english: School keeps me pretty busy.
spanish: La escuela me mantiene bastante ocupado.

english: I called you in here to ask you a question.
spanish: Te llamé acá para hacerte una pregunta.

english: He went home while it was still light.
spanish: Él volvió a casa habiendo luz todavía.

english: I earn my living as best I can.
spanish: Me gano la vida como puedo.

english: Do you have a ticket?
spanish: ¿Tienes un boleto?

english: The plane didn't stop at New York.
spanish: El avión no hizo escala en New York.

english: Well, I have to go now.
spanish: Ahora tengo que irme.

english: He boasts that he can speak six languages.
spanish: Él se jacta de que puede hablar seis idiomas.

english: It's almost half past eleven.
spanish: Casi son las once y media.

english: I don't know anybody here.
spanish: Aquí no conozco a nadie.

english: She told him that she loved him.
spanish: Ella le dijo que lo amaba.

english: The river runs through the valley.
spanish: El río atraviesa el valle.

english: It is better to live rich, than to die rich.
spanish: Es mejor vivir rico que morir rico.

english: He gave a detailed description of the accident.
spanish: Él dio una descripción detallada del accidente.

english: This song reminds me of someone.
spanish: Esta canción me trae recuerdos de alguien.

english: I think that you're wrong.
spanish: Creo que te equivocas.

english: Tom should've danced with Mary.
spanish: Tom debería haber bailado con Mary.

english: Won't you come with me?
spanish: ¿No vienes conmigo?

english: He hurt his knee when he fell.
spanish: Al caer se hizo daño en la rodilla.

english: I could not keep the tears from my eyes.
spanish: No pude contener las lágrimas.

english: There's nothing in the fridge.
spanish: No hay nada en la nevera.

english: You're either with me or you're against me.
spanish: Estás conmigo o contra mí.

english: He always leaves the window open while he sleeps.
spanish: Él siempre deja la ventana abierta cuando duerme.

english: Everybody agreed with his idea.
spanish: Todos estaban de acuerdo con su idea.

english: What is your name, sir?
spanish: ¿Cuál es su nombre, señor?

english: I'm not willing to do that.
spanish: Yo no estoy dispuesto a hacer eso.

english: Tom loved the color of Mary's new dress.
spanish: A Tom le encantaba el color del nuevo vestido de Mary.

english: Let me win for once.
spanish: Quiero ganar por una vez.

english: This book is too difficult to read in a week.
spanish: Este libro es demasiado complicado para leerlo en una semana.

english: I think I understand the pressures you are under.
spanish: Creo que entiendo las presiones a las que estás sometido.

english: I don't know why they don't understand.
spanish: No sé por qué no lo entendéis.

english: Tom eats chocolate every day.
spanish: Tom come chocolate todos los días.

english: Tom and Mary grow leaf lettuce in their garden.
spanish: Tom y María cultivan lechuga en su jardín.

english: You aren't a spy, are you?
spanish: ¿No eres un espía, o sí?

english: Will you help me for a minute?
spanish: ¿Me ayudas un minuto?

english: Tom doesn't know what he'd do without Mary.
spanish: Tom no sabe qué haría él sin Mary.

english: This book is suitable for beginners.
spanish: Este libro es apropiado para principiantes.

english: I think my plan is better than yours.
spanish: Creo que mi plan es mejor que el tuyo.

english: He was eating a sandwich.
spanish: Estaba comiendo un sándwich.

english: Tom spoke French to me.
spanish: Tom habló conmigo en francés.

english: There is nothing interesting in the newspaper.
spanish: No hay nada interesante en el periódico.

english: Just don't tell anyone else.
spanish: Pero no le digas a nadie más.

english: They are going to meet at the hotel tomorrow.
spanish: Ellos se van a encontrar mañana en el hotel.

english: The hotel is down there.
spanish: El hotel está allí abajo.

english: He's a famous popular singer in Japan.
spanish: Es un cantante famoso en Japón.

english: I knew you wanted me.
spanish: Sabía que me querías.

english: How did you ever get out of it?
spanish: ¿Cómo hizo usted para salir de aquello?

english: Do you have a subway map?
spanish: ¿Tienes un mapa del metro?

english: This is one of Boston's best hotels.
spanish: Este es uno de los mejores hoteles de Boston.

english: I think it's impossible for Tom.
spanish: Creo que es imposible para Tom.

english: Can we really afford that?
spanish: ¿Podemos permitírnoslo?

english: Rain is forecast for this evening.
spanish: Se pronostica lluvia para esta noche.

english: I'll fix it up with him.
spanish: Lo arreglaré con él.

english: I believe that he's happy.
spanish: Yo creo que él es feliz.

english: Are you tired of waiting in line?
spanish: ¿Estás cansado de hacer cola?

english: His rank isn't high enough for that position.
spanish: No tiene categoría para ese puesto.

english: Tom comes here once a month.
spanish: Tom viene aquí una vez al mes.

english: I don't believe such things exist.
spanish: No creo que tales cosas existan.

english: Tom looks like a nervous wreck.
spanish: Tom se ve como un manojo de nervios.

english: I have three pieces of baggage.
spanish: Tengo tres maletas.

english: My parents were satisfied with my grades this year.
spanish: Mis padres quedaron satisfechos con mis notas de este año.

english: My brother works in France.
spanish: Mi hermano trabaja en Francia.

english: He is busy preparing for an examination.
spanish: Él está ocupado preparándose para un examen.

english: I'm very busy so don't count on me.
spanish: Estoy muy ocupada, así que no cuentes conmigo.

english: I thought you might want something to drink.
spanish: Pensé que querríais algo de tomar.

english: It's fun to learn about foreign cultures.
spanish: Estudiar las culturas de otros países es divertido.

english: I'll get there before you will.
spanish: Llegaré antes que tú.

english: Tom won't be wearing a tie.
spanish: Tom no llevará corbata.

english: Will you tell me what I should do next?
spanish: ¿Me dirías qué debo hacer luego?

english: I am at the end of my patience.
spanish: Estoy al límite de mi paciencia.

english: Do you have attacks of dizziness?
spanish: ¿Tiene usted ataques de vértigo?

english: He is among the best jazz singers.
spanish: Él está entre los mejores cantantes de jazz.

english: Choose either one or the other.
spanish: Elige uno u otro.

english: We were busy working all night.
spanish: Estuvimos ocupados trabajando toda la noche.

english: The Nintendo DS is a popular handheld game console.
spanish: La Nintendo DS es una consola portátil de juegos popular.

english: May I turn on the television?
spanish: ¿Puedo prender el televisor?

english: He used to try very hard to get straight As.
spanish: Solía hacer muchos esfuerzos para conseguir todo sobresalientes.

english: Why are you busy today?
spanish: ¿Por qué estás hoy ocupado?

english: Tom is an established writer.
spanish: Tom es un escritor consolidado.

english: He always does as he pleases.
spanish: Siempre hace lo que quiere.

english: Didn't you lock up your car?
spanish: ¿No cerraste el coche?

english: I study from eight to eleven.
spanish: Estudio de las ocho a las once.

english: You look kind of down.
spanish: Pareces algo triste.

english: He is Japanese by birth.
spanish: Él es japonés de nacimiento.

english: He came into my room.
spanish: Él vino a mi habitación.

english: She is a good swimmer.
spanish: Ella es una buena nadadora.

english: Tom never took Mary seriously.
spanish: Tom nunca tomó a Mary en serio.

english: Do you know all these people?
spanish: ¿Conocés a toda esta gente?

english: Japanese tourists abroad are big spenders.
spanish: Los turistas japoneses en el extranjero son grandes derrochadores.

english: You must be worn out after working all day.
spanish: Sin duda debes de estar agotado después de trabajar todo el día.

english: Tom drank straight from the can.
spanish: Tom bebió directo de la lata.

english: Do you give to charity?
spanish: ¿Tú das a caridad?

english: He said, "Let's take a short rest."
spanish: Él dijo: «Tomémonos un pequeño descanso».

english: Draw a line on the paper.
spanish: Trazá una línea en el papel.

english: You are a professional, but I am an amateur.
spanish: Vos sos un profesional pero yo soy un amateur.

english: I'd rather stay here than go there.
spanish: Preferiría quedarme aquí que ir allí.

english: I don't understand your question.
spanish: No entiendo tu pregunta.

english: When did you receive the telegram?
spanish: ¿Cuándo recibiste el telegrama?

english: You shouldn't talk when the teacher's talking.
spanish: No deberías hablar cuando el profesor está hablando.

english: I have been to Tokyo only once.
spanish: Sólo he ido una vez a Tokio.

english: He is handsome and clever.
spanish: Es guapo e inteligente.

english: Tom is used to hard work.
spanish: Tom está acostumbrado a trabajar mucho.

english: It was one of the best nights I've had.
spanish: Fue una de las mejores noches que he tenido.

english: I hate the guy who lives next door.
spanish: No aguanto al vecino.

english: Someone in this room needs a good deodorant.
spanish: Alguien en esta sala está necesitando un buen desodorante.

english: I'm only thinking of you.
spanish: Sólo estoy pensando en ti.

english: My mother allowed me to go abroad.
spanish: Mi madre me dejó ir al extranjero.

english: That's what I don't understand.
spanish: Eso es lo que no entiendo.

english: Tom didn't want to argue with Mary.
spanish: Tom no quería discutir con Mary.

english: Do you think it'll rain today?
spanish: ¿Crees que hoy va a llover?

english: I want to be an honest person.
spanish: Quiero ser una persona honesta.

english: What I want now is something to eat.
spanish: Lo que quiero ahora es algo para comer.

english: No answer is also an answer.
spanish: Ninguna respuesta también es una respuesta.

english: Who are they talking to?
spanish: ¿A quién le están hablando?

english: I made an appointment to see him at seven o'clock.
spanish: Me cité para verle a las siete en punto.

english: What time did you arrive there?
spanish: ¿A qué hora llegaste ahí?

english: Tom, your life's in danger.
spanish: Tom, tu vida está en peligro.

english: I told you I didn't want to do this.
spanish: Te dije que no quería hacer esto.

english: Is the lecture already finished?
spanish: ¿Ha finalizado ya la conferencia?

english: What do you intend to do?
spanish: ¿Qué tiene pensado hacer?

english: Let's ask Tom what he thinks.
spanish: Vamos a preguntar a Tom qué piensa.

english: Can I borrow your phone?
spanish: ¿Te puedo pedir prestado tu teléfono?

english: That's my CD, isn't it?
spanish: Ese es mi CD, ¿cierto?

english: I had to walk because there were no taxis.
spanish: Tuve que caminar porque no había taxis.

english: You saw Tom, didn't you?
spanish: Viste a Tomás, ¿verdad?

english: It is said the house is haunted.
spanish: Se dice que la casa está embrujada.

english: I love my yellow sweater.
spanish: Me encanta mi jersey amarillo.

english: He made an apology to us for being late.
spanish: Se disculpó con nosotros por haber llegado tarde.

english: Who do you think will be chosen?
spanish: ¿Quién piensas que será elegido?

english: She decided not to go.
spanish: Ella decidió no ir.

english: I agree with you to some extent.
spanish: Hasta cierto punto estoy de acuerdo contigo.

english: Should I have my tooth extracted?
spanish: ¿Debería hacer que me extraigan el diente?

english: Tom wanted to explain, but Mary wouldn't let him.
spanish: Tom quería explicar, pero María no se lo permitió.

english: They go skiing at Nozawa every winter.
spanish: Ellos van a esquiar a Nozowa cada invierno.

english: Isn't that skirt too short?
spanish: ¿Acaso no es muy corta esa falda?

english: I know you blame me for Tom's death.
spanish: Sé que me culpas por la muerte de Tom.

english: That car's so big that parking it is difficult.
spanish: Ese auto es tan grande, que estacionarlo es difícil.

english: I'll talk with you when you're not busy.
spanish: Hablaré contigo cuando estés desocupado.

english: There isn't much furniture in my house.
spanish: En mi casa no hay muchos muebles.

english: I don't remember where I put my key.
spanish: No me acuerdo dónde puse mi llave.

english: Who's your favorite fashion model?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu modelo favorito?

english: We need to finish the job.
spanish: Necesitamos terminar el trabajo.

english: Rich mineral deposits have been discovered recently in Afghanistan.
spanish: Recientemente se han descubierto depósitos ricos en minerales en Afganistán.

english: I drank from the tap.
spanish: Bebí del grifo.

english: Tom told Mary that she shouldn't walk alone after dark.
spanish: Tom le dijo a María que no debería caminar sola al anochecer.

english: Can you believe it? He's even lazier than me.
spanish: ¿Puedes creerlo? Él es aún más flojo que yo.

english: Tom doesn't know if Mary will come tomorrow.
spanish: Tom no sabe si Mary vendrá mañana.

english: Do you like this blouse?
spanish: ¿Te gusta esta blusa?

english: Which group do you want to join?
spanish: ¿A qué grupo te quieres unir?

english: Tom kept walking back and forth.
spanish: Tom siguió caminando de un lado para otro.

english: My phone was out of order.
spanish: Mi teléfono se estropeó.

english: We expect Tom to come back soon.
spanish: Esperamos que Tom vuelva pronto.

english: I'm glad to see you.
spanish: Me alegro de verte.

english: Will it be much longer?
spanish: ¿Durará mucho más?

english: Tom got fired from his job.
spanish: Tomás fue echado de su trabajo.

english: Tom doubts if Mary will come tomorrow.
spanish: Tom duda que Mary venga mañana.

english: I know we can do it.
spanish: Sé que podemos hacerlo.

english: The bill was approved by an overwhelming majority.
spanish: El proyecto de ley fue aprobado por una abrumadora mayoría.

english: He hopes that something interesting happens.
spanish: Él espera que pase algo interesante.

english: My wife loves apple pie.
spanish: Mi esposa ama el pastel de manzana.

english: England resembles Japan in many respects.
spanish: Inglaterra se asemeja a Japón en muchos aspectos.

english: I'd like to sail around the world.
spanish: Me gustaría navegar por todo el mundo.

english: He said, "I'm from Canada."
spanish: Dijo: "Soy de Canadá."

english: She wore a red blouse.
spanish: Ella llevaba una blusa roja.

english: Would you excuse me a moment?
spanish: ¿Me disculparía por un momento?

english: You've got the wrong person.
spanish: Tenéis a la persona equivocada.

english: Did you bring a hair dryer?
spanish: ¿Trajeron un secador de pelo?

english: Why would Tom want to kill anyone?
spanish: ¿Por qué Tom querría matar a alguien?

english: Tom put the flowers in a vase.
spanish: Tom puso las flores en un florero.

english: It's good that you're here.
spanish: Es bueno que estés aquí.

english: Are you going to share that?
spanish: ¿Vas a compartir eso?

english: She is unable to cope with stress.
spanish: Ella no puede manejar el estrés.

english: Tom folded his clothes and put them in his suitcase.
spanish: Tom dobló su ropa y la puso en su maleta.

english: When she heard the news, she broke down crying.
spanish: Al oír la noticia, ella colapsó en llanto.

english: Tom ran to the door and tried to open it.
spanish: Tom corrió hacia la puerta e intentó abrirla.

english: You can't do two things at once.
spanish: No puedes hacer dos cosas al mismo tiempo.

english: Tom doesn't know when Mary will come.
spanish: Tomás no sabe cuando va a venir María.

english: Making good grades requires studying hard.
spanish: Para tener buenas notas hay que estudiar mucho.

english: Do you think Tom is hungry?
spanish: ¿Vos creés que Tom tiene hambre?

english: We're a little busy here.
spanish: Estamos un poco ocupados acá.

english: I thought the same exact thing.
spanish: Pensé exactamente lo mismo.

english: Do you plan to go to Boston by bus?
spanish: ¿Planeas ir a Boston en bus?

english: I wonder where Tom is and who he's with.
spanish: Me pregunto dónde está Tom y con quién está.

english: I want to be on the other team.
spanish: Quiero estar en el otro equipo.

english: It was foolish of you to accept his offer.
spanish: Fue tonto de tu parte aceptar su oferta.

english: Tom had no chance to tell Mary what he thought.
spanish: Tom no tuvo una oportunidad para decirle a Mary lo que pensaba.

english: That's Tom's house with the red roof.
spanish: Aquella casa del tejado rojo es la de Tom.

english: I put some milk in my coffee.
spanish: Le puse algo de leche a mi café.

english: Don't you ever speak to me like that again.
spanish: Nunca más me hables de esa manera.

english: I know it was just a dream.
spanish: Sé que solo era un sueño.

english: Tom usually eats his lunch alone.
spanish: Tom comúnmente se come su almuerzo solo.

english: Could you turn down the radio?
spanish: ¿Puedes bajar la radio?

english: He's an excellent brain surgeon.
spanish: Él es un excelente neurocirujano.

english: I kept as quiet as possible.
spanish: Me quedé lo más quieto posible que pude sin hacer ruido.

english: Tom lent his camera to Mary.
spanish: Tom le prestó su cámara a Mary.

english: The child was full of curiosity.
spanish: El niño estaba lleno de curiosidad.

english: Spain is a developed country.
spanish: España es un país desarrollado.

english: Tom didn't know how to thank Mary.
spanish: Tom no sabía cómo darle las gracias a Mary.

english: She is peeling the potatoes.
spanish: Ella está pelando las papas.

english: I'll bring you something to eat.
spanish: Te traeré algo de comer.

english: Today I don't feel like doing anything.
spanish: Hoy no tengo ganas de hacer nada.

english: I just wanted a coffee.
spanish: Sólo quería un café.

english: The girl let the bird loose.
spanish: La niña dejó escapar al pájaro.

english: I hope that I'll see her.
spanish: Espero verla.

english: When did you first meet him?
spanish: ¿Cuándo lo viste por primera vez?

english: She thinks highly of him.
spanish: Ella le respeta.

english: I don't own any real jewels.
spanish: No tengo joyas verdaderas.

english: We've got a lot to learn.
spanish: Tenemos mucho que aprender.

english: Tom and Mary kissed passionately.
spanish: Tom y Mary se besaron apasionadamente.

english: He should come right away!
spanish: ¡Él debe venir de inmediato!

english: I don't want to make the same mistakes over again.
spanish: No quiero cometer el mismo error otra vez.

english: Thank you for your concern.
spanish: Gracias por tu preocupación.

english: The game was canceled due to rain.
spanish: El juego se suspendió por la lluvia.

english: You two come with me.
spanish: Vosotros dos venid conmigo.

english: I don't want you working here.
spanish: No te quiero trabajando aquí.

english: My wife isn't beautiful. Yours is.
spanish: Mi esposa no es hermosa. La suya sí.

english: He was given a gold watch as a reward.
spanish: Él recibió un reloj de pulsera dorado como recompensa.

english: They wash their car every Saturday.
spanish: Lavan su coche todos los sábados.

english: He told him to study.
spanish: Él le dijo que estudiara.

english: Which do you like better, this or that?
spanish: ¿Cuál te gusta más, este o ese?

english: He writes to his parents once a month.
spanish: Él escribe a sus padres una vez al mes.

english: Tom wears very thick glasses.
spanish: Tomás usa unos anteojos muy gruesos.

english: You're Tom's friend, aren't you?
spanish: Vos sos el amigo de Tom, ¿verdad?

english: I'm sorry for the delay in responding.
spanish: Siento la demora en contestar.

english: Tom picked up a stone and threw it at Mary.
spanish: Tom cogió una piedra y se la arrojó a María.

english: What time is it now?
spanish: ¿Qué hora es ahora?

english: No one is listening to me.
spanish: Nadie me está escuchando.

english: My house is on a hill.
spanish: Mi casa está en una colina.

english: A young child has a small vocabulary.
spanish: Un niño pequeño usa un vocabulario reducido.

english: Tom is reading a book.
spanish: Tom está leyendo un libro.

english: You've got a black eye.
spanish: Tienes un ojo morado.

english: Do I have to go right now?
spanish: ¿Tengo que ir ahora?

english: Tom had a really great time.
spanish: Tom la pasó realmente bien.

english: I'm just glad everything turned out OK.
spanish: Estoy verdaderamente satisfecho de que todo saliera bien.

english: Pardon, do you have the time?
spanish: Perdone, ¿tiene hora?

english: Tom told Mary what to do.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary lo que tenía que hacer.

english: Where are you going on your honeymoon?
spanish: ¿A dónde vas a ir en tu luna de miel?

english: Why is Tom still in Boston?
spanish: ¿Por qué Tomás sigue en Boston?

english: Can I have some water?
spanish: ¿Puedo tomar algo de agua?

english: Everybody feels comfortable with him.
spanish: Todos se sienten cómodos con él.

english: You have the same racket as I have.
spanish: Tienes la misma raqueta que tengo yo.

english: Everybody knew Tom was in trouble.
spanish: Todos sabían que Tom estaba en apuros.

english: Where were you at the time of the murder?
spanish: ¿Dónde estabas en el momento del asesinato?

english: This is the important part.
spanish: Esta es la parte importante.

english: The criminal was arrested and put into prison.
spanish: El criminal fue arrestado y puesto en prisión.

english: He opened the cage and set the birds free.
spanish: Él abrió la jaula y liberó a los pájaros.

english: When are you coming to Melbourne again?
spanish: ¿Cuándo vendrán nuevamente a Melbourne?

english: He could run fast when he was young.
spanish: Él podía correr rápido cuando era joven.

english: Tom's house was destroyed by a tornado.
spanish: La casa de Tom fue destruida por un tornado.

english: I wish you were a little more like me.
spanish: Desearía que fueras un poco más como yo.

english: When it comes to cooking, no one can beat me.
spanish: Si se trata de cocinar, nadie me puede superar.

english: You can't make an omelet without breaking eggs.
spanish: No puedes hacer un omelet sin quebrar huevos.

english: Will you come with us?
spanish: ¿Vendrás con nosotros?

english: I did my military service in Ankara.
spanish: Hice mi servicio militar en Ankara.

english: I don't know the reason why he went there.
spanish: Yo no sé la razón por la que él fue allí.

english: Zurich is considered to be a major financial hub.
spanish: Zürich es considerada una metrópoli financiera.

english: A cat was on the table.
spanish: Sobre la mesa había un gato.

english: Tom can't afford that kind of computer.
spanish: Tom no puede permitirse ese tipo de ordenador.

english: There's ample room in the attic.
spanish: Hay suficiente espacio en el ático.

english: This bicycle belongs to my brother.
spanish: Esta bicicleta le pertenece a mi hermano.

english: I thought it was a secret.
spanish: Creía que era un secreto.

english: Excuse me, but where is the men's shoe department?
spanish: Discúlpeme pero, ¿dónde está es departamento de calzado masculino?

english: I don't want anything for Christmas.
spanish: No quiero nada para Navidad.

english: I just want to visit Tom.
spanish: Solo quiero visitar a Tom.

english: Tom can fix the heater.
spanish: Tom puede arreglar el calefactor.

english: Were you expecting something different to happen?
spanish: ¿Esperabas que pasara algo diferente?

english: I need to show you something.
spanish: Necesito mostrarte algo.

english: When did you start smoking?
spanish: ¿A qué edad empezaste a fumar?

english: They demanded money from him.
spanish: Ellos exigieron dinero de él.

english: His second son married and settled down.
spanish: Su segundo hijo se casó y asentó la cabeza.

english: People don't always behave rationally.
spanish: Las personas no siempre se comportan racionalmente.

english: There's no doubt that he's innocent.
spanish: No hay ninguna duda de que es inocente.

english: The members of the jury listened carefully to the attorney.
spanish: Los miembros del jurado escucharon cuidadosamente al abogado.

english: Are you going to school tomorrow?
spanish: ¿Vas a ir a la escuela mañana?

spanish: ¿Vienes a la tienda conmigo?

english: Have patience for another day or two.
spanish: Tenga paciencia por uno o dos días más.

english: What time does your plane leave?
spanish: ¿A qué hora sale tu avión?

english: The vase she broke is my aunt's.
spanish: El jarrón que rompió es de mi tía.

english: I want to play cards.
spanish: Quiero jugar a las cartas.

english: Tom wants to know why you're not working here anymore.
spanish: Tom quiere saber por qué ya no trabajas aquí.

english: I wish you had been there.
spanish: Ojalá hubieras estado allí.

english: How much is this clock?
spanish: ¿Cuánto cuesta este reloj?

english: Tom doesn't do things like that.
spanish: Tom no hace cosas como esa.

english: Tom doesn't pay much attention to how he dresses.
spanish: Tom no presta mucha atención a cómo se viste.

english: He interpreted my silence as consent.
spanish: Él juzgó mi silencio como consentimiento.

english: Why are you so angry with him?
spanish: ¿Por qué estás tan enfadado con él?

english: I wish I could sing like Tom.
spanish: Desearía poder cantar como Tomás.

english: Your dog is still barking at me.
spanish: Tu perro todavía me está ladrando.

english: Tom had no time to waste.
spanish: Tom no tenía tiempo que perder.

english: I have a few books.
spanish: Tengo unos cuantos libros.

english: I will be working all day tomorrow.
spanish: Yo estaré trabajando mañana todo el día.

english: I was asked to wait here.
spanish: Me pidieron que esperase aquí.

english: I have been to Rome.
spanish: He ido a Roma.

english: He is good at soccer.
spanish: Él juega bien al fútbol.

english: I have never eaten a mango before.
spanish: Nunca he comido un mango.

english: I'm very proud of my father.
spanish: Estoy muy orgulloso de mi padre.

english: This morning the teacher got very angry with me.
spanish: La profesora se enojó mucho conmigo esta mañana.

english: The box was almost full.
spanish: Esa caja estaba casi llena.

english: I want to eat out today.
spanish: Hoy quiero salir a comer.

english: You should leave it for tomorrow.
spanish: Lo deberías dejar para mañana.

english: I am hers and she is mine.
spanish: Yo soy de ella y ella es mía.

english: Tom always leaves everything to the last minute.
spanish: Tomás siempre deja todo para último momento.

english: There are rumors that she found a new job.
spanish: Se rumorea que ella encontró un nuevo empleo.

english: Tom went to the Australian embassy to get a visa.
spanish: Tom fue a la embajada australiana a conseguir una visa.

english: It has worked out nicely.
spanish: Salió de maravillas.

english: Not only did he give me advice, but also money.
spanish: No sólo me dio el consejo, sino también el dinero.

english: It's easier to make money when you already have some.
spanish: Es más fácil hacer dinero cuando ya tienes algo.

english: I don't want to be late for work.
spanish: No quiero llegar atrasado al trabajo.

english: Could I have a piece of cheesecake?
spanish: ¿Podrían darme un pedazo de tarta de queso?

english: Tom has a cousin named Mary.
spanish: Tom tiene una prima de nombre María.

english: Aren't you glad Tom isn't here?
spanish: ¿No estás feliz de que Tom no esté aquí?

english: Tom asked me if I liked Chinese food.
spanish: Tom me preguntó si me gustaba la comida china.

english: Why don't you try to behave like a gentleman?
spanish: ¿Por qué no tratas de portarte como un caballero?

english: The arrow indicates the way to go.
spanish: La flecha indica el camino a seguir.

english: Can you help us tonight?
spanish: ¿Nos podés ayudar esta noche?

english: Tom took his shirt off.
spanish: Tom se quitó su camisa.

english: We didn't need to do that.
spanish: No necesitamos hacer eso.

english: Tom and Mary stopped hugging.
spanish: Tom y Mary dejaron de abrazarse.

english: She was loved by everybody in the village.
spanish: Ella era querida por todos en la villa.

english: The soldiers were equipped with weapons.
spanish: Los soldados estaban equipados con armas.

english: I'll bring you the bill immediately.
spanish: Le traeré la cuenta inmediatamente.

english: How many do you want?
spanish: ¿Cuántos quiere?

english: I think Tom hates my dog.
spanish: Creo que Tom odia a mi perro.

english: She is in an awful mood.
spanish: Ella está de pésimo humor.

english: When does the movie start?
spanish: ¿Cuándo empieza la película?

english: There are birds singing in the cage, aren't there?
spanish: Hay pájaros cantando dentro de la jaula, ¿no?

english: Tom doesn't have a lot of freedom.
spanish: Tom no tiene mucha libertad.

english: She wants to dye her hair red.
spanish: Ella quiere teñirse el pelo de rojo.

english: Why are you so tired today?
spanish: ¿Por qué estáis tan cansados hoy?

english: I'd like to sit by the window.
spanish: Me gustaría sentarme en la ventana.

english: None of Tom's relatives came to his funeral.
spanish: Ninguno de los familiares de Tom vinieron a su funeral.

english: Tom's house has three bedrooms.
spanish: La casa de Tom tiene tres habitaciones.

english: She is great at skiing.
spanish: Ella es buena esquiando.

english: It is very difficult to talk about what happened.
spanish: Es muy difícil hablar sobre lo que ocurrió.

english: I hope that everything is okay.
spanish: Espero que todo esté bien.

english: He devotes himself to his work.
spanish: Se consagra a su trabajo.

english: Tom is always in a hurry.
spanish: Tom siempre está en un apuro.

english: I have to take a bus to go anywhere.
spanish: Tengo que coger un autobús para ir adonde sea.

english: I need to keep you safe.
spanish: Necesito mantenerte a salvo.

english: He was in the queue.
spanish: Él estaba en la lista de espera.

english: Tom's father is very strict.
spanish: El padre de Tom es muy estricto.

english: We came here to enjoy ourselves.
spanish: Vinimos aquí para divertirnos.

english: Christmas comes but once a year.
spanish: La Navidad es sólo una vez por año.

english: He lives apart from his family.
spanish: Él vive lejos de su familia.

english: I didn't ask for you.
spanish: No pregunté por vos.

english: That boy takes after his father.
spanish: El niño se parece a su padre.

english: This chair is soft and comfortable.
spanish: Esta silla es blanda y cómoda.

english: He won the next election.
spanish: Él ganó las elecciones siguientes.

english: The one who has everything can lose everything.
spanish: El que lo tiene todo puede perderlo todo.

english: It is stupid of you to make such a mistake.
spanish: Es estúpido de tu parte cometer semejante error.

english: I want to make sure you're safe.
spanish: Quiero asegurarme de que estés a salvo.

english: The passengers all went aboard the ship.
spanish: Todos los pasajeros abordaron el barco.

english: Tom threw a rotten egg at Mary.
spanish: Tom le tiró un huevo podrido a Mary.

english: You are saying you intentionally hide your good looks?
spanish: ¿Quieres decir que ocultas intencionalmente tu belleza?

english: I was pretty hungry when I got home.
spanish: Tenía mucha hambre cuando llegué a casa.

english: Is there a garden in front of the house?
spanish: ¿Hay un jardín frente a la casa?

english: It was the worst moment of my life.
spanish: Fue el peor momento de mi vida.

english: Please turn off the radio.
spanish: Por favor, apaga la radio.

english: We've run out of tea.
spanish: No nos queda té.

english: I didn't lie to Tom.
spanish: No le mentí a Tom.

english: How did he find us?
spanish: ¿Cómo nos ha encontrado?

english: Tom is willing to pay Mary whatever she asks for.
spanish: Tomás está dispuesto a pagarle a María lo que ella pida.

english: I don't know what's going on.
spanish: No sé qué está pasando.

english: Tom doesn't like either beer or wine.
spanish: A Tom no le gusta la cerveza ni el vino.

english: Let me see a menu.
spanish: Déjame ver el menú.

english: It doesn't hurt as much as it did before.
spanish: No duele tanto como antes.

english: We haven't seen you in a while.
spanish: No te hemos visto en un tiempo.

english: Our town was bombed twice this week.
spanish: Nuestra ciudad ha sido bombardeada dos veces esta semana.

english: It's hard to learn a foreign language.
spanish: Aprender lenguas extranjeras es difícil.

english: I will be seeing the doctor again next Friday.
spanish: Voy a ver al doctor de nuevo el próximo viernes.

english: Tom accepted the job offer.
spanish: Tom aceptó la oferta de trabajo.

english: Would you prefer to speak in English?
spanish: ¿Preferirías hablar en inglés?

english: She lives in a huge house.
spanish: Ella vive en una casa grande.

english: The bridge is built of wood.
spanish: El puente está hecho de madera.

english: I can't find my gloves.
spanish: No encuentro mis guantes.

english: The students bowed to their teacher.
spanish: Los estudiantes se inclinaron ante su maestro.

english: I grew up in the mountains.
spanish: Yo crecí en la montaña.

english: Don't speak to me about Tom. We're on bad terms.
spanish: No me hables de Tom, estoy a matar con él.

english: The roof is on fire.
spanish: El techo está en llamas.

english: My brother is rich enough to buy a car.
spanish: Mi hermano es lo suficientemente rico como para comprar un coche.

english: Suddenly, the door opened and her father entered.
spanish: De repente se abrió la puerta y entró su padre.

english: I was fined for not wearing a seatbelt.
spanish: Me multaron por no llevar puesto el cinturón.

english: Tom wants to play golf with Mary's father.
spanish: Tom quiere jugar golf con el padre de Mary.

english: I can't believe Tom is really here.
spanish: No puedo creer que Tom esté de verdad aquí.

english: Your question is not relevant to the subject.
spanish: Tu pregunta no tiene relación con el tema.

english: I spent the weekend reading a long novel.
spanish: Pasé el fin de semana leyendo una larga novela.

english: The resemblance between these two men is uncanny.
spanish: El parecido entre estos dos hombres es misterioso.

english: Having finished lunch, we went skating.
spanish: Después de almorzar, fuimos a esquiar.

english: I didn't expect to meet you.
spanish: No esperaba encontrarte.

english: There's a rock on the floor.
spanish: Hay una roca sobre el piso.

english: She does not do things like that.
spanish: Ella no hace cosas así.

english: Ask him whether they still live in Tokyo.
spanish: Pregúntale si todavía viven en Tokio.

english: I keep a rabbit as a pet.
spanish: Tengo un conejo como mascota.

english: Mark Twain said, "All generalizations are false, including this one."
spanish: Mark Twain dijo: "Todas las generalizaciones son falsas, incluyendo ésta".

english: How much time do you intend to stay in Oxford?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo piensas quedarte en Oxford?

english: Tom doesn't know how much Mary weighs.
spanish: Tom no sabe cuánto pesa Mary.

english: This is my favorite movie.
spanish: Esta es mi película favorita.

english: You'll forget about me someday.
spanish: Un día me olvidarás.

english: When does the game begin?
spanish: ¿Cuándo comienza el juego?

english: Watching TV is a passive activity.
spanish: Ver la tele es una actividad pasiva.

english: The bullet found its mark.
spanish: La bala dio a su objetivo.

english: I thought Tom would know how to do that.
spanish: Pensé que Tom sabría cómo hacer eso.

english: It was really quite fast.
spanish: Fue bastante rápido.

english: She could not understand the whole story.
spanish: Ella no pudo comprender el cuento entero.

english: The water's leaking from the elbow of the pipe.
spanish: El agua goteaba por el codo de la cañería.

english: Does anyone in your family speak French?
spanish: ¿Alguien de tu familia habla francés?

english: I feel uneasy in my father's presence.
spanish: Cuando estoy con mi padre no me siento cómodo.

english: She can't find her hat.
spanish: Ella no puede encontrar su sombrero.

english: He's rich, but he's not happy.
spanish: Es rico, pero no feliz.

english: Can you loan me a pen?
spanish: ¿Me dejas un boli?

english: I can't do anything but obey him.
spanish: No me queda más opción que obedecerle.

english: Next Monday and Tuesday are holidays.
spanish: Los próximos lunes y martes son fiesta.

english: How much will you charge me for the suit?
spanish: ¿Cuánto me cobrará usted por el traje?

english: We're trying to get better.
spanish: Estamos tratando de mejorar.

english: Tom took Mary to the hospital.
spanish: Tom llevó a María al hospital.

english: I'm too tired to ride my bicycle back home.
spanish: Estoy demasiado cansado para volver a casa en bicicleta.

english: I've managed to finish the first three chapters so far.
spanish: Por ahora he conseguido acabarme los tres primeros capítulos.

english: Such luxury is beyond my reach.
spanish: Tal lujo está más allá de mi alcance.

english: I still have a lot of questions.
spanish: Todavía tengo muchas preguntas.

english: The new film was a great success.
spanish: La nueva película fue un gran éxito.

english: Why don't you ask Tom yourself?
spanish: ¿Por qué no le preguntas tú misma a Tom?

english: Are there still wild bears in Germany?
spanish: ¿Aún hay osos salvajes en Alemania?

english: There's nothing good on television.
spanish: No echan nada bueno por la tele.

english: She waited for him for hours.
spanish: Ella lo esperó por horas.

english: I can't play tennis as well as Tom.
spanish: No juego al tenis tan bien como Tom.

english: We took lots of pictures.
spanish: Sacamos muchas fotos.

english: I ate a hamburger and ordered another.
spanish: Me comí una hamburguesa y pedí otra.

english: We made pancakes for breakfast.
spanish: Hacemos hotcakes para desayunar.

english: There's a slight possibility of a recurrence.
spanish: Existe una pequeña posibilidad de recaída.

english: I've already drank three cups of coffee.
spanish: Ya me he tomado tres tazas de café.

english: Don't trust what he says.
spanish: No confíes en lo que él dice.

english: Do you have any sisters?
spanish: ¿Tienes hermanas?

english: They were treated for hypothermia.
spanish: Fueron tratados de hipotermia.

english: Tom doesn't usually do stupid things like that.
spanish: Tom normalmente no hace cosas estúpidas como esa.

english: We all agreed that the plan made sense.
spanish: Todos acordamos que el plan tenía perfecto sentido.

english: Mary is a very beautiful girl.
spanish: Mary es una niña muy linda.

english: He carried a rifle on his shoulder.
spanish: Él cargaba un rifle en su hombro.

english: I forced her to do my homework.
spanish: La obligué a hacerme los deberes.

english: Don't treat me like a child.
spanish: No me trates como si fuese un niño.

english: I barely know Tom at all.
spanish: Casi no conozco a Tom.

english: Let me congratulate you on your success.
spanish: Permítame felicitarla por su éxito.

english: Why are you so insecure?
spanish: ¿Por qué estás tan insegura?

english: The deadline is drawing near.
spanish: La fecha límite se acerca.

english: Do you know when Tom got his driver's license?
spanish: ¿Sabes cuándo consiguió Tom su licencia de conducir?

english: It was easy to find his office.
spanish: Fue sencillo encontrar su oficina.

english: Tom was at home alone.
spanish: Tom estaba solo en casa.

english: These articles are not for sale.
spanish: Estos artículos no están a la venta.

english: This dictionary is by far the best.
spanish: Este diccionario es el mejor con diferencia.

english: I won't be here long.
spanish: No estaré aquí mucho tiempo.

english: I think we should tell Tom what we think.
spanish: Creo que deberíamos decirle a Tom lo que pensamos.

english: There is an urgent need for new ideas.
spanish: Se necesitan urgentemente nuevas ideas.

english: Shall I buy you a ticket for the concert?
spanish: ¿Te compro una entrada para el concierto?

english: When did you see him last?
spanish: ¿Cuándo le viste por última vez?

english: He just wants to have fun.
spanish: Él solo quiere divertirse.

english: They will set up a new company.
spanish: Ellos fundarán una nueva compañía.

english: His ambition made him work hard.
spanish: Su ambición le hacía trabajar duro.

english: May I go home now?
spanish: ¿Me puedo ir a casa ahora?

english: I want to live in Australia.
spanish: Quiero vivir en Australia.

english: Losing my daughter has taken away my will to live.
spanish: Perder a mi hija me sacó la voluntad de vivir.

english: He did it simply out of curiosity.
spanish: Lo hizo simplemente por curiosidad.

english: Tom and Mary couldn't move the heavy trunk.
spanish: Tom y Mary no podían mover el pesado tronco.

english: I don't know where to put them.
spanish: No sé dónde ponerlos.

english: Where do I get on the number 7 bus?
spanish: ¿Dónde puedo tomar el autobús número 7?

english: According to the radio, it'll rain tomorrow.
spanish: Según la radio, mañana lloverá.

english: I quit smoking three years ago.
spanish: Dejé de fumar hace tres años.

english: A big crowd gathered at the scene of the fire.
spanish: Una gran multitud se reunió en el lugar del incendio.

english: I never should've kissed Tom's girlfriend.
spanish: Jamás debí besar a la novia de Tom.

english: I'll be there rain or shine.
spanish: Estaré allí haga frío o calor.

english: They met with the Minister of Foreign Affairs yesterday.
spanish: Ellos se reunieron ayer con el Ministro de Asuntos Exteriores.

english: Tom has already seen it.
spanish: Tom ya lo ha visto.

english: I bought this printer yesterday.
spanish: Ayer compré esta impresora.

english: I think you owe me an explanation.
spanish: Creo que me debes una explicación.

english: They are talking about what they will sing.
spanish: Hablan sobre lo que van a cantar.

english: Stay away from the door.
spanish: ¡Mantente alejado de la puerta!

english: How did you enjoy the concert?
spanish: ¿Qué os ha parecido el concierto?

english: Have you been told when to come?
spanish: ¿Te dijeron cuándo tienes que venir?

english: I may have to fire Tom.
spanish: Puede que tenga que despedir a Tom.

english: All his family was around him when he died.
spanish: Cuando murió lo rodeaba toda su familia.

english: He and I are cousins.
spanish: Él y yo somos primos.

english: Would you like to have a cup of coffee?
spanish: ¿Te gustaría tomar una taza de café?

english: Tom has had his license suspended.
spanish: A Tom le suspendieron su licencia.

english: What do you think about the book?
spanish: ¿Qué pensás del libro?

english: What's my bank balance this month?
spanish: ¿Cuál es mi balance de este mes en el banco?

english: Tom asked Mary to come again.
spanish: Tom pidió a Mary que viniera de nuevo.

english: You can't live on that island.
spanish: No puedes vivir en esa isla.

english: He was walking in front of the car.
spanish: Él iba caminando frente al auto.

english: I hardly ever drive to work.
spanish: Raramente voy en coche al trabajo.

english: The medal had an inscription.
spanish: La medalla tenía una inscripción.

english: Why did you invite Tom to dinner?
spanish: ¿Por qué invitaron a Tom a cenar?

english: I really appreciate you saying that.
spanish: Verdaderamente aprecio que lo digas tú.

english: I can't accept this gift.
spanish: No puedo aceptar este regalo.

english: There's nothing harder than a diamond.
spanish: No hay nada más duro que un diamante.

english: I'll see what I can do.
spanish: Veré qué puedo hacer.

english: Can you believe it? He's even lazier than me.
spanish: ¿Te lo puedes creer? Él es todavía más vago que yo.

english: You couldn't be more wrong.
spanish: No podrías estar más equivocada.

english: Please let me know if it hurts.
spanish: Dime si te duele.

english: My father is expecting you to phone him tomorrow.
spanish: Mi padre espera que le llames mañana.

english: I will not go unless it stops raining.
spanish: No iré si no para de llover.

english: Tom doesn't know the boy talking to Mary.
spanish: Tom no conoce al niño que está hablando con Mary.

english: You have a very nice room.
spanish: Tienes una habitación muy bonita.

english: Tom tried to explain everything to Mary.
spanish: Tom intentó explicarle todo a Mary.

english: He sipped the hot coffee slowly.
spanish: Él lentamente se tomó a sorbos su café.

english: In Venice, there are always lots of tourists.
spanish: En Venecia siempre hay muchos turistas.

english: This coffee is too strong for me.
spanish: Este café está demasiado fuerte para mí.

english: We saw a castle in the distance.
spanish: Vimos un castillo en la distancia.

english: Everybody looks up to him.
spanish: Todo el mundo le admira.

english: She went out for a walk.
spanish: Ella salió a dar un paseo.

english: Would you promise to keep in touch with me?
spanish: ¿Me prometerías seguir en contacto conmigo?

english: Tom knows something that he's not telling us.
spanish: Tom sabe algo que no nos está diciendo.

english: Is that where it happened?
spanish: ¿Es allá donde pasó?

english: If it were not raining, I would go fishing.
spanish: Si no estuviera lloviendo, iría a pescar.

english: What sort of work do you do?
spanish: ¿Qué tipo de trabajo realizás?

english: He is very bad at inventing excuses.
spanish: Él es muy malo inventando excusas.

english: I'll take care of the horses.
spanish: Yo cuidaré a los caballos.

english: Does Tom know about it?
spanish: ¿Sabe Tom de eso?

english: Tom hopes he didn't botch the job.
spanish: Tom espera no haber estropeado el trabajo.

english: I can teach you how to hunt.
spanish: Puedo enseñarte a cazar.

english: Have you ever grown a beard?
spanish: ¿Te has dejado crecer barba alguna vez?

english: May I eat this cake?
spanish: ¿Me puedo comer este pastel?

english: These apples look very fresh.
spanish: Estas manzanas se ven muy frescas.

english: All the apple trees were cut down.
spanish: Todos los manzanos fueron talados.

english: Familiarity breeds contempt and children.
spanish: La familiaridad engendra desprecio y niños.

english: You've set a bad example.
spanish: Has puesto un mal ejemplo.

english: I don't know how it happened.
spanish: No sé cómo sucedió.

english: He accelerated his car and overtook me.
spanish: Él aceleró su auto y me sobrepasó.

english: I studied for a while this morning.
spanish: Estudié un poco esta mañana.

english: There is a garden in front of the house.
spanish: Hay un jardín en frente de la casa.

english: I don't think he'll be able to do that work.
spanish: No creo que él sepa hacer ese trabajo.

english: Should we go by car or by taxi?
spanish: ¿Deberíamos ir en coche o en taxi?

english: Thank you very much for all you have done.
spanish: Muchas gracias por todo lo que habéis hecho.

english: Does this sentence make sense?
spanish: ¿Tiene sentido esta frase?

english: Let's move on to another topic.
spanish: Sigamos con otro tema.

english: This cookbook has recipes for every imaginable occasion.
spanish: Este libro de cocina tiene recetas para cualquier ocasión que puedas imaginar.

english: He put the ring on Mary's finger.
spanish: Él puso el anillo en el dedo de Mary.

english: You look very charming today.
spanish: Luces muy encantador hoy.

english: I didn't do what Tom said I did.
spanish: No hice lo que Tom dijo que hice.

english: You should really lay off that. It'll ruin your health.
spanish: Realmente deberías dejar eso. Arruinará tu salud.

english: I do not understand her.
spanish: No la entiendo.

english: Tom advised Mary not to do it.
spanish: Tom aconsejó a Mary no hacerlo.

english: It's her word against his.
spanish: Es su palabra contra la de él.

english: I love my mother very much.
spanish: Yo amo mucho a mi madre.

english: You really shouldn't use pirated software.
spanish: Realmente no deberías usar software pirata.

english: Tom could tell Mary was interested.
spanish: Tom sabía que a Mary le interesaba.

english: You don't have to decide right now.
spanish: No necesitas decidir ahora mismo.

english: She bought a shirt for him.
spanish: Ella le compró una camisa.

english: I would like you to sing a song.
spanish: Me gustaría que cantaras una canción.

english: You can count on him.
spanish: Podéis contar con él.

english: He didn't know how to express himself.
spanish: Él no sabía cómo expresarse.

english: We don't have class on Wednesday afternoons.
spanish: No tenemos clase los miércoles por la tarde.

english: I fixed the car yesterday.
spanish: Ayer reparé el coche.

english: I want to open my own restaurant.
spanish: Quiero abrir mi propio restaurante.

english: May I have a road map, please?
spanish: Un mapa vial, por favor.

english: I can't say anything about that.
spanish: No puedo decir nada acerca de eso.

english: Doctors take an oath not to harm anyone.
spanish: Los médicos realizan un juramento de no lastimar a nadie.

english: What was it like living in Australia?
spanish: ¿Cómo era vivir en Australia?

english: Don't put so much pepper in the soup.
spanish: ¡No pongas tanta pimienta en la sopa!

english: This is the book that I told you about.
spanish: Éste es el libro del que te hablé.

english: If I had enough money, I could buy this camera.
spanish: Si tuviese suficiente dinero, podría comprar esta cámara.

english: I don't have any other hobbies besides football.
spanish: El fútbol es mi único pasatiempo.

english: This stable contains twelve stalls.
spanish: Este establo tiene 12 puestos.

english: He was aiming a gun at them.
spanish: Él les apuntaba con una arma.

english: Tom's work is selling second-hand cars.
spanish: El trabajo de Tom es vender autos usados.

english: I forgot the book at home.
spanish: Olvidé el libro en casa.

english: I don't know what to do about it.
spanish: No sé que hacer al respecto.

english: I can't afford to buy an expensive car.
spanish: No puedo permitirme el lujo de comprar un coche caro.

english: He contracted that illness many years ago.
spanish: Contrajo esa enfermedad hace muchos años.

english: I asked Tom to leave.
spanish: Le pedí a Tom que se fuera.

english: Do you eat in the classroom?
spanish: ¿Coméis en el aula?

english: Tom did it simply for the money.
spanish: Tom lo hizo sencillamente por el dinero.

english: Saturday is when my father is free.
spanish: El sábado es cuando mi padre está libre.

english: Put some salt into the boiling water.
spanish: Pon un poco de sal en el agua hirviendo.

english: Tom will be bored stiff.
spanish: Tom estará aburrido como una ostra.

english: He has not yet recovered consciousness.
spanish: Él no ha recobrado aún el conocimiento.

english: Why are you so sad?
spanish: ¿Por qué está tan triste?

english: Tom took out his phone and called Mary.
spanish: Tom sacó su teléfono y llamó a María.

english: Tom is more talented than I am.
spanish: Tom es más talentoso que yo.

english: Go get her medicine and a glass of water.
spanish: Ve a traer sus remedios y un vaso de agua.

english: You'd better hurry, or you'll miss the train.
spanish: Mejor apresúrate, o te vas a perder el tren.

english: I know now what I have to do.
spanish: Ahora sé lo que tengo que hacer.

english: You know I hate that.
spanish: Sabes que lo odio.

english: Only love can break your heart.
spanish: Solo el amor puede romper su corazón.

english: She spent more money than usual.
spanish: Ella gastó más dinero de lo común.

english: I didn't know Tom had a cat.
spanish: No sabía que Tom tenía un gato.

english: How could Tom not like me?
spanish: ¿Cómo podría Tom no quererme?

english: You do your part and I'll do the rest.
spanish: Tú haz tu parte y yo haré el resto.

english: The restaurant is always packed.
spanish: El restaurante siempre está lleno.

english: Who will take care of the baby?
spanish: ¿Quién cuidará al bebé?

english: I was hungry and thirsty.
spanish: Tenía hambre y sed.

english: Tom asked Mary if she liked Mexican food.
spanish: Tom le preguntó a Mary si le gustaba la comida mejicana.

english: Don't get a stomachache by eating too much.
spanish: Que no te dé dolor de estómago por comer demasiado.

english: She arrived just as I was leaving.
spanish: Ella llegó justo cuando yo me estaba yendo.

english: The prisoners fled from the concentration camp.
spanish: Los prisioneros huyeron del campo de concentración.

english: Flour is the main ingredient in cakes.
spanish: La harina es el principal ingrediente de las tartas.

english: They sell fish and meat.
spanish: Ellos venden pescado y carne.

english: Mary is in love with the boy with blond hair.
spanish: Mary está enamorada del chico de pelo rubio.

english: I would like to meet his father.
spanish: Me gustaría conocer a su padre.

english: Strange to say, he didn't know the news.
spanish: Por muy raro que parezca, no se había enterado de la noticia.

english: I have a lot to do today.
spanish: Hoy tengo muchas cosas que hacer.

english: We banished him from the country.
spanish: Nosotros lo hemos exiliado del país.

english: I'm looking for a gift for my father.
spanish: Estoy buscando un regalo para mi padre.

english: He erased his speech from the tape.
spanish: Él borró su discurso de la cinta.

english: I speak a little Japanese.
spanish: Yo hablo un poco de japonés.

english: Tom has to do this.
spanish: Tomás tiene que hacer esto.

english: He wanted it to be a surprise.
spanish: Él quería que fuera una sorpresa.

english: Tom offered to help Mary find her lost puppy.
spanish: Tom se ofreció para ayudar a Mary a recuperar su perrito perdido.

english: My mother makes the best cakes in the world.
spanish: Mi madre hace las mejores tartas del mundo.

english: These scissors don't cut well.
spanish: Estas tijeras no cortan bien.

english: Tom comes here nearly every day.
spanish: Tom viene aquí casi todos los días.

english: If I told you, you wouldn't understand.
spanish: Si les dijera, no entenderían.

english: I think you know that's not a good idea.
spanish: Creo que sabes que eso no es una buena idea.

english: Please tell Tom he can come back after lunch.
spanish: Dile a Tom que puede volver después del almuerzo, por favor.

english: There is a television in this room.
spanish: Hay un televisor en esta habitación.

english: She is as thin as a broom stick.
spanish: Ella está tan delgada como un palo de escoba.

english: You're disturbing the whole neighborhood.
spanish: Estás perturbando a todo el vecindario.

english: I'm not ashamed of who I am.
spanish: No me avergüenzo de lo que soy.

english: Tom appears to be a bit worried.
spanish: Tom parece estar un poco preocupado.

english: I can barely remember what my grandfather looked like.
spanish: Apenas puedo recordar cómo lucía mi abuelo.

english: Tom told the boys to line up.
spanish: Tom les dijo a los chicos que se pusieran en fila.

english: It'll have to be done tomorrow.
spanish: Habrá que hacerlo mañana.

english: My mother does not speak English.
spanish: Mi madre no habla inglés.

english: I need some butter. Do you have any?
spanish: Necesito mantequilla. ¿Tienes un poco?

english: I want to ask a favor of you.
spanish: Quisiera pediros un favor.

english: They don't like my friends.
spanish: No les gustan mis amigos.

english: He was given a gold watch as a reward.
spanish: Se le dio un reloj de oro como recompensa.

english: I don't know exactly where I am.
spanish: No estoy segura exactamente dónde estoy.

english: I really can't take it anymore.
spanish: De verdad no puedo soportarlo más.

english: Tom asked Mary what she thought of John.
spanish: Tom preguntó a Mary lo que pensaba de John.

english: She did not disappoint him.
spanish: Ella no lo decepcionó.

english: I am a man who can't stand being alone.
spanish: Soy un hombre que no soporta estar solo.

english: I think my boyfriend is spying on my emails.
spanish: Pienso que mi novio me espía mi correo.

english: I thought Tom would ask that.
spanish: Pensé que Tom preguntaría eso.

english: That's because you're a girl.
spanish: Eso es porque eres niña.

english: The street is paved with asphalt.
spanish: La calle está pavimentada.

english: You should come with me sometime.
spanish: Deberías venir conmigo alguna vez.

english: Tom refused to forgive Mary.
spanish: Tom se rehusó a perdonar a Mary.

english: Look, I know you're busy.
spanish: Mira, sé que estás ocupado.

english: She baked me a cake.
spanish: Ella me hizo una torta.

english: I was made to go there.
spanish: Me obligaron a ir ahí.

english: Are you laughing at me?
spanish: ¿Te estás riendo de mí?

english: Glaciers around the world are melting.
spanish: Los glaciares de todo el mundo se están derritiendo.

english: You're asking the wrong person.
spanish: Le estás preguntando a la persona equivocada.

english: That gradually became his habit.
spanish: Eventualmente se convirtió en su hábito.

english: I took a week off.
spanish: Me tomé una semana libre.

english: I spent the whole afternoon chatting with friends.
spanish: Pasé toda la tarde hablando con unos amigos.

english: She put the magazine on the table.
spanish: Puso la revista sobre la mesa.

english: Tom wondered why everyone was staring at him.
spanish: Tom se preguntaba por qué todos lo miraban fijamente.

english: She spent a lot of time writing her essay.
spanish: Ella pasó mucho tiempo escribiendo su ensayo.

english: He's not as old as my brother.
spanish: Él no es tan mayor como mi hermano.

english: I'm in love with you.
spanish: Estoy enamorada de ti.

english: I don't drink before noon.
spanish: Yo no bebo antes de mediodía.

english: This is one of the best local newspapers.
spanish: Este es uno de los mejores periódicos locales.

english: Our eyes take time to adjust to the dark.
spanish: Nuestros ojos requieren tiempo para adaptarse a la oscuridad.

english: The instant I saw him, I knew he was ill.
spanish: Me di cuenta que estaba enfermo en el mismo momento en que lo vi.

english: Do you know what Tom's secret is?
spanish: ¿Sabes cuál es el secreto de Tom?

english: Tom asked me how to get to Mary's house.
spanish: Tom me preguntó cómo llegar a la casa de María.

english: Let's go to the zoo.
spanish: Vamos al zoo.

english: They arranged the furniture badly.
spanish: Ellos repararon malamente los muebles.

english: He will commit suicide if he can't see his son.
spanish: Se suicidará si no puede ver a su hijo.

english: You have no need to be ashamed.
spanish: No tienes por qué avergonzarte.

english: Tom wants his father buried next to his mother.
spanish: Tom quiere que su padre sea enterrado al lado de su madre.

english: Keep in mind that you must die.
spanish: Recuerda que debes morir.

english: Tell me what's going on.
spanish: Cuéntame qué pasa.

english: I thought that book was difficult to read.
spanish: Pensaba que ese libro era difícil de leer.

english: We amused ourselves playing cards.
spanish: Nos entretuvimos jugando a las cartas.

english: Tom died of a drug overdose.
spanish: Tom murió de una sobredosis de drogas.

english: We have to buy the tickets right now.
spanish: Tenemos que comprar las entradas ahora mismo.

english: Tom had open heart surgery.
spanish: Tom tuvo una operación a corazón abierto.

english: I'm sure I'll find a way.
spanish: Estoy seguro de que encontraré una manera.

english: Tom and I are busy tonight.
spanish: Tom y yo estamos ocupados esta noche.

english: Tom likes to do almost everything by himself.
spanish: A Tom le gusta hacer casi todo solo.

english: Did you call your friend in Canada?
spanish: ¿Has llamado a tu amiga de Canadá?

english: It's not something anyone can do.
spanish: No es algo que pueda hacer cualquiera.

english: I lent Tom my umbrella.
spanish: Presté a Tom mi paraguas.

english: Tom ate vegetable soup this morning.
spanish: Tom tomó sopa de verduras esta mañana.

english: Kites were invented 2,000 years ago.
spanish: Los volantines fueron inventados hace 2.000 años atrás.

english: He administered his friend's affairs.
spanish: Administraba los intereses de su amigo.

english: She loved him with all her heart.
spanish: Ella lo amó con toda su alma.

english: Was Tom in on it?
spanish: ¿Estuvo Tom involucrado en esto?

english: The old man was run over by a car.
spanish: Un auto atropelló al anciano.

english: Tom filled the box with food.
spanish: Tom llenó la caja con comida.

english: I'll buy you a new one.
spanish: Yo te compro uno nuevo.

english: I thought the death penalty should be abolished.
spanish: Yo pensaba que la pena de muerte debía ser abolida.

english: Take this piece of chalk and write on the blackboard.
spanish: Toma este trozo de tiza y escribe en la pizarra.

english: You look a little embarrassed.
spanish: Se te ve algo avergonzado.

english: She spends more time thinking about work than doing it.
spanish: Ella pasa más tiempo pensando en el trabajo que haciéndolo.

english: Tom did really well on the exam.
spanish: A Tom le fue realmente bien en el examen.

english: Are you sure it'll work?
spanish: ¿Está seguro de que eso va a funcionar?

english: I saw Tom a while back.
spanish: Vi a Tom hace un tiempo.

english: She gave him a massage.
spanish: Ella le dio un masaje.

english: The company president was indicted for paying kickbacks.
spanish: El presidente de la compañía fue acusado de pagar comisiones clandestinas.

english: There was a castle here many years ago.
spanish: Hace muchos años aquí había un castillo.

english: I like carrots least of all.
spanish: Lo que menos me gusta son las zanahorias.

english: I hope to see them.
spanish: Espero verlos.

english: Tom did all that he could.
spanish: Tom hizo todo lo que pudo.

english: What are you looking for?
spanish: ¿Qué busca usted?

english: Tom found the treasure at the bottom of the lake.
spanish: Tom encontró el tesoro en el fondo del lago.

english: Tom confessed that he had killed Mary.
spanish: Tom confesó que él había matado a Mary.

english: He came back at nine o'clock.
spanish: Él volvió a las nueve.

english: Tom and Mary want to talk to you.
spanish: Tomás y María quieren hablar contigo.

english: Do you really think Tom is better than me?
spanish: ¿Realmente crees que Tom es mejor que yo?

english: I study music at a university in Boston.
spanish: Estudio música en la universidad de Boston.

english: He does not believe in evolution.
spanish: Él no cree en la evolución.

english: Tom doesn't even know what you are talking about.
spanish: Tom ni siquiera sabe de qué estás hablando.

english: The store happened to be crowded yesterday.
spanish: La tienda estuvo abarrotada de gente ayer.

english: I don't care for the way he talks.
spanish: No me gusta cómo habla.

english: It seems that the door was knocked down.
spanish: Parece que la puerta fue derribada.

english: He is either in London or in Paris.
spanish: Él está o en Londres o en París.

english: He is proud of his son.
spanish: Él está orgulloso de su hijo.

english: I have nowhere to stay.
spanish: No tengo ningún lugar donde quedarme.

english: You have to begin as soon as possible.
spanish: Tienes que empezar lo antes posible.

english: I wonder whether or not Tom has already left.
spanish: ¿Tom se habrá marchado ya?

english: Does depreciation of the yen give rise to inflation?
spanish: ¿Genera inflación la depreciación del yen?

english: Everybody calls the small cat Tora.
spanish: Todos llaman "Tora" a ese gatito.

english: Did my father really die?
spanish: ¿En serio mi padre murió?

english: It's yours if you want it.
spanish: Es tuyo si lo quieres.

english: I have never dared to speak to her.
spanish: Nunca me he atrevido a hablar con ella.

english: There is no admission fee for children under five.
spanish: No hay cuota de admisión para los niños menores de cinco años.

english: I just wanted you to know that.
spanish: Sólo quería que lo supieras.

english: The children are talking to their parents at this moment.
spanish: Los niños están hablando con sus padres en este mismo momento.

english: Tom and his teacher were talking to each other.
spanish: Tom y su profesora estaban conversando.

english: I haven't played the ukulele in years.
spanish: No he tocado el ukelele en años.

english: Once upon a time, there was a beautiful princess.
spanish: Érase una vez una hermosa princesa.

english: What was your hobby when you were a teenager?
spanish: ¿Cuáles eran tus aficiones cuando eras adolescente?

english: Tom took off his wedding ring.
spanish: Tom se quitó su anillo de bodas.

english: Tom should get some rest.
spanish: Tom debería descansar un poco.

english: Their communication may be much more complex than we thought.
spanish: Su comunicación podría ser mucho más compleja de lo que pensamos.

english: Tom doesn't spend much time studying.
spanish: Tom no pasa mucho tiempo estudiando.

english: She has an agreeable voice.
spanish: Ella tiene una agradable voz.

english: The dog knew its master.
spanish: El perro conocía a su amo.

english: I am complaining to the principal.
spanish: Me estoy quejando con el director.

english: She likes to dress in an old-fashioned way.
spanish: Le gusta vestir a la antigua.

english: Tomorrow, I'll take the books to the library.
spanish: Mañana llevaré los libros a la biblioteca.

english: Give me something to drink.
spanish: Dame algo de beber.

english: I'll apply for the job today.
spanish: Voy a rellenar la solicitud de empleo hoy.

english: Tom never told me where he lived.
spanish: Tom nunca me dijo donde vivía.

english: The light here's not good for reading.
spanish: Aquí la luz no es buena para leer.

english: You've been so nice to me.
spanish: Habéis sido tan atentos conmigo.

english: Did you speak at all?
spanish: ¿Hablaste siquiera?

english: I've never played the tuba.
spanish: Nunca he tocado la tuba.

english: Don't forget to turn the light off.
spanish: Que no se te olvide apagar la luz.

english: Do you understand what he's told you?
spanish: ¿Entiendes lo que te ha contado?

english: Your new dress is very pretty.
spanish: Tu vestido nuevo es la mar de bonito.

english: When I was in Boston, I visited Tom.
spanish: Cuándo estuve en Boston lo visité a Tomás.

english: Do you talk to your cats?
spanish: ¿Vos hablás con tus gatos?

english: Nobody seems to have paid attention to what he said.
spanish: Parece que nadie le prestó atención a lo que él dijo.

english: To make matters worse, his wife fell ill.
spanish: Para empeorar las cosas, su esposa se enfermó.

english: I've worked out a good plan.
spanish: He tramado un buen plan.

english: Lucky at cards, unlucky in love.
spanish: Afortunado en el juego, desafortunado en el amor.

english: Eskimos have ninety different words for snow.
spanish: Los esquimales tienen 90 palabras diferentes para la nieve.

english: Whoever leaves the office last should turn off the light.
spanish: El que se salga último de la oficina tiene que apagar la luz.

english: Tom translated the letter into French.
spanish: Tom tradujo la carta al francés.

english: We own a dog and a cat.
spanish: Tenemos un perro y un gato.

english: Tom has known Mary for a long time.
spanish: Tom conoce a Mary desde hace un largo tiempo.

english: They have lost a lot.
spanish: Ellos han perdido mucho.

english: My shoes are too small.
spanish: Mis zapatos son demasiado pequeños.

english: I don't think it's necessary for us to do this.
spanish: No creo que tengamos que hacer esto.

english: Which dessert should he eat?
spanish: ¿Qué postre debería tomar?

english: He was not just a father to me.
spanish: Él no era solo un padre para mí.

english: She's used to getting up early.
spanish: Está acostumbrada a levantarse pronto.

english: Does it bother you if I smoke?
spanish: ¿Le importa si fumo?

english: He is an executive in an insurance company.
spanish: Es ejecutivo en una aseguradora.

english: Do you know a good restaurant?
spanish: ¿Conocéis un buen restaurante?

english: The baby is sucking his finger.
spanish: El bebé se está chupando el dedo.

english: My dream is to take a round-the-world trip.
spanish: Mi sueño es hacer un viaje alrededor del mundo.

english: He works in the lab.
spanish: Él trabaja en el laboratorio.

english: Did you find your keys?
spanish: ¿Encontraste tus llaves?

english: The snow lasted for two days.
spanish: La nieve duró dos días.

english: I want to go to London.
spanish: Quiero ir a Londres.

english: This tea is very hot.
spanish: Este té está ardiendo.

english: The pain was almost unbearable.
spanish: El dolor era casi insoportable.

english: I wish I'd met her.
spanish: Ojalá la hubiera conocido.

english: He was standing with his arms folded.
spanish: Estaba de pie con los brazos cruzados.

english: Some day we'll take a trip to India.
spanish: Algún día haremos un viaje a la India.

english: I want to know why this happened.
spanish: Quiero saber por qué pasó esto.

english: I would do anything to get a job.
spanish: Haría cualquier cosa por conseguir un empleo.

english: A girl is playing the flute.
spanish: Una niña está tocando flauta.

english: I want to see you as soon as possible.
spanish: Deseo verle cuanto antes.

english: I tried to put an end to the quarrel.
spanish: Intenté poner fin a la discusión.

english: I was interviewed for a job.
spanish: Me entrevistaron para un empleo.

english: Could you please pass me the salt?
spanish: ¿Podrías por favor pasarme la sal?

english: I live in a big city.
spanish: Vivo en una gran ciudad.

english: Did I do something to offend you?
spanish: ¿Acaso hice algo que te ofendiera?

english: The two enemies were face to face.
spanish: Los dos enemigos estaban frente a frente.

english: There's no need to ask for permission.
spanish: No hace falta pedir permiso.

english: Above all, be careful about what you eat and drink.
spanish: Sobre todo, ten cuidado con lo que comes y bebes.

english: He has already done my homework.
spanish: Ya ha hecho mis deberes.

english: They made fun of Mary.
spanish: Se burlaron de Mary.

english: I thought I'd never hear that.
spanish: Pensé que jamás oiría eso.

english: When did you see my scar?
spanish: ¿Cuándo viste mi cicatriz?

english: Germany was once an ally of Italy.
spanish: Alemania alguna vez fue aliado de Italia.

english: Tom's starting to go bald.
spanish: Tomás está empezando a quedarse pelado.

english: The last one is the best.
spanish: La última es la mejor.

english: I'm very disappointed in you.
spanish: Estoy muy decepcionado con vosotros.

english: We had a little water.
spanish: Teníamos un poco de agua.

english: I'm paid by the hour.
spanish: Me pagan por horas.

english: Come on, Tom, think about it.
spanish: Vamos Tom, piénsalo.

english: Tom plans to go to Boston next week.
spanish: Tom planea ir a Boston la semana que viene.

english: How much do you earn?
spanish: ¿Cuánto ganas?

english: It wasn't the first time.
spanish: No fue la primera vez.

english: I am badly in need of your help.
spanish: Necesito mucho tu ayuda.

english: This is a book about stars.
spanish: Este es un libro sobre las estrellas.

english: Why do you want to know that?
spanish: ¿Por qué quieres saber eso?

english: Did you warn Tom about the neighbor's dog?
spanish: ¿Le advertiste a Tom acerca del perro del vecino?

english: Tom was the last person to see Mary alive.
spanish: Tom fue el último en ver a María viva.

english: I can't understand why he did that.
spanish: No puedo entender por qué él hizo eso.

english: Tom helped his son get dressed.
spanish: Tom ayudó a su hijo a vestirse.

english: You shouldn't have gone there.
spanish: No deberías haber ido allí.

english: I can't understand his feelings.
spanish: No puedo entender sus sentimientos.

english: Could you speak more slowly, please?
spanish: ¿Puedes hablar más despacio, por favor?

english: Does it hurt when you breathe?
spanish: ¿Te duele cuando respiras?

english: I have not eaten breakfast yet.
spanish: Aún no he desayunado.

english: I found this watch at the station.
spanish: Encontré este reloj en la estación.

english: I hate to be alone at home on the weekends.
spanish: Odio estar solo en casa los fines de semana.

english: I can still do that pretty well.
spanish: Todavía lo puedo hacer bastante bien.

english: The lion is the king of the jungle.
spanish: El león es el rey de la selva.

english: You won't have to take charge of that.
spanish: No tienes para que hacerte cargo de eso.

english: Tom gave Mary moral support.
spanish: Tom le dio apoyo moral a Mary.

english: She looked up at the sky.
spanish: Ella alzó la vista al cielo.

english: Thanks for the delicious meal.
spanish: Gracias por la deliciosa comida.

english: Bill Gates is the founder of Microsoft.
spanish: Bill Gates es el fundador de Microsoft.

english: Do you know the boy in the picture?
spanish: ¿Conocés al muchacho de la foto?

english: He was killed in the war.
spanish: Él fue asesinado en la guerra.

english: They hid in the cellar.
spanish: Ellos se escondieron en el sótano.

english: Tom has a bad reputation.
spanish: Tom tiene mala reputación.

english: The religious man remained kneeling for hours.
spanish: El hombre religioso siguió arrodillado por horas.

english: Hold the vase in both hands.
spanish: Sostén la jarra con ambas manos.

english: Tom finished the job in three hours.
spanish: Tom terminó el trabajo en tres horas.

english: I know someone who may be interested in your project.
spanish: Conozco a alguien que puede estar interesado en tu proyecto.

english: Tom and Mary can't be in the same room.
spanish: Tom y Mary no pueden estar en la misma habitación.

english: She has been to England once.
spanish: Ella ya había estado en Inglaterra una vez.

english: How do you say that in Italian?
spanish: ¿Cómo se dice eso en italiano?

english: She will come even if she is tired.
spanish: Ella vendrá incluso si está cansada.

english: Tom doesn't want Mary to go.
spanish: Tom no quiere que se vaya Mary.

english: The collection of taxes is well organized.
spanish: La cobranza de impuestos está bien organizada.

english: I've got some things I want to do right now.
spanish: Tengo unas cosas que quiero hacer ahora mismo.

english: What time is Tom coming?
spanish: ¿A que hora va a venir Tomás?

english: Do you really want to live in Boston?
spanish: ¿De verdad quieres vivir en Boston?

english: Don't touch that pan! It's very hot.
spanish: ¡No toques la sartén!, está muy caliente.

english: When was the last time you lost something?
spanish: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que perdisteis alguna cosa?

english: I'd like to go out with her.
spanish: Me gustaría salir con ella.

english: Two children are sitting on the fence.
spanish: Dos niños están sentados sobre la cerca.

english: I'm sorry to have bothered you.
spanish: Perdón por haberlo molestado.

english: The mother separated the fighting children.
spanish: La mamá separó a los niños que peleaban.

english: What exactly is it that you want me to say?
spanish: ¿Exactamente qué es lo que quieren que diga?

english: It is easy for a monkey to climb a tree.
spanish: Para los monos es sencillo trepar árboles.

english: He suddenly became very happy.
spanish: Se puso muy contento de repente.

english: I have one brother and two sisters.
spanish: Yo tengo un hermano y dos hermanas.

english: He is now either in Rome or in Paris.
spanish: Ahora estará en Roma o en París.

english: She speaks English very fluently.
spanish: Ella habla inglés de manera muy fluida.

english: I don't know if you remember me.
spanish: No sé si te acuerdas de mí.

english: He left his family and went to live in Tahiti.
spanish: Dejó a su familia y se fue a vivir a Tahití.

english: Can I carry this on the plane?
spanish: ¿Puedo llevar esto en el avión?

english: Although he is very old, he is strong.
spanish: A pesar de ser anciano él es fuerte.

english: I forgot to put film in the camera.
spanish: Se me olvidó ponerle el rollo a la cámara.

english: I ate too much last night.
spanish: Anoche comí demasiado.

english: I was late for the train.
spanish: Perdí el tren.

english: It's been snowing all night.
spanish: Estuvo nevando toda la noche.

english: That took longer than I expected.
spanish: Tomó más de lo que esperaba.

english: He entered the bank disguised as a guard.
spanish: Él entró en el banco disfrazado de guardia.

english: It was a lucky guess.
spanish: Fue un golpe de suerte.

english: Tom has never trusted me.
spanish: Tom nunca ha confiado en mí.

english: Do you want me to bring you anything?
spanish: ¿Querés que te traiga algo?

english: I'm sure Tom means well.
spanish: Estoy segura de que Tom tiene buenas intenciones.

english: Tom is expected to arrive any minute now.
spanish: Se espera que Tom llegue en cualquier minuto ahora.

english: No one will be fired.
spanish: Nadie será despedido.

english: I have relatives in Milan.
spanish: Tengo parientes en Milán.

english: He read a really long book today.
spanish: Él se leyó hoy un libro verdaderamente largo.

english: That's the part I liked best.
spanish: Esa es la parte que más me gustó.

english: Tom hates to work late on Friday.
spanish: Tom odia trabajar tarde en un viernes.

english: Why didn't you call us?
spanish: ¿Por qué no nos llamaste?

english: He is a good man for the job.
spanish: Es bueno para ese trabajo.

english: We would play baseball after school in those days.
spanish: Esos días jugábamos al béisbol después de la escuela.

english: Tom got a bottle of beer out of the fridge.
spanish: Tom cogió una botella de cerveza del frigorífico.

english: I can take care of myself.
spanish: Puedo cuidarme solo.

english: It's the smart thing to do.
spanish: Es lo más inteligente para hacer.

english: How about a cup of coffee?
spanish: ¿Quisiera una taza de café?

english: I almost had a heart attack.
spanish: Por poco no me da un infarto.

english: I usually go to bed at nine.
spanish: Suelo acostarme a las nueve.

english: I'm really glad to hear it.
spanish: Realmente me alegra escucharlo.

english: This is a violent neighborhood.
spanish: Este es un vecindario violento.

english: We'll have finished eating by the time you arrive.
spanish: Para cuando llegues, habremos terminado de comer.

english: Your secretary seems to know the truth.
spanish: Su secretario parece saber la verdad.

english: I'd do anything for you.
spanish: Haría cualquier cosa por usted.

english: Tom added a few finishing touches to the painting.
spanish: Tom le añadió unos pocos toques finales a la pintura.

english: Will you go on foot or by bus?
spanish: ¿Iréis andando o en autobús?

english: She is always cheerful and smiling.
spanish: Ella siempre está alegre y sonriente.

english: We see what we want to see.
spanish: Vemos lo que queremos.

english: Tom got into a fight with his brother.
spanish: Tom se metió en una pelea con su hermano.

english: My mother forgot to add salt to the salad.
spanish: Mi madre olvidó echar sal en la ensalada.

english: The children have glow sticks.
spanish: Los niños tienen palos que brillan.

english: I've always wanted to meet you.
spanish: Siempre he querido conocerles.

english: Are you prepared for the worst?
spanish: ¿Estás preparada para lo peor?

english: I remember both of you.
spanish: Los recuerdo a los dos.

english: I only slept two hours.
spanish: Sólo dormí por dos horas.

english: Tom came to ask us to help him.
spanish: Tom vino a pedirnos que le ayudáramos.

english: She dried her face on a towel.
spanish: Se secó la cara con una toalla.

english: I'm done with my homework.
spanish: Acabé mi tarea.

english: You must catch the animal alive.
spanish: Debes atrapar vivo al animal.

english: My grandfather died when I was boy.
spanish: Mi abuelo se murió cuando yo todavía era un niño.
