english: I'll take charge of the work.
spanish: Me encargaré del trabajo.

english: I'm writing a song in French.
spanish: Estoy escribiendo una canción en francés.

english: This book has a certain value.
spanish: Este libro tiene un cierto precio.

english: It appears the storm has calmed down.
spanish: Parece que la tormenta ha amainado.

english: The room is full of people.
spanish: La sala está llena de personas.

english: Please listen to what I have to say.
spanish: Por favor, escucha lo que tengo que decir.

english: Tom did his best to find a reason to stay.
spanish: Tom hizo lo que pudo para encontrar una razón para quedarse.

english: Back in those days, I loved to play checkers.
spanish: En aquellos días me encantaba jugar damas.

english: From where do you hail?
spanish: ¿De dónde llamas?

english: Choose any one from among these.
spanish: Escoge cualquiera de estos.

english: We have to change something.
spanish: Tenemos que cambiar algo.

english: I paid 800 yen for this book.
spanish: Pagué 800 yenes por este libro.

english: Give some meat to the dog.
spanish: Dale un cacho de carne al perro.

english: She got the ticket for free.
spanish: Ella consiguió gratis el boleto.

english: I cannot walk any farther.
spanish: No puedo caminar más lejos.

english: Tom can operate a forklift.
spanish: Tom sabe cómo manejar una carretilla elevadora.

english: They are talking in the kitchen.
spanish: Están hablando en la cocina.

english: She earns more than she spends.
spanish: Ella gana más de lo que gasta.

english: Somebody has broken this dish.
spanish: Alguien ha roto este plato.

english: He had a mild heart attack.
spanish: Tuvo un amago de infarto.

english: Tom always eats before going to work.
spanish: Tom siempre come antes de irse a trabajar.

english: Tom called to tell Mary that he'd be late.
spanish: Tom llamó para decirle a Mary que vendría más tarde.

english: You're a very pretty girl.
spanish: Eres una chica muy guapa.

english: Everything would be easier if we could float.
spanish: Todo sería más fácil si pudiéramos flotar.

english: Can't we go with Tom?
spanish: ¿No podemos ir con Tom?

english: The doctor advised me to give up smoking.
spanish: El médico me sugirió que deje de fumar.

english: I don't want to be anywhere else.
spanish: No quiero estar en ningún otro lado.

english: I won't close the door.
spanish: No voy a cerrar la puerta.

english: What kind of equipment is installed in the classrooms?
spanish: ¿Qué tipo de equipamiento es instalado en las aulas?

english: We made good time since the traffic was light.
spanish: Fuimos bien de tiempo porque hubo tráfico fluido.

english: I paid for it already.
spanish: Ya lo pagué.

english: Tom went down the river in a canoe.
spanish: Tom bajó el río en una canoa.

english: Do you want to go first?
spanish: ¿Quieres ir primero?

english: It is a privilege to meet you.
spanish: Es un privilegio conocerte.

english: Tom doesn't even know he's in trouble.
spanish: Tom ni siquiera sabe que está en problemas.

english: Tom was sentenced to 10 years in prison.
spanish: Tom fue condenado a diez años de prisión.

english: Why couldn't you tell me?
spanish: ¿Por qué no me lo podías decir?

english: She writes to her son every now and then.
spanish: Ella le escribe a su hijo de vez en cuando.

english: The store opens for business tomorrow.
spanish: La tienda está abierta al público mañana.

english: You should have seen the picture.
spanish: Deberían haber visto la foto.

english: Tom will remain at home.
spanish: Tom se quedará en casa.

english: It's an awful shame your wife couldn't come.
spanish: Es una enorme lástima que tu esposa no pudiera venir.

english: It was foolish of him to do such a thing.
spanish: Fue una tontería de su parte hacer tal cosa.

english: It would be sad if that were true.
spanish: Sería triste si fuera cierto.

english: I have not seen him in months.
spanish: No lo he visto en meses.

english: Tom warned Mary about John.
spanish: Tom advirtió a Mary sobre John.

english: Hurry up! We'll be late.
spanish: ¡Apresúrate! Llegaremos tarde.

english: I am brushing my teeth.
spanish: Me estoy cepillando los dientes.

english: Tom hasn't finished his homework yet.
spanish: Tom no terminó su tarea todavía.

english: Oh, no! We're running out of gas.
spanish: ¡Oh, no! ¡Nos estamos quedando sin gasolina!

english: Have you finished reading the novel?
spanish: ¿Has terminado de leer la novela?

english: Tom had long hair last year.
spanish: Tom tenía el pelo largo el año pasado.

english: Spain is the host country for the Olympics in 1992.
spanish: España es el país anfitrión de las Olimpiadas de 1992.

english: In autumn the leaves turn yellow.
spanish: En otoño las hojas se vuelven amarillas.

english: Tom is a doctor now.
spanish: Tom es un doctor ahora.

english: Tom allowed Mary to go home early.
spanish: Tom le dejo irse a casa temprano a Mary.

english: It's not as hot today as it was yesterday.
spanish: Hoy no hace tanto calor como ayer.

english: What are you babbling about?
spanish: ¿Sobre qué estás chismorreando?

english: I am going to work in Osaka next year.
spanish: El próximo año voy a trabajar en Osaka.

english: Scientists can easily compute the distance between planets.
spanish: Los científicos fácilmente pueden calcular la distancia entre planetas.

english: "You talk too much," he said.
spanish: —Hablas demasiado —dijo él.

english: I brought some of my books to read.
spanish: Traje algunos de mis libros para leer.

english: Would you like to join our team?
spanish: ¿Querrías unirte a nuestro equipo?

english: I wouldn't go in there.
spanish: Yo no entraría ahí.

english: There are some flies on the wall.
spanish: Hay moscas en la pared.

english: Who is able to explain this to me?
spanish: ¿Quién me puede explicar esto?

english: Show me how to do it.
spanish: Muéstrame cómo hacerlo.

english: I only have one so far.
spanish: Sólo tengo una hasta ahora.

english: Tom and Mary are in the same class.
spanish: Tom y Mary están en la misma clase.

english: Who are you hiding from?
spanish: ¿De quién te estás escondiendo?

english: The storm has gradually abated.
spanish: La tormenta ha amainado gradualmente.

english: The dog ran away from us.
spanish: Se nos escapó el perro.

english: He can be counted on.
spanish: Se puede contar con él.

english: Tom can die happy now.
spanish: Tom puede morir feliz ahora.

english: Run, or else you'll be late.
spanish: Corre, o vas a llegar tarde.

english: Where did you buy that dress?
spanish: ¿Dónde compraste ese vestido?

english: You must do as you are told to do.
spanish: Tú debes hacer lo que se te dice.

english: Tom was killed by lightning.
spanish: Tom fue asesinado por un rayo.

english: He cannot have done it by himself.
spanish: Él no puede haber hecho eso solo.

english: Where did the accident take place?
spanish: ¿Dónde ocurrió el accidente?

english: Tom hasn't cleaned his gun in a long time.
spanish: Tom no ha limpiado su arma en mucho tiempo.

english: Please adjust the seat to fit you.
spanish: Por favor, ajuste su asiento como le acomode.

english: He went to the library.
spanish: Él ha ido a la biblioteca.

english: You'll learn how to do it sooner or later.
spanish: Aprenderás a hacerlo tarde o temprano.

english: He must be crazy to behave like that.
spanish: Él debe estar loco para actuar así.

english: These gloves belong to Tom.
spanish: Estos guantes son de Tom.

english: He's rotten to the core.
spanish: Él está podrido hasta la médula.

english: Don't make me say it again.
spanish: No me hagas decirlo otra vez.

english: Are you sure you want that one?
spanish: ¿Estás segura de que quieres ese?

english: Tom never thought Mary would ever actually graduate from college.
spanish: Tom nunca pensó que Mary sería capaz de graduarse en la universidad.

english: The cottage was clean and tidy.
spanish: La cabaña estaba limpia y ordenada.

english: I like eating pineapple for breakfast.
spanish: Me gusta comer piña para el desayuno.

english: They are much taller than us.
spanish: Son mucho más altos que nosotros.

english: His father doesn't play golf.
spanish: Su padre no juega al golf.

english: It's easy to distinguish good from evil.
spanish: Es fácil distinguir lo bueno de lo malo.

english: I missed the end of the movie because of you.
spanish: Me perdí el final de la película por tu culpa.

english: Do you speak Chinese well?
spanish: ¿Hablas bien chino?

english: There are many rivers on that island.
spanish: Hay muchos ríos en esa isla.

english: I spoke with him about the matter.
spanish: Yo hablé con él acerca del asunto.

english: It depends on the context.
spanish: Depende del contexto.

english: I should tell you something.
spanish: Debería decirte algo.

english: My father has gone to China.
spanish: Mi padre se ha ido a China.

english: We do need your advice.
spanish: Necesitamos tu consejo.

english: I bared my soul to her.
spanish: Le abrí mi corazón.

english: I just don't know what to say.
spanish: Sencillamente no sé qué decir.

english: I kept my mouth shut.
spanish: Mantuve mi boca cerrada.

english: The school is on the hill.
spanish: La escuela se encuentra en la colina.

english: Tom asked too many questions.
spanish: Tom hizo demasiadas preguntas.

english: All the dogs are alive.
spanish: Todos los perros están vivos.

english: That painting is beautiful, and so is this one.
spanish: Ese cuadro es muy bonito, y este también.

english: I didn't hear him coming.
spanish: No lo oí llegar.

english: I crossed the dark street.
spanish: Yo atravesé la oscura calle.

english: Can you eat raw oysters?
spanish: ¿Se pueden comer las ostras crudas?

english: I knew you were OK.
spanish: Sabía que estabas bien.

english: I have read this book before.
spanish: Ya he leído este libro antes.

english: It's going to clear up.
spanish: Va a despejarse.

english: Thank you very, very much!
spanish: ¡Muchísimas gracias!

english: I envy the friendship Tom and Mary have.
spanish: Envidio la amistad que tienen Tom y Mary.

english: Which films are showing now?
spanish: ¿Qué películas están en cartelera ahora?

english: I repeated the word several times for her.
spanish: Yo repetí la palabra varias veces para ella.

english: This is the shortest way to the station.
spanish: Este es el camino más corto a la estación.

english: I haven't seen a doctor.
spanish: No he visto a un doctor.

english: He can't have said such a stupid thing.
spanish: No puede haber dicho algo tan estúpido.

english: I'll give you a piece of advice.
spanish: Te daré un consejo.

english: I think you owe me some money.
spanish: Creo que me debes algo de dinero.

english: It was Tom who showed me how to do this.
spanish: Fue Tom el que me mostró cómo hacer esto.

english: We must be alert to dangers.
spanish: Debemos estar alerta a los peligros.

english: It was a dry year, and many animals starved.
spanish: Fue un año seco, y muchos animales murieron de hambre.

english: She was blind, deaf, and dumb.
spanish: Ella era ciega, sorda y muda.

english: I would never try that.
spanish: Yo nunca lo intentaría.

english: Tom asked me for my phone number.
spanish: Tom me pidió mi número de teléfono.

english: Tom had some money stolen from his tent.
spanish: A Tom le robaron algo de dinero de su tienda.

english: It was late at night when we got back.
spanish: Era muy de noche cuando regresamos.

english: Are you in a hurry?
spanish: ¿Vas apresurado?

english: I read a lot of books in English.
spanish: Leí muchos libros en inglés.

english: You have only ten seconds left to live.
spanish: Sólo te quedan diez segundos de vida.

english: I will help you if possible.
spanish: Te ayudaré si es posible.

english: Tom just does what he's told to do.
spanish: Tom tan sólo hace lo que se le dice que haga.

english: I don't think that's very likely to happen.
spanish: No creo que sea muy probable que eso suceda.

english: Here is their photo album.
spanish: Aquí está su álbum de fotos.

english: I was compelled to do the work alone.
spanish: Yo fui obligado a hacer el trabajo solo.

english: I painted the gate blue.
spanish: Pinté el portón azul.

english: You ought to be more careful.
spanish: Deberías ser más cuidadoso.

english: You don't know everything I do.
spanish: Tú no sabes todo lo que yo hago.

english: I want you to go to Boston with Tom.
spanish: Quiero que vayás a Boston con Tom.

english: Tom is looking for an easy way to lose weight.
spanish: Tom está buscando una manera fácil de perder peso.

english: How long are you planning to stay?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo tienes pensado quedarte?

english: Tom and Mary are very close to each other.
spanish: Tom y Mary son muy compinches.

english: I work in a bank.
spanish: Yo trabajo en un banco.

english: My aunt won an all-expenses-paid tour of Hawaii.
spanish: Mi tía se ganó un viaje todo pagado a Hawái.

english: What are you doing here?
spanish: ¿Qué haces aquí?

english: Tom seemed a bit angry.
spanish: Tomás parece estar un poco enojado.

english: Tom didn't get on the plane.
spanish: Tom no se subió al avión.

english: I've already told you what I know.
spanish: Yo ya te dije lo que sé al respecto.

english: He's considered to be a great politician.
spanish: Él es considerado un gran político.

english: Believe it or not, that is true.
spanish: Lo creas o no, eso es verdad.

english: The people voted in November.
spanish: La gente votó en Noviembre.

english: You go to school, don't you?
spanish: Vas a la escuela, ¿verdad?

english: He managed to escape through a window.
spanish: Él consiguió escaparse por una ventana.

english: He wrote this novel at twenty.
spanish: Él escribió esta novela a los 20 años.

english: Part of the story is true.
spanish: Una parte de la historia es cierta.

english: You have it in the bag.
spanish: Lo tienes en la mochila.

english: The dog barks at a stranger.
spanish: El perro le ladra a un extraño.

english: She returned the book to the library.
spanish: Ella regresó el libro a la biblioteca.

english: When are you moving into your new house?
spanish: ¿Cuándo te vas a mudar a tu nueva casa?

english: Tom is going to enjoy this.
spanish: Tom va a disfrutar esto.

english: You are selling him short.
spanish: Le estáis subestimando.

english: Picasso's paintings seem strange to me.
spanish: Las pinturas de Picasso me parecen extrañas.

english: I'm looking forward to serving your company.
spanish: Espero con ganas a trabajar en su compañía.

english: Social customs vary from country to country.
spanish: Las costumbres sociales varían de país en país.

english: Do your homework before you watch TV.
spanish: Haced los deberes antes de ver la televisión.

english: I've studied French for three years.
spanish: Llevo tres años estudiando francés.

english: Now we have to be very careful.
spanish: Ahora hay que andarse con mucho ojo.

english: Tom will come back. I'm sure he will.
spanish: Tom volverá. Estoy seguro de que sí.

english: Is there anyone who can answer?
spanish: ¿Hay alguien que pueda responder?

english: Proverbs are full of wisdom.
spanish: Los proverbios están llenos de sabiduría.

english: Are you proud of your father?
spanish: ¿Estáis orgullosas de vuestro padre?

english: That house is for sale.
spanish: Esa casa está a la venta.

english: I'm going to grab a bite to eat.
spanish: Voy a picotear algo.

english: How can I quit this job?
spanish: ¿Cómo puedo renunciar a este trabajo?

english: As far as I know, this is the latest edition.
spanish: Hasta donde yo sé, esta es la edición más nueva.

english: It is not the best solution.
spanish: No es la mejor solución.

english: I don't have any enemies.
spanish: No tengo enemigos.

english: We have almost no water left.
spanish: Apenas tenemos algo de agua.

english: She tried to screen her son from reality.
spanish: Ella trataba de proteger a su hijo de la realidad.

english: Can I go home now?
spanish: ¿Me puedo ir a casa ahora?

english: Anyone can make a mistake.
spanish: Cualquiera puede cometer un error.

english: There is a television in the room.
spanish: Hay un televisor en la habitación.

english: I ran into a tree.
spanish: Choqué contra un árbol.

english: Do you really want to make some money?
spanish: ¿De verdad quieres hacer algo de dinero?

english: This design resembles his earlier work.
spanish: Este diseño recuerda a sus primeros trabajos.

english: There's a serious split in the party.
spanish: Hay una gran división en el partido.

english: Are you proud of your father?
spanish: ¿Estás orgullosa de tu padre?

english: I don't understand what you're trying to say.
spanish: No entiendo lo que quiere decir.

english: This is all the money I have.
spanish: Este es todo el dinero que tengo.

english: They celebrated his birthday with a big party.
spanish: Celebraron su cumpleaños con una gran fiesta.

english: I thought you had it all figured out.
spanish: Pensé que lo tenías todo resuelto.

english: There seems to be a mistake.
spanish: Parece que hay un error.

english: Put away your books and notebooks.
spanish: Guarden sus libros y cuadernos.

english: You cannot tame a wolf.
spanish: Tú no puedes domesticar un lobo.

english: I haven't eaten for days.
spanish: Llevo días sin comer.

english: I wish I could swim.
spanish: Ojalá pudiera nadar.

english: The driver increased his speed.
spanish: El conductor aceleró.

english: He tried to make up for lost time.
spanish: Él trató de compensar el tiempo perdido.

english: I did that to survive.
spanish: Lo hacía para sobrevivir.

english: He is a formidable opponent.
spanish: Él es un adversario formidable.

english: I can no longer stand this noise.
spanish: Ya no puedo más con este ruido.

english: You can ask the child that is playing over there.
spanish: Puedes preguntar al chico que está jugando allí.

english: This is a very interesting book.
spanish: Este es un libro interesante.

english: I have read the book.
spanish: Me he leído el libro.

english: We conducted our investigation with the greatest care.
spanish: Condujimos nuestra investigación con el mayor de los cuidados.

english: You can start right now.
spanish: Puede empezar ahora mismo.

english: He had reached the limits of his patience.
spanish: Él había llegado al límite de su paciencia.

english: May I call you back?
spanish: ¿Puedo llamarte de vuelta?

english: You should wear a coat.
spanish: Deberías ponerte un abrigo.

english: These clothes are too small for him.
spanish: Esta ropa es muy pequeña para él.

english: Her face was drenched with sweat.
spanish: Su cara estaba empapada en sudor.

english: I got what I wanted.
spanish: Conseguí lo que quería.

english: Will you exchange seats with me?
spanish: ¿Me cambiarás el sitio?

english: I wouldn't have trusted Tom either.
spanish: Yo tampoco habría confiado en Tom.

english: I knew I should've married you.
spanish: Sabía que debería haberme casado contigo.

english: My mother is out there.
spanish: Mi madre está ahí fuera.

english: Tom is just an amateur.
spanish: Tom es solo un amateur.

english: Since I had a slight fever, I stayed in bed.
spanish: Como tenía un poco de fiebre, me quedé en la cama.

english: Could I sit on the aisle?
spanish: ¿Me podría sentar en el pasillo?

english: Every word in this dictionary is important.
spanish: Cada palabra en este diccionario es importante.

english: It is not clear when and where she was born.
spanish: No es claro cuándo y dónde nació ella.

english: You can stand up if you want to.
spanish: Te puedes parar si quieres.

english: Tom didn't know how to thank Mary.
spanish: Tom no sabía cómo agradecerle a Mary.

english: I have left you your dinner in the oven.
spanish: Te he dejado la cena en el horno.

english: I am a student in a university.
spanish: Soy un estudiante en una universidad.

english: Don't do a half-baked job.
spanish: No haga usted las cosas a medias.

english: I don't want to hurt Tom again.
spanish: No quiero volver a herir a Tom.

english: He came from one of the richest families in America.
spanish: Vino de una de las familias más ricas de América.

english: The boy began to cry.
spanish: El niño se puso a llorar.

english: Tom doesn't have to stay here.
spanish: Tom no necesita quedarse aquí.

english: How long does a bear sleep?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo duerme un oso?

english: Tom and Mary were often seen together.
spanish: A menudo se veía a Tom y Mary juntos.

english: I was not aware of her absence.
spanish: No me había percatado de su ausencia.

english: He won't die. He is as strong as a horse.
spanish: Él no se va a morir. Es fuerte como un toro.

english: You can use my dictionary.
spanish: Puede usar mi diccionario.

english: I know you're writing a book.
spanish: Sé que estás escribiendo un libro.

english: Wait a minute. I want to tell you something.
spanish: Espera un momento, quiero decirte una cosa.

english: I no longer have a headache.
spanish: Ya no tengo dolor de cabeza.

english: Tom had nothing left to drink.
spanish: A Tom no le quedaba nada de beber.

english: We found the boy fast asleep.
spanish: Encontramos al niño durmiendo profundamente.

english: Lock the windows before going to bed.
spanish: Cierra las ventanas antes de acostarte.

english: I am convinced of her innocence.
spanish: Estoy convencido de su inocencia.

english: What's my book doing here?
spanish: ¿Qué está haciendo aquí mi libro?

english: The man standing by the door is a famous singer.
spanish: El hombre parado en la puerta es un famoso cantante.

english: Tom can speak French like a native.
spanish: Tom habla francés como un nativo.

english: He has no hat on.
spanish: No lleva sombrero.

english: I saw them enter the bank.
spanish: Los vi entrar al banco.

english: Try to be on time.
spanish: Trata de ser puntual.

english: Tom shouldn't wait for Mary for more than ten minutes.
spanish: Tom no debería esperar a Mary por más de diez minutos.

english: He's three years older than her.
spanish: Él es tres años mayor que ella.

english: Do you realize what this means?
spanish: ¿Te das cuenta de lo que esto significa?

english: When was it that you first met her?
spanish: ¿Cuándo la encontraste por primera vez?

english: The cat is waiting for you at home.
spanish: El gato le espera en casa.

english: She visits him twice a year.
spanish: Ella le visita dos veces al año.

english: When did you notice that?
spanish: ¿Cuándo te diste cuenta de eso?

english: He is strong, brave and, above all, kind.
spanish: Él es fuerte, valiente y, sobre todo, amable.

english: You can use my help.
spanish: Puedes disponer de mi ayuda.

english: He was sitting between Mary and Tom.
spanish: Él estaba sentado entre Mary y Tom.

english: Tom said it was OK.
spanish: Tom dijo que estaba bien.

english: My brother has been friendly to him.
spanish: Mi hermano ha sido simpático con él.

english: Tom has known Mary for over three years.
spanish: Tom conoce a Mary de hace más de tres años.

english: I wanted to be just like you.
spanish: Yo quería que ser igual que tú.

english: Tom has known Mary since he was a little boy.
spanish: Tom conoce a Mary desde que era niño.

english: Let's see how Tom reacts to that.
spanish: Veamos cómo reacciona Tom a eso.

english: He often sits for many hours reading books.
spanish: Él frecuentemente se queda sentado durante horas leyendo libros.

english: Tom is a very decent fellow.
spanish: Tom es una persona decente.

english: They sat in a circle.
spanish: Ellos se sentaron en un círculo.

english: He wet the towel with water.
spanish: Mojó la toalla con agua.

english: I'm learning Chinese on my own.
spanish: Estoy aprendiendo chino por mi cuenta.

english: Sleep is no less necessary to health than food.
spanish: El sueño no es menos necesario para la salud que la comida.

english: I won't leave this house voluntarily.
spanish: No dejaré esta casa voluntariamente.

english: He went to London, where he stayed for a week.
spanish: Se fue a Londres, donde pasó una semana.

english: I think we do a really good job.
spanish: Creo que hacemos un muy buen trabajo.

english: She has been married to him for a decade now.
spanish: Ella lleva diez años casada con él.

english: Would you like for me to do that for you?
spanish: ¿Quieren que haga eso por ustedes?

english: The drunk driver damaged a tree.
spanish: El conductor borracho dañó un árbol.

english: Tom almost got hit by the ball.
spanish: Tom casi fué golpeado por el balón.

english: As far as I know, she is a kind girl.
spanish: Por lo que sé, es una chica amable.

english: The concert hasn't yet begun.
spanish: El concierto aún no ha comenzado.

english: I'm not good at math.
spanish: No soy fuerte en matemáticas.

english: She has her faults, but I like her.
spanish: Ella tiene sus defectos, pero me gusta.

english: Did he make up his mind to make the trip?
spanish: ¿Se determinó a hacer el viaje?

english: Tom isn't at the hotel.
spanish: Tom no está en el hotel.

english: The Japanese economy grew by 4% last year.
spanish: La economía japonesa creció un 4% el año pasado.

english: You must gather further information.
spanish: Debes reunir más información.

english: What was the cause of the explosion?
spanish: ¿Cuál fue la causa de la explosión?

english: We're not the only Canadians here.
spanish: No somos los únicos canadienses aquí.

english: By the way, where do you live?
spanish: Por cierto, ¿dónde vive usted?

english: I fail to see the reason.
spanish: No logro ver el motivo.

english: Tom left a message on Mary's answering machine.
spanish: Tom dejó un mensaje en el contestador de Mary.

english: You may choose whichever you want.
spanish: Tú puedes elegir la que quieras.

english: Would you prefer milk or coffee?
spanish: ¿Te gusta más la leche o el café?

english: The train pulled out exactly on time.
spanish: A la hora en punto el tren se puso en movimiento.

english: I kind of like it.
spanish: No está mal.

english: She advised him that he should stay at home.
spanish: Le aconsejó que se debería quedar en casa.

english: Do you remember the day when we met first?
spanish: ¿Te acuerdas del día en que nos conocimos?

english: He was standing with his arms folded.
spanish: Él estaba parado con los brazos cruzados.

english: What do you have in your bag?
spanish: ¿Qué tienes en tu bolso?

english: Did you enjoy the show?
spanish: ¿Te gustó el espectáculo?

english: Could I get your autograph?
spanish: ¿Me puede dar un autógrafo?

english: Tom bumped into a Mary on his way to school.
spanish: Tom se topó con una María de camino a la escuela.

english: I thought you would understand.
spanish: Creía que lo entenderías.

english: That was just plain stupid.
spanish: Eso fue simplemente estúpido.

english: I don't have time for reading.
spanish: No tengo tiempo para leer.

english: You can't buy it anywhere but there.
spanish: No se puede comprar en ningún otro lugar.

english: I only speak a smattering of Japanese.
spanish: Chapurreo de japonés.

english: My grandfather is very hard to please.
spanish: Es muy difícil satisfacer a mi abuelo.

english: It's clear that he doesn't want to talk to me.
spanish: Es claro que él no quiere hablar conmigo.

english: Get back in the car.
spanish: Regresa al auto.

english: I don't regret it one bit.
spanish: No lo lamento ni un poco.

english: The meeting took place last week.
spanish: La reunión se llevó a cabo la semana pasada.

english: We'd be happy if you could come with us.
spanish: Nos alegraría mucho que pudiera venir con nosotros.

english: I thought you always played football on Saturday.
spanish: Pensé que siempre jugaban fútbol los sábados.

english: I'm older than any other student in my class.
spanish: Soy más viejo que cualquier otro estudiante de mi clase.

english: Can you explain it to me?
spanish: ¿Me lo podrías explicar?

english: Do as I say, not as I do.
spanish: Haz lo que yo digo, no lo que yo hago.

english: They must work 8 hours a day.
spanish: Ellos deben trabajar ocho horas al día.

english: I met her during my stay in Mexico.
spanish: La conocí durante mi estancia en México.

english: I'm going to Paris next month.
spanish: El mes que viene voy a ir a París.

english: Tom used to work in a bakery.
spanish: Tom solía trabajar en una panadería.

english: I am leaving next week.
spanish: Me voy la semana que viene.

english: We got lost in the snow.
spanish: Nos perdimos en la nieve.

english: He demanded that the savage dog be kept tied up.
spanish: Él exigió que tuvieran al perro salvaje amarrado.

english: There used to be an elementary school here.
spanish: Solía haber una escuela de primaria aquí.

english: I want to spend more time with Tom.
spanish: Quiero pasar más tiempo con Tom.

english: Dinosaurs died out a very long time ago.
spanish: Los dinosaurios se extinguieron hace mucho tiempo.

english: I'll make every possible effort to meet your request.
spanish: Yo haré cada esfuerzo posible para cumplir con su solicitud.

english: Some kinds of birds can't fly.
spanish: Algunas clases de aves no pueden volar.

english: She tried in vain to conceal her fear.
spanish: Ella trató en vano de ocultar su temor.

english: Do you have anything for a headache?
spanish: ¿Tienes algo para el dolor de cabeza?

english: Are we in the same hotel?
spanish: ¿Estamos en el mismo hotel?

english: I thought the show was over.
spanish: Pensé que el show había terminado.

english: What would you like to be called?
spanish: ¿Cómo te gustaría ser llamado?

english: When was the last time you saw her?
spanish: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que la viste?

english: I have a brother who's the same age as you.
spanish: Tengo un hermano con la misma edad que tú.

english: Tom is in bed, asleep.
spanish: Tom está en la cama durmiendo.

english: Is that what happened here?
spanish: ¿Es eso lo que pasó aquí?

english: If you eat well, you're likely to live longer.
spanish: Si comes bien, es probable que vivas más.

english: They were sunbathing on the beach.
spanish: Estuvieron tomando el sol en la playa.

english: I plan to leave Boston as soon as I can.
spanish: Planeo dejar Boston tan pronto como me sea posible.

english: They used a pump to take out the water.
spanish: Usaron una bomba para sacar el agua.

english: Tom gave a speech in French.
spanish: Tom hizo un discurso en francés.

english: I want my own house, even if it's a shack.
spanish: Quiero mi propia casa, aunque solo sea una chabola.

english: Tom probably knows the answer.
spanish: Tom probablemente sepa la respuesta.

english: Did you hear the noise?
spanish: ¿Escuchaste ese ruido?

english: She is almost sixty years old.
spanish: Ella tiene casi sesenta años.

english: I will help him tomorrow.
spanish: Lo ayudaré mañana.

english: We're sure you'll be fine.
spanish: Estamos seguros de que vas a estar bien.

english: I couldn't have said it any better myself.
spanish: Yo mismo no podría haberlo dicho mejor.

english: I can't live without a TV.
spanish: No puedo vivir sin tele.

english: This bolt fits this nut.
spanish: Este tornillo encaja con esta tuerca.

english: Tom has a fast car.
spanish: Tom tiene un coche rápido.

english: In other words, I don't like to work with him.
spanish: En otras palabras, no me gusta trabajar con él.

english: This book is not as large that one.
spanish: Este libro no es tan grande como aquél.

english: He wore a robe over his pajamas.
spanish: Él llevaba una bata encima de su pijama.

english: I have something to talk over with you.
spanish: Tengo algo que discutir contigo.

english: Look at the map on page 25.
spanish: Mira el mapa de la página 25.

english: The noise hasn't stopped all day.
spanish: El ruido no ha cesado en todo el día.

english: Do you have anything to eat?
spanish: ¿Tienen algo de comer?

english: He is not a good person.
spanish: Él no es una buena persona.

english: The doctor took my pulse.
spanish: El médico me tomó el pulso.

english: I wandered around for a while.
spanish: Di vueltas por ahí un rato.

english: She gradually began to understand.
spanish: Ella empezó de poco a poco a entender.

english: I had to go back to Boston.
spanish: Tuve que volver a Boston.

english: My dad won't let my sister go to Boston.
spanish: Mi padre no dejará a mi hermana ir a Boston.

english: There's too much salt in this soup.
spanish: Esta sopa tiene demasiada sal.

english: I need to know you're OK.
spanish: Necesito saber que estás bien.

english: Do you take travelers' checks?
spanish: ¿Aceptan cheques de viajero?

english: He will be studying when you get up.
spanish: Cuando te levantes, él estará estudiando.

english: You'll have to ask someone else.
spanish: Tendrá usted que preguntar a otra persona.

english: They just want someone to blame.
spanish: Ellos solo quieren a alguien a quien culpar.

english: How was the weather yesterday?
spanish: ¿Cómo estuvo el tiempo ayer?

english: My sister usually goes to the park every weekend.
spanish: Mi hermana normalmente va al parque los fines de semana.

english: He knows everything about Germany.
spanish: Lo sabe todo sobre Alemania.

english: He was more surprised than I had expected.
spanish: Él estaba más sorprendido de lo que me había esperado.

english: How would you describe your relationship with Tom?
spanish: ¿Cómo describirías tu relación con Tom?

english: You like English, don't you?
spanish: Te gusta el inglés, ¿verdad?

english: I tried to focus my attention on reading.
spanish: Traté de concentrarme en la lectura.

english: I can assure you that you are wrong.
spanish: Te puedo asegurar que estás equivocada.

english: There are people who think pineapples grow underground.
spanish: Hay personas que piensan que las piñas crecen bajo tierra.

english: We work in a factory.
spanish: Trabajamos en una fábrica.

english: We dissected a frog to examine its internal organs.
spanish: Diseccionamos una rana para examinar sus órganos internos.

english: I regret that I can't help you.
spanish: Lamento no poder ayudarles.

english: You have to believe us.
spanish: Tienes que creernos.

english: I think the pay is enough.
spanish: Creo que el pago es suficiente.

english: I really need your help.
spanish: De verdad que necesito tu ayuda.

english: Tom has a 13-year-old daughter.
spanish: Tom tiene una hija de 13 años.

english: She tried to persuade him to go with her.
spanish: Ella intentó convencerle para que fuera con ella.

english: She seldom sings, but I think she will tonight.
spanish: Ella rara vez canta, pero yo creo que esta noche lo hará.

english: I think it's time for me to sharpen my pencil.
spanish: Creo que es hora de que le saque punta a mi lápiz.

english: I'll be with you as soon as I can.
spanish: Estaré con usted tan pronto como pueda.

english: Tom's starting to go bald.
spanish: Tomás está comenzando a quedarse pelado.

english: You work too hard these days. Aren't you tired?
spanish: Trabajas muy duro estos días. ¿No estás cansado?

english: She goes to the supermarket every three days.
spanish: Ella va al supermercado cada tres días.

english: She went to the hospital yesterday.
spanish: Ella fue al hospital ayer.

english: Why do you want to be a nurse?
spanish: ¿Por qué quieres ser enfermera?

english: We might have frost next week.
spanish: Puede que hiele la semana que viene.

english: It must've been broken during shipping.
spanish: Se habrá roto en el transporte.

english: He is tall, but his brother is much taller.
spanish: Él es alto, pero su hermano es mucho más alto.

english: Tom made some bad investments.
spanish: Tom hizo algunas malas inversiones.

english: They are having a really good time.
spanish: Ellos están divirtiéndose mucho.

english: I only have one mouth, but I have two ears.
spanish: Solo tengo una boca, pero tengo dos oídos.

english: Millions of people lost all their savings.
spanish: Millones de personas perdieron todos sus ahorros.

english: He wants to meet you.
spanish: Él se quiere encontrar con ustedes.

english: The boy was accompanied by his parents.
spanish: El niño iba acompañado por sus padres.

english: Do you have any plans for today?
spanish: ¿Tienes algún plan para hoy?

english: Two robbers broke into a store.
spanish: Dos ladrones entraron en una tienda.

english: When was the last time you had your hair cut?
spanish: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que te cortaste el pelo?

english: I think that most young people like rock music.
spanish: Creo que a casi todos los jóvenes les gusta el rock.

english: His father always comes home late.
spanish: Su padre siempre vuelve tarde a casa.

english: I never had any doubts.
spanish: Nunca tuve dudas.

english: This is the last game.
spanish: Este es el último partido.

english: Women didn't use to talk politics in this country.
spanish: Antes, en este país, las mujeres no solían hablar acerca de política.

english: She is capable of teaching English.
spanish: Ella está capacitada para enseñar inglés.

english: I'm not in favor of such a plan.
spanish: No estoy a favor de un plan así.

english: Tom doesn't have to work on Mondays.
spanish: Tom no tiene que trabajar los lunes.

english: She waited for you for two hours.
spanish: Ella os esperó durante dos horas.

english: I thought you said your name was Tom.
spanish: Pensé que dijiste que te llamabas Tom.

english: You have to stay here.
spanish: Tienes que quedarte aquí.

english: My refrigerator is out of order.
spanish: Mi refrigerador está descompuesto.

english: I accidentally spilled the milk.
spanish: Accidentalmente vertí la leche.

english: Tom is in the bathroom.
spanish: Tom está en el baño.

english: One of the kids broke the lock.
spanish: Uno de los niños rompió el candado.

english: She was anxious about her children's health.
spanish: Ella estaba ansiosa a causa de la salud de su hijo.

english: What did you do over the weekend?
spanish: ¿Qué hiciste el fin de semana?

english: Isn't that just a brush fire?
spanish: ¿No es un simple incendio forestal?

english: That man ruined them completely.
spanish: Ese hombre los ha arruinado completamente.

english: He asked for my pardon.
spanish: Él me pidió perdón.

english: I could not get out.
spanish: Yo no pude salir afuera.

english: What did she do today?
spanish: ¿Qué hizo ella hoy?

english: Tom knows what he likes.
spanish: Tomás sabe lo que quiere.

english: When are you leaving for Boston?
spanish: ¿Cuándo sales para Boston?

english: I'd like to run a big stock farm.
spanish: Quisiera administrar una gran explotación ganadera.

english: She brought me a cup of tea.
spanish: Me trajo un vaso de té.

english: Please don't laugh at me.
spanish: Por favor, no te rías de mí.

english: Starting a fight with Tom wasn't such a good idea.
spanish: Empezar una pelea con Tom no fue una muy buena idea.

english: Tom started to feel like his life wasn't worth living.
spanish: Tom comenzó a sentir que no valía la pena vivir su vida.

english: He heard someone calling for help.
spanish: Oyó a alguien pidiendo ayuda.

english: If at first you don't succeed, try, try, try again.
spanish: Si a la primera no tienes éxito, inténtalo, inténtalo, inténtalo nuevamente.

english: Each man's pay was in proportion to his work.
spanish: La paga de cada uno es proporcional a su trabajo.

english: We have bigger things to worry about.
spanish: Tenemos cosas más grandes de qué preocuparnos.

english: The kids have had enough of your rules.
spanish: Los niños ya han tenido suficiente de tus reglas.

english: My father could swim well when he was young.
spanish: Mi padre podía nadar bien cuando era joven.

english: He was deaf to my pleas.
spanish: Él era sordo a mis súplicas.

english: I made you something to eat.
spanish: Te preparé algo de comer.

english: Tom took his dog for a walk.
spanish: Tom sacó a pasear a su perro.

english: Tom, Mary and John shared the cost of the party.
spanish: Tom, Mary y John compartieron el coste de la fiesta.

english: I'm afraid that I might make you angry.
spanish: Me da miedo que te pueda hacer enojar.

english: I want you to fly to Boston tomorrow.
spanish: Quiero que mañana vayas en avión a Boston.

english: It always happens this way.
spanish: Siempre sucede así.

english: It's almost time to get started.
spanish: Ya casi es hora de comenzar.

english: We didn't know what to do.
spanish: No sabíamos qué hacer.

english: Tom has all but given up.
spanish: Tom se ha rendido casi por completo.

english: Tom and I were friends.
spanish: Tom y yo éramos amigos.

english: I don't think it's weird at all.
spanish: No creo que sea raro en absoluto.

english: I don't know why he quit the company.
spanish: No sé por qué él renunció a la compañía.

english: Switzerland is a beautiful country worth visiting.
spanish: Suiza es un bello país que vale la pena visitar.

english: Did you bring your family with you?
spanish: ¿Trajiste a tu familia contigo?

english: Now is the time when we must work together.
spanish: Ahora es el momento en que debemos trabajar juntos.

english: Tom used to live in Boston.
spanish: Tom solía vivir en Boston.

english: He came to Japan seven years ago.
spanish: Él vino a Japón hace siete años.

english: It was a very beautiful flower.
spanish: Era una flor muy bella.

english: It never snows in this country.
spanish: En este país no nieva nunca.

english: I'm very short of money.
spanish: Estoy corto de dinero.

english: It's about a ten-minute drive from here.
spanish: Está a unos diez minutos conduciendo de aquí.

english: Mary bought a present for her friend's daughter.
spanish: Mary le compró un regalo a la hija de su amiga.

english: Let me pay for the dinner.
spanish: Déjame pagar por la cena.

english: Why did you kiss me?
spanish: ¿Por qué me besaste?

english: The police officer removed Tom's handcuffs.
spanish: El policía le quitó las esposas a Tom.

english: He is what is called a self-made man.
spanish: Él es lo que se dice un hombre que se ha hecho a sí mismo.

english: If Tom drops by, please give him this document.
spanish: Si Tom aparece, entrégale este documento, por favor.

english: Tom is still in love with Mary.
spanish: Tom todavía está enamorado de Mary.

english: I just wanted to go to college.
spanish: Sólo deseaba ir a la universidad.

english: This book is unique in many ways.
spanish: Este libro es único en muchos sentidos.

english: She wasn't able to contact him by phone.
spanish: Ella no pudo contactarlo por teléfono.

english: I think the story is true.
spanish: Yo pienso que la historia es verdadera.

english: Do you think I should go alone?
spanish: ¿Crees que debería ir solo?

english: Can you think of anything else?
spanish: ¿Puedes pensar en alguna otra cosa?

english: Who wants a bit of cake?
spanish: ¿Quién quiere un poco de torta?

english: She closed her diary slowly.
spanish: Ella cerró lentamente su diario.

english: Are you the one who let the dog in?
spanish: ¿Eres tú quien dejó pasar al perro?

english: I want to get rid of it.
spanish: Quiero deshacerme de él.

english: Let me know if I need to make any changes.
spanish: Avíseme si necesito hacer algún cambio.

english: I didn't tell him everything.
spanish: No se lo conté todo.

english: She's neither rich nor famous.
spanish: Ella no es ni rica ni famosa.

english: Clark Kent is the hero of the Superman stories.
spanish: Clark Kent es el héroe de las historias de Supermán.

english: The dog wagged its tail.
spanish: El perro sacudía la cola.

english: I don't know the reason for her absence.
spanish: Desconozco la razón de su ausencia.

english: I prefer the black one.
spanish: Prefiero el negro.

english: I spoke with her for one hour.
spanish: Hablé con ella por una hora.

english: All the furniture was covered with dust.
spanish: Todos los muebles estaban llenos de polvo.

english: Tom could do with some help.
spanish: A Tom le serviría algo de ayuda.

english: I'm not sure whether Tom heard it or not.
spanish: No estoy seguro de si Tom lo oyó o no.

english: Tom disagreed with Mary on that point.
spanish: Tom no estuvo de acuerdo con Mary en ese punto.

english: I'm being good to you this morning.
spanish: Estoy siendo bueno con usted esta mañana.

english: How long have you been in Boston?
spanish: ¿Hace cuánto que estás en Boston?

english: I've met that girl before.
spanish: Yo he visto a esa niña antes.

english: It's all coming to an end.
spanish: Todo está terminando.

english: We got lost in the woods.
spanish: Nos hemos perdido en el bosque.

english: Why don't you come in?
spanish: ¿Por qué no pasas adentro?

english: The years pass by quickly.
spanish: Los años pasan rápido.

english: Tom wondered the same thing.
spanish: Tom se preguntaba lo mismo.

english: My apartment is near here.
spanish: Mi apartamento está cerca de aquí.

english: I will do my best.
spanish: Daré lo mejor.

english: We have one more item to discuss.
spanish: Tenemos un asunto más que discutir.

english: They live two flights up.
spanish: Viven dos pisos más arriba.

english: The boy I thought was honest deceived me.
spanish: El niño que yo tenía por sincero me engañó.

english: That pair of pliers came in handy.
spanish: Estos alicates me vinieron muy bien.

english: Tell it to him, not me!
spanish: ¡Díselo a él, no a mí!

english: I remember seeing you last year.
spanish: Recuerdo haberte visto el año pasado.

english: He'll soon catch up with Tom.
spanish: Pronto alcanzará a Tom.

english: We will go, but without you.
spanish: Nosotros iremos, pero sin ti.

english: Would you like to have another cup of tea?
spanish: ¿Quieres tomar otra taza de té?

english: Please send me a letter as soon as you arrive.
spanish: Por favor, escribidme una carta en cuanto lleguéis.

english: What kind of ranch did you grow up on?
spanish: ¿En qué clase de rancho te criaste?

english: Do you know where he lives?
spanish: ¿Sabes dónde vive?

english: I want them to give me my money back.
spanish: Quiero que me devuelvan el dinero.

english: I don't know if I should tell him.
spanish: No sé si debería decírselo.

english: I came to give you back the books I borrowed.
spanish: He venido para devolverte los libros que me llevé.

english: We can't allow ourselves to be fooled.
spanish: No podemos permitirnos que nos engañen.

english: I don't want this one.
spanish: No quiero éste.

english: Nobody has made a decision yet.
spanish: Nadie ha tomado una decisión aún.

english: I took my shoes off.
spanish: Me saqué los zapatos.

english: I'm a coward when it comes to cockroaches.
spanish: Soy un cobarde con las cucarachas.

english: I know what happened to Tom.
spanish: Sé lo que le pasó a Tom.

english: Stop it. You're being ridiculous.
spanish: Detente. Estás actuando como un idiota.

english: He is not ashamed of being poor.
spanish: Él no se avergüenza de ser pobre.

english: Owing to the storm, the ship could not leave port.
spanish: El barco no pudo dejar el puerto debido a la tormenta.

english: He is good at dealing with children.
spanish: Él es bueno para tratar con niños.

english: I'll let Tom know you want to see him.
spanish: Le voy a avisar a Tom que lo querés ver.

english: You must be a friend of Tom's.
spanish: Debes ser amiga de Tom.

english: He has money, but he's not happy.
spanish: Él tiene dinero pero no es feliz.

english: He told me his name was Tom.
spanish: Me dijo que se llamaba Tom.

english: I'm sure Tom will wish he hadn't said that.
spanish: Estoy seguro de que Tom deseará no haber dicho eso.

english: What's your favorite drink in the winter?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu bebida favorita de invierno?

english: Tom didn't say how many times he had been there.
spanish: Tom no dijo cuántas veces había estado allí.

english: I did not see the sign.
spanish: No vi la señal.

english: Tom had nothing to read.
spanish: Tom no tenía nada para leer.

english: She needs him more than he needs her.
spanish: Ella le necesita más de lo que él la necesita.

english: He is not as intelligent as his brother.
spanish: No es tan inteligente como su hermano.

english: What's going to happen today?
spanish: ¿Qué va a pasar hoy?

english: Tom is traveling by himself.
spanish: Tom viaja solo.

english: He seized the pickpocket by the collar.
spanish: Él atrapo al carterista por el cuello.

english: What you did was wrong.
spanish: Lo que hicisteis estuvo mal.

english: You're the same age as my girlfriend.
spanish: Tienes la misma edad que mi novia.

english: Tom didn't think it was funny.
spanish: Tom no pensaba que era divertido.

english: Who do you plan to spend Christmas with?
spanish: ¿Con quién vas a pasar la Navidad?

english: Our guest is waiting for us downstairs.
spanish: Nuestro invitado nos está esperando abajo.

english: The clerk waited on them immediately.
spanish: El dependiente los atendió en seguida.

english: Tom hasn't been very well recently.
spanish: Tom no se ha sentido muy bien recientemente.

english: I can't remember what her name is.
spanish: No me puedo acordar de su nombre.

english: The new store is going to open next week.
spanish: La semana que viene abren los nuevos almacenes.

english: I wonder if anybody can help us.
spanish: Me pregunto si alguien nos puede ayudar.

english: I think skateboards are usually cheaper than rollerblades.
spanish: Me parece que las patinetas en general son más baratas que los patines.

english: According to the radio, it will snow tomorrow.
spanish: Según la radio, mañana va a nevar.

english: I'm going to need you later.
spanish: Voy a necesitarte más tarde.

english: I think time will solve the problem.
spanish: Creo que el tiempo solucionará el problema.

english: Tom is allergic to peanuts.
spanish: Tom es alérgico al maní.

english: She tried to commit suicide.
spanish: Ella intentó suicidarse.

english: Children are curious about everything.
spanish: Los niños sienten curiosidad por todo.

english: They made me an offer I couldn't refuse.
spanish: Me hicieron una oferta que no pude rechazar.

english: Please make three copies of each page.
spanish: Hágame tres copias de cada página, por favor.

english: What's your home phone number?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu número telefónico de domicilio?

english: You have to do it.
spanish: Debes hacerlo.

english: It's good to talk to you.
spanish: Es bueno hablar contigo.

english: He solved the difficult problem easily.
spanish: Él resolvió el difícil problema con facilidad.

english: The blood was bright red.
spanish: La sangre era de un rojo brillante.

english: I hope you'll be comfortable here.
spanish: Espero que estén cómodos aquí.

english: I think that there is a man there.
spanish: Creo que hay un hombre allí.

english: Why do you know so much about Australia?
spanish: ¿Por qué sabes tanto de Australia?

english: This book is out of print.
spanish: Este libro está descatalogado.

english: I'd like to reserve a single room.
spanish: Quisiera reservar una habitación individual.

english: Tell me what you're thinking.
spanish: Dime lo que piensas.

english: The company produces soy sauce and other food products.
spanish: La compañía produce salsa de soya y otros productos alimenticios.

english: If you touch that wire, you'll get a shock.
spanish: Si tocas ese cable, te va a dar un choque.

english: Please cut the pizza into three slices.
spanish: Por favor corta la pizza en tres porciones.

english: Let's go to my house.
spanish: Vayamos a mi casa.

english: Would you mind saying that once more?
spanish: ¿Te importaría decirlo otra vez?

english: It's even worse than it looks.
spanish: Es aún peor de lo que parece.

english: I saw the old man feed his dog chicken bones.
spanish: Vi al anciano alimentar a su perro con huesos de pollo.

english: She put away a good deal of money.
spanish: Ella ahorró una buena cantidad de dinero.

english: Do you want to study in Germany?
spanish: ¿Querés estudiar en Alemania?

english: I hear that his father is abroad.
spanish: Oí que su padre está en otro país.

english: If you wish for peace, prepare for war.
spanish: Si queréis paz, preparaos para la guerra.

english: I ate a hot dog for lunch.
spanish: Comí un pancho como almuerzo.

english: I want to help you with your homework.
spanish: Quiero ayudarte con los deberes.

english: Tom finally succeeded in getting a job that he liked.
spanish: Tom finalmente logró conseguir el trabajo que le gustaba.

english: What time does the train get in?
spanish: ¿A qué hora llega el tren?

english: It's better to be crazy than to be boring.
spanish: ¡Es mejor ser loca que aburrida!

english: I'm going to follow Tom.
spanish: Voy a seguir a Tom.

english: It was the first time man walked on the moon.
spanish: Fue la primera vez que un hombre caminaba sobre la luna.

english: Our teacher is a real idiot.
spanish: Nuestro maestro es un verdadero idiota.

english: I am hungry because I did not have breakfast.
spanish: Tengo hambre porque no he desayunado.

english: He flew into a rage.
spanish: Él montó en cólera.

english: I appreciate all your help.
spanish: Aprecio toda tu ayuda.

english: Have you lost your mind?
spanish: ¿Habéis perdido la cabeza?

english: I was aware of being watched.
spanish: Estaba informado de que estaba siendo vigilado.

english: I think you resemble your mother.
spanish: Creo que te pareces a tu madre.

english: We made a sand castle.
spanish: Hicimos un castillo de arena.

english: I don't think Tom wants to see me.
spanish: No creo que Tom quiera verme.

english: I don't mind in the slightest who he is.
spanish: No me importa en lo más mínimo quién es él.

english: He is what we call a man of culture.
spanish: Él es lo que llamamos un hombre de la cultura.

english: I feed my dog twice a day.
spanish: Alimento a mi perro dos veces al día.

english: Do you mind if I join you?
spanish: ¿Le molesta si la acompaño?

english: I didn't know you had allergies.
spanish: No sabía que tenías alergias.

english: Father set the alarm for six o'clock.
spanish: Papá puso la alarma a las seis en punto.

english: I like your techno dance moves.
spanish: Me gustan tus movimientos de baile tecno.

english: I have been here for two years.
spanish: Llevo aquí dos años.

english: Can I give you a hand?
spanish: ¿Te puedo dar una mano?

english: He closely resembles his father.
spanish: Se parece mucho a su padre.

english: Your father's supporters are not limited to his friends.
spanish: Los aliados de tu padre no son solamente sus amigos.

english: I like the way that smells.
spanish: Me gusta cómo huele.

english: He never fails to write to her every week.
spanish: Nunca deja de escribir todas las semanas.

english: I told you Tom wouldn't understand.
spanish: Te dije que Tomás no lo comprendería.

english: I rode a unicycle today.
spanish: Hoy anduve en un monociclo.

english: I have been looking for you.
spanish: Te estaba buscando.

english: Tom certainly didn't sound alarmed.
spanish: Tom ciertamente no sonaba alarmado.

english: There was a pair of handcuffs on the bed.
spanish: Había un par de esposas sobre la cama.

english: I have nothing in common with her.
spanish: No tengo nada en común con ella.

english: This fruit has an unpleasant smell.
spanish: Esta fruta tiene un olor desagradable.

english: You can start right now.
spanish: Pueden empezar ahora mismo.

english: Tom loved Mary, but she didn't love him back.
spanish: Tom amaba a Mary, pero ella no lo amaba a él.

english: Why did Tom call you?
spanish: ¿Por qué te llamó Tom?

english: I don't know why you're all so angry.
spanish: No sé por qué están todos ustedes tan enojados.

english: Have you already done your homework?
spanish: ¿Ya hiciste tus deberes?

english: I saw him scolded by his mother.
spanish: Vi como le regañaba su madre.

english: I often go to the movies.
spanish: Yo voy a menudo al cine.

english: They wanted me to finish by 2:30.
spanish: Querían que terminara a las 2:30.

english: Tom is outside playing frisbee with his dog.
spanish: Tom está afuera jugando frisbee con su perro.

english: He may have missed the plane.
spanish: Él puede haber perdido el avión.

english: I found his office easily.
spanish: Encontré su oficina con facilidad.

english: He is trying hard to give up smoking.
spanish: Él está haciendo un gran esfuerzo para dejar de fumar.

english: He declined the offer and so did I.
spanish: Él rechazó la oferta, y también yo.

english: How was the universe formed?
spanish: ¿Cómo se creó el universo?

english: I don't want to change.
spanish: No quiero cambiar.

english: It isn't what you say, but just the opposite.
spanish: No es lo que usted dice, sino todo lo contrario.

english: You should not have done it without my permission.
spanish: No deberías haberlo hecho sin mi permiso.

english: As far as I know, he's guilty.
spanish: Hasta donde yo sé, él es culpable.

english: I own some very old stamps.
spanish: Poseo algunos sellos muy antiguos.

english: I need to save money.
spanish: Necesito ahorrar dinero.

english: Tom is a good-looking guy, but he's not too friendly.
spanish: Tom es un tipo apuesto, pero no es muy amistoso.

english: Does he know that you love him?
spanish: ¿Sabe que le quieres?

english: Please contact me by mail.
spanish: Por favor, contácteme por correo.

english: She stood by him whenever he was in trouble.
spanish: Ella siempre le apoyó cuando tuvo problemas.

english: He made a huge mistake.
spanish: Él cometió un gran error.

english: I don't feel like exercising.
spanish: No tengo ganas de hacer ejercicio.

english: I wish I had been with her then.
spanish: Desearía haber estado con ella entonces.

english: I'm hoping you can help me.
spanish: Espero que me puedas ayudar.

english: I'd like to go to the seaside with you.
spanish: Me gustaría ir al mar contigo.

english: We must protect the rainforest.
spanish: Debemos proteger la selva tropical.

english: My father will be forty soon.
spanish: Mi padre tendrá cuarenta pronto.

english: Do you believe in extraterrestrials?
spanish: ¿Crees en los extraterrestres?

english: He hit me, not her.
spanish: Él me pegó a mí, no a ella.

english: The girls danced in the gym.
spanish: Las niñas bailaron en el gimnasio.

english: I was employee of the year for three years.
spanish: Fui empleado del año durante 3 años.

english: Don't touch it. Leave it as it is.
spanish: No lo toques. Dejalo como está.

english: Tom could be right about that.
spanish: Tom podría tener razón en eso.

english: That guitar never sounded so good when I played it.
spanish: Esa guitarra nunca sonaba tan bien cuando yo la tocaba.

english: Tom was quite good-looking when he was young.
spanish: Tom era bastante lindo cuando era joven.

english: I'm in prison for a crime I didn't commit.
spanish: Estoy en prisión por un crimen que no cometí.

english: It's one of those moments.
spanish: Es uno de esos momentos.

english: You seem to know all the answers.
spanish: Parecéis conocer todas las respuestas.

english: Did you already brush your teeth?
spanish: ¿Ya te limpiaste los dientes?

english: He used to be a quiet man.
spanish: Solía ser un hombre callado.

english: Those girls look like guys.
spanish: Esas chicas parecen chicos.

english: You have no legal right to seize my property.
spanish: Usted no tiene derecho legal a confiscar mi propiedad.

english: Many students like to study in the morning.
spanish: A muchos estudiantes les gusta estudiar en la mañana.

english: I don't want to lose Tom.
spanish: No quiero perder a Tom.

english: We made a huge mistake.
spanish: Nosotros cometimos un error enorme.

english: What is he up to now?
spanish: ¿Qué trama ahora?

english: Is that too much to ask?
spanish: ¿Es eso mucho pedir?

english: This TV program is really quite interesting.
spanish: Este programa de hecho es bien interesante.

english: The typhoon caused the river to flood.
spanish: El tifón causó que el río se desbordara.

english: Tom wants the same thing you do.
spanish: Tom quiere lo mismo que tú.

english: I met with an old woman.
spanish: Me encontré con una anciana.

english: I think you saw something.
spanish: Creo que viste algo.

english: You must not touch the paintings.
spanish: No debes tocar las pinturas.

english: What's your favorite fast food restaurant?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu restaurante de comida rápida favorito?

english: What prevented you from coming to the concert?
spanish: ¿Qué fue lo que te impidió venir al concierto?

english: Tom depends too much on Mary.
spanish: Tom depende demasiado de Mary.

english: I didn't know you had a brother.
spanish: No sabía que tuvieras un hermano.

english: She put on her hat.
spanish: Ella se puso el sombrero.

english: Tom was sick in bed last Sunday.
spanish: Tom estuvo en cama enfermo el domingo pasado.

english: He would like to know whether you play chess.
spanish: Él quisiera saber si jugás al ajedrez.

english: I'm likely going to be fired for doing that.
spanish: Es muy probable que me despidan por hacer eso.

english: Make sure you stick together so no one gets lost.
spanish: Aseguraos de manteneros juntos para que nadie se pierda.

english: She died of stomach cancer.
spanish: Ella murió de cáncer de estómago.

english: Why don't we go and see a movie?
spanish: ¿Por qué no nos vamos a ver una película?

english: He has a fair income.
spanish: Él tiene unos razonables ingresos.

english: The dog followed me to my home.
spanish: El perro me siguió hasta casa.

english: Will you explain it in plain English?
spanish: ¿Lo puedes explicar en cristiano?

english: I can keep a secret.
spanish: Sé guardar un secreto.

english: If you stay, I'll stay.
spanish: Si te quedas, me quedo.

english: I regret having said such a thing to my teacher.
spanish: Me arrepiento de haberle dicho eso al profesor.

english: Many Americans are interested in jazz.
spanish: A muchos estadounidenses les interesa el jazz.

english: That's what I look at.
spanish: Eso es lo que estoy mirando.

english: I don't know what I've been so afraid of.
spanish: No sé a qué he temido tanto.

english: I used to swim here every day.
spanish: Solía nadar aquí todos los días.

english: He found the box under the table.
spanish: Él encontró la caja debajo de la mesa.

english: I'm tougher than you think.
spanish: Soy más duro de lo que piensas.

english: I can't tell if you're joking or not.
spanish: Yo no puedo decir si tú estás bromeando o no.

english: I ran a race with him.
spanish: Hice una carrera con él.

english: They went to a fortune teller.
spanish: Ellos acudieron a una adivina.

english: Do you like to sing?
spanish: ¿Les gusta cantar?

english: I know I should stay.
spanish: Sé que debería quedarme.

english: He needs to be the center of attention.
spanish: Él necesita ser el centro de atención.

english: An idea came to me.
spanish: Se me ha ocurrido una idea.

english: In the summer, people go to the seaside.
spanish: En verano, la gente va a la playa.

english: I know you're worried about Tom.
spanish: Sé que está preocupado por Tom.

english: It is impossible for me to answer the question.
spanish: Me es imposible responder a la pregunta.

english: She'll have left before you come back.
spanish: Ella se habrá ido antes de que tú regreses.

english: You are taller than she is.
spanish: Sois más altos que ella.

english: Can you describe the object?
spanish: ¿Puedes describir el objeto?

english: She's the most beautiful woman.
spanish: Es la mujer más hermosa.

english: What does Tom have to say?
spanish: ¿Qué es lo que Tom tiene que decir al respecto?

english: You often find that sympathy turns into love.
spanish: A menudo descubres que la simpatía se convierte en amor.

english: You have been good soldiers.
spanish: Han sido buenos soldados.

english: You get more and more beautiful every day.
spanish: Estás más y más bonita cada día.

english: There are some things that I don't understand.
spanish: Hay algunas cosas que no entiendo.

english: They're having a break at the moment.
spanish: En este momento están descansando.

english: Tom waited on the platform.
spanish: Tom aguardó en la plataforma.

english: He made an important scientific discovery.
spanish: Él hizo un importante descubrimiento científico.

english: He was angry with his son.
spanish: Él estaba enfadado con su hijo.

english: I leave in an hour.
spanish: Me voy en una hora.

english: Are you going by bus or car?
spanish: ¿Vas en colectivo o en auto?

english: Don't you ever wonder why?
spanish: ¿Alguna vez te preguntaste el porqué?

english: I'm here to teach you some manners.
spanish: Estoy aquí para enseñarte modales.

english: Tom hopes Mary gets the job.
spanish: Tom espera que Mary consiga un trabajo.

english: How often should I feed my dog?
spanish: ¿Qué tan frecuentemente debería alimentar a mi perro?

english: People around the world are getting fatter.
spanish: Las personas en todo el mundo se están volviendo más gordas.

english: I can't remember his name.
spanish: No puedo recordar su nombre.

english: You have to be careful when you're in the jungle.
spanish: Tenés que tener cuidado cuando estás en la selva.

english: Tom tried to open the door.
spanish: Tom intentó abrir la puerta.

english: Tom shared his lunch with me.
spanish: Tomás compartió su almuerzo conmigo.

english: Kublai Khan is the grandson of Genghis Khan.
spanish: Kublai Khan es el nieto de Genghis Khan.

english: That's not what I meant.
spanish: Eso no es lo que quise decir.

english: He's a little taller than you are.
spanish: Él es un poco más alto que tú.

english: I kept the door locked.
spanish: Mantuve la puerta cerrada con llave.

english: I have made up my mind to leave Japan.
spanish: Me decidí a dejar Japón.

english: He discovered that he had made a mistake.
spanish: Él descubrió que había cometido un error.

english: I hesitated about which road to take.
spanish: Dudé acerca de cual camino tomar.

english: He looks a bit tired, doesn't he?
spanish: Parece un poco cansado, ¿verdad?

english: Have you ever fixed your car by yourself?
spanish: ¿Has arreglado tú solo tu auto alguna vez?

english: I don't want to go to bed.
spanish: No me quiero acostar.

english: Lots of people make that mistake.
spanish: Mucha gente comete ese error.

english: Tom and Mary went to Australia for their honeymoon.
spanish: Tomás y María fueron a Australia de luna de miel.

english: I called to thank Tom.
spanish: Llamé a Tom para darle las gracias.

english: Has Tom ever been in love?
spanish: ¿Ha estado Tom alguna vez enamorado?

english: Tom has a talent for modern painting.
spanish: Tom tiene talento para la pintura moderna.

english: I prefer rice to bread.
spanish: Prefiero el arroz al pan.

english: A hammer was used to break the window.
spanish: Se usó un martillo para romper la ventana.

english: The envious die, but envy never does.
spanish: Los envidiosos mueren, la envidia nunca.

english: You have a good camera.
spanish: Tienes una cámara buena.

english: Tom will win this game.
spanish: Tom ganará esta partida.

english: Would you like a beer?
spanish: ¿Te gustaría una cerveza?

english: I am heating the room.
spanish: Estoy calentando la pieza.

english: Tom wasn't the one who told me that.
spanish: Tom no fue el único que me dijo eso.

english: I do not like mathematics very much.
spanish: No me gustan mucho las matemáticas.

english: Leave us alone and we'll leave you alone.
spanish: Déjanos en paz, y nosotros te dejaremos en paz.

english: There's no reason to get angry.
spanish: No hay motivo para enfadarse.

english: I know a few things.
spanish: Sé unas cuantas cosas.

english: We will get there in two hours.
spanish: Llegaremos allí en dos horas.

english: Will you please pass me your plate?
spanish: ¿Quiere usted hacer el favor de pasarme su plato?

english: I may have hurt his feelings.
spanish: Puede que haya herido sus sentimientos.

english: I am folding my dress.
spanish: Estoy doblando mi vestido.

english: I'd like to rent skis and ski boots.
spanish: Me gustaría arrendar esquíes y botas.

english: I want an MP3 player!
spanish: ¡Quiero un MP3!

english: She is sewing a dress.
spanish: Ella está cosiendo un vestido.

english: What difference does that make now?
spanish: ¿Qué importa ahora?

english: Let's not talk about your job tonight.
spanish: Vamos a dejar el tema del trabajo para otro día.

english: I am shorter than you.
spanish: Soy más bajo que tú.

english: You may eat anything in the refrigerator.
spanish: Puedes comer todo lo que hay en el frigorífico.

english: I owe you ten dollars.
spanish: Te debo diez dólares.

english: Walk as fast as possible.
spanish: Caminá lo más rápido posible.

english: I had my watch stolen yesterday.
spanish: Ayer me robaron mi reloj.

english: She will get along with my grandmother.
spanish: Ella se llevará bien con mi abuela.

english: Doctors are the worst patients.
spanish: Los médicos son los peores pacientes.

english: I'm not a native speaker.
spanish: No soy hablante nativo.

english: My uncle gave me a book.
spanish: Mi tío me ha dado un libro.

english: Wood floats, but iron sinks.
spanish: La madera flota, pero el hierro se hunde.

english: He'll answer your letter soon.
spanish: Pronto responderá a tu carta.

english: This is why I fired him.
spanish: Por eso lo despedí.

english: Tom is a professional baseball player.
spanish: Tom es un beisbolista profesional.

english: He explained how to make a fire.
spanish: Él explicó cómo hacer un fuego.

english: This hotel is conveniently located in terms of public transportation.
spanish: Este hotel está muy bien situado en lo que concierne al transporte público.

english: They communicate with each other often by mail.
spanish: Se comunican entre sí a menudo por correo.

english: We don't want any accidents.
spanish: No queremos ningún accidente.

english: I cannot get the lid off.
spanish: No puedo quitar la tapa.

english: We don't have any more bread.
spanish: No tenemos más pan.

english: Did you give Tom something to eat?
spanish: ¿Le diste a Tom algo de comer?

english: The post office isn't too far from here.
spanish: El correo no está muy lejos de acá.

english: Man eats to live, he does not live to eat.
spanish: El hombre come para vivir, no vive para comer.

english: Do you have a moment to talk about Jesus?
spanish: ¿Tiene un momento para hablar de Jesucristo?

english: Yesterday night, I shared a cab with Paris Hilton.
spanish: Anoche compartí taxi con Paris Hilton.

english: She scolded the child for coming home so late.
spanish: Ella retó al niño por llegar tan tarde a la casa.

english: He got up at five as usual.
spanish: Él se levantó a las cinco como siempre.

english: Tom has a sister in Boston.
spanish: Tom tiene una hermana en Boston.

english: Come and see me at eleven o'clock.
spanish: Ven a verme a las once.

english: Tom is mixing flour with sugar.
spanish: Tom está mezclando harina con azúcar.

english: Tom attached the string to the kite.
spanish: Tom ató un hilo a la cometa.

english: My mother appears young for her age.
spanish: Para la edad que tiene, mi madre parece más joven.

english: Your office is nicer than mine.
spanish: Su oficina es más bonita que la mía.

english: Tom is a practical man.
spanish: Tom es práctico.

english: I couldn't make out what he was saying.
spanish: No pude entender lo que él estaba diciendo.

english: Tell her that I am fishing.
spanish: Dile que estoy pescando.

english: I'm sure Tom would've told me if he'd known.
spanish: Estoy seguro de que Tom me lo hubiera dicho si hubiese sabido.

english: Tom wanted to tell Mary about John.
spanish: Tom quería hablar a Mary sobre John.

english: I'm a citizen of the world.
spanish: Soy un ciudadano del mundo.

english: Let's have a closer look at this.
spanish: Echemos un vistazo más de cerca a esto.

english: I wasn't busy last week.
spanish: La semana pasada no estuve ocupado.

english: She borrowed a saw from the farmer.
spanish: Ella tomó prestada una sierra del granjero.

english: You don't have enough experience.
spanish: Usted no tiene suficiente experiencia.

english: Please allow me to go.
spanish: Por favor déjame ir.

english: It is a good idea to read this book.
spanish: Es una buena idea leer este libro.

english: I wonder why women outlive men.
spanish: Me pregunto por qué las mujeres viven más que los hombres.

english: Sunday is the day when people go to church.
spanish: El domingo es el día en el que la gente va a la iglesia.

english: Buy a book and read it.
spanish: Comprá un libro y leelo.

english: I don't speak a word of French.
spanish: No hablo ni una palabra en francés.

english: I haven't seen her in three days.
spanish: Hace tres días que no le veo.

english: I'm looking for my friends.
spanish: Busco a mis amigos.

english: Most students come to school on foot.
spanish: La mayoría de los estudiantes vienen a la escuela de a pie.

english: The officer ordered the soldiers to attack the fortified position.
spanish: El oficial ordenó a los soldados atacar la posición fortificada.

english: All plants need water and light.
spanish: Todas las plantas necesitan luz y agua.

english: I called my friend after arriving at the station.
spanish: Al llegar a la estación, telefoneé a mi amigo.

english: He can do whatever he likes with the money.
spanish: Puede hacer lo que quiera con el dinero.

english: I am willing to agree to your request.
spanish: Yo estoy dispuesto a admitir su petición.

english: She watched him drawing a picture.
spanish: Ella lo miraba pintar una pintura.

english: The boy actually was going to do it.
spanish: El niño en realidad iba a hacerlo.

english: Singing is her strong point.
spanish: El canto es su punto fuerte.

english: She spends time with her grandmother every Sunday.
spanish: Ella pasa tiempo con su abuela todos los domingos.

english: I have a bit of time to relax.
spanish: Tengo un poco de tiempo para relajarme.

english: Tom said his house had been broken into.
spanish: Tom dijo que habían entrado a robar en su casa.

english: One of us should talk to Tom.
spanish: Uno de nosotros debería hablar con Tom.

english: She's loved by her friends.
spanish: Sus amigos le quieren.

english: She was absorbed in her work.
spanish: A ella la absorbió su trabajo.

english: My father often goes to America on business.
spanish: Mi padre usualmente viaja a los Estados Unidos por asuntos de negocios.

english: Come as soon as you can.
spanish: Ven tan rápido como te sea posible.

english: Tom told me he was having trouble sleeping.
spanish: Tom me dijo que tenía problemas para quedarse dormido.

english: Tom is much better than you.
spanish: Tom es mucho mejor que vos.

english: The trial will continue Monday.
spanish: El juicio continuará el lunes.

english: My mother makes the best cakes in the world.
spanish: Mi madre hace las mejores tortas del mundo.

english: He's not my boyfriend. He's my brother.
spanish: Él no es mi novio. Es mi hermano.

english: She stayed at a hotel.
spanish: Ella se quedó en el hotel.

english: If time permits, I'll visit the museum.
spanish: Si el tiempo lo permite, visitaré el museo.

english: I don't hear a thing.
spanish: No escucho nada.

english: Tom put his iPad on the table.
spanish: Tom puso su iPad sobre la mesa.

english: Does Tom have mental problems?
spanish: ¿Tom tiene problemas mentales?

english: I sold my books at a reasonable price.
spanish: Vendí mis libros a un precio módico.

english: It doesn't have any significance.
spanish: No significa nada.

english: It takes two to tango.
spanish: Es cosa de dos.

english: He has eyes at the back of his head.
spanish: Él tiene ojos en el cogote.

english: He has a perfect body.
spanish: Tiene un cuerpo perfecto.

english: Could you bring me some water?
spanish: ¿Puedes traerme un poco de agua?

english: I can give you something for your pain.
spanish: Puedo darte algo para el dolor.

english: Do you like this drawing?
spanish: ¿Te gusta este dibujo?

english: Tom left his umbrella on the bus.
spanish: Tom se dejó el paraguas en el autobús.

english: People often complain about the weather.
spanish: La gente se queja a menudo del tiempo.

english: Please let me eat in peace.
spanish: Por favor, déjame comer tranquilo.

english: Americans eat a lot of meat.
spanish: Los estadounidenses comen un montón de carne.

english: What does USSR stand for?
spanish: ¿Qué significa URSS?

english: Japan has a lot of trade with Canada.
spanish: Japón comercia mucho con Canadá.

english: Tom doesn't seem to be having fun.
spanish: Tomás no parece estar divirtiéndose.

english: Tom wanted to lose weight.
spanish: Tom quería adelgazar.

english: I couldn't bear any more insults.
spanish: Yo no pude soportar más insultos.

english: It kept snowing all day.
spanish: Continuó nevando todo el día.

english: This is the place where Tom was born.
spanish: Este es el lugar donde nació Tom.

english: Tom asked Mary out to dinner.
spanish: Tom invitó a Mary a cenar.

english: I'm sure you'll find everything is in order.
spanish: Estoy seguro de que vas a encontrar todo en orden.

english: I want to tell you the truth.
spanish: Quiero decirte la verdad.

english: Tom wondered why his wife left him.
spanish: Tomás se preguntaba por qué le abandonó su mujer.

english: John went back to work after a two-week hospital stay.
spanish: John volvió al trabajo después de estar hospitalizado dos semanas.

english: You should have attended the meeting in person.
spanish: Deberías haber asistido a la reunión en persona.

english: Tom doesn't take his job very seriously.
spanish: Tom no se toma su trabajo muy en serio.

english: Excuse me. What's your name?
spanish: Discúlpame. ¿Cuál es tu nombre?

english: I went to your website.
spanish: Me metí a tu página web.

english: Taiwan isn't part of China.
spanish: Taiwan no es parte de China.

english: The past is the past.
spanish: El pasado, pasado está.

english: If something goes wrong, just blame it on the translator.
spanish: Si algo va mal, simplemente échale la culpa al traductor.

english: I made several mistakes in the exam.
spanish: Cometí algunos errores en el examen.

english: I know what's wrong with me.
spanish: Yo sé lo que me pasa.

english: That doesn't mean that I'll stop doing it.
spanish: No significa que dejaré de hacerlo.

english: If I understood, I would tell you.
spanish: Si yo lo entendiese, te lo diría.

english: What do you want me to wear?
spanish: ¿Qué quieres que me ponga?

english: Which of them is your brother?
spanish: ¿Cuál de ellos es tu hermano?

english: We should not place too much emphasis on money.
spanish: No deberíamos poner demasiado énfasis en el dinero.

english: What did Tom want to eat?
spanish: ¿Qué quería Tomás comer?

english: That isn't what I'm looking for.
spanish: Eso no es lo que estoy buscando.

english: I don't know who he is.
spanish: No sé quién es.

english: The building that I saw was very large.
spanish: El edificio que vi era muy grande.

english: Thanks for being my friend.
spanish: Gracias por ser mi amigo.

english: His answer was far from satisfactory.
spanish: Su respuesta distaba mucho de ser satisfactoria.

english: It smells like a trap.
spanish: Huele a una trampa.

english: How far is it to the airport?
spanish: ¿A qué distancia está el aeropuerto?

english: She missed her chance to see the famous singer.
spanish: Ella perdió la oportunidad de ver a la cantante famosa.

english: The fox and the bear lived together.
spanish: El zorro y el oso vivían juntos.

english: My colleague and her husband are both American.
spanish: Mi colega y su marido son ambos americanos.

english: The teacher and I sat face to face.
spanish: El profesor y yo nos sentamos cara a cara.

english: I am sick and tired of him.
spanish: Estoy enfermo y cansado de él.

english: What is the capital of the United States?
spanish: ¿Cuál es la capital de los Estados Unidos?
