english: Don't talk in the classroom.
spanish: No hables en clase.

english: My boss refused my request for a raise.
spanish: Mi jefe rechazó mi petición de subirme el sueldo.

english: She laughed to cover her fear.
spanish: Ella se rió para esconder su miedo.

english: You have no right to interfere in other people's affairs.
spanish: No tienes derecho a interferir en los asuntos de otras personas.

english: I thought Tom was in Boston.
spanish: Pensé que Tom estaba en Boston.

english: There is no bus service after nine-thirty.
spanish: No hay servicio de autobús después de las nueve y media.

english: Next Monday is a holiday.
spanish: El próximo lunes es feriado.

english: I'm glad Tom invited you.
spanish: Me alegro de que Tom te haya invitado.

english: When did he say he would come?
spanish: ¿A qué horas dijo que vendría?

english: I don't want this one.
spanish: Ésta no la quiero.

english: There's something I should tell you.
spanish: Hay algo que debo decirte.

english: When my children are happy, I'm happy.
spanish: Cuando mis hijos estás felices, yo soy feliz.

english: Grandmother mows the grass in the garden.
spanish: La abuela corta el césped en el jardín.

english: It looks like Tom is winning.
spanish: Parece que Tom va ganando.

english: Where does this train go?
spanish: ¿Adónde va este tren?

english: He tends to talk too much.
spanish: Él tiende a hablar demasiado.

english: You only started this job an hour ago.
spanish: Hace sólo una hora que empezaste este trabajo.

english: What do you think now?
spanish: ¿Qué estás pensando?

english: Tom drank a cup of coffee.
spanish: Tom bebió una taza de café.

english: You have to finish your homework right away.
spanish: Tienes que terminar tu tarea de inmediato.

english: They weren't listening to music.
spanish: Ellos no estaban escuchando música.

english: She is going to France next week.
spanish: Ella irá a Francia la semana próxima.

english: Tom is not in his bedroom.
spanish: Tom no está en su habitación.

english: I saw a snake eating a mouse.
spanish: Vi cómo una serpiente se comía un ratón.

english: Tom wants to know where you've hidden the key.
spanish: Tom quiere saber dónde escondiste la llave.

english: Tom was born in Boston.
spanish: Tom nació en Boston.

english: The boycott lasted a little more than a year.
spanish: El boicot duró poco más de un año.

english: I'm going to a meeting.
spanish: Voy a una reunión.

english: Have you ever slept on the street?
spanish: ¿Alguna vez has dormido en la calle?

english: I just want to improve as much as I can.
spanish: Tan solo quiero mejorar tanto como pueda.

english: I gave some water to the dogs.
spanish: Di un poco de agua a los perros.

english: I know who we're dealing with.
spanish: Yo sé con quién estamos tratando.

english: The state is going to reform its drug policies.
spanish: El estado va a reformar sus políticas de drogas.

english: His plan is to build a bridge over that river.
spanish: Su plan es construir un puente por sobre ese río.

english: Tom will be back in less than thirty minutes.
spanish: Tom regresará en menos de treinta minutos.

english: Mary is now a happy little girl.
spanish: María es ahora una feliz niñita.

english: Why in the world did you do that?
spanish: ¿Por qué carajo hiciste eso?

english: I can't tell if you're serious or not.
spanish: Yo no puedo decir si tú eres serio o no.

english: I didn't even know that existed.
spanish: Yo ni siquiera sabía que eso existía.

english: The man turned out to be a private detective.
spanish: El hombre resultó ser un detective privado.

english: I am convinced that he is innocent.
spanish: Estoy convencido de que es inocente.

english: Just tell him the truth.
spanish: Tan solo díganle la verdad.

english: Please don't touch the exhibits.
spanish: Por favor, no toque los objetos expuestos.

english: Where did you learn to do that?
spanish: ¿Dónde aprendiste a hacer eso?

english: How often does Tom play hockey?
spanish: ¿Con qué frecuencia juega Tom al hockey?

english: You've got to be kidding me!
spanish: ¡Tienes que estar de coña!

english: She worries about my health.
spanish: Ella se preocupa por mi salud.

english: He held out his hand.
spanish: Él extendió la mano.

english: Tom is younger than you think.
spanish: Tom es más joven de lo que piensas.

english: Don't breathe a word of this to anyone.
spanish: No digas una palabra de esto a nadie.

english: I never did figure it out.
spanish: Nunca pude entenderlo.

english: I told Tom what I saw.
spanish: Yo le dije a Tom lo que vi.

english: He's proud of his good grades.
spanish: Está orgulloso de sus buenas notas.

english: She sleeps with two pillows.
spanish: Ella duerme con dos almohadas.

english: Tell them that there was someone here looking for them.
spanish: Diles que alguien les estaba buscando.

english: The sun was shining brightly.
spanish: El sol brillaba con fuerza.

english: What's the worst thing that could happen?
spanish: ¿Qué es lo peor que podría suceder?

english: His constant insults aroused her anger.
spanish: Sus insultos constantes encendieron su ira.

english: Tom doesn't speak French at home.
spanish: Tom no habla francés en casa.

english: Please don't smoke too much.
spanish: Por favor, no fumes mucho.

english: Tom made up his mind to buy the car.
spanish: Tom se decidió a comprar el coche.

english: Tom escaped from the danger.
spanish: Tom se escapó del peligro.

english: I can't play tennis very well.
spanish: No puedo jugar tenis muy bien.

english: You should get to school.
spanish: Deberíais ir al colegio.

english: I don't think it's dangerous.
spanish: No creo que sea peligroso.

english: Let me get your coat.
spanish: Permíteme que coja tu abrigo.

english: This CD costs ten dollars.
spanish: Este CD vale diez dólares.

english: Tom isn't a good cook.
spanish: Tom no es un buen cocinero.

english: I'll send the book by mail.
spanish: Enviaré el libro por correo.

english: I didn't know you were from Boston.
spanish: No sabía que eras de Boston.

english: Tom knew immediately that something was wrong.
spanish: Tom supo de inmediato que algo no andaba bien.

english: The coffee stain was difficult to remove.
spanish: La mancha de café era difícil de quitar.

english: How do you relax after a hard day at work?
spanish: ¿Cómo te relajas tras un duro día de trabajo?

english: Is there a similar proverb in Japan?
spanish: ¿Hay un proverbio parecido en Japón?

english: The town has changed a lot since then.
spanish: La ciudad ha cambiado muchísimo desde entonces.

english: The water is not fit to drink.
spanish: El agua no es apta para beberse.

english: I'll leave the rest to you.
spanish: Te dejo el resto a ti.

english: Little presents keep a friendship alive.
spanish: Pequeños obsequios mantienen viva a una amistad.

english: You have no obligation to help us.
spanish: No estás obligado a ayudarnos.

english: Old people need someone to talk to.
spanish: Los ancianos necesitan a alguien con quien conversar.

english: I used to collect coasters.
spanish: Antes coleccionaba posavasos.

english: I persuaded him into accepting the offer.
spanish: Le convencí de aceptar la oferta.

english: How long will you stay in Hakone?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo te vas a quedar en Hakone?

english: Does Tom live in Boston?
spanish: ¿Tom vive en Boston?

english: I know you can help us.
spanish: Sé que nos puedes ayudar.

english: Tom filled the room with cardboard boxes.
spanish: Tom llenó el cuarto con cajas de cartón.

english: He isn't actually the manager.
spanish: En realidad él no es el gerente.

english: Tom doesn't have to go if he doesn't want to.
spanish: Tom no tiene por qué ir si no quiere.

english: I am busy now and can't play with you.
spanish: Estoy ocupado ahora y no puedo jugar con vos.

english: The store might be closed already.
spanish: La tienda ya podría estar cerrada.

english: Lock the door when you go out.
spanish: Eche usted la llave al salir.

english: We're in a blind alley.
spanish: Estamos en un callejón sin salida.

english: Hopefully, everything will turn out all right.
spanish: Esperemos que todo salga bien.

english: I lost my camera the other day.
spanish: El otro día perdí mi cámara.

english: I have lost the key.
spanish: Perdí la llave.

english: You're going the wrong way.
spanish: Van en la dirección equivocada.

english: Oh, don't worry about that.
spanish: Oh, no te preocupes por eso.

english: He waited for several seconds and opened the door.
spanish: Él aguardó varios segundos y abrió la puerta.

english: I am afraid it will be rainy.
spanish: Temo que será lluvioso.

english: Tom saw Mary kissing John.
spanish: Tom vio a Mary besar a John.

english: There are holes in the roof.
spanish: Hay agujeros en el tejado.

english: Tom is thorough, isn't he?
spanish: Tom es detallista, ¿o no?

english: Come and see us sometime.
spanish: Ven a vernos alguna vez.

english: The lecture was really boring.
spanish: El discurso fue realmente aburrido.

english: I like that it is soft.
spanish: Me gusta que sea suave.

english: All the supplies ran out.
spanish: Se consumieron todas las provisiones.

english: The doctor insisted that he stay in bed.
spanish: El doctor insistió en que quedara en cama.

english: It's quite clear to me that this is the truth.
spanish: Para mí está muy claro que esta es la verdad.

english: Father is coming home tomorrow.
spanish: Papá vuelve mañana.

english: I don't intend to ever talk to Tom again.
spanish: No pienso hablar con Tomás nunca más.

english: Why are you so insecure?
spanish: ¿Por qué sois tan inseguros?

english: How did you learn about that news?
spanish: ¿Cómo te enteraste de esa noticia?

english: He was assigned a task.
spanish: Le asignaron una tarea.

english: Tom helped Mary wash the dishes.
spanish: Tom ayudó a Mary a lavar los platos.

english: That comedian is very funny.
spanish: Ese comediante es muy gracioso.

english: Show me what you've got.
spanish: Muéstrame lo que tienes.

english: She met her uncle at the shop.
spanish: Ella se encontró con su tío en la tienda.

english: When I came home, she was watching TV.
spanish: Cuando vine a casa, ella estaba viendo la televisión.

english: I know where he lives.
spanish: Sé dónde vive.

english: Tom tipped the barrel over.
spanish: Tom volcó el barril.

english: It took me two hours to memorize this sentence.
spanish: Me tomó dos horas memorizar esta frase.

english: I want to go to bed early.
spanish: Quiero irme temprano a la cama.

english: Nothing can be better than that.
spanish: Nada puede ser mejor que eso.

english: I have nothing to do with the crime.
spanish: Yo no tengo nada que ver con ese crimen.

english: He invited me to dinner.
spanish: Él me invitó a cenar.

english: Do you like Indian food?
spanish: ¿Te gusta la comida india?

english: This house is mine, not yours.
spanish: Esta casa es mía, no tuya.

english: She's forgotten how to do it.
spanish: Ha olvidado cómo se hace.

english: Not a single star could be seen in the sky.
spanish: No se podía ver ninguna estrella en el cielo.

english: He severely criticized the mayor.
spanish: Él criticó severamente al edil.

english: When was the last time you stayed at a hotel?
spanish: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que te quedaste en un hotel?

english: It depends largely on the context.
spanish: Eso depende en gran parte del contexto.

english: He stepped on my foot on purpose.
spanish: Me pisó el pie a propósito.

english: Supplies of oil are not infinite.
spanish: Los suministros de petroleo no son infinitos.

english: I've already told you that.
spanish: Ya se los dije.

english: We rented a cabin by a lake.
spanish: Arrendamos una cabaña cerca de un lago.

english: I still haven't found anything.
spanish: Todavía no he encontrado nada.

english: I don't usually wear a tie to work.
spanish: Por lo general no uso corbata para ir al trabajo.

english: It looks like your dog is thirsty.
spanish: Parece que tu perro está sediento.

english: I heard him coming downstairs.
spanish: Lo oí bajando las escaleras.

english: I'd like to know more about what happened to Tom.
spanish: Quisiera saber más acerca de lo que le pasó a Tom.

english: I had no idea what I was doing.
spanish: No tenía idea de qué estaba haciendo.

english: She is good at speaking English.
spanish: Ella habla bien inglés.

english: Which of you will come with me?
spanish: ¿Cuál de ustedes vendrá conmigo?

english: For all I know, he's a criminal.
spanish: Por lo que sé es un criminal.

english: She stared him in the face.
spanish: Ella lo miró a la cara.

english: Tom was shocked by what Mary said.
spanish: Tom se asombró de lo que Mary dijo.

english: She put the key in her pocket.
spanish: Ella se metió la llave al bolsillo.

english: Tom is doing very well.
spanish: A Tom le va muy bien.

english: My TV has quit working.
spanish: Mi televisor dejó de funcionar.

english: It happens all the time.
spanish: Eso pasa todo el tiempo.

english: Get that book for me.
spanish: Tráeme ese libro.

english: Time passes quickly when we are doing something we like.
spanish: El tiempo pasa rápido cuando estamos haciendo algo que nos gusta.

english: She's been learning German for a year now.
spanish: Ella ha estado aprendiendo alemán por un año.

english: The city was deserted by its inhabitants.
spanish: La ciudad fue abandonada por los ciudadanos.

english: Do you want me to help you?
spanish: ¿Quieres que te ayude?

english: Try to make sure Tom doesn't do something stupid.
spanish: Trata de asegurarte de que Tom no haga algo estúpido.

english: I go back home to Boston every three months.
spanish: Vuelvo a casa, en Boston, cada tres meses.

english: I have a cough and a little fever.
spanish: Tengo tos y un poco de fiebre.

english: I will not be afraid.
spanish: No tendré miedo.

english: The patient is out of danger now.
spanish: El paciente está ahora fuera de peligro.

english: Could you help me for ten minutes?
spanish: ¿Podrías ayudarme diez minutos?

english: Ring the bell when you want me.
spanish: Haz sonar el timbre cuando me requieras.

english: Father told us a very interesting story.
spanish: Papá nos contó una historia muy interesante.

english: No matter what you say, I will never believe you.
spanish: No importa lo que digas, no te volveré a creer.

english: Do you like to drive?
spanish: ¿Te gusta conducir?

english: When did Tom get back?
spanish: ¿Hace cuánto que Tom está de vuelta?

english: Tom talked Mary into joining our band.
spanish: Tom convenció a Mary de unirse a nuestra banda.

english: Do you still want to go to Boston?
spanish: ¿Sigues queriendo ir a Boston?

english: I have been ill in bed since last Friday.
spanish: He estado enfermo en la cama desde el viernes pasado.

english: You said Tom liked me.
spanish: Tú dijiste que yo le gustaba a Tom.

english: I took a shower and then went to bed.
spanish: Me duché y me fui a la cama.

english: My parents forbade me to see Tom again.
spanish: Mis padres me prohibieron volver a ver a Tom.

english: I want you to let me go.
spanish: Quiero que me dejes ir.

english: This is one of the basic rules.
spanish: Esta es una de las reglas principales.

english: They sleep in separate bedrooms even though they're married.
spanish: A pesar de estar casados, duermen en cuartos separados.

english: That's going to make Tom very happy.
spanish: Eso lo va a hacer muy feliz a Tom.

english: What time do you usually eat breakfast?
spanish: ¿A qué hora acostumbras desayunar?

english: The dentist gave me an appointment for seven o'clock.
spanish: El dentista me citó a las siete.

english: The woman reached for the knife on the table.
spanish: La mujer alcanzó el cuchillo sobre la mesa.

english: We are eleven in all.
spanish: En total somos once.

english: Do you want something to drink?
spanish: ¿Te gustaría beber algo?

english: Are you bringing your camera?
spanish: ¿Traes la cámara?

english: He is a man of few words.
spanish: Él es poco hablador.

english: The box was made of sandalwood.
spanish: La caja estaba hecha de madera de sándalo.

english: She refused to take the money.
spanish: Se rehusó a tomar el dinero.

english: I was burned up by what he said.
spanish: Me tiene ardido con lo que me dijo.

english: Do a lot of people live in your town?
spanish: ¿Viven muchas personas en tu ciudad?

english: Tom and Mary couldn't be happier.
spanish: Tom y Mary no podrían ser más felices.

english: You've done more than enough.
spanish: Has hecho más que suficiente.

english: Were Tom and Mary here when you arrived?
spanish: ¿Tom y Mary estaban aquí cuando viniste?

english: That movie is suitable for people of all ages.
spanish: Esa película es apropiada para personas de todas las edades.

english: We have nothing at all in common.
spanish: No tenemos nada en absoluto en común.

english: The answers are all right.
spanish: Todas las respuestas están bien.

english: His car ran into a tree.
spanish: Su coche se estrelló contra un árbol.

english: A blood transfusion is necessary.
spanish: Es necesaria una transfusión de sangre.

english: I wouldn't want to be a judge.
spanish: No me gustaría ser juez.

english: It's junk. Throw it away.
spanish: Es basura. Arrójala a la basura.

english: I like to study English.
spanish: Me gusta estudiar inglés.

english: Tom shouldn't be so surprised.
spanish: Tom no debería estar tan sorprendido.

english: Where shall I wait for you?
spanish: ¿Dónde te voy a esperar?

english: I know I'm not the brightest girl in the world.
spanish: Sé que no soy la muchacha más lista del mundo.

english: How big is your garden?
spanish: ¿De qué tamaño es tu jardín?

english: I'm off to Turkey tomorrow.
spanish: Voy a Turquía mañana.

english: It was probably not true.
spanish: Probablemente no era verdad.

english: This movie is highly controversial.
spanish: Esta película es muy polémica.

english: This stuffed animal belongs to the little girl.
spanish: Este animal de peluche le pertenece a la niñita.

english: What would the world be without women?
spanish: ¿Qué sería del mundo sin las mujeres?

english: Tom goes for a walk every afternoon.
spanish: Tom cada tarde da un paseo.

english: The question is what for.
spanish: La pregunta es ¿para qué?

english: She often takes advantage of his ignorance.
spanish: A menudo se aprovecha de su ignorancia.

english: How many prefectures are there in Japan?
spanish: ¿Cuántas prefecturas hay en Japón?

english: We have a lot of time.
spanish: Tenemos un montón de tiempo.

english: Tom doesn't trust the police.
spanish: Tom no confía en la Policía.

english: She's the closest thing to family he has.
spanish: Ella es lo más cercano que tiene a una familia.

english: There's nobody in the kitchen.
spanish: No hay nadie en la cocina.

english: Both you and I are students.
spanish: Tanto vosotros como yo somos estudiantes.

english: He has access to the American Embassy.
spanish: Él tiene acceso a la embajada de los Estados Unidos.

english: Ouch!! I've been stung by a bee!!
spanish: ¡Auch! ¡Me picó una abeja!

english: I just need to ask Tom some questions.
spanish: Solo necesito hacerle unas preguntas a Tom.

english: Fewer people came than we were expecting.
spanish: Vino menos gente de lo que esperábamos.

english: His condition could have been worse.
spanish: Su condición podría haber sido peor.

english: What you said was very interesting.
spanish: Lo que dijiste fue muy interesante.

english: That song sounds familiar to me.
spanish: Esa canción me resulta conocida.

english: Do you have a camera?
spanish: ¿Tienes una cámara de fotos?

english: Speaking of foreign languages, do you speak French?
spanish: Hablando de lenguas extranjeras, ¿hablas francés?

english: This medicine will take care of your headache.
spanish: Esta medicina los ayudará con el dolor de cabeza.

english: I've told you a million times not to exaggerate.
spanish: Ya te dije un millón de veces que no exageres.

english: Why are you so paranoid?
spanish: ¿Por qué es tan paranoico?

english: Tom ate the stew right out of the pot.
spanish: Tom se comió el guiso directamente de la olla.

english: I had already eaten before I arrived at the party.
spanish: Yo ya había comido antes de llegar a la fiesta.

english: On leaving school, he went to Africa.
spanish: Al dejar el colegio, fue para África.

english: I am studying English now.
spanish: Ahora estoy estudiando inglés.

english: Tom's guitar playing is amazing.
spanish: El toque de guitarra de Tom es estupendo.

english: Do they speak French in Canada?
spanish: ¿En Canadá hablan francés?

english: He works on the farm from morning till night.
spanish: Él trabaja en la granja desde la mañana a la noche.

english: Tom knows it was a mistake.
spanish: Tom sabe que fue un error.

english: Tom was here before I was.
spanish: Tom estaba aquí antes que yo.

english: We had a wonderful holiday in Sweden.
spanish: Tuvimos unas maravillosas vacaciones en Suecia.

english: I want to be alone!
spanish: ¡Quiero estar solo!

english: The furniture in his office is very modern.
spanish: Los muebles de su oficina son muy modernos.

english: Have you decided on the subject of your thesis?
spanish: ¿Has decidido el tema de tu tesis?

english: He turned on the radio.
spanish: Él prendió la radio.

english: Why are you in Boston?
spanish: ¿Por qué estás en Boston?

english: India was governed by Great Britain for many years.
spanish: India fue gobernada por Reino Unido durante muchos años.

english: I suppose that she was happy then.
spanish: Supongo que ella era feliz entonces.

english: Mine is not as good as yours.
spanish: La mía no es tan buena como la tuya.

english: He's a science fiction fanatic.
spanish: Él es un fanático de la ciencia ficción.

english: My cat killed a squirrel.
spanish: Mi gato mató una ardilla.

english: I thought you didn't want to talk about this now.
spanish: Pensé que no querías hablar sobre esto ahora.

english: You always reserve the same room.
spanish: Tú siempre reservas la misma habitación.

english: Why are you opposed to this?
spanish: ¿Por qué te opones a esto?

english: I did write to him.
spanish: Sí que le escribí.

english: Tom doesn't know anything about what happened.
spanish: Tom no sabe nada acerca de qué sucedió.

english: I knew it wasn't you.
spanish: Sabía que no eras tú.

english: I have a rough idea where it is.
spanish: Tengo una ligera idea de dónde está.

english: Tom also has family in Boston.
spanish: Tom también tiene familia en Boston.

english: He won't live much longer.
spanish: Él no vivirá mucho más.

english: The planet closest to the sun is Mercury.
spanish: El planeta más próximo al sol es Mercurio.

english: School will open on Monday.
spanish: La escuela abrirá el lunes.

english: When is the best time to feed your dog?
spanish: ¿Cuál es la mejor hora para alimentar a tu perro?

english: I think I've found something.
spanish: Creo que he encontrado algo.

english: Fish cannot live out of water.
spanish: Los peces no pueden vivir fuera del agua.

english: I don't really understand it.
spanish: Realmente no lo entiendo.

english: Tom's sister Mary is now in Boston.
spanish: Mary, la hermana de Tom, está ahora en Boston.

english: I'm sure that'll really be appreciated.
spanish: Estoy convencido de que eso será ciertamente apreciado.

english: I wonder what happens if I press this button.
spanish: Me pregunto que sucede si presiono este botón.

english: Tom and Mary went to the same school.
spanish: Tomás y María fueron a la misma escuela.

english: Let's go to the beach.
spanish: Vayamos a la playa.

english: Why are you so tired today?
spanish: ¿Por qué está hoy tan cansado?

english: Tom must have spent a fortune on his new house.
spanish: Tom debe haber gastado una fortuna en su nueva casa.

english: They want to hurt me.
spanish: Ellos quieren lastimarme.

english: I go to bed early.
spanish: Me acuesto temprano.

english: London is small compared to Tokyo.
spanish: Londres es pequeño comparado con Tokyo.

english: What time will dinner be served?
spanish: ¿A qué hora servirán la cena?

english: We will someday make the world a better place.
spanish: Un día haremos del mundo un lugar mejor.

english: I'm not in a position to discuss that.
spanish: No estoy en una posición para discutir eso.

english: I don't care what you do with it.
spanish: No me interesa lo que hagas con esto.

english: I can't blame Tom for something that was Mary's fault.
spanish: No puedo culpar a Tom por algo que fue culpa de Mary.

english: This signal means "don't walk."
spanish: Esta señal significa "no caminar".

english: His jokes are not funny at all.
spanish: Sus chistes no son para nada graciosos.

english: I want you to know that you can trust me.
spanish: Quiero que sepas que podés confiar en mí.

english: We've got a job to do.
spanish: Tenemos un trabajo que hacer.

english: I found out where she is.
spanish: Averigüé dónde está ella.

english: I grind my own coffee beans every morning.
spanish: Muelo mis propios granos de café todas las mañanas.

english: It is easy to be brave from a safe distance.
spanish: Es fácil ser valiente a una distancia segura.

english: She got him a new hat.
spanish: Ella le consiguió un nuevo sombrero.

english: I thought Tom was exaggerating.
spanish: Pensé que Tom estaba exagerando.

english: I just want to ask you some questions.
spanish: Solo quiero hacerte algunas preguntas.

english: That just goes to prove that you are a liar.
spanish: Eso sólo demuestra que tú eres un mentiroso.

english: Why would we want to punish you?
spanish: ¿Por qué querríamos castigarte?

english: He left his wife and children.
spanish: Abandonó a su esposa e hijos.

english: That blue dress suits you very well.
spanish: Ese vestido azul te queda requetebién.

english: It looks like it's going to snow.
spanish: Parece que nevará.

english: He is talking on the phone.
spanish: Él está hablando por teléfono.

english: He knows that you know.
spanish: Él sabe que tú sabes.

english: Tom put away his clothes.
spanish: Tom recogió su ropa.

english: He kept the secret to himself.
spanish: El guardó el secreto para sí solo.

english: She took a taxi to the hospital.
spanish: Cogió un taxi para ir al hospital.

english: Do you hear from your son from time to time?
spanish: ¿Sabes algo de tu hijo de vez en cuando?

english: Can you please leave me alone?
spanish: ¿Me puedes dejar solo, por favor?

english: My house is in the suburbs.
spanish: Mi casa está en las afueras.

english: She was almost late for school.
spanish: Ella casi llegó tarde al colegio.

english: Which of these dogs is yours?
spanish: ¿Cuál de estos es tu perro?

english: A friend of mine is coming this evening.
spanish: Un amigo mío viene esta tarde.

english: Tom handed the keys to Mary.
spanish: Tom le pasó las llaves a Mary.

english: Please take care of yourself.
spanish: Cuídese, por favor.

english: What's Tom talking about now?
spanish: ¿De qué está hablando Tom ahora?

english: Tom was supposed to help me this afternoon.
spanish: Se suponía que Tom me ayudara esta tarde.

english: Faith is believing what you know ain't true.
spanish: La fe es creer en lo que sabes que no es cierto.

english: Tom bought Mary a nice present.
spanish: Tom le compró a Mary un lindo obsequio.

english: Please don't lie to me.
spanish: Por favor, no me mientas.

english: I'm dying to see Paris.
spanish: Me muero de ganas de ver París.

english: Walking is the best exercise.
spanish: Caminar es el mejor ejercicio.

english: The couple decided to adopt an orphan.
spanish: La pareja decidió adoptar a un huérfano.

english: He is the bravest soldier that ever lived.
spanish: Él es el soldado más valiente que jamás existió.

english: Tom and Mary split up after their son died.
spanish: Tomás y María se separaron después de que su hijo muriera.

english: I'll go on my own.
spanish: Iré solo.

english: Tom doesn't understand the value of saving.
spanish: Tom no comprende el valor de ahorrar.

english: Asians generally have black hair.
spanish: Los asiáticos generalmente tienen pelo oscuro.

english: I'm starting to think you enjoy being with me.
spanish: Estoy empezando a pensar que te gusta estar conmigo.

english: When do you put up your Christmas tree?
spanish: ¿Cuándo colocas tu árbol de Navidad?

english: These three pretty girls are all nieces of mine.
spanish: Esas tres chicas bonitas son todas sobrinas mías.

english: Tell me where you live.
spanish: Dígame en dónde vive usted.

english: I have a small gift for you.
spanish: Tengo un regalito para vos.

english: Coming here was a mistake.
spanish: Fue un error venir aquí.

english: She choked him with her bare hands.
spanish: Ella le estranguló con sus propias manos.

english: He has a natural gift for speaking.
spanish: Tiene un don natural para hablar.

english: His brother passed away last month.
spanish: Su hermano ha muerto el mes pasado.

english: If you invited him, he might come.
spanish: Si lo invitaste, a lo mejor venga.

english: I would like to order a sandwich.
spanish: Quisiera pedir un sándwich.

english: She needs someone to talk to.
spanish: Ella necesita a alguien con quien hablar.

english: Tom asked me to do it.
spanish: Tom me pidió que lo haga.

english: Tom is a confirmed bachelor.
spanish: Tom es un soltero empedernido.

english: Tom made it quite clear what he needed.
spanish: Tom dejó bastante claro lo que necesitaba.

english: The express train does not stop between Shibuya and Naka-Meguro.
spanish: El tren expreso no se detiene entre Shibuya y Naka-Meguro.

english: Tom is a real nerd.
spanish: Tomás es un verdadero nerd.

english: I don't want anything to drink.
spanish: No quiero nada de beber.

english: There was nothing he could have done.
spanish: No había nada que él pudo haber hecho.

english: Tom didn't know who to believe.
spanish: Tom no sabía a quién creerle.

english: When there's nothing left to do, what do you do?
spanish: Cuando no queda nada por hacer, ¿qué haces?

english: The first was not the best.
spanish: El primero no fue el mejor.

english: Please tell us what happened.
spanish: Por favor, dinos qué pasó.

english: I bought this camera for 25,000 yen.
spanish: Compré esta cámara por 25.000 yenes.

english: I've been laid up with flu for the last week.
spanish: La última semana he estado en cama con gripe.

english: This fact proves his innocence.
spanish: Este hecho demuestra su inocencia.

english: When he was 18, he married.
spanish: Él se casó cuando tenía 18 años.

english: They died one after another.
spanish: Ellos murieron uno tras otro.

english: These plants are all poisonous.
spanish: Todas estas plantas son venenosas.

english: Without your help, he would have been ruined.
spanish: De no haber sido por tu ayuda, él hubiera estado arruinado.

english: I saw a stranger standing at the door.
spanish: Vi a un extraño parado en la puerta.

english: What's your favorite board game?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu juego de mesa preferido?

english: I wish I were rich.
spanish: Desearía ser rico.

english: I didn't pull the trigger.
spanish: Yo no apreté el gatillo.

english: Most people like watching TV.
spanish: A la mayoría de la gente le gusta ver TV.

english: Which cup will he choose?
spanish: ¿Cuál copa elegirá?

english: Have you ever returned home before seven?
spanish: ¿Has vuelto a la casa antes de las siete alguna vez?

english: Where is my red pen?
spanish: ¿Dónde está mi birome roja?

english: He was accused of squandering public funds.
spanish: Él estaba acusado de despilfarrar fondos públicos.

english: Have you asked the others?
spanish: ¿Habéis preguntado a los otros?

english: I wish I had asked you for advice.
spanish: Desearía haberte pedido consejo.

english: Tom and Mary are married to each other.
spanish: Tom y María son esposos.

english: My father gets along with his friends.
spanish: Mi padre se lleva bien con sus amigos.

english: Why are you talking to me?
spanish: ¿Por qué me hablas?

english: I expected better of you.
spanish: Esperaba más de ti.

english: He handed the salesclerk the money.
spanish: Él le entregó el dinero al vendedor.

english: It will be three months before our house is completed.
spanish: Tardará tres meses antes de que nuestra casa esté lista.

english: I'm glad you could come.
spanish: Me alegro que pudieras venir.

english: She could feel her knees shaking.
spanish: Ella podía sentir cómo temblaban sus rodillas.

english: They have plenty of time.
spanish: Ellos tienen un montón de tiempo.

english: I think you're all wrong.
spanish: Creo que estás totalmente equivocado.

english: The company laid off five people.
spanish: La compañía despidió a cinco personas.

english: Tom isn't as healthy as he used to be.
spanish: Tom no está tan sano como solía estar.

english: There is little water in the bucket.
spanish: Hay un poco de agua en el balde.

english: Do you want to be rich?
spanish: ¿Quieren hacerse ricas?

english: Tom believes in the supernatural.
spanish: Tom cree en lo sobrenatural.

english: You'd better go back home now.
spanish: Mejor váyase a casa ya.

english: His book was upside down.
spanish: Su libro estaba al revés.

english: Tom and I are both a little busy.
spanish: Tom y yo estamos un poco ocupados.

english: Who do you plan to spend Christmas with?
spanish: ¿Con quién estás pensando pasar la Navidad?

english: Ancient customs are dying out quickly today.
spanish: Las tradiciones antiguas están desapareciendo rápidamente hoy en día.

english: How was your trip to Australia?
spanish: ¿Cómo fue tu viaje a Australia?

english: This desk is too small for Tom.
spanish: Este escritorio es demasiado pequeño para Tom.

english: I like it when it's snowing.
spanish: Me gusta cuando nieva.

english: It won't be long before he can play baseball again.
spanish: No pasará mucho tiempo hasta que él pueda volver a jugar al béisbol.

english: Neither of my brothers will be there.
spanish: Ninguno de mis hermanos estará allí.

english: Mary and Alice are sisters.
spanish: Mary y Alice son hermanas.

english: I still prefer to write letters by hand.
spanish: Todavía prefiero escribir cartas a mano.

english: They didn't take credit cards.
spanish: No aceptaban tarjetas de crédito.

english: A rash broke out on her neck.
spanish: Una erupción reventó en su cuello.

english: I need a better job.
spanish: Necesito un trabajo mejor.

english: There was a cottage on the side of the hill.
spanish: Había una casa de campo en un lado de la colina.

english: Will you sell your house to him?
spanish: ¿Le vas a vender tu casa a él?

english: I wish you wouldn't smoke so much.
spanish: Ojalá no fumaras tanto.

english: He was a burden to his parents.
spanish: Era una carga para sus padres.

english: I went to the airport by taxi.
spanish: Fui al aeropuerto en taxi.

english: I want to live in Italy.
spanish: Quiero vivir en Italia.

english: Don't point your gun at me.
spanish: No me apuntes con tu arma.

english: Choose a dress you like.
spanish: Escoge un vestido que te guste.

english: Tom handed Mary a glass of red wine.
spanish: Tom le pasó a María un vaso de vino tinto.

english: I'm ashamed of my body.
spanish: Me avergüenzo de mi cuerpo.

english: I don't work on Sundays.
spanish: No trabajo los domingos.

english: I eat with my hands.
spanish: Como con las manos.

english: Mary knitted Tom a sweater for his birthday.
spanish: Mary le tejió un suéter a Tom para su cumpleaños.

english: I know little or nothing about it.
spanish: No sé casi nada de eso.

english: Was this letter written by Mary?
spanish: ¿Esta carta la escribió Mary?

english: Comb your hair before you go out.
spanish: Péinate antes de salir.

english: She stayed there for several days.
spanish: Ella se quedó ahí por varios días.

english: There aren't as many trains at night.
spanish: No pasan tantos trenes de noche.

english: The people have made their preparations for the trip.
spanish: La gente hizo sus preparativos para el viaje.

english: Tom's train left five minutes ago.
spanish: El tren de Tom salió hace cinco minutos.

english: He's nothing more than a common thug.
spanish: Él no es más que un vulgar granuja.

english: Please give me a cup of milk.
spanish: Deme una taza de leche, por favor.

english: I hope you have fun.
spanish: Espero que te diviertas.

english: Wit is to conversation what salt is to food.
spanish: La astucia es a la conversación lo que la sal es a la comida.

english: Tom and Mary attempted to murder John.
spanish: Tom y Mary intentaron matar a John.

english: What did you do with my purse?
spanish: ¿Qué hiciste con mi billetera?

english: I wasn't fired. I quit.
spanish: No me despidieron. Me fui.

english: Tom told Mary not to be late again.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary que no volviera a llegar tarde.

english: Where is a public telephone?
spanish: ¿Dónde hay un teléfono público?

english: There was no taxi, so I had to walk home.
spanish: No había taxis, así que tuve que ir caminando a casa.

english: It was her that told me.
spanish: Fue ella la que me lo dijo.

english: Tom didn't know what Mary would like.
spanish: Tom no sabía qué le gustaría a Mary.

english: But what will you do if he doesn't come?
spanish: ¿Pero qué harás si no viene?

english: Do you have children already?
spanish: ¿Usted ya tiene hijos?

english: It's boring to stay at home.
spanish: Quedarse en casa es aburrido.

english: You just made my day.
spanish: Me acabas de alegrar el día.

english: What do you need this money for?
spanish: ¿Para qué necesitas este dinero?

english: His behavior never ceases to surprise me.
spanish: Su conducta nunca deja de sorprenderme.

english: Tom doesn't care what people think about him.
spanish: A Tom no le importa lo que la gente piense de él.

english: Who is that old woman?
spanish: ¿Quién es aquella anciana?

english: Tom speaks French as if he were a native speaker.
spanish: Tom habla francés como un nativo.

english: I forgot the key to my room.
spanish: Olvidé la llave de mi cuarto.

english: We got behind the car and pushed.
spanish: Nos situamos detrás del coche y empujamos.

english: Dogs are man's best friends.
spanish: Los perros son los mejores amigos del hombre.

english: Have you fed the dog yet?
spanish: ¿Ya has dado de comer al perro?

english: My brother looks a lot like me.
spanish: Mi hermano se parece mucho a mí.

english: I couldn't bear to look at her.
spanish: No podía soportar verla.

english: I want to go to Boston.
spanish: Quiero ir a Boston.

english: Both of my parents aren't alive.
spanish: Ninguno de mis padres está vivo.

english: I don't like studying in this heat.
spanish: No me gusta estudiar con este calor.

english: Her garden is a work of art.
spanish: Su jardín es una obra de arte.

english: Have you ever assembled a computer by yourself?
spanish: ¿Has montado alguna vez un ordenador por ti mismo?

english: I want to be a doctor.
spanish: Yo quiero ser doctor.

english: I usually got up at five in those days.
spanish: Comúnmente me levanto a las cinco en esos días.

english: We had a lot of fun skating.
spanish: Nos lo pasamos muy bien patinando.

english: That was an easy call.
spanish: Ésa fue una decisión fácil.

english: The cat put its nose in the pot.
spanish: El gato metió el hocico en el puchero.

english: Tom is probably a bit older than Mary.
spanish: Tom es probablemente un poco mayor que Mary.

english: Why don't you come visit us?
spanish: ¿Por qué no vienes a visitarnos?

english: They wanted to steal the car.
spanish: Querían robar el coche.

english: People want to feel safe.
spanish: La gente quiere sentirse segura.

english: Tom says he saw everything.
spanish: Tom dice que vio todo.

english: We saw a flying saucer.
spanish: Vimos un platillo volador.

english: She should be charged with murder.
spanish: Ella debería ser acusada de homicidio.

english: He is what is called a champion of justice.
spanish: Él es lo que se llama un campeón de la justicia.

english: When did you get up this morning?
spanish: ¿Cúando te has levantado esta mañana?

english: Tom saw Mary with another man.
spanish: Tom vio a Mary con otro hombre.

english: I'm going to tell you everything.
spanish: Te lo voy a contar todo.

english: Tom needs a little more practice.
spanish: Tom necesita un poco más de práctica.

english: The lake is large and beautiful.
spanish: El lago es grande y hermoso.

english: We want the truth, Tom.
spanish: Queremos la verdad, Tom.

english: He stood apart from us.
spanish: Él se paró apartado de nosotros.

english: If Mary slapped Tom, I'm sure he deserved it.
spanish: Si Mary le dio una bofetada a Tom, estoy segura de que se lo merecía.

english: Somebody else might get hurt.
spanish: Alguien más podría resultar herido.

english: I thank you from the bottom of my heart.
spanish: Te lo agradezco de todo corazón.

english: I had an excellent breakfast at seven.
spanish: Tuve un excelente desayuno a las siete.

english: I'm sick of hearing it.
spanish: Estoy harto de oírlo.

english: May I call on you today?
spanish: ¿Te puedo visitar hoy?

english: I want everything you just said written into the contract.
spanish: Quiero que todo lo que acabas de decir salga escrito en el contrato.

english: I am more handsome than you.
spanish: Soy más guapo que tú.

english: A haiku is one type of poem.
spanish: El haiku es un tipo de poema.

english: This table is made of wood.
spanish: Esta mesa está hecha de madera.

english: We have exams right after summer vacation.
spanish: Tenemos los exámenes justo después de las vacaciones de verano.

english: The sum of 5 and 3 is 8.
spanish: La suma de 5 con 3 es 8.

english: A huge crowd of people waited.
spanish: Una enorme multitud esperaba.

english: Signs that say "high voltage" are often yellow.
spanish: Los letreros donde dice "alta tensión" frecuentemente son amarillos.

english: My uncle, who lives in Osaka, visited us yesterday.
spanish: Mi tío que vive en Osaka nos visitó ayer.

english: She looked as though she had seen me somewhere before.
spanish: Ella parecía como si me hubiera visto de alguna parte antes.

english: There are four seasons in a year.
spanish: Hay cuatro estaciones en un año.

english: I have a sharp pain in my chest.
spanish: Tengo un dolor agudo en mi pecho.

english: I haven't finished reading this book.
spanish: No he terminado de leer este libro.

english: Speech is silver, but silence is golden.
spanish: La palabra es plata y el silencio oro.

english: You should express your opinion.
spanish: Deberían expresar su opinión.

english: Please remember to come and see us this weekend.
spanish: Por favor, acuérdate de venir a vernos este fin de semana.

english: The dog next door is dangerous.
spanish: El perro de al lado es peligroso.

english: Tom wants me on his team.
spanish: Tom me quiere en su equipo.

english: I want to get out of here.
spanish: Quiero salir de aquí.

english: He will arrive in Paris tomorrow.
spanish: Mañana llegará a París.

english: Grades are important, but they are not everything.
spanish: Las notas son importantes, pero no lo son todo.

english: Have you read today's paper yet?
spanish: ¿Ya has leído el periódico de hoy?

english: I need your answer by the end of the day.
spanish: Necesito tu respuesta para el término del día.

english: There were fewer accidents this year than last.
spanish: Este año hubo menos accidentes que el año pasado.

english: He rose from his seat.
spanish: Se levantó de su asiento.

english: Tom has to cook dinner tonight.
spanish: Tom tiene que cocinar la cena esta noche.

english: Who buried the gold bars here?
spanish: ¿Quién enterró los lingotes de oro aquí?

english: Am I speaking too quickly?
spanish: ¿Estoy hablando demasiado rápido?

english: It is not the correct solution.
spanish: No es la solución correcta.

english: He wanted to be a farmer.
spanish: Él quería ser un granjero.

english: What's your favorite way to cook potatoes?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu forma preferida de cocinar papas?

english: We have no other choice.
spanish: No tenemos otra alternativa.

english: I've had a headache since yesterday.
spanish: Estoy con jaqueca desde ayer.

english: She provided the traveler with food and clothing.
spanish: Ella proveyó al viajero de alimento y ropa.

english: I'll bring one more towel.
spanish: Voy a traer otra toalla.

english: Someone broke the lock and stole my bike.
spanish: Alguien rompió el candado y robó mi bicicleta.

english: Write to him right away.
spanish: ¡Escríbele inmediatamente!

english: Tom isn't from around here.
spanish: Tom no es de por aquí.

english: Tom doesn't care what I do.
spanish: A Tom le da igual lo que yo haga.

english: I want to go with Tom.
spanish: Yo quiero ir con Tom.

english: He is the last person I want to see now.
spanish: Él es la última persona a la que deseo ver ahora.

english: I see him in the library now and then.
spanish: Lo veo en la biblioteca de vez en cuando.

english: I made use of every opportunity to improve my English.
spanish: Ocupé cada oportunidad para mejorar mi inglés.

english: We have no school tomorrow.
spanish: Mañana no hay clases.

english: I have no idea what you're talking about.
spanish: No tengo ni idea de qué estás hablando.

english: He bore a grudge against me.
spanish: Él guardaba rencor contra mí.

english: Tom has never seen Mary smile.
spanish: Tom nunca ha visto sonreír a Mary.

english: It's a beautiful sunset, isn't it?
spanish: Es una bella puesta de sol, ¿no es así?

english: You'll get there in less than ten minutes.
spanish: Llegarás allí en menos de diez minutos.

english: This book is available at one shop only.
spanish: Este libro solo está en una tienda.

english: Tom has no idea how long it will take.
spanish: Tom no tiene idea de cuánto tiempo tomará.

english: Tom loves playing Irish tunes on the fiddle.
spanish: A Tom le encanta tocar melodias irlandesas en el violín.

english: At times I feel like quitting my job.
spanish: A veces tengo ganas de dejar mi trabajo.

english: He pretends to be deaf.
spanish: Él finge ser sordo.

english: Have you been invited to their wedding?
spanish: ¿Te invitaron a su boda?

english: I'll probably use it again.
spanish: Probablemente lo voy a usar de nuevo.

english: Tom refused to shoot the dog.
spanish: Tom rehusó disparar al perro.

english: A nice roast chicken is one of my favorite dishes.
spanish: Un buen pollo asado es uno de mis platos favoritos.

english: Both of my parents do not play golf.
spanish: Ninguno de mis padres juega al golf.

english: The new bridge is under construction.
spanish: El nuevo puente está en construcción.

english: I'm not sure I believe you.
spanish: No estoy seguro de que te crea.

english: It can't be removed. It's fixed.
spanish: No se puede quitar. Está fijo.

english: I want you to get in the car.
spanish: Quiero que te metas en el auto.

english: Would you like to eat lunch together?
spanish: ¿Quieres almorzar con nosotras?

english: How far is it from here to the sea?
spanish: ¿Qué tan lejos es de aquí hasta el mar?

english: That boy showed no fear.
spanish: Ese muchacho no mostró ningún temor.

english: They released a new album.
spanish: Ellos lanzaron un nuevo álbum.

english: She advised him not to drive too fast.
spanish: Ella le aconsejó que no condujera demasiado rápido.

english: Tom begged me to come.
spanish: Tom me rogó que viniera.

english: Do you know what time the post office opens?
spanish: ¿Sabéis cuándo abre la oficina de correos?

english: Could you please come over here?
spanish: ¿Podrías por favor venir aquí?

english: It was rather easy for them.
spanish: Fue bien fácil para ellos.

english: "Can you do it in a week?" "I think so."
spanish: "¿Puedes hacerlo en una semana?" "Eso creo."

english: I promise you I won't stay out too late.
spanish: Prometo que no me quedaré hasta tarde.

english: I don't know how long it'll last.
spanish: No sé cuánto tiempo tardará.

english: That's why I don't approve of your plan.
spanish: Esa es la razón por la que no apruebo tu plan.

english: I agree with what you say to some extent.
spanish: Estoy de acuerdo con lo que dices hasta cierto punto.

english: I'm so sick of all this.
spanish: Estoy tan cansado de todo esto.

english: I thought you were already dead.
spanish: Yo pensaba que ya estabas muerto.

english: I have several friends in Boston.
spanish: Tengo varios amigos en Boston.

english: This road will take you to the station.
spanish: Este camino lo va a llevar a la estación.

english: There's still a lot to do.
spanish: Todavía hay mucho por hacer.

english: I can't stand the thought of losing you forever.
spanish: No soporto la idea de perderte para siempre.

english: These boards haven't been planed right.
spanish: Estas tablas no están bien cepilladas.

english: I think that they will be late.
spanish: Pienso que llegarán tarde.

english: Tom is still in prison.
spanish: Tom aún está en prisión.

english: I heard a cry for help.
spanish: Oí un grito de auxilio.

english: Have you ever had a narrow escape?
spanish: ¿Te has salvado alguna vez por los pelos?

english: Just do what you've got to do.
spanish: Sólo haz lo que tengas que hacer.

english: Her daughter can recite many poems.
spanish: Su hija es capaz de recitar muchos poemas.

english: I was not a good mother.
spanish: Yo no era una buena madre.

english: She baked her husband an apple pie.
spanish: Ella le hizo una tarta de manzana a su marido.

english: Tom had no one to help him.
spanish: Tom no tenía quien lo ayudara.

english: Tom knows he has to help Mary tomorrow.
spanish: Tom sabe que tiene que ayudar a Mary mañana.

english: This is a tropical storm. It'll be over soon.
spanish: Esta es una tormenta tropical. Terminará pronto.

english: He won't be home at lunch time.
spanish: Él no va a estar en casa a la hora de almuerzo.

english: Judging from his expression, he's in a bad mood.
spanish: A juzgar por su expresión, él está de mal humor.

english: That effort bore no fruit.
spanish: Aquel esfuerzo no dio fruto.

english: Tokyo is more populous than any other city in Japan.
spanish: Tokio está más poblada que cualquier otra ciudad de Japón.

english: She devoted herself to her children.
spanish: Ella se dedicaba a sus hijos.

english: Tom has just finished writing a letter to Mary.
spanish: Tom acaba de terminar de escribirle una carta a Mary.

english: I have no more time to talk with you.
spanish: No tengo más tiempo para hablar con vos.

english: I guess it's too late to say no.
spanish: Supongo que es muy tarde para decir que no.

english: They did it in front of the staff.
spanish: Lo hicieron en frente del personal.

english: Excuse me, may I open the window?
spanish: Perdone, ¿puedo abrir la ventana?

english: When did you arrive? Did you arrive today?
spanish: ¿Cuándo llegaste? ¿Llegaste hoy?

english: I was taught something different.
spanish: Me enseñaron algo diferente.

english: He was destined to become a simultaneous interpreter.
spanish: Él estaba destinado a convertirse en intérprete simultáneo.

english: You don't have to answer.
spanish: No hace falta que responda.

english: We'll need an extra ten dollars.
spanish: Vamos a necesitar diez dólares extra.

english: Tom is very afraid of snakes.
spanish: Tom tiene mucho miedo de las serpientes.

english: If you're happy, so am I.
spanish: Si eres feliz, yo también.

english: That makes me disgusted just to think of it.
spanish: Eso me indigna sólo de pensarlo.

english: It shouldn't be like that.
spanish: No debería ser así.

english: At first, I didn't like him.
spanish: Al principio no me agradaba.

english: She made him a new suit.
spanish: Ella le hizo un traje nuevo.

english: He was in time for the appointment.
spanish: Él llegó a tiempo a la cita.

english: We didn't do anything wrong.
spanish: No hicimos nada malo.

english: I'm sorry if my words hurt you.
spanish: Lo lamento si mis palabras te hirieron.

english: Let's put our cards on the table.
spanish: Pongamos las cartas sobre la mesa.

english: She is really a nice girl.
spanish: Ella es de verdad una niña buena gente.

english: I know what his name is.
spanish: Sé cómo se llama.

english: My parents let me go there.
spanish: Mis padres me dejan ir allí.

english: He has learned to be patient.
spanish: Él ha aprendido a ser paciente.

english: I first met him three years ago.
spanish: Lo conocí hace tres años.

english: Hey, be careful with that!
spanish: Hey, tenga cuidado con eso.

english: What do you do in your free time?
spanish: ¿Qué haces en tu tiempo libre?

english: Is it about ten o'clock?
spanish: ¿Son cerca de las diez?

english: I am tied up at the office.
spanish: Estoy ocupado en la oficina.

english: Do you really care what I think?
spanish: ¿De verdad les interesa lo que yo pienso?

english: What does your car look like?
spanish: ¿Cómo se ve tu auto?

english: There isn't anything else I can do.
spanish: No hay nada más que pueda hacer.

english: How easy is it to find a part-time job?
spanish: ¿Qué tan fácil es encontrar trabajo a tiempo parcial?

english: Do you want to go get something to eat?
spanish: ¿Quieres ir a comer algo?

english: It was an act of courage.
spanish: Fue un acto de valor.

english: I'm running out of ideas.
spanish: Me estoy quedando sin ideas.

english: I am against the war, of course.
spanish: Estoy en contra de la guerra, por supuesto.

english: Tom got engaged to Mary.
spanish: Tom se comprometió con Mary.

english: Why are you learning a foreign language?
spanish: ¿Por qué estás aprendiendo idiomas?

english: Tom slumped to the floor.
spanish: Tom se desplomó sobre el suelo.

english: I did what I could.
spanish: Hice lo que pude

english: Have you read this book yet?
spanish: ¿Ya has leído este libro?

english: I'm reading a book on American history.
spanish: Estoy leyendo un libro acerca de la historia americana.

english: When are you leaving for Boston?
spanish: ¿Cuándo salís para Boston?

english: All three of us are students.
spanish: Los tres somos estudiantes.

english: I bought her a nice Christmas present.
spanish: Le compré un lindo obsequio de Navidad.

english: What was he up to?
spanish: ¿Qué pretendía?

english: We waited a long time, but she didn't show up.
spanish: Esperamos mucho rato, pero no apareció.

english: I'm likely to still be doing this tomorrow.
spanish: Muy probablemente mañana continuaré haciendo esto.

english: He aimed at the bird.
spanish: Él le apuntó al pájaro.

english: Some people laugh at his jokes, but others don't.
spanish: Algunas personas se ríen de sus chistes, pero otras no.

english: Tom sent me a present.
spanish: Tom me envió un regalo.

english: Which of you came here first?
spanish: ¿Quién de ustedes llegó primero?

english: I spent my vacation in Hakone.
spanish: Pasé las vacaciones en Hakone.

english: I am to take over my father's business.
spanish: Voy a heredar el negocio de mi padre.

english: How can I connect my iPod to a car stereo?
spanish: ¿Cómo puedo conectar mi iPod al estéreo de un auto.

english: Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
spanish: Ni la ausencia ni el tiempo son nada cuando se ama.

english: Tom is standing near the window.
spanish: Tom está parado cerca de la ventana.

english: No one could solve the puzzle.
spanish: Nadie pudo resolver el rompecabezas.

english: Tom fought with all his strength.
spanish: Tom luchó con toda su fuerza.

english: I try to eat a balanced diet.
spanish: Trato de tener una dieta balanceada.

english: I had my radio repaired by him.
spanish: Él me reparó mi radio.

english: Smoking in the office is against our rules.
spanish: Fumar en la oficina está en contra de nuestras reglas.

english: Tom wasn't in the office.
spanish: Tomás no estaba en la oficina.

english: I want something cold to drink now.
spanish: Ahora quiero algo helado para beber.

english: I was being eaten alive by mosquitos.
spanish: Los mosquitos me estaban comiendo vivo.

english: We saw a dim light in the darkness.
spanish: Vimos una débil luz en la oscuridad.

english: Smoking is bad for your health.
spanish: Fumar es malo para la salud.

english: Every ship needs an anchor.
spanish: Cada barco necesita un ancla.

english: I will wait here till he comes.
spanish: Esperaré aquí hasta que él venga.

english: Are you sure you want to break up?
spanish: ¿Estás seguro de que quieres terminar?

english: Her house is near the park.
spanish: Su casa está cerca del parque.

english: He gave me his phone number.
spanish: Me dio su número de teléfono.

english: I'm starting to enjoy it.
spanish: Comienzo a disfrutarlo.

english: Do you have the latest version?
spanish: ¿Tienes la última versión?

english: I've never been to Lanzarote.
spanish: Nunca he estado en Lanzarote.

english: Tom was a bad student.
spanish: Tom era un mal estudiante.

english: Can we talk to Tom?
spanish: ¿Podemos hablar con Tom?

english: His piano playing sounded fantastic.
spanish: Su interpretación en el piano sonó fantástico.

english: When did he fall ill?
spanish: ¿Cuándo se puso enfermo?

english: I learned a lot about Tom.
spanish: Aprendí mucho sobre Tom.

english: There's a bank on the corner.
spanish: Hay un banco en la esquina.

english: I didn't understand anything Tom said.
spanish: No entendí nada de lo que dijo Tom.

english: At least we had fun.
spanish: Por lo menos nos lo pasamos bien.

english: I felt it was a relatively difficult jigsaw puzzle.
spanish: Me pareció que era un rompecabezas relativamente difícil.

english: I don't want to be here when Tom wakes up.
spanish: No quiero estar acá cuando Tom se despierte.

english: It was eight meters long.
spanish: Era de ocho metros de largo.

english: I've got some dust in my eyes.
spanish: Tengo polvo en los ojos.

english: He failed the exam because he had not studied enough.
spanish: Él suspendió el examen porque no había estudiado lo suficiente.

english: I don't want to waste a moment more.
spanish: No quiero perder un instante más.

english: I'll do as you request.
spanish: Haré como pidas.

english: He came into the room.
spanish: Él entró en la habitación.

english: I'm not here to make friends.
spanish: No estoy acá para hacer amigos.

english: We use a lot of water.
spanish: Usamos mucha agua.

english: I'm not used to talking in public.
spanish: No estoy acostumbrada a hablar en público.

english: We got into a car.
spanish: Nos metimos en un coche.

english: Tom accused the employee of stealing.
spanish: Tom acusó al trabajador de robar.

english: I want to see what I'm up against.
spanish: Quiero ver lo que estoy enfrentando.

english: Tom ate what little food he had left.
spanish: Tom se comió la poca comida que le quedaba.

english: Men rarely talk about their problems.
spanish: Los hombres rara vez hablan de sus problemas.

english: Don't forget to kiss Tom goodbye.
spanish: No olvides darle un beso de despedida a Tom.

english: Painting is another thing I can do fairly well.
spanish: Pintar es otra cosa que puedo hacer bastante bien.

english: Saudi Arabia is very rich in oil.
spanish: Arabia Saudita es muy rica en petróleo.

english: Anyway, I'm getting more experience.
spanish: Sea como sea, estoy ganando más experiencia.

english: If Tom breaks up with Mary, he'll regret it.
spanish: Si Tom termina con María, lo va a lamentar.

english: Tom has a rare disease.
spanish: Tom tiene una rara enfermedad.

english: "She likes music." "So do I."
spanish: "A ella le gusta la música." "A mí también."

english: He's ashamed of his body.
spanish: A él le avergüenza su cuerpo.

english: I burned my fingers on a hot iron.
spanish: Me quemé los dedos en una plancha caliente.

english: I am reading the book.
spanish: Leo el libro.

english: Tom is a freelance writer.
spanish: Tom es escritor freelance.

english: No matter what he says, don't trust him.
spanish: No importa lo que él diga, no le creas.

english: I can't study anywhere in my house. It's too noisy.
spanish: No puedo estudiar en ningún lugar de mi casa, es demasiado ruidosa.

english: He will play baseball tomorrow.
spanish: Mañana jugará al béisbol.

english: I guess we can't say no.
spanish: Supongo que no podemos decir que no.

english: A candle lighted the room.
spanish: Una vela iluminaba la habitación.

english: I saw her a week ago today.
spanish: Hoy hace una semana que la vi.

english: Would you like to come to my party?
spanish: ¿Te gustaría venir a mi fiesta?

english: Tom shook hands with Mary.
spanish: Tom y Mary se dieron un apretón de manos.

english: Perhaps he knows this story.
spanish: Puede que él conozca esta historia.

english: How long have you been in Japan?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo lleváis en Japón?

english: Tom and Mary are playing in the backyard.
spanish: Tom y María están jugando en el patio.

english: She invited us to her birthday party.
spanish: Ella nos invitó a su fiesta de cumpleaños.

english: It's true that I was madly in love with her.
spanish: Es verdad que yo estaba loco de amor por ella.

english: He knows a lot about animals.
spanish: Sabe mucho de animales.

english: They had been working together for common interests.
spanish: Ellos habían trabajado juntos por intereses comunes.

english: I know about the job.
spanish: Ya había oído sobre trabajo.

english: Tom drinks like a fish.
spanish: Tom bebe como un pez.

english: If you're hungry, then eat.
spanish: Si tienes hambre, pues come.

english: Somebody farted in the elevator.
spanish: Alguien se tiró un pedo en el ascensor.

english: Tom wants to kiss Mary.
spanish: Tom quiere besar a Mary.

english: That's it. I'm outta here.
spanish: Ya está, me largo.

english: I could not convince him of his mistake.
spanish: No he podido hacerle ver su error.

english: There were many children in the room.
spanish: Había muchos niños en la sala.

english: I am acquainted with the author.
spanish: El autor es un conocido mío.

english: I've never met anyone like you before.
spanish: Nunca he conocido a nadie como tú.

english: I stayed with my uncle last week.
spanish: La semana pasada me quedé con mi tío.

english: I tried to be like you.
spanish: Intenté ser como tú.

english: Tom doesn't know who's who.
spanish: Tom no sabe quién es quién.

english: Tom passed away last night.
spanish: Tom falleció anoche.

english: Our teacher comes to school by car.
spanish: Nuestra profesora vino a la escuela en coche.

english: She is wearing a hat.
spanish: Ella está usando un sombrero.

english: They visit us from time to time.
spanish: Ellos nos visitan de vez en cuando.

english: Let him play your guitar.
spanish: Déjalo que toque tu guitarra.

english: I was hoping you'd volunteer.
spanish: Esperaba que te ofrecieras voluntario.

english: No words can relieve her deep sorrow.
spanish: Las palabras no pueden aliviar su profundo pesar.

english: Tom runs faster than me.
spanish: Tom corre más rápido que yo.

english: Did you win the race?
spanish: ¿Ganaste la carrera?

english: Your secret is safe with me.
spanish: Tu secreto está a salvo conmigo.

english: It must be a nightmare to clean this place.
spanish: Limpiar este lugar debe ser una pesadilla.

english: I can't thank you enough.
spanish: No puedo agradecerle lo suficiente.

english: The arrow fell short of the target.
spanish: La flecha cayó cerca del objetivo.

english: Will the coffee stain ruin the carpet?
spanish: ¿La mancha de café va a arruinar la alfombra?

english: Do you need the book?
spanish: ¿Necesitas este libro?

english: Tom forgot Mary's phone number.
spanish: Tom olvidó el número telefónico de Mary.

english: You should not speak ill of others.
spanish: No deberías hablar mal de otros.

english: I tried for almost an hour.
spanish: Lo intenté más o menos por una hora.

english: It's a good day for going to the park.
spanish: Es un buen día para ir al parque.

english: Why don't you go sit down at the table?
spanish: ¿Por qué no os sentáis a la mesa?

english: Tom couldn't believe it was already time to go home.
spanish: Tom no podía creer que ya era hora de irse a casa.

english: Faded jeans are still in fashion.
spanish: Los pantalones desteñidos todavía están de moda.

english: You're the only one who can do this.
spanish: Tú eres el único que puede hacer esto.

english: The arrow missed its target.
spanish: La flecha falló su objetivo.

english: Would you like to go have a drink?
spanish: ¿Te gustaría ir a tomar algo?

english: Death is the fate of all people.
spanish: La muerte es el destino de todas las personas.

english: You and I have something in common.
spanish: Tú y yo tenemos algo en común.

english: Tom was the only survivor.
spanish: Tom fue el único sobreviviente.

english: Tom wants me to take Mary to the party.
spanish: Tom quiere que lleve a Mary a la fiesta.

english: Tom's starting to go bald.
spanish: Tomás se está quedando pelado.

english: I will send it by email this afternoon.
spanish: Lo enviaré por correo electrónico esta tarde.

english: You're a really good guitarist.
spanish: Realmente eres un buen guitarrista.

english: I think we should notify Tom's parents.
spanish: Creo que deberíamos informar a los padres de Tom.

english: Have you ever seen a wolf?
spanish: ¿Alguna vez has visto un lobo?

english: Do you ever stay home?
spanish: ¿Alguna vez te quedas en casa?

english: He left the country after his grandfather's death.
spanish: Abandonó el país después de la muerte del abuelo.

english: Tom wished he'd never met Mary.
spanish: Tom deseó nunca haber conocido a Mary.

english: Where were you between one and three o'clock?
spanish: ¿Dónde estuviste entre la una y las tres horas?

english: Don't worry about the past.
spanish: No te preocupes por el pasado.

english: Tom smokes two or three cigarettes a day.
spanish: Tom fuma dos o tres cigarrillos por día.

english: He gave away all his money to charity.
spanish: Él donó todo su dinero a la caridad.

english: He is standing on the hill.
spanish: Él está parado en la colina.

english: I intend to stay there for a week.
spanish: Pretendo quedarme ahí por una semana.

english: He hasn't written the letter yet.
spanish: Todavía no ha escrito la carta.

english: Where were you that day?
spanish: ¿Dónde estabas ese día?

english: He gets a good salary.
spanish: Él cobra un buen sueldo.

english: He was always ready to help people in trouble.
spanish: Él siempre estaba listo para ayudar a las personas en problemas.

english: Tom's face feels rough because he needs to shave.
spanish: El rostro de Tom se siente áspero porque debe afeitarse.

english: Is this a bad time to chat?
spanish: ¿Es mal momento para charlar?

english: Tom felt obligated to say something.
spanish: Tom se sintió obligado a decir algo.

english: He did it without malice.
spanish: Lo hizo sin malicia.

english: How many days does it usually take to get there?
spanish: ¿Cuántos días usualmente toma llegar allá?

english: I don't want to read this book.
spanish: No quiero leer este libro.

english: The bus leaves every ten minutes.
spanish: El bus sale cada diez minutos.

english: Do I have to do it over again?
spanish: ¿Debo hacerlo de nuevo?

english: I didn't do that entirely on my own.
spanish: No lo hice todo yo solo.

english: Tom made Mary change her plans.
spanish: Tom hizo que Mary cambiara sus planes.

english: I like the arrangement of the furniture in this room.
spanish: Me agrada la ubicación de los muebles en esta sala.

english: She sent me a long letter.
spanish: Ella me envió una larga carta.

english: Farther on, we came upon a house.
spanish: Más adelante encontramos una casa.

english: The horse stopped and refused to move.
spanish: El caballo se paró y se negó a moverse.

english: Tom is interested in French literature.
spanish: A Tom le interesa la literatura francesa.

english: Do you think you could make a little less noise?
spanish: ¿Cree que podría hacer algo menos de ruido?

english: Workers must have their hair cut short.
spanish: Los trabajadores tienen que llevar el pelo corto.

english: Please move to the rear of the bus.
spanish: Por favor, muévanse para la parte de atrás del bus.

english: She pulled him out of the mud.
spanish: Ella lo sacó del lodo.

english: Answer the following questions in English.
spanish: Responde en inglés a las siguientes preguntas.

english: Put everything in my basket.
spanish: Poné todo en mi canasta.

english: This is a real breakthrough.
spanish: Esto es un auténtico logro.

english: Please use a pencil to write down your name.
spanish: Escriba su nombre con lápiz, por favor.

english: I'm trying to figure out something.
spanish: Estoy intentando comprender algo.

english: I owe my success to their help.
spanish: Yo le debo mi éxito a su ayuda.

english: How about going to the movie tonight?
spanish: ¿Qué te parece ir al cine esta noche?

english: She is not honest at all.
spanish: No es honesta del todo.

english: There are no grammatical mistakes in this sentence.
spanish: Esta frase está libre de errores gramaticales.

english: Write down your name here.
spanish: Anota tu nombre aquí.

english: How did you make this soup?
spanish: ¿Cómo hiciste esta sopa?

english: I don't think anybody can help me now.
spanish: No creo que nadie pueda ayudarme ahora.

english: No one will believe him.
spanish: Nadie le creerá.

english: Come here. I need to tell you something.
spanish: Vení. Necesito decirte algo.

english: It's not as easy as people think.
spanish: No es tan fácil como la gente piensa.

english: Tom is likely to be back soon.
spanish: Tom debería regresar pronto.

english: Seemingly impossible things sometimes happen.
spanish: A veces suceden cosas aparentemente imposibles.

english: Tom wants me to help Mary with her homework.
spanish: Tom quiere que ayude a Mary con sus deberes.

english: We clean our classroom after school.
spanish: Nosotros limpiamos nuestra sala después de clases.

english: You are a mean person.
spanish: Eres un tacaño.

english: I do that whenever I have free time.
spanish: Lo hago en mi tiempo libre.

english: I have seen her before.
spanish: La he visto antes.

english: Tom and Mary will enter from the back.
spanish: Tom y Mary entrarán por atrás.

english: You'd better take Tom home.
spanish: Será mejor que lleves a Tom a casa.

english: Do you know what it is?
spanish: ¿Saben qué es esto?

english: I went into the navy.
spanish: Me fui a la marina.

english: Did you understand what he said?
spanish: ¿Entendiste lo que él dijo?

english: I can't let them catch me.
spanish: No puedo dejar que me atrapen.

english: A true friend would not say such a thing.
spanish: Un verdadero amigo no diría una cosa así.

english: Excuse me, may I come in?
spanish: Disculpe, ¿puedo entrar?

english: I wish I could swim.
spanish: Ojalá supiera nadar.

english: Tom will be able to solve the problem.
spanish: Tom será capaz de resolver el problema.

english: She's waiting for you at home.
spanish: Te está esperando en casa.

english: Tom tried to hug Mary.
spanish: Tom intentó abrazar a Mary.

english: He drank straight from the bottle.
spanish: Él bebió directo de la botella.

english: He described the scene in detail.
spanish: Él describió la escena con todo lujo de detalles.

english: I'd love to know everything about you.
spanish: Me encantaría saber todo sobre ti.

english: I didn't quite make out what he said.
spanish: No he entendido muy bien lo que él ha dicho.

english: Tom would do anything for his sister, Mary.
spanish: Tom haría lo que sea por su hermana, María.

english: I have nothing to hide.
spanish: No tengo nada que ocultar.

english: Mary used to be beautiful.
spanish: Mary era guapa.

english: The audience was greatly impressed by his speech.
spanish: El público quedó muy impresionado por su discurso.

english: There's a pay phone over there.
spanish: Hay un teléfono público allí.

english: My sister showers every morning.
spanish: Mi hermana se ducha todas las mañanas.

english: I think you've made a big mistake.
spanish: Creo que has cometido un gran error.

english: You've got to read this.
spanish: Tienen que leer esto.

english: Tom and Mary both stared at John.
spanish: Ambos, Tom y Mary, observaron a John.

english: Do you think what she said is a lie?
spanish: ¿Crees que lo que ella dijo es mentira?

english: The sky is full of stars.
spanish: El cielo está lleno de estrellas.

english: Do you know how to cook meat?
spanish: ¿Sabes cómo cocinar carne?

english: The village does not have a post office.
spanish: El pueblo no tiene oficina de correos.

english: His aunt has three cats.
spanish: Su tía tiene tres gatos.

english: She went down the stairs.
spanish: Ella bajó las escaleras.

english: The dictionary on the desk is Tom's.
spanish: El diccionario que está encima de la mesa es de Tom.

english: I ran out of money during my stay in India.
spanish: Me quedé sin dinero durante mi estadía en la India.

english: He followed the doctor's suggestions.
spanish: Siguió las indicaciones del médico.

english: I'd like to buy that one.
spanish: Quisiera comprar aquel.

english: I've never seen you cry.
spanish: Nunca te he visto llorar.

english: Tom could think of no reason why he shouldn't stay.
spanish: Tom no podía pensar en ninguna motivo por el que él no debiera quedarse.

english: I want to speak in French.
spanish: Quiero hablar francés.

english: The eagle is about to land.
spanish: El águila está a punto de aterrizar.

english: I love you more than he loves you.
spanish: Te amo más de lo que él te ama.

english: He lived in Ankara for six years.
spanish: Él vivió en Ankara por seis años.

english: There's more wind today than yesterday.
spanish: Hace más viento hoy que ayer.

english: Foreign investors withdrew their money from the United States.
spanish: Los inversionistas extranjeros retiraron su dinero de Estados Unidos.

english: He lay down on the bed.
spanish: Él se recostó sobre la cama.

english: I saw you on television.
spanish: Os vi en la televisión.

english: You'd better take an umbrella.
spanish: Es mejor que te lleves un paraguas.

english: You've got a bit of a fever today, don't you?
spanish: Tienes un poco de fiebre hoy, ¿o no?

english: Tom has already made up his mind.
spanish: Tom ya se decidió.

english: That's my CD, isn't it?
spanish: Este es mi CD, ¿no?

english: Tom began to wonder who Mary had learned French from.
spanish: Tom se empezó a preguntar de quién Mary habría aprendido francés.

english: Tell Tom to write me.
spanish: Dile a Tom que me escriba.

english: What's happened, has happened. It's history.
spanish: Lo que pasó, pasó. Es historia.

english: What will you be doing at this time tomorrow?
spanish: ¿Tienes algo que hacer mañana a esta hora?

english: Tom decided to keep a diary.
spanish: Tom decidió mantener un diario.

english: Do you want a trim?
spanish: ¿Quieres un recorte?

english: I turned off the lamp and went to sleep.
spanish: Apagué la luz y me fui a dormir.

english: Why don't we go in?
spanish: ¿Por qué no entramos?

english: Tom told Mary that she was right.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary que ella tenía razón.

english: Tom has a learning disorder.
spanish: Tom tiene un trastorno del aprendizaje.

english: Tom thought about Mary a lot.
spanish: Tom pensó mucho acerca de María.

english: I see no reason to stop.
spanish: No encuentro motivo para parar.

english: That short woman over there is my mother.
spanish: Esa señora bajita de allí es mi madre.

english: I've made a terrible mistake.
spanish: Cometí un terrible error.

english: What he says is false.
spanish: Lo que él dice no es correcto.

english: The business was a failure.
spanish: El negocio fue un fracaso.

english: She hit me, not him.
spanish: Ella me pegó a mí, no a él.

english: I don't want to drink anything cold.
spanish: No quiero beber nada frío.

english: It's too far to walk.
spanish: Es demasiado lejos para ir andando.

english: America was at war in 1864.
spanish: Estados Unidos estuvo en guerra en 1864.

english: She thanked him for his help.
spanish: Ella le agradeció por su ayuda.

english: I just wanted to wish you luck.
spanish: Solo quería desearte suerte.

english: Tom doesn't seem too worried.
spanish: Tom no se ve demasiado preocupado.

english: What train is Tom coming in on?
spanish: ¿En qué tren está viniendo Tom?

english: I want to see this movie.
spanish: Quiero ver esta película.

english: We can't live without oxygen.
spanish: No podemos vivir sin oxígeno.

english: The new museum is worth visiting.
spanish: Merece la pena ir al nuevo museo.

english: Tom paid for it by credit card.
spanish: Tom lo pagó con tarjeta de crédito.

english: I won't be able to fix that.
spanish: No seré capaz de arreglar eso.

english: Father came home about ten minutes ago.
spanish: Mi padre vino a la casa hace cerca de diez minutos.

english: We have a cat. We all love cats.
spanish: Tenemos un gato. A todos nos gustan los gatos.

english: He used to drink beer.
spanish: Solía beber cerveza.

english: We have to pick a name for the child.
spanish: Tenemos que elegir un nombre para el niño.

english: Tom has a Canadian girlfriend.
spanish: Tom tiene una novia canadiense.

english: Tom doesn't know if Mary likes him.
spanish: Tom no sabe si le gusta a Mary.

english: Are you on a diet?
spanish: ¿Estáis a dieta?

english: We're aware of the problem.
spanish: Estamos al corriente del problema.

english: I love the sound of children laughing.
spanish: Adoro el sonido de las risas de los niños.

english: The girl was sobbing in the corner of the schoolroom.
spanish: La niña estaba lloriqueando en la orilla de la sala.

english: I'm going to study French.
spanish: Voy a estudiar francés.

english: I like to play basketball.
spanish: Me gusta jugar al baloncesto.

english: The embassy denied political asylum to foreign refugees.
spanish: La embajada les negó el asilo político a los refugiados extranjeros.

english: He glanced at the book.
spanish: Echó una mirada al libro.

english: I know Tom is tired.
spanish: Sé que Tom está agotado.

english: The boy was searching for the lost key.
spanish: El niño estaba buscando la llave perdida.

english: Did you know that some foxes lived on this mountain?
spanish: ¿Sabía usted que algunos zorros vivían en esta montaña?

english: Can you pass me the milk?
spanish: ¿Me alcanzas la leche?

english: Would you like to sing?
spanish: ¿Te gustaría cantar?

english: I don't think that it will rain tomorrow.
spanish: No creo que llueva mañana.

english: Tom is out to lunch.
spanish: Tom salió a almorzar.

english: I'm not one hundred percent convinced that's true.
spanish: No estoy cien por cien convencido de que eso sea cierto.

english: I was dreaming about Tom.
spanish: Estaba soñando con Tom.

english: The meeting will end tomorrow.
spanish: La reunión terminará mañana.

english: Now I feel sorry for her.
spanish: Ahora me siento mal por ella.

english: I've made up my mind.
spanish: Me he decidido.

english: There is no doubt that he was murdered.
spanish: No hay lugar a dudas de que él fue asesinado.

english: I got up at five that morning.
spanish: Esa mañana me levanté a las cinco.

english: I feel much better now.
spanish: Ahora estoy mucho mejor.

english: Tom hardly ever asks questions.
spanish: Tom casi nunca hace preguntas.

english: A terrible thing happened last week.
spanish: Ocurrió una cosa terrible la semana pasada.

english: No one will stop me.
spanish: Nadie me detendrá.

english: When will we go home?
spanish: ¿Cuándo nos iremos a casa?

english: It seemed clear the Senate would reject the treaty.
spanish: Parecía claro que el Senado rechazaría el tratado.

english: I only feed my dog dry dog food.
spanish: Tan sólo alimento a mi perro con comida seca para perros.

english: I don't feel that I can trust what he says.
