spanish: No siento que pueda confiar en lo que él dice.

english: I had to do it before 2:30.
spanish: Tenía que hacerlo antes de las dos y media.

english: I learned a lot from you.
spanish: Aprendí mucho de ti.

english: We have to buy them from abroad.
spanish: Los tenemos que comprar desde el extranjero.

english: Are you busy Friday night?
spanish: ¿Estás ocupada el viernes por la noche?

english: Tom asked for a loan from Mary.
spanish: Tom le pidió un préstamo a Mary.

english: Do you want my help?
spanish: ¿Quieres mi ayuda?

english: What do you feel most proud of?
spanish: ¿Qué os enorgullece más?

english: I thought you might want to know.
spanish: Pensé que tal vez quisieran saber.

english: Tom has been bullying me for months.
spanish: Tom me ha estado haciendo bullying desde hace meses.

english: Tom is a lot better today.
spanish: Tom está mucho mejor hoy.

english: He told us an interesting story.
spanish: Él nos contó una historia interesante.

english: I was playing a game when I felt an earthquake.
spanish: Yo estaba jugando un juego cuando sentí un terremoto.

english: I think I'm just tired.
spanish: Creo que sólo estoy cansado.

english: I went to the airport to meet my father.
spanish: Fuí al aeropuerto para recibir a mi padre.

english: Each one of the three kids got a prize.
spanish: Cada uno de los tres niños recibió un premio.

english: I have a nap almost every day.
spanish: Me doy una siesta casi todos los días.

english: I was told that you know Tom's telephone number.
spanish: Me dijeron que tienes el número de Tom.

english: Mary showed the letter to me.
spanish: Mary me mostró la carta.

english: Tom is a picky eater and seldom tries anything new.
spanish: Tom es quisquilloso y rara vez prueba algo nuevo.

english: The boy admitted having broken the vase.
spanish: El niño reconoció haber roto el jarrón.

english: I'm expecting a letter from her.
spanish: Espero una carta suya.

english: I thought he had died.
spanish: Pensé que él había muerto.

english: He must have missed the train.
spanish: Él debe haber perdido el tren.

english: Tom wants to know why you didn't call him back.
spanish: Tom quiere saber por qué no le regresaron la llamada.

english: Did Tom get my message?
spanish: ¿Tom recibió mi mensaje?

english: It's a pity that Mary has no sense of humor.
spanish: Es una lástima que Mary no tenga sentido del humor.

english: He doesn't eat raw fish.
spanish: No come pescado crudo.

english: Many people use ATMs to withdraw money.
spanish: Mucha gente usa cajeros automáticos para retirar dinero.

english: Our team won the game.
spanish: Nuestro equipo ganó el juego.

english: I hope you don't mind me dropping by.
spanish: Espero que no te moleste que me haya pasado.

english: Tom didn't come with us to Boston.
spanish: Tom no vino con nosotros a Boston.

english: He is used to that type of situation.
spanish: Él está acostumbrado a esta clase de situaciones.

english: You've got to go even if you don't want to.
spanish: Tenéis que ir, incluso si no queréis.

english: I hear that he eats frogs.
spanish: Oí que él come ranas.

english: This dress is cheaper than yours.
spanish: Este vestido es más barato que el tuyo.

english: Take that off your head.
spanish: Sacate eso de la cabeza.

english: The doctor continued to observe the patient's behavior.
spanish: El doctor siguió observando el comportamiento del paciente.

english: There's a party at Tom's house tonight.
spanish: Esta noche hay una fiesta en la casa de Tom.

english: This oil well is going to make me rich.
spanish: ¡Este pozo de petróleo me va a hacer rico!

english: I'm looking for my keys.
spanish: Estoy buscando mis llaves.

english: You're always disagreeing with your boss.
spanish: Te la pasas peleando con tu jefe.

english: The dog wagged its tail.
spanish: El perro meneaba la cola.

english: No one was aware of her literary talent.
spanish: Nadie estaba consciente de su talento para la literatura.

english: It is important for you to keep this secret.
spanish: Es importante que guardes este secreto.

english: They got to be good friends.
spanish: Llegaron a ser buenos amigos.

english: Tom said it was urgent.
spanish: Tom dijo que era urgente.

english: The boy kissed the girl.
spanish: El muchacho besó a la muchacha.

english: We went to New York by plane.
spanish: Fuimos a Nueva York en avión.

english: Why did you stay at home yesterday?
spanish: ¿Por qué te quedaste ayer en casa?

english: Tom wants to thank you.
spanish: Tom quiere decirte gracias.

english: I'll get used to it sooner or later.
spanish: Tarde o temprano me acostumbraré.

english: He doesn't listen to me.
spanish: Él no me escucha.

english: I want to say thank you.
spanish: Quiero dar las gracias.

english: I prefer to write in French.
spanish: Prefiero escribir en francés.

english: Tom insists on eating fruit every day.
spanish: Tom insiste en comer fruta todos los días.

english: Do you spend more time at home or at work?
spanish: ¿Usted pasa más tiempo en su casa o en el trabajo?

english: Do you see any problems with the project?
spanish: ¿Ves algún problema con el proyecto?

english: That baby knows how to walk.
spanish: Ese bebé sabe caminar.

english: I'll meet you at the usual time.
spanish: Te veré a la hora de siempre.

english: What's your favorite food to eat with red wine?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu comida favorita para acompañarla con vino tinto?

english: My car is covered in pigeon poop.
spanish: Mi coche está cubierto de caca de paloma.

english: You owe Tom a big apology.
spanish: Le debes una gran disculpa a Tom.

english: As far as I know, she hasn't left yet.
spanish: Que yo sepa, todavía no se ha ido.

english: That might make matters worse.
spanish: Eso podría empeorar el asunto.

english: The bed in Tom's room was unmade.
spanish: La cama en el cuarto de Tom estaba deshecha.

english: There is always something happening here.
spanish: Aquí siempre pasa algo.

english: I can't make out what you're saying.
spanish: No te cacho.

english: She is being blackmailed by him.
spanish: Ella está siendo chantajeada por él.

english: It had been snowing for a week.
spanish: Había estado nevando durante una semana.

english: He dressed like a girl.
spanish: Él se vestía como una niña.

english: You are not supposed to smoke here.
spanish: Está prohibido fumar aquí.

english: I want to know where they hid the money.
spanish: Quiero saber dónde escondieron el dinero.

english: We have no choice. I guess we'll have to walk.
spanish: No tenemos elección. Supongo que tendrémos que andar.

english: The students adore the new English teacher.
spanish: Los alumnos adoran al nuevo profesor de inglés.

english: The three big monotheistic religions are Islam, Judaism and Christianity.
spanish: Las tres grandes religiones monoteístas son el islam, el judaísmo y el cristianismo.

english: Physics is my favorite subject.
spanish: Física es mi asignatura favorita.

english: He is a clever boy.
spanish: Él es un niño astuto.

english: I'm planning to study tonight.
spanish: Esta noche planeo estudiar.

english: The sun has gone down.
spanish: Se ha puesto el sol.

english: Tom isn't as rich as Mary is.
spanish: Tom no es tan rico como lo es Mary.

english: Where is this guy going?
spanish: ¿Dónde va este tipo?

english: I want to know how Tom is doing.
spanish: Quiero saber cómo le va a Tom.

english: Perhaps we should do something about it.
spanish: Quizá deberíamos hacer algo al respecto.

english: I don't like your friends at all.
spanish: No me gustan nada tus amigos.

english: This restaurant is badly managed.
spanish: Este restaurante está mal administrado.

english: Are you ready for Halloween?
spanish: ¿Estás listo para la Noche de Brujas?

english: Could you turn down the volume?
spanish: ¿Puedes bajar el volumen?

english: Do you like living in Boston?
spanish: ¿Te gusta vivir en Boston?

english: Tom doesn't know what happened because he wasn't there.
spanish: Tom no sabe lo que pasó porque él no estaba ahí.

english: I concentrated on what he was saying.
spanish: Me concentré en lo que estaba diciendo.

english: Compared with his brother, he is not so intelligent.
spanish: Comparado con su hermano, no es tan inteligente.

english: It's a pretty amazing script.
spanish: Es un guion bastante asombroso.

english: He can't have told a lie.
spanish: Él no puede haber dicho una mentira.

english: Would you like to give it a try?
spanish: ¿Te gustaría hacer un intento?

english: Pets can be very expensive.
spanish: Las mascotas pueden llegar a ser muy caras.

english: Please bring this gentleman a glass of beer.
spanish: Por favor tráigale a este caballero un vaso de cerveza.

english: It wouldn't take that much time.
spanish: No tomaría eso mucho tiempo.

english: I just want to say good luck.
spanish: Solo quiero decir buena suerte.

english: He is such a bad person that everybody dislikes him.
spanish: Él es una persona tan mala que todos lo odian.

english: I promise that I'll be there on time.
spanish: Prometo que estaré ahí a tiempo.

english: She kept crying all night.
spanish: Ella estuvo llorando toda la noche.

english: I need to know what's happening.
spanish: Necesito saber qué pasa.

english: From time to time she stopped and looked round.
spanish: Cada cierto tiempo se paraba y miraba a su alrededor.

english: He went out a little before five o'clock.
spanish: Él salió un poco antes de las cinco.

english: Do you deny that you went there?
spanish: ¿Niegas que fuiste allí?

english: She bought him some candy.
spanish: Ella le compró a él unos dulces.

english: I have a little something for you.
spanish: Tengo una cosita para ustedes.

english: He is soon to be a father.
spanish: Dentro de poco será padre.

english: Tom went to a concert just the other day.
spanish: Solo el otro día, Tom fue a un concierto.

english: She and I have been married 30 years.
spanish: Ella y yo hemos estado casados durante 30 años.

english: I haven't paid for the tickets yet.
spanish: Todavía no he pagado las entradas.

english: She was on the verge of killing herself.
spanish: Ella estaba a punto de quitarse la vida.

english: My mother is busy cooking supper.
spanish: Mi madre está ocupada cocinando la cena.

english: I used to be the same age as you.
spanish: Yo solía tener la misma edad que tú.

english: I don't know how to interpret his words.
spanish: No sé cómo interpretar sus palabras.

english: I heard her speak English fluently.
spanish: Yo le escuché a ella hablar en inglés con fluidez.

english: Tom finally gave up smoking.
spanish: Tom finalmente dejó de fumar.

english: Tom wants you to do it.
spanish: Tom quiere que lo hagas tú.

english: This river is 500 miles in length.
spanish: El río tiene 500 millas de longitud.

english: I don't know whether I should laugh or cry.
spanish: No sé si reír o llorar.

english: My husband won't let me get a job.
spanish: Mi esposo no me deja tener un trabajo.

english: You are in need of a holiday.
spanish: Tú necesitas un día libre.

english: He was afraid of making the first move.
spanish: Él tenía miedo de dar el primer paso.

english: A century is one hundred years.
spanish: Un siglo tiene cien años.

english: He did it only for my sake.
spanish: Él lo hizo solo por mí.

english: Do you have a complaint to make?
spanish: ¿Tienes alguna queja?

english: What are you going to do with my picture?
spanish: ¿Qué vas a hacer con mi foto?

english: Correct my spelling if it's wrong.
spanish: Corrige mi pronunciación si es incorrecta.

english: I wouldn't blame you if you preferred to leave.
spanish: No los culparía si prefirieran irse.

english: Do you believe in miracles?
spanish: ¿Creés en los milagros?

english: Do you mind if I open the window?
spanish: ¿Te molesta si abro la ventana?

english: She'll come even if you tell her not to.
spanish: Ella vendrá incluso si le dices que no lo haga.

english: Where is the nearest subway station?
spanish: ¿Dónde se encuentra la estación del metro más cercana?

english: A rainbow is a natural phenomenon.
spanish: El arcoíris es un fenómeno natural.

english: I thought you didn't want to come.
spanish: Creía que no querías venir.

english: What is your impression of America?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu impresión de Estados Unidos?

english: Tom never ceases to amaze me.
spanish: Tom nunca deja de sorprenderme.

english: Don't you have a husband?
spanish: ¿No tenés marido?

english: There's a fan on the table.
spanish: Hay un abanico encima de la mesa.

english: Tom works from nine to five.
spanish: Tom trabaja desde las nueve hasta las cinco.

english: What will you be doing at this time tomorrow?
spanish: ¿Tendrás desocupada tu agenda mañana a esta misma hora?

english: He can swim a mile.
spanish: Él puede nadar una milla.

english: Tom is very good at videogames.
spanish: A Tom se le da muy bien jugar a los videojuegos.

english: Have you ever been to Africa?
spanish: ¿Has estado alguna vez en África?

english: Tom felt he had no chance to win the race.
spanish: Tom sentía que no tenía chances de ganar la carrera.

english: She is in a very good mood.
spanish: Está de buen humor.

english: Don't tell anyone we've done this.
spanish: No le digas a nadie que hemos hecho esto.

english: Tom is helping his wife.
spanish: Tom le está ayudando a su esposa.

english: Does it snow much in the winter?
spanish: ¿Nieva mucho en el invierno?

english: What can you do for Tom?
spanish: ¿Qué puedes hacer por Tom?

english: I thought you wanted to get married.
spanish: Pensé que querías casarte.

english: She let go of the boy's hand.
spanish: Ella soltó la mano del niño.

english: Get up as early as you can.
spanish: Levántate tan pronto como puedas.

english: At what age do you want to get married?
spanish: ¿A qué edad quieres casarte?

english: The police will never find us.
spanish: La Policía jamás nos va a encontrar.

english: Let's go sit in the shade.
spanish: Vamos a sentarnos a la sombra.

english: I'm as healthy as a horse.
spanish: Tengo la salud de un toro.

english: I can't understand why you are so critical of him.
spanish: No entiendo por qué eres tan crítico con él.

english: Hi. How are you doing?
spanish: ¡Hola! ¿Qué tal?

english: I'm anxious to see you.
spanish: Estoy ansioso de verte.

english: He was framed on a murder charge.
spanish: Fue acusado falsamente de asesinato.

english: Tom is the tallest boy in our group.
spanish: Tom es el chico más alto de nuestro grupo.

english: Not feeling well, I stayed home on that day.
spanish: Como no me encontraba bien, me quedé en casa ese día.

english: I had a good reason for doing that.
spanish: Yo tuve una buena razón para hacerlo.

english: I'll be right outside if you need me.
spanish: Estaré afuerita si me necesitas.

english: I just want to take a quick look.
spanish: Solo quiero dar un vistazo breve.

english: The club has more than fifty members.
spanish: El club tiene más de 50 miembros.

english: I heard it thunder in the distance.
spanish: Escuché truenos en la lejanía.

english: It started raining just as I was leaving home.
spanish: Comenzó a llover justo cuando yo salía de casa.

english: How many Christmas presents did you give this year?
spanish: ¿Cuántos regalos navideños has entregado este año?

english: The cook served the family for many years.
spanish: La cocinera sirvió a la familia durante muchos años.

english: The airplane landed on my father's farm.
spanish: El avión aterrizó en la granja de mi papá.

english: It is high time we said good-bye.
spanish: Ya es buena hora para despedirse.

english: She has an absent look on her face.
spanish: Ella tiene un semblante ausente.

english: I am afraid I can't help you.
spanish: Me temo que no puedo ayudarle.

english: I had to go to Boston.
spanish: Tuve que ir a Boston.

english: I want you to stay here with her.
spanish: Quiero que se quede aquí con ella.

english: My name is known by everyone in our town.
spanish: Mi nombre es conocido por todos en nuestra ciudad.

english: This text is aimed at beginners.
spanish: Este texto está dirigido a principiantes.

english: How is your family name written?
spanish: ¿Cómo se escribe tu apellido?

english: I could hear an owl hooting in the distance.
spanish: Podía oír a un búho ululando en la distancia.

english: He's always the first to complain.
spanish: Siempre es el primero en quejarse.

english: From now on, I promise to be punctual.
spanish: De ahora en adelante, prometo ser puntual.

english: I've learned a lot from you over the past year.
spanish: Aprendí mucho de ti en el trascurso del año pasado.

english: I've invited all my friends.
spanish: He invitado a todos mis amigos.

english: I visit him every other day.
spanish: Voy a verle cada dos días.

english: He likes to read books.
spanish: Le gusta leer libros.

english: What do you want to hear from me?
spanish: ¿Qué quieres oír de mi?

english: Nobody told me what time I should come.
spanish: Nadie me dijo cuándo tenía que venir.

english: To my dismay I found I had lost my money.
spanish: A mi consternación, encontré que había perdido mi dinero.

english: He wanted my permission to use the telephone.
spanish: Él quería mi permiso para usar el teléfono.

english: Tom is waiting for Mary to get home.
spanish: Tom está esperando a que Mary vuelva a casa.

english: Tom wore a new coat to school today.
spanish: Hoy Tom llevó un nuevo abrigo a la escuela.

english: Are you by yourself or with someone?
spanish: ¿Estás solo o con alguien más?

english: Are you going to buy that car?
spanish: ¿Vas a comprar ese coche?

english: Our teacher is a real idiot.
spanish: Nuestro profesor es un perfecto idiota.

english: I teach French to college kids.
spanish: Enseño francés a chicos de escuela secundaria.

english: My sister irons my pants.
spanish: Mi hermana me plancha los pantalones.

english: Why do you walk when you have a car?
spanish: ¿Por qué vas a pie si tienes un auto?

english: It's not my cup of tea.
spanish: No es de mi agrado.

english: I imagine that Tom and Mary will eventually get married.
spanish: Me imagino que tarde o temprano Tom y Mary se van a casar.

english: I've still got a lot to learn.
spanish: Todavía tengo mucho que aprender.

english: You seem to be lying.
spanish: Pareces estar mintiendo.

english: We made a lot of progress today.
spanish: Hoy hemos progresado mucho.

english: We should try to treat everybody with justice.
spanish: Debemos intentar tratar a todo el mundo justamente.

english: I think that we should do that again.
spanish: Creo que deberíamos repetirlo.

english: I thought Tom would take Mary to the aquarium.
spanish: Pensé que Tom llevaría María al acuario.

english: I know she is sleeping.
spanish: Sé que ella está durmiendo.

english: That was the best day of my life.
spanish: Ese fue el mejor día de mi vida.

english: Women tend to live longer than men.
spanish: Las mujeres suelen vivir más que los hombres.

english: His store is always crowded with customers.
spanish: Su negocio está siempre lleno de clientes.

english: What was it I left behind?
spanish: ¿Qué fue lo que olvidé?

english: Can I borrow it for about two weeks?
spanish: ¿Puedo tomarlo prestado durante unas dos semanas?

english: I am not as interested in literature as you.
spanish: No estoy tan interesado como tú en la literatura.

english: They talked on the phone every night.
spanish: Hablaban cada noche por teléfono.

english: She turned a page of her book.
spanish: Ella pasó una página de su libro.

english: Tom frequently talks in his sleep.
spanish: A menudo, Tom habla mientras duerme.

english: He amused us with funny stories.
spanish: Él nos entretuvo con historias graciosas.

english: Who lives in that house?
spanish: ¿Quién vive en esa casa?

english: Children need a lot of sleep.
spanish: Los niños necesitan mucho sueño.

english: They didn't make a deal.
spanish: Ellos no hicieron un trato.

english: I believe he is not a lawyer.
spanish: Creo que no es abogado.

english: I have breakfast at seven every morning.
spanish: Desayuno a las siete todas las mañanas.

english: Tom accidentally ate some rat poison.
spanish: Tom tomó raticida por accidente.

english: What did you do with my book?
spanish: ¿Qué has hecho con mi libro?

english: I haven't finished reading this book.
spanish: Todavía no he acabado de leer este libro.

english: Tom is looking for a job.
spanish: Tom está buscando un empleo.

english: I don't care who Tom is talking to.
spanish: No me importa con quién esté hablando Tom.

english: Tom double-checked his door to make sure it was locked.
spanish: Tom volvió a checar su puerta a ver si estaba cerrada con llave.

english: I wish I were a stone.
spanish: Ojalá fuera una piedra.

english: I wonder what happened to her.
spanish: Me pregunto qué le pasó a ella.

english: I just got a letter from my girl.
spanish: Acabo de recibir una carta de mi novia.

english: I don't drink much wine.
spanish: No bebo mucho vino.

english: I used to take a walk early in the morning.
spanish: Solía pasear por la mañana temprano.

english: I remember returning the book to the library.
spanish: Recuerdo haber devuelto el libro a la biblioteca.

english: A bright red ladybug landed on my fingertip.
spanish: Una juanita de color rojo brillante se posó en la punta de mi dedo.

english: What would you do if you had a million dollars?
spanish: ¿Qué harías si tuvieses un millón de dólares?

english: I'll leave tomorrow, weather permitting.
spanish: Me iré mañana, si el tiempo lo permite.

english: We walked along side by side.
spanish: Nosotros íbamos caminando uno al lado del otro.

english: I'm saving up so that I can go to Australia.
spanish: Estoy ahorrando para así poder ir a Australia.

english: He wanted to go to sea.
spanish: Él quería ir al mar.

english: She doesn't want to talk about it.
spanish: Ella no quiere hablar de eso.

english: She has been sick in bed since last Monday.
spanish: Ha estado enfermo en la cama desde el lunes pasado.

english: I wanted to know where the voice was coming from.
spanish: Yo quería saber de dónde venía la voz.

english: What does this stand for?
spanish: ¿Qué significa esto?

english: He knows who we are.
spanish: Sabe quiénes somos.

english: Why did you do that?
spanish: ¿Por qué lo has hecho?

english: The game may have been put off till next week.
spanish: Puede que se haya aplazado el juego hasta la semana que viene.

english: I went to bed at twelve last night.
spanish: Anoche me fui a la cama a las doce.

english: He who sleeps with dogs wakes up with fleas.
spanish: El que con perros se acuesta, con pulgas se despierta.

english: There's nothing better than taking a nice walk.
spanish: No hay nada mejor que dar una buena caminata.

english: I know something you don't know.
spanish: Sé algo que vos no sabés.

english: She advised him to save money.
spanish: Le aconsejó que ahorrara dinero.

english: Tom and Mary are both still single.
spanish: Tom y Mary son ambos solteros aún.

english: Tom told Mary about last night's ordeal.
spanish: Tom le contó a Mary la terrible experiencia de anoche.

english: Do you know which room the meeting will be in?
spanish: ¿Conoces la sala de la reunión?

english: The sun is coming up.
spanish: El sol está saliendo.

english: I can't stop thinking about what I saw.
spanish: No puedo dejar de pensar en lo que vi.

english: I poured water into the bucket.
spanish: Vertí agua en el balde.

english: He seems to know us.
spanish: Él parece conocernos.

english: Baseball is different from cricket.
spanish: El béisbol es diferente del críquet.

english: Tom got on the wrong bus.
spanish: Tom se subió al bus equivocado.

english: You don't need to work today.
spanish: No hace falta que trabajes hoy.

english: Tom was hoping that Mary would smile at him.
spanish: Tom esperaba que María le sonriera.

english: My girlfriend also loves to drink.
spanish: A mi novia también le encanta beber.

english: I would rather starve than steal.
spanish: Prefiero morirme de hambre antes que robar.

english: What happened to the goats?
spanish: ¿Qué le pasó a las cabras?

english: Tom has a deep voice.
spanish: Tom tiene una voz grave.

english: Tom had to take care of Mary.
spanish: Tom tenía que cuidar de Mary.

english: She can read very well.
spanish: Ella sabe leer muy bien.

english: There is a key on the desk.
spanish: Hay una llave sobre el escritorio.

english: I think it's a wild goose chase.
spanish: Creo que es perseguir un imposible.

english: Mary hates her job for many reasons.
spanish: María odia su trabajo por muchas razones.

english: How soon are we going to arrive?
spanish: ¿Qué tan pronto vamos a llegar?

english: Tom told Mary she should study harder.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary que tenía que estudiar más.

english: Boston is where I want to go.
spanish: Adonde quiero ir es a Boston.

english: Nobody cares what you think.
spanish: A nadie le interesa lo que tú pienses.

english: You should've eaten something this morning.
spanish: Deberías haber comido algo esta mañana.

english: Does Tom have a key to your apartment?
spanish: ¿Tom tiene la llave de tu apartamento?

english: My father is too stubborn to admit his faults.
spanish: Mi padre es demasiado terco para admitir sus errores.

english: For some reason, it's not working.
spanish: Por alguna razón, esto no funciona.

english: He came home in high spirits.
spanish: Él llegó a casa de muy buen humor.

english: Have you tried it before?
spanish: ¿Lo has intentado antes?

english: He is known to everyone.
spanish: Él es conocido por todos.

english: Tom met a friend of Mary's at the airport.
spanish: Tom encontró a un amigo de Mary en el aeropuerto.

english: You may call me Tom.
spanish: Me puedes llamar Tom.

english: He went there to learn English.
spanish: Él fue allí para aprender inglés.

english: She advised him to study harder.
spanish: Le aconsejó que estudiara más.

english: That might have been true.
spanish: Eso puede haber sido verdad.

english: I remember meeting the queen.
spanish: Recuerdo haber visto a la reina.

english: I want to visit my friend next week.
spanish: La próxima semana quiero visitar a mi amigo.

english: I will help you all I can.
spanish: Te ayudaré en todo lo que pueda.

english: That's where we saw Tom last year.
spanish: Ahí es donde vimos a Tom el año pasado.

english: There's something wrong with my car.
spanish: Hay algo mal con mi auto.

english: The child ran to his mother.
spanish: El niño corrió con su madre.

english: Tom didn't feel very confident.
spanish: Tom no se sentía muy confiado.

english: I am worried about my mother's health.
spanish: Estoy preocupada por la salud de mi madre.

english: A cat appeared from under the desk.
spanish: Apareció un gato de abajo del escritorio.

english: She's much heavier than him.
spanish: Ella pesa mucho más que él.

english: Did you read this morning's extra?
spanish: ¿Leyó usted la extra de esta mañana?

english: Is there any evidence that supports his position?
spanish: ¿Hay alguna evidencia que apoye esta postura?

english: The book I read yesterday was really interesting.
spanish: El libro que me leí ayer era muy interesante.

english: You cannot be too careful in choosing friends.
spanish: No puedes ser demasiado cauteloso al elegir a los amigos.

english: I really miss the old days.
spanish: Echo mucho de menos aquellos días.

english: How long is your Christmas vacation?
spanish: ¿Cuántas vacaciones tienes en Navidad?

english: Sit down here and warm yourself.
spanish: Siéntese aquí y caliéntese.

english: Tom wanted to give Mary another chance.
spanish: Tom quiso darle otra chance a Mary.

english: Did you hear my son play the violin?
spanish: ¿Oíste a mi hijo tocar violín?

english: My father used to go to work by bus.
spanish: Mi padre solía ir a trabajar en autobús.

english: The eagle soared majestically above the snow-covered peaks.
spanish: El águila se elevó majestuosamente por encima de los picos cubiertos de nieve.

english: I read an exciting story.
spanish: Leí una historia emocionante.

english: He told me when to say yes.
spanish: Él me dijo cuándo decir sí.

english: I don't want to go anywhere tonight.
spanish: No quiero ir a ningún lado esta noche.

english: I hate being alone on Valentine's Day.
spanish: Detesto pasar el día de San Valentín solo.

english: Tom saw his reflection in the mirror.
spanish: Tom vio su reflejo en el espejo.

english: Why are you so insecure?
spanish: ¿Por qué eres tan insegura?

english: Can you watch the kids?
spanish: ¿Puedes cuidar de los niños?

english: How much for half a kilo?
spanish: ¿Cuánto cuesta medio kilo?

english: She didn't read the book.
spanish: Ella no leyó el libro.

english: I left my umbrella behind in the taxi.
spanish: Olvidé mi paraguas en el taxi.

english: We wondered what would happen after Tom showed up.
spanish: Nos preguntamos qué pasaría después de que Tom apareciera.

english: I'd like to see you again next week.
spanish: Me gustaría volver a verte la semana que viene.

english: Someone grabbed me from behind.
spanish: Alguien me agarró por detrás.

english: What are you staring at?
spanish: ¿Qué estás mirando?

english: He shaved his mustache off.
spanish: Se afeitó el bigote.

english: For all I know, he was born in Italy.
spanish: Por lo que sé, nació en Italia.

english: You must answer these questions.
spanish: Tienes que responder a estas preguntas.

english: I'd just like to find Tom and talk to him.
spanish: Solo quisiera encontrar a Tom y hablar con él.

english: Mary is going to have a baby.
spanish: Mary va a tener un bebé.

english: Tom punched Mary in the face.
spanish: Tom le pegó un puñetazo en la cara a Mary.

english: That's not a cat. It's a dog.
spanish: Eso no es un gato, es un perro.

english: Tom doesn't play golf as much as he used to.
spanish: Tom no juega golf tanto como antes.

english: He always wears blue shirts.
spanish: Él siempre usa camisas azules.

english: He died doing what he loved.
spanish: Él murió haciendo lo que amaba.

english: Which way is the beach?
spanish: ¿En qué camino queda la playa?

english: This is a condition caused by aging.
spanish: Esta es una enfermedad causada por el envejecimiento.

english: Tom knew that Mary loved him.
spanish: Tom sabía que Mary lo amaba.

english: Tom shouldn't have compared his teacher to Hitler.
spanish: Tom no debería haber comparado a su profesor con Hitler.

english: Tom has trouble standing on one leg.
spanish: Tom tiene problemas para pararse en una pierna.

english: I don't understand a word of what he says.
spanish: No entiendo ni una palabra de lo que dice.

english: He is not guilty of murder.
spanish: Él no es culpable de asesinato.

english: Stay as long as you'd like.
spanish: Quédate cuanto quieras.

english: Why did he quit his job?
spanish: ¿Por qué renunció a su trabajo?

english: The world doesn't revolve around you.
spanish: El mundo no gira a tu alrededor.

english: Tom felt remorse for what he had done.
spanish: Tom sentía remordimiento por lo que había hecho.

english: I must have passed out.
spanish: Debo de haberme desmayado.

english: The injured were transported by ambulance.
spanish: Los heridos fueron transportados en ambulancia.

english: I want you to look for Tom.
spanish: Quiero que busques a Tom.

english: I don't know the password.
spanish: No me sé la contraseña.

english: He dropped to his knees.
spanish: Cayó de rodillas.

english: That is different than what I had expected.
spanish: Eso es distinto de lo que yo había esperado.

english: I invited him to the party and he accepted.
spanish: Lo invité a la fiesta, y él aceptó.

english: What has she done today?
spanish: ¿Qué ha hecho hoy?

english: He was petting the dog.
spanish: Acariciaba al perro.

english: Tom is on the back porch.
spanish: Tom está en el porche de atrás.

english: The truth can be more painful than a lie.
spanish: La verdad puede ser más dolorosa que la mentira.

english: Don't make me do this.
spanish: No me hagas hacer esto.

english: Lenin ordered them to rebel.
spanish: Lenin les ordenó que se rebelaran.

english: Let me congratulate you on your victory in the tournament.
spanish: Felicitaciones por su victoria en el torneo.

english: I don't expect you'd remember.
spanish: No espero que lo recordarías.

english: He came and had dinner with us.
spanish: Él vino y cenó con nosotros.

english: I'm doing this for you.
spanish: Hago esto por ti.

english: I met a dog on my way home.
spanish: Me encontré con un perro de camino a casa.

english: French and Arabic are spoken in this country.
spanish: En este país se habla francés y árabe.

english: My friend is studying Korean.
spanish: Mi amigo está estudiando coreano.

english: Please cut the cake with a knife.
spanish: Corta la tarta con un cuchillo, por favor.

english: I paid $200 for this bag.
spanish: Pagué 200 dólares por esta bolsa.

english: I learned that when I was in high school.
spanish: Aprendí eso cuando estaba en la prepa.

english: We thought we had the game in the bag.
spanish: Pensábamos que teníamos el juego en la bolsa.

english: I go to church once in a blue moon.
spanish: No voy casi nunca a la iglesia.

english: Good movies broaden your horizons.
spanish: Las buenas películas ensanchan tus horizontes.

english: This problem is a real challenge.
spanish: Este problema es un verdadero desafío.

english: Is this fish still alive?
spanish: ¿Este pez sigue vivo?

english: Tom is a doctor now.
spanish: Tom es médico ahora.

english: He is listening to the radio.
spanish: Él está escuchando la radio.

english: Mother bought my brother a yellow umbrella.
spanish: Mi mamá le compró un paraguas amarillo a mi hermano.

english: There is a girl reading under a tree.
spanish: Hay una niña leyendo bajo un árbol.

english: It's no use talking to Tom.
spanish: No sirve de nada hablar con Tom.

english: I like to travel by train.
spanish: Me gusta andar en tren.

english: Tom decided that he wanted to live in Boston.
spanish: Tom decidió que quería vivir en Boston.

english: What's your favorite breakfast food?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu desayuno favorito?

english: Can you wrap it up for me? It's a gift.
spanish: ¿Puede envolvérmelo para regalo?

english: I made a fool of myself.
spanish: Hice el ridículo.

english: I spent the entire day on the beach.
spanish: Pasé todo el día en la playa.

english: He stabbed me in the back!
spanish: ¡Me apuñaló por la espalda!

english: It wouldn't have been safe to do that.
spanish: No habría sido seguro hacerlo.

english: They are in favor of your plan.
spanish: Ellos están a favor de vuestro plan.

english: The thief was bound hand and foot.
spanish: Ataron al ladrón de manos y pies.

english: The mid-term exams are just around the corner.
spanish: Los exámenes de mitad de año están a la vuelta de la esquina.

english: He works in order to forget.
spanish: Él trabaja para olvidar.

english: You must have the report done by Monday.
spanish: Tienes que haber terminado el artículo para el lunes.

english: Tom comes to Boston every two months.
spanish: Tom viene cada dos meses a Boston.

english: Pork has a lot of fat.
spanish: La carne de cerdo tiene mucha grasa.

english: I kept walking to the car.
spanish: Seguí caminando hacia el coche.

english: He is too drunk to drive home.
spanish: Él está demasiado borracho para irse conduciendo a su casa.

english: Tom is blind in one eye.
spanish: Tom es ciego de un ojo.

english: We went swimming in the lake.
spanish: Fuimos a nadar al lago.

english: There used to be a church here.
spanish: Aquí solía haber una iglesia.

english: The product is guaranteed to be free from defects.
spanish: Garantizan que el producto se halla libre de defectos.

english: He carried out his mission very well.
spanish: Desempeñó muy bien su misión.

english: Even his teacher didn't understand him.
spanish: Ni siquiera su maestro lo entendía.

english: See you tomorrow at the office.
spanish: Te veo mañana en una oficina.

english: She thought for a few minutes.
spanish: Ella meditó por unos minutos.

english: Tom wants to kill Mary.
spanish: Tom quiere matar a Mary.

english: The boys are still playing in the sandbox.
spanish: Los chicos todavía están jugando en el arenero.

english: I assume you're referring to what happened here recently.
spanish: Asumo que te refieres a lo que pasó aquí recientemente.

english: Do you have enough blankets?
spanish: ¿Tienes suficientes mantas?

english: Press the red button if something strange happens.
spanish: Pulsa el botón rojo si pasa algo raro.

english: Tom won't be able to understand any of this.
spanish: Tom no podrá entender nada de esto.

english: I did that today for the first time.
spanish: Lo he hecho hoy por primera vez.

english: I fell asleep while watching TV.
spanish: Me quedé dormido viendo televisión.

english: Write it down here, please.
spanish: Escriba aquí, por favor.

english: I did exactly what I said I would do.
spanish: Hice exactamente lo que dije que haría.

english: His story must be true.
spanish: Su historia debe de ser verdad.

english: Turn down the volume, please.
spanish: Por favor, baja el volumen.

english: She is a slow runner.
spanish: Ella es una corredora lenta.

english: My cat is following me.
spanish: Mi gato me está siguiendo.

english: Please paint the door white.
spanish: Pinta la puerta de blanco, por favor.

english: We could learn a lot from each other.
spanish: Podríamos aprender mucho la una de la otra.

english: She has a pure heart.
spanish: Ella tiene un corazón puro.

english: How long will you be staying here?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo va a quedarse aquí?

english: I don't feel like going out this morning.
spanish: Esta mañana no tengo ganas de salir.

english: That is the funniest joke that I have ever heard.
spanish: Es la broma más divertida que he escuchado alguna vez.

english: Why don't you leave, Tom?
spanish: ¿Por qué no te vas, Tom?

english: He's three years older than her.
spanish: Él tiene tres años más que ella.

english: I wish I could speak French like a native speaker.
spanish: Ojalá hablara francés como un nativo.

english: You've got to sign your name.
spanish: Tienes que firmar con tu nombre.

english: Tell me you love me.
spanish: Dime que me quieres.

english: I asked her to dance.
spanish: La saqué a bailar.

english: Do you want some scrambled eggs?
spanish: ¿Quieres unos huevos revueltos?

english: He seems to have left the country.
spanish: Parece que él ha salido del país.

english: You should eat more vegetables.
spanish: Deberías comer más vegetales.

english: I have to take medicine.
spanish: Tengo que tomar un medicamento.

english: I don't want to think about what could've happened.
spanish: No quiero pensar en lo que podría haber pasado.

english: How many of you are there?
spanish: ¿Cuántos sois?

english: Not all baby animals are cute.
spanish: No todas las crías de animales son bonitas.

english: What's the number for the Tokyo Dome?
spanish: ¿Cuál es el número telefónico del Tokio Domo?

english: He was condemned to death.
spanish: Él fue condenado a muerte.

english: Tom is too honest a boy to tell a lie.
spanish: Tom es un niño demasiado honesto para mentir.

english: Tom was leaning on the fence.
spanish: Tom estaba apoyado sobre la valla.

english: This desk is better than that one.
spanish: Este escritorio es mejor que ése.

english: I don't even know where Tom is now.
spanish: Ni siquiera sé dónde está Tom ahora.

english: Do you prefer red or white wine?
spanish: ¿Preferís vino rojo o vino blanco?

english: A girl approached the king from among the crowd.
spanish: Una niña se acercó al rey en medio de la multitud.

english: I'll accompany you to the station.
spanish: Te voy a acompañar a la estación.

english: A fence runs around the house.
spanish: Una valla rodea la casa.

english: I squeezed the juice out of the oranges.
spanish: Yo les exprimí el jugo a las naranjas.

english: Why are you telling me all this?
spanish: ¿Por qué me dices todo esto?

english: Tom clearly doesn't want to be doing this.
spanish: Tom definitivamente no desea estar haciendo esto.

english: Would you like to have tea with us this afternoon?
spanish: ¿Te gustaría tomar el té con nosotros esta tarde?

english: You like English, don't you?
spanish: Te gusta el inglés, ¿no es cierto?

english: I have to give back the book before Saturday.
spanish: Tengo que devolver el libro antes del sábado.

english: Tom has three older brothers.
spanish: Tom tiene tres hermanos mayores.

english: Excuse me. Can you speak English?
spanish: Disculpe. ¿Usted habla inglés?

english: Do you like the new school better?
spanish: ¿Te gusta más la nueva escuela?

english: Do you know which road leads to my house?
spanish: ¿Sabe qué calle lleva a mi casa?

english: He tapped me on the shoulder.
spanish: Él me dio una palmada en el hombro.

english: Science can be used for good or evil purposes.
spanish: La ciencia puede ser usada para propósitos buenos o malvados.

english: I called Tom and pretended to be you.
spanish: Llamé a Tom y me hice pasar por ti.

english: We're running out of water.
spanish: Se nos está acabando el agua.

english: You ran as fast as you could.
spanish: Corrió tan rápido como pudo.

english: I want to know if it's close.
spanish: Quiero saber si está cerca.

english: Everyone came except for Tom.
spanish: Todos vinieron menos Tomás.

english: He believed they were destroying it.
spanish: Él creyó que lo estaban destruyendo.

english: Men like to look masculine.
spanish: A los hombres les gusta lucir varoniles.

english: I'm not going to let you do that.
spanish: No voy a dejar que hagas eso.

english: I would do anything but that.
spanish: Haría cualquier cosa menos eso.

english: Tom teaches me French twice a week.
spanish: Tom me enseña francés dos veces por semana.

english: Tom could sense that Mary was trying to impress him.
spanish: Tom podía sentir que Mary estaba tratando de impresionarle.

english: I'm not able to do that on my own.
spanish: No soy capaz de hacer eso yo solo.

english: My father is a bit old-fashioned.
spanish: Mi padre es un poco anticuado.

english: You'd better go back home now.
spanish: Mejor váyanse a casa ya.

english: Their wedding will be tomorrow.
spanish: Su boda será mañana.

english: The children made sculptures out of wire.
spanish: Los niños hicieron esculturas de alambre.

english: Tom is definitely up to something.
spanish: Tom definitivamente está planeando algo.

english: I'll be ready by Monday.
spanish: Estaré listo para el lunes.

english: There is no scientific basis for these claims.
spanish: No hay un trasfondo científico para sostener estas posturas.

english: Tom and Mary are trying to sell their house.
spanish: Tom y Mary están tratando de vender su casa.

english: I won't unload the car because that's somebody else's job.
spanish: No quiero descargar el coche porque ese es el trabajo de otro.

english: I never gave up hope.
spanish: Nunca perdí las esperanzas.

english: Tom has never killed anybody.
spanish: Tom nunca mató a nadie.

english: Tom ran back to the village.
spanish: Tom corrió de regreso a la villa.

english: I chose between two options.
spanish: Elegí entre las dos alternativas.

english: We don't hear a thing.
spanish: No oímos nada.

english: What was the cause of his delay?
spanish: ¿Cuál fue la causa de su retraso?

english: Her hobby was collecting old coins.
spanish: Su pasatiempo era coleccionar monedas antiguas.

english: I mentioned your name to him.
spanish: Le mencioné tu nombre a él.

english: Our son was killed in the war.
spanish: Nuestro hijo murió en batalla.

english: He made fun of our ignorance.
spanish: Se burló de nuestra ignorancia.

english: A few of these are mine.
spanish: Unas cuantas de éstas son mías.

english: I've read every one of those books.
spanish: He leído todos esos libros.

english: Tell them to give it to you.
spanish: Diles que te lo den.

english: I have the complete works of Shakespeare.
spanish: Tengo las obras completas de Shakespeare.

english: These measures can prevent the disease from spreading.
spanish: Estas medidas pueden impedir la propagación de la enfermedad.

english: We must protect the children.
spanish: Debemos proteger a los niños.

english: She became more and more beautiful as she grew older.
spanish: Ella se volvía más y más bella con los años.

english: What time do you usually have breakfast?
spanish: ¿A qué hora desayunas normalmente?

english: Don't be afraid to ask questions.
spanish: No tenga miedo de hacer preguntas.

english: When Tom was young, he ate three eggs every day.
spanish: Cuando Tom era joven, se comía tres huevos al día.

english: This book belongs to you.
spanish: Este libro es tuyo.

english: I don't really understand this part.
spanish: En realidad no comprendo esta parte.

english: Many young men went to war.
spanish: Muchos jóvenes fueron a la guerra.

english: If they don't want this, then what do they want?
spanish: Si no quieren esto, ¿qué es lo que quieren?

english: Please let me eat in peace.
spanish: Por favor, déjame comer tranquila.

english: I'm going to take the dog to the vet.
spanish: Voy a ir a llevar al perro al veterinario.

english: Do you have any plans for the summer vacation?
spanish: ¿Tienes planes para las vacaciones de verano?

english: Say what you want to say.
spanish: Decí lo que querés decir.

english: You can't go in with this.
spanish: No puedes entrar con esto.

english: I used to respect you.
spanish: Antes te respetaba.

english: Students have access to these computers.
spanish: Los estudiantes tienen acceso a estos computadores.

english: I spent the whole afternoon chatting with friends.
spanish: Estuve toda la tarde charlando con amigos.

english: The sun appeared on the horizon.
spanish: El sol apareció en el horizonte.

english: It was made to look like an accident.
spanish: Fue planeado para que pareciera un accidente.

english: That is the house where I was born.
spanish: Ésa es la casa en que nací.

english: How many English words do you know?
spanish: ¿Cuántas palabras en inglés conoce?

english: When he came to, he was lying in the park.
spanish: Cuando volvió en sí, estaba tirado en el parque.

english: I have nothing to complain about.
spanish: No tengo nada de qué quejarme.

english: Where can I buy silk?
spanish: ¿En dónde puedo comprar seda?

english: Somebody took away my bag.
spanish: Alguien se llevó mi mochila.

english: Sometimes I wonder if I shouldn't have stayed in Boston.
spanish: A veces me pregunto si me debería haber quedado en Boston.

english: She gave him a watch.
spanish: Le dio un reloj.

english: Have you ever been to Canada?
spanish: ¿Has estado alguna vez en Canadá?

english: It's your turn to shuffle.
spanish: Es tu turno de barajar.

english: How come you didn't call me last night?
spanish: ¿Por qué no me llamaste ayer por la noche?

english: That was a month ago.
spanish: Fue hace un mes.

english: Tom doesn't like working here.
spanish: A Tom no le gusta trabajar aquí.

english: Tom refused to follow Mary's advice.
spanish: Tom se negó a seguir el consejo de Mary.

english: Tom asked me if I wanted another beer.
spanish: Tom me preguntó si quería otra cerveza.

english: He had an unpleasant expression on his face.
spanish: Tenía mal gesto.

english: The plane was approaching London.
spanish: El avión se aproximaba a Londres.

english: I am eating a cucumber.
spanish: Estoy comiendo un pepino.

english: Is it true that you're going to study in Boston?
spanish: ¿Es cierto que te irás a estudiar a Boston?

english: He doesn't want to live in the city.
spanish: Él no quiere vivir en la ciudad.

english: I have an exam on Monday.
spanish: Tengo un examen el lunes.

english: I will stop him from going.
spanish: Impediré que él vaya.

english: I don't want to drink anything.
spanish: No quiero beber nada.

english: Did you receive the letter?
spanish: ¿Recibiste la carta?

english: What would you say to convince him to buy one?
spanish: ¿Qué le dirías para convencerlo de que compre uno?

english: Tom and Mary hugged each other.
spanish: Tom y Mary se abrazaron.

english: It used to be thought that the earth was flat.
spanish: Solía pensarse que la Tierra era plana.

english: Many workers were trapped in the coal mine.
spanish: Muchos trabajadores quedaron atrapados en la mina de carbón.

english: Tom asked me if I was tired.
spanish: Tom me preguntó si estaba cansado.

english: Which one are you going to use?
spanish: ¿Cuál vas a utilizar?

english: The president will hold a press conference later today.
spanish: El presidente dará una conferencia de prensa hoy más tarde.

english: Do you like French wines?
spanish: ¿Te gusta el vino francés?

english: She heard him scream, so she ran into his bedroom.
spanish: Ella lo oyó gritar, así que entró corriendo a su habitación.

english: She decided on a blue dress.
spanish: Ella se decantó por un vestido azul.

english: I wish my father had lived longer.
spanish: Ojalá mi padre hubiera vivido más.

english: Japan should not spend much money on weapons.
spanish: Japón no debería gastar mucho dinero en armas.

english: This is not what I ordered.
spanish: Esto no es lo que había pedido.

english: Give me an example. I don't understand.
spanish: Déme usted un ejemplo porque no entiendo.

english: I have an old car.
spanish: Tengo un coche viejo.

english: Did you want to see me?

english: My mother has cooked ten eggs.
spanish: Mi madre cocinó diez huevos.

english: Did you leave a tip?

english: Fir trees are often used as Christmas trees.
spanish: Los abetos se utilizan a menudo como árboles de Navidad.

english: He turned around and looked back.
spanish: Él se volteó y miró hacia atrás.

english: Tom got off his stool.
spanish: Tom se bajó de su taburete.

english: What do you say to a beer?

english: Hurry up. You'll be late for school.
spanish: Apresúrate. Vas a llegar tarde al colegio.

english: I'd be crazy to expect such a thing.
spanish: Tendría que estar loco para esperar semejante cosa.

english: He wants to learn to swim.
spanish: Él quiere aprender a nadar.

english: The policeman grabbed the robber's arm.
spanish: El policía agarró al ladrón por el brazo.

english: Are you good at mathematics?

english: Tom lived in Boston for a few years.
spanish: Tom vivió unos años en Boston.

english: She has a strong personality.
spanish: Ella tiene una personalidad fuerte.

english: How old is this airplane?

english: I bet you're a great teacher.
spanish: Apuesto a que eres un excelente profesor.

english: I'll call you at noon.

english: Please take Tom with you.
spanish: Por favor vaya con Tom.

english: I ordered Tom to do it.

english: I didn't want to say anything.
spanish: No quise decir nada.

english: We have broken off relations with them.
spanish: Hemos roto relaciones con ellos.

english: Thank you for asking this question.
spanish: Gracias por hacer esta pregunta.

english: He is capable of teaching French.
spanish: Es capaz de enseñar francés.

english: You weren't supposed to come today.
spanish: No se suponía que viniera hoy.

english: I don't want to take such a risk.
spanish: No quiero tomar un riesgo así.

english: It's easy for monkeys to climb trees.
spanish: Para los monos es sencillo trepar árboles.

english: Tom is a pastry chef.
spanish: Tomás es maestro pastelero.

english: It's a pity that he can't get married to her.
spanish: Es una pena que él no se pueda casar con ella.

english: This week I had three midterms.
spanish: Esta semana hay tres exámenes parciales.

english: Your income is about twice as large as mine.
spanish: Tus ingresos son sobre el doble de grandes que los míos.

english: For me, time is not money.
spanish: Para mí, el tiempo no es dinero.

english: Do you know the way?

english: He could not hold back his tears.
spanish: Él no podía contener sus lágrimas.

english: I've got to get some sleep.
spanish: Necesito dormir un poco.

english: Tom is being hunted by the police.
spanish: Tom está siendo perseguido por la policía.

english: Can you speak more slowly?

english: Tom will always be here for you.
spanish: Tom siempre va a estar aquí para ti.

english: I like talking to you.
spanish: Me gusta platicar contigo.

english: She doesn't listen to music at all.
spanish: Ella no escucha ni un poco de música.

english: I think that he is right.
spanish: Creo que él tiene razón.

english: I gave my books to those people.
spanish: Le di mis libros a esa gente.

english: The boy spilled the ink, but he didn't mean to.
spanish: El niño derramó la tinta, pero no fue a propósito.

english: I knew you'd come home.
spanish: Sabía que vendrías a casa.

english: Tom thought that Africa was a country.
spanish: Tom pensó que África era un país.

english: Would you like more mashed potatoes?
spanish: ¿Te gustaría más puré de papas?

english: I wouldn't worry about it if I were you.

english: Tell me how long that boy has been sitting there.
spanish: Dime cuánto tiempo ha estado ese chico sentado allí.

english: We flew from Boston to Chicago.
spanish: Volamos desde Boston a Chicago.

english: You must help your mother.
spanish: Tienes que ayudar a tu madre.

english: He can drive a car.

english: I stood aside to let them pass.
spanish: Me aparté a un lado para dejarles pasar.

english: I don't care what they say.

english: He was sentenced to prison.

english: I'll call you on Monday.
spanish: Te llamaré el lunes.

english: She kept on talking while eating.
spanish: Ella seguía hablando mientras comía.

spanish: Tom va a la iglesia todos los domingos por la mañana.

english: I've written down all the numbers up to thirty-one.
spanish: He escrito todos los números hasta el treinta y uno.

english: I'm going to Australia next year.
spanish: Voy a ir a Australia el año que viene.

english: I have some information for you.

english: I shouldn't have stayed up all night.
spanish: No debería haberme quedado despierto toda la noche.

english: I wanted to be there.
spanish: Yo quería estar ahí.

english: Do you think her story is false?

spanish: Domínese, no se ponga usted así.

english: Is Tom over there with you?
spanish: ¿Está Tom allí contigo?

spanish: ¿Todavía estás enamorado de Tom?

english: Tom asked Mary about John.
spanish: Tom le preguntó a Mary acerca de John.

english: I'm going to go on a picnic tomorrow.
spanish: Mañana me voy de picnic.

english: I thought you said you weren't interested.
spanish: Pensé que habías dicho que no estabas interesado.

english: Tom made a stupid decision.
spanish: Tom tomó una decisión estúpida.

english: I gave Tom a sedative.
spanish: Le di a Tom un sedante.

english: Did you see the shooter's face?
spanish: ¿Viste la cara del que disparó?

english: I am a teacher of English.
spanish: Soy profesor de inglés.

english: I saw him caught by the police.
spanish: Lo vi arrestado por la policía.

english: Tom is a great motocross rider.
spanish: Tom es un gran motociclista.

english: Did Tom let Mary drive his car?
spanish: ¿Acaso Tom dejó a Mary conducir su auto?

english: Someone like you can change the world.
spanish: Alguien como tú puede cambiar el mundo.

english: You should ask Mary out on a date.
spanish: Deberías pedirle a Mary que saliera contigo.

english: It isn't easy to teach little kids.
spanish: No es fácil enseñar a niños pequeños.

english: Tom never saw Mary again.
spanish: Tom nunca vio a Mary de nuevo.

english: Do I have to wear a tie at work?
spanish: ¿Debo usar una corbata en el trabajo?

english: People normally breathe 12 to 20 times a minute.
spanish: La gente normalmente respira de 12 a 20 veces por minuto.

english: Tom didn't want to dance with me.
spanish: Tom no quiso bailar conmigo.

english: That farm belongs to Tom.
spanish: Esa granja pertenece a Tom.

english: Tom doesn't want to compromise.
spanish: Tom no quiere comprometerse.

english: Tom prepared lunch for Mary.
spanish: Tom preparó almuerzo para Mary.

english: Tom introduced me to his roommate.
spanish: Tom me presentó a su compañero de habitación.

english: This radio is no bigger than a matchbox.
spanish: Esta radio no es más grande que una caja de cerillas.

english: I can't believe you did this by yourself.
spanish: No puedo creer que tú hayas hecho esto solo.

english: I don't need your permission.
spanish: No necesito tu permiso.

english: Tom is a good friend.
spanish: Tom es un buen amigo.

english: I'll try my best today, too.
spanish: Hoy también lo haré lo mejor que pueda.

english: Don't you want to walk again?
spanish: ¿Quieres dar otra vuelta?

english: This is the least expensive method of all.
spanish: Este es el método menos caro de todos.

english: This old book is worth 50,000 yen.
spanish: Este libro viejo vale 50.000 yenes.

english: No one told me about that.
spanish: Nadie me habló acerca de eso.

english: Tom's daughter's boyfriend is Canadian.
spanish: El novio de la hija de Tom es canadiense.

english: Something is very wrong here.
spanish: Algo anda muy mal aquí.

english: Tell me where you were born.
spanish: Dime dónde naciste.

english: I am mopping my room.
spanish: Estoy trapeando mi cuarto.

english: In high altitudes, people find it hard to breathe.
spanish: En grandes altitudes la gente encuentra difícil respirar.

english: When it comes to cooking, no one can beat me.
spanish: Nadie me gana cocinando.

english: There's an old movie theater in town.
spanish: Hay un viejo cine en la ciudad.

english: We really need a man like you here.
spanish: Realmente necesitamos a un hombre como tú aquí.

english: You've drunk three cups of coffee.
spanish: Has bebido tres tazas de café.

english: I started studying French when I was thirteen.
spanish: Empecé a aprender francés a los trece años.

english: He gave me a curt answer.
spanish: Me dio una respuesta cortante.

spanish: Creo que Tom vive por aquí cerca.

english: Tom spent time with Mary.
spanish: Tom pasó tiempo con Mary.

english: You are not a student.
spanish: Tú no eres un estudiante.

english: She called up her mother on the phone.
spanish: Ella llamó a su madre al teléfono.

english: What would you do if you were ten years younger?
spanish: ¿Qué harías si tuvieras diez años menos?

english: Tom doesn't want to argue with you.
spanish: Tom no quiere discutir con vosotros.

english: I can't stand this pain any more.
spanish: No aguanto más este dolor.

spanish: Al menos intenté hacer algo.

english: I want to be able to read French.
spanish: Quiero ser capaz de leer en francés.

english: Where does that road lead?
spanish: ¿A dónde va ese camino?

english: Tom couldn't keep from smiling.
spanish: Tom no podía contener su sonrisa.

english: Are you flirting with me?
spanish: ¿Me estás zorreando?

spanish: ¿Qué significa esto?

spanish: Ya veo que no me crees.

english: It could be a trap.

english: My brother is a college student.
spanish: Mi hermano es estudiante de universidad.

english: The truth is that we can't live without air.

english: I have to prepare for the test.
spanish: Me tengo que preparar para el examen.

english: I should probably just toss this in the trash.
spanish: Probablemente debería tirar esto a la basura.

english: If I find your passport, I'll call you.
spanish: Si encuentro tu pasaporte, te llamaré.

english: I have not finished breakfast yet.
spanish: Todavía no he acabado de desayunar.

english: The party was a great success.
spanish: La fiesta fue un gran éxito.

spanish: Ese tipo me enloquece.

english: Tom didn't participate in the discussion.
spanish: Tom no participó en la discusión.

english: His mother died when he was eleven years old.

spanish: Tom se va a divorciar.

english: I stay at home on Sundays.
spanish: Me quedo en casa los domingos.

english: Teaching children is easier than teaching adults.
spanish: Enseñarle a los niños es más fácil que a los adultos.

spanish: Tom dejó solos a Mary y John momentáneamente.

english: Do you know what Tom looks like?
spanish: ¿Tú sabes cómo luce Tom?

spanish: Tom quiere vivir en el campo.

english: He crushed the sheet of paper up into a ball.

english: I don't like this one.

english: There are only two seasons in the tropics.
spanish: En los trópicos hay sólo dos estaciones.

english: It sounds like the faucet is dripping.
spanish: Suena como si goteara el grifo.

english: Let's see if that works.

spanish: ¿Cuál es tu juego favorito para jugar con amigos?

spanish: No me gusta viajar con grupos grandes.

spanish: ¿Por qué ella pidió nuestra ayuda?

english: I weigh a lot more than you do.
spanish: Peso bastante más de lo que tú pesas.

english: The youngest daughter was particularly beautiful.
spanish: La menor de las hijas era particularmente hermosa.

english: My mother bought me a new bicycle.
spanish: Mi madre me compró una bicicleta nueva.

english: Tom is on a winning streak.

spanish: Tu oficina no es tan grande como la mía.

english: It is restful, isn't it?

english: Tom taught Mary how to bake bread.
spanish: Tom le enseñó a Mary a hornear pan.

spanish: Esta canción me recuerda a mi infancia.

english: It is important that you should be punctual.
spanish: Es importante que sea puntual.

english: My wallet was stolen yesterday.

spanish: Ese libro ha contribuido mucho a divulgar la química.

english: He's as blind as a bat.

english: They were not listening to music.
spanish: Ellos no estaban escuchando música.

english: I'd like to sit further back.

spanish: Tom echó a María del bar.

english: It's not an easy sport.
spanish: No es un deporte fácil.

spanish: Los tres miraron a Tom.

spanish: Esto hace que me hierva la sangre.

english: I was eating dinner then.
spanish: En ese momento estaba cenando.

english: What time will the bus pick us up?
spanish: ¿A qué hora nos recogerá el autobús?

english: We'll give you anything you want.

english: I want to do it again.

spanish: Así es como yo resolví el intrincado problema.

spanish: El extraño estaba demasiado sorprendido para hablar.

english: My husband always reads in bed.
spanish: Mi marido lee siempre en la cama.

english: He gathered the courage to decline the offer.
spanish: Él juntó el coraje para rechazar su oferta.

english: This website is very useful.
spanish: Este sitio es muy útil.

english: It's the shortest route to Paris.
spanish: Es la ruta más corta a París.

english: Tom had no problem doing it.
spanish: Tom no tuvo problema en hacerlo.

english: I like meat better than fish.
spanish: Me gusta más la carne que el pescado.

english: You know where everything is.
spanish: Sabes donde está todo.

english: You're stronger than the rest of us.
spanish: Tú eres más fuerte que el resto de nosotros.

english: You're both acting like children.
spanish: Ambos están actuando como niños.

english: Tom said he didn't want anything to eat.
spanish: Tom dijo que no quería nada de comer.

english: How did Tom find out?
spanish: ¿Cómo lo averiguó Tom?

english: What will become of Japan?
spanish: ¿Qué será de Japón?

english: Tom carefully read over the contract.
spanish: Tom leyó atentamente el contrato.

english: His girlfriend has lost weight.
spanish: Su novia perdió peso.

english: Why don't you put your clothes back on?
spanish: ¿Por qué no te vuelves a poner la ropa?

english: Suppose you had ten million yen, what would you do?
spanish: Supón que tuvieras diez millones de yenes, ¿qué harías?

english: All my friends like playing videogames.
spanish: A todos mis amigos les gustan los videojuegos.

english: He heard the dog barking.
spanish: Oyó al perro ladrar.

english: Do you know how to get there?
spanish: ¿Sabes cómo se llega allí?

english: I live near where I work.
spanish: Vivo cerca del trabajo.

english: I work as a consultant.
spanish: Trabajo como asesor.

english: Tom has never had the chance to do that.
spanish: Tom nunca ha tenido la oportunidad de hacer eso.

english: He lives in Tokyo now.
spanish: Ahora él vive en Tokio.

english: I asked Tom why he had never gotten married.
spanish: Pregunté a Tom por qué no se había casado nunca.

english: He did not know where to go.
spanish: No sabía adónde ir.

english: I left Shanghai last year and I've never been back.
spanish: Me fui de Shanghái el año pasado y no he vuelto.

english: Tom had a very good night.
spanish: Tom tuvo una noche muy buena.

english: Tom now works for Mary.
spanish: Ahora Tom trabaja para Mary.

english: How do you spell that word?
spanish: ¿Cómo se deletrea esa palabra?

english: You haven't got a chance.
spanish: No tienes oportunidad.

english: I remember meeting you before.
spanish: Me acuerdo de haberte conocido antes.

english: Franklin Roosevelt became president in 1933.
spanish: Franklin Roosevelt se hizo presidente en 1933.

english: She introduced me to her sister.
spanish: Ella me presentó a su hermana.

english: Tom wasn't supposed to be here until after Mary arrived.
spanish: Se suponía que Tom no estaría aquí hasta que llegase Mary.

english: Set the alarm clock for seven o'clock.
spanish: Ponga el despertador a las siete.

english: It's been a hard year.
spanish: Ha sido un año difícil.

english: I do not like to make mistakes.
spanish: No me gusta cometer errores.

english: I grew up in the country.
spanish: Yo crecí en el campo.

english: I need you to leave now.
spanish: Necesito que te vayas ahora.

english: Tom goes to work by motorcycle.
spanish: Tom va a trabajar en moto.

english: I will definitely attend your funeral.
spanish: Yo definitivamente asistiré a tu funeral.

english: I got some help from a friend.
spanish: Yo obtuve alguna ayuda de un amigo.

english: I wonder if this is love.
spanish: Me pregunto si esto será amor.

english: Tom doesn't know what Mary has to do.
spanish: Tom no conoce lo que Mary tiene por hacer.

english: There's something I want you to hear.
spanish: Hay algo que quiero que oigas.

english: Tom stood in the middle of the room.
spanish: Tom estaba de pie en el centro del cuarto.

english: Where have you been hiding?
spanish: ¿Donde te has estado escondiendo?

english: It is the oldest wooden building in existence.
spanish: Es el edificio de madera más antiguo que existe.

english: I was in bed all day long yesterday.
spanish: Ayer me pasé todo el día en la cama.

english: This road goes to the city.
spanish: Este camino conduce a la ciudad.

english: Could you please take me home?
spanish: ¿Me puedes llevar a casa por favor?

english: At the sight of the dog, the cat ran off.
spanish: El gato se fue corriendo al ver al perro.

english: Don't leave the bedroom window open.
spanish: No dejes la ventana del cuarto abierta.

english: Tom bought his ticket twenty minutes ago.
spanish: Tom compró su entrada hace veinte minutos.

english: I'm not happy with how things turned out.
spanish: No estoy contento de cómo salieron las cosas.

english: How did you come up with that idea?
spanish: ¿Cómo llegaste a esa idea?

english: Tom isn't a good singer.
spanish: Tomás no es un buen cantante.

english: Are you afraid of Tom?
spanish: ¿Tienes miedo de Tom?

english: Do you want beef or pork?
spanish: ¿Quieren ustedes carne de vaca o de cerdo?

english: She came back before eight.
spanish: Ella regresó antes de las ocho.

english: Tom is dumb and immature.
spanish: Tom es estúpido e inmaduro.

english: Tom concluded his speech with a proverb.
spanish: Tom concluyó su discurso con un proverbio.

english: I had the porter carry my suitcase.
spanish: El mozo me llevó la maleta.

english: I keep fit by jogging every morning.
spanish: Me mantengo en forma trotando todas las mañanas.

english: He was playing with a toy.
spanish: Estaba jugando con un juguete.

spanish: Es nuestra obligación ayudarnos el uno al otro.

spanish: Creo que has respondido a todas mis preguntas.

english: We pledged our support to the candidate.
spanish: Prometimos nuestro apoyo al candidato.

english: I had to stay home.

spanish: Sé que te decepciono a veces.
