english: I can't stand the sight of blood.
spanish: No soporto ver sangre.

english: Tom has a very large ego.
spanish: Tom tiene un ego enorme.

english: I must have lost it.
spanish: Debo de haberlo perdido.

english: I don't want to break my promise.
spanish: Yo no quiero romper mi promesa.

english: He is watching TV now.
spanish: Ahora está viendo la televisión.

english: I'll be back in half an hour.
spanish: Vuelvo en media hora.

english: I am impatient with his inability to make decisions.
spanish: Su incapacidad para tomar decisiones me impacienta.

english: Tom was sick, so he couldn't come.
spanish: Tom estaba enfermo, así que no pudo venir.

english: Dirty drinking water can cause sickness.
spanish: El agua potable sucia puede provocar enfermedades.

english: She is always free in the afternoon.
spanish: Ella siempre está libre en la tarde.

english: The sister of your father or mother is your aunt.
spanish: La hermana de su padre o de su madre es su tía.

english: It's just a matter of time.
spanish: Es solo cuestión de tiempo.

english: How many kids do you have?
spanish: ¿Cuántos niños tienes?

english: Tom has broken something again.
spanish: Tomás de nuevo ha roto algo.

english: I wasn't the only one who didn't know Tom.
spanish: No era el único que no conocía a Tom.

english: Tom wants to see Mary again.
spanish: Tom quiere ver a Mary otra vez.

english: My life was in danger.
spanish: Mi vida estaba en peligro.

english: I'd like a room facing the garden.
spanish: Desearía una habitación con vistas al jardín.

english: The food wasn't that great.
spanish: La comida no era tan buena.

english: She was bitten by a wild animal.
spanish: Fue mordida por un animal salvaje.

english: Did you buy a washing machine?
spanish: ¿Compraste un lavarropa?

english: You've invited your friends too, haven't you?
spanish: Tú también has invitado a tus amigos, ¿verdad?

english: I don't like the way she speaks.
spanish: No me gusta su forma de hablar.

english: I'll be back in three hours.
spanish: Regresaré en tres horas.

english: This is a new type of car.
spanish: Este es un nuevo tipo de coche.

english: Is it true that you were absent yesterday?
spanish: ¿Es cierto que estuviste ausente ayer?

english: One must observe the rules.
spanish: Hay que cumplir las reglas.

english: Please tell Tom that Mary called.
spanish: Por favor decile a Tom que Mary llamó.

english: This book is very small.
spanish: Este libro es muy pequeño.

english: Please try to be as brief as possible.
spanish: Por favor trata de ser lo más breve posible.

english: She seems to get fatter and fatter.
spanish: Parece estar poniéndose cada vez más gorda.

english: I didn't care what I had to do.
spanish: No me importaba lo que tenía que hacer.

english: Can the report be true?
spanish: ¿Podrá ser cierto el reporte?

english: This is the church where we got married.
spanish: Esta es la iglesia en la que nos casamos.

english: I was taken to a circus for the first time.
spanish: Me llevaron al circo por primera vez.

english: I saw him twice today.
spanish: Hoy le he visto dos veces.

english: Those children always get into trouble with their parents.
spanish: Esos niños siempre se meten en problemas con sus padres.

english: Tom said that he thought Mary understood.
spanish: Tom dijo que el creyó que Mary entendía.

english: I'll explain it to you.
spanish: Te lo explicaré.

english: I'm happy for the first time in life.
spanish: Por primera vez en la vida soy feliz.

english: I cannot speak Mandarin well.
spanish: No puedo hablar bien Mandarín.

english: He does not live there any more.
spanish: Él ya no vive ahí.

english: I'm moving as fast as I can.
spanish: Me muevo tan rápido como puedo.

english: Tom often drinks a little wine after dinner.
spanish: Tom a menudo toma un poco de vino después de cenar.

english: I'm sure you'll tell me what I want to know.
spanish: Estoy seguro de que me vas a decir lo que quiero saber.

english: I did it on my own.
spanish: Lo hice yo sola.

english: We don't really know anything about death.
spanish: Realmente no se sabe nada acerca de la muerte.

english: I would like something to drink.
spanish: Me gustaría tomar algo.

english: Are you listening to me at all?
spanish: ¿Acaso me estás escuchando?

english: The pizza's on the way.
spanish: La pizza está en camino.

english: He was a fresh face in American politics.
spanish: Él era un rostro nuevo en la política estadounidense.

english: I've been in Boston for less than a month.
spanish: Llevo en Boston menos de un mes.

english: I know it's not impossible.
spanish: Sé que no es imposible.

english: I just want you to scare Tom.
spanish: Solo quiero que asustes a Tom.

english: He likes his school a lot.
spanish: A él le encanta su escuela.

english: Mary can cook anything without using a recipe.
spanish: Mary puede cocinar de todo sin utilizar recetas.

english: Perhaps our emotions make us who we are.
spanish: Tal vez nuestras emociones nos hacen ser lo que somos.

english: Did you call me last night?
spanish: ¿Me telefoneaste anoche?

english: Leaves are to plants what lungs are to animals.
spanish: Las hojas son para las plantas lo que los pulmones son para los animales.

english: You get more and more beautiful every day.
spanish: Cada día estás más guapa.

english: Tom knew about the surprise party all along.
spanish: Tom supo acerca de la fiesta sorpresa desde un principio.

english: You should not keep people waiting.
spanish: No deberías hacer esperar a la gente.

english: All of us approved of the plan.
spanish: Todos nosotros aprobamos el plan.

english: He plays chess very well.
spanish: Él juega ajedrez muy bien.

english: The oak tree remained standing after the storm.
spanish: El roble siguió erguido después de la tormenta.

english: I didn't mean to be disrespectful.
spanish: No fue mi intención ser irrespetuoso.

english: All of us got into the car.
spanish: Nos metimos todos en el coche.

english: We had a snowball fight.
spanish: Tuvimos una pelea de bolas de nieve.

english: This dress is too big for me.
spanish: Este vestido es demasiado grande para mí.

english: It's not sure it will happen.
spanish: No es seguro que vaya a suceder.

english: The crowd is growing larger and larger.
spanish: La multitud está haciéndose cada vez mayor.

english: Every boy here has a girlfriend.
spanish: Todos los chicos aquí tienen novia.

english: She made a serious mistake.
spanish: Ella cometió un grave error.

english: The students stood up one by one and introduced themselves.
spanish: Los estudiantes se levantaron uno por uno y se presentaron.

english: Tom doesn't want to miss his flight.
spanish: Tom no quiere perder su vuelo.

english: Would you like go out for a drink after work?
spanish: ¿Le gustaría ir por un trago después del trabajo?

english: I don't know what to do first.
spanish: No sé qué hacer primero.

english: Tom decided that it wasn't necessary to paint the ceiling.
spanish: Tom decidió que no había que pintar el techo.

english: Is that why you were late?
spanish: ¿Por eso llegas tan tarde?

english: There is no disgrace in being poor.
spanish: No hay deshonra en ser pobre.

english: You can invite other people.
spanish: Puedes invitar a otras personas.

english: Tom read anything he could lay his hands on.
spanish: Tom leía cualquier cosa que cayera en sus manos.

english: Everyone smiles in the same language.
spanish: Todos sonríen en el mismo idioma.

english: Tom wasn't satisfied with the pay he was getting.
spanish: Tom no estaba satisfecho con la paga que estaba recibiendo.

english: I went there to meet him.
spanish: Fui ahí para reunirme con él.

english: Tom once worked as a tour guide.
spanish: Tom una vez trabajó como guía turístico.

english: Investigating the causes of cancer is very expensive.
spanish: La investigación en las causas del cáncer es muy costosa.

english: He caught the ball with his left hand.
spanish: Él atrapó la pelota con su mano izquierda.

english: We will purchase a new car next week.
spanish: Compraremos un coche nuevo la semana que viene.

english: I must say that they didn't really seem surprised.
spanish: Debo decir que en realidad no parecían sorprendidos.

english: He shook thousands of hands.
spanish: Él sacudió miles de manos.

english: Tom stood there for a while.
spanish: Tom se quedó ahí durante un rato.

english: I tried to write with my left hand.
spanish: Intenté escribir con la mano izquierda.

english: I get only five days off this summer.
spanish: Solo tengo cinco días de vacaciones este verano.

english: At last, we were home!
spanish: ¡Por fin estábamos en casa!

english: I guess I'm never going to get married.
spanish: Creo que nunca me voy a casar.

english: I had no friends in Boston.
spanish: No tenía amigos en Boston.

english: He is in touch with all kinds of people.
spanish: Él se codea con todo tipo de gente.

english: I should've stayed with Tom.
spanish: Debería haberme quedado con Tom.

english: She has been absent from school for five days.
spanish: Ella no ha ido al colegio desde hace cinco días.

english: School begins at nine and is over at six.
spanish: El colegio empieza a las nueve y acaba a las seis.

english: This book deals with China.
spanish: Este libro es sobre China.

english: I wish they'd play this song over and over again.
spanish: Ojalá tocaran esta canción una y otra vez.

english: I asked Tom if he knew Mary.
spanish: Le pregunté a Tom si conocía a María.

english: Spanish is spoken in most countries of South America.
spanish: Se habla español en la mayoría de los países sudamericanos.

english: He is not as smart as his older brother.
spanish: No es tan inteligente como su hermano mayor.

english: Do you want me to leave you alone?
spanish: ¿Quieres que te deje solo?

english: He managed to run the machine.
spanish: Consiguió que la máquina funcionara.

english: Twenty teams entered the tournament.
spanish: Veinte equipos entraron al torneo.

english: She stood on her head.
spanish: Ella hizo el pino.

english: Tom took a piece of candy from the bag.
spanish: Tom cogió un caramelo de la bolsa.

english: Tom noticed Mary hadn't even started to cook dinner.
spanish: Tom se dio cuenta de que Mary ni siquiera había empezado a hacer la cena.

english: Do you ask every new employee that question?
spanish: ¿Le haces esa pregunta a todo nuevo empleado?

english: Give me a couple more hours.
spanish: Dame un par de horas más.

english: People are really stupid sometimes.
spanish: La gente es realmente estúpida a veces.

english: The station is about three miles from here.
spanish: La estación está a unas tres millas de aquí.

english: You can't establish a company without people.
spanish: No puedes fundar una compañía sin gente.

english: I'll take you there one of these days.
spanish: Te llevaré allí uno de estos días.

english: I also want to have a barbecue.
spanish: Yo también quiero tener una barbacoa.

english: I hope he's all right.
spanish: Espero que esté bien.

english: Our classroom was kept tidy.
spanish: Nuestra aula se mantuvo limpia.

english: I know this isn't easy.
spanish: Sé que esto no es fácil.

english: If I screw up, what's the worst that can happen?
spanish: Si yo la cago, ¿Qué es lo peor que puede ocurrir?

english: I'll go to bed early.
spanish: Me voy a dormir temprano.

english: His words excited everyone, even the opposition.
spanish: Sus palabras emocionaron a todos, incluso a la oposición.

english: I didn't have time to watch TV yesterday.
spanish: Ayer no tuve tiempo de ver la televisión.

english: He's friendly with all his classmates.
spanish: Él es amistoso con todos sus compañeros.

english: We've arrived a little late.
spanish: Llegamos un poco tarde.

english: I lived in Boston when I was a kid.
spanish: Vivía en Boston cuando era niño.

english: She was ill for a long time.
spanish: Ella estuvo enferma por un largo tiempo.

english: Montgomery was where it all began.
spanish: Fue en Montgomery donde todo empezó.

english: Strawberries are in season now.
spanish: Las fresas ya están de temporada.

english: I saw my uncle on the way to school.
spanish: De camino a la escuela vi a mi tío.

english: The shirt you gave me fit perfectly.
spanish: La camisa que me diste me queda perfecta.

english: She gave me a piece of good advice.
spanish: Ella me dio un buen consejo.

english: You just turned the radio on.
spanish: Acabas de encender la radio.

english: Tom gave his dog a piece of leftover Christmas turkey.
spanish: Tom le dio a su perro sobras del pavo de Navidad.

english: She calculates faster than any other student.
spanish: Ella calcula más rápido que cualquier otro estudiante.

english: What did you learn at school today?
spanish: ¿Qué aprendiste en la escuela hoy?

english: I will help as much as I can.
spanish: Ayudaré tanto como pueda.

english: Tom would never break a promise.
spanish: Tom nunca rompería una promesa.

english: This hat is too big for me.
spanish: Este sombrero es muy grande para mí.

english: Take me to your leader.
spanish: Llévenme con su líder.

english: Tom asked Mary to help John with his homework assignment.
spanish: Tom pidió a Mary que ayudase a John con sus deberes.

english: I just wanted to ask you a few questions.
spanish: Solo quería hacerte unas pocas preguntas.

english: Tom doesn't want to talk to you.
spanish: Tom no quiere hablar contigo.

english: I am anxious about your health.
spanish: Estoy preocupado por su salud.

english: It seems as if you are the first one here.
spanish: Parece que usted es el primero aquí.

english: Please let go of my arm.
spanish: Suéltame el brazo por favor.

english: Tom sat on a log.
spanish: Tom se sentó en un tronco.

english: That's how we want it written.
spanish: Así es como deseamos que se escriba.

english: I did not participate in the dialog.
spanish: No participé en el diálogo.

english: Her idea is very similar to mine.
spanish: Su idea es muy parecida a la mía.

english: I have a large family.
spanish: Tengo una familia numerosa.

english: Tom couldn't make himself understood.
spanish: Tom no podía hacerse entender.

english: Without you, life is awful.
spanish: Sin ti la vida es horrible.

english: We were waiting for the boat for many hours.
spanish: Estuvimos esperando al barco muchas horas.

english: I wanted to swim in this river.
spanish: Quería nadar en este río.

english: Why don't you get something to eat?
spanish: ¿Por qué no buscas algo para comer?

english: The temperature now is minus ten degrees.
spanish: La temperatura ahora es de menos diez grados.

english: The air in this room's very stuffy.
spanish: El aire de esta habitación está muy cargado.

english: You have to leave Boston.
spanish: Tenés que dejar Boston.

english: I'm fed up with English.
spanish: Estoy harto del inglés.

english: I put it in the drawer.
spanish: Eso lo dejé metido en el cajón.

english: Can you hide me from the police?
spanish: ¿Me puedes esconder de la policía?

english: When they finally found him, it was too late.
spanish: Cuando finalmente dieron con él, ya era demasiado tarde.

english: Please turn on the television.
spanish: Por favor, prende la televisión.

english: I don't have any money.
spanish: No tengo un centimo.

english: I felt dazed when I got up.
spanish: Me sentía aturdido cuando me levanté.

english: My brother is an engineer.
spanish: Mi hermano es ingeniero.

english: I withdrew some money from the bank for my trip.
spanish: Saqué algo de plata del banco para mi viaje.

english: It smells as though someone has been smoking in here.
spanish: Huele como si alguien hubiera estado fumando aquí.

english: I don't need your help.
spanish: No necesito tu ayuda.

english: I don't know anything about her family.
spanish: No sé nada acerca de su familia.

english: Sometimes, knowing the truth hurts a lot.
spanish: A veces duele mucho saber la verdad.

english: This is never going to end.
spanish: Esto nunca va a terminar.

english: I've always wanted a daughter.
spanish: Siempre quise tener una hija.

english: There are a lot of different people in Europe.
spanish: Hay muchas personas diferentes en Europa.

english: Read it back to me.
spanish: Léelo de nuevo para mí.

english: Tom's wallet is almost empty.
spanish: La billetera de Tom está casi pelada.

english: What kind of information are you looking for?
spanish: ¿Qué tipo de información estás buscando?

english: That child wouldn't let go of his mother's hand.
spanish: Ese niño no quería soltar la mano de su madre.

english: I've finished reading the book.
spanish: Me he acabado el libro.

english: I would like to know her name.
spanish: Me gustaría saber su nombre.

english: He thinks he is fit for the position.
spanish: Él piensa que es apto para el puesto.

english: Somebody needs to be here for the children.
spanish: Alguien tiene que quedarse aquí con los niños.

english: Not all of us can speak English.
spanish: No todos nosotros sabemos hablar inglés.

english: Do you know where Tom put the keys?
spanish: ¿Sabes dónde colocó Tom las llaves?

english: He doesn't know the truth yet.
spanish: Todavía no sabe la verdad.

english: Tom doesn't drink alcoholic drinks at all.
spanish: Tom no bebe nada de alcohol.

english: Your message has been received.
spanish: Tu mensaje ha sido recibido.

english: The train arrived on time.
spanish: El tren llegó a tiempo.

english: I have enjoyed reading this novel.
spanish: Yo he disfrutado el leer esta novela.

english: Why do you put up with that?
spanish: ¿Por qué aguantas eso?

english: Tom screamed at the top of his lungs.
spanish: Tom gritó a pleno pulmón.

english: You have to eat regularly.
spanish: Tienen que comer con regularidad.

english: I almost missed the train.
spanish: Casi perdí el tren.

english: I know exactly when that happened.
spanish: Sé exactamente cuándo sucedió eso.

english: I have to help Tom.
spanish: Tengo que ayudar a Tom.

english: Close the door after you when you leave the room.
spanish: Cerrad la puerta al salir de la habitación.

english: Of all these cakes I like this one best.
spanish: De todos estos pasteles el que más me gusta es este.

english: Give me a chance to make you proud of me.
spanish: Dame una oportunidad para hacerte sentir orgullosa de mí.

english: Last week she gave birth to a beautiful daughter.
spanish: La semana pasada dio a luz a una hija preciosa.

english: You can never be too careful.
spanish: Nunca se es demasiado cuidadoso.

english: What is the temperature of the water in the pool?
spanish: ¿A qué temperatura está el agua de la piscina?

english: She is wearing a brooch.
spanish: Ella lleva puesto un broche.

english: Tom went to a job fair.
spanish: Tom fue a una feria de trabajo.

english: He had three sons who became lawyers.
spanish: Él tuvo tres hijos que se convirtieron en abogados.

english: I guess Tom was right.
spanish: Supongo que Tom tenía razón.

english: Tom has visited Boston three times.
spanish: Tom ha visitado Boston tres veces.

english: I don't earn enough money to buy clothes regularly.
spanish: No gano dinero suficiente para comprar pilchas regularmente.

english: You're actually asking two questions there.
spanish: De hecho, aquí estás haciendo dos preguntas.

english: The church was built hundreds of years ago.
spanish: La iglesia fue construida hace cientos de años.

english: The old man lost the will to live.
spanish: El anciano perdió las ganas de vivir.

english: I don't see the problem.
spanish: No veo el problema.

english: She sat next to him wishing she were somewhere else.
spanish: Ella se sentó cerca de él deseando estar en cualquier otro lugar.

english: I have a headache now.
spanish: Me duele la cabeza ahora.

english: It's a very good question.
spanish: Esa es una muy buena pregunta.

english: They've got everything under control.
spanish: Lo tienen todo bajo control.

english: I can still see you.
spanish: Todavía puedo verte.

english: I do not know what I will do.
spanish: No sé qué haré.

english: She married him last year.
spanish: Ella se casó con él el año pasado.

english: Where is the captain of this ship?
spanish: ¿Dónde está el capitán de este barco?

english: Don't forget to turn off the gas before going out.
spanish: No te olvides de cortar el gas antes de salir.

english: Tom is almost always cheerful.
spanish: Tom casi siempre es alegre.

english: He threw the letter into the fire.
spanish: Él arrojó la carta al fuego.

english: It is something my mother made.
spanish: Es algo que mi madre ha hecho.

english: Do you think she still loves me?
spanish: ¿Crees que aún me ame?

english: Tom probably knew who I was.
spanish: Tom probablemente sabía quién era yo.

english: The manager messed up all the company's business.
spanish: El gerente enredó todos los negocios de la compañía.

english: I was born in 1972.
spanish: Nací en 1972.

english: A new year always brings hope.
spanish: Un nuevo año siempre trae esperanza.

english: He is tall and looks strong.
spanish: Es alto y parece fuerte.

english: I don't know where Tom is.
spanish: No sé dónde está Tom.

english: A nail penetrated the car tire.
spanish: Un clavo pinchó el neumático.

english: We started at the same time.
spanish: Empezamos al mismo tiempo.

english: I lived in Boston for almost three years.
spanish: Viví casi tres años en Boston.

english: My wife talked me into buying a new car.
spanish: Mi mujer me convenció de comprar un coche nuevo.

english: I love music as well as sports.
spanish: Me gustan la música y los deportes.

english: That's why we must fight.
spanish: Por eso debemos luchar.

english: What do you have there?
spanish: ¿Qué tienen ahí?

english: It can only get worse.
spanish: Sólo puede ir a peor.

english: Do it carefully. I don't like botched jobs.
spanish: Hazlo con cuidado, no me gustan las chapuzas.

english: Tom didn't look happy at all.
spanish: Tom no se veía para nada feliz.

english: He's a man of his word.
spanish: Es un hombre que siempre cumple sus promesas.

english: He was expelled from school.
spanish: Él fue expulsado de la escuela.

english: I don't want to get into a jam.
spanish: No quiero meterme en un lío.

english: A good businessman knows how to make money.
spanish: Un buen hombre de negocios sabe cómo hacer dinero.

english: I had my watch fixed.
spanish: Mandé mi reloj a arreglar.

english: Our school is in this village.
spanish: Nuestro colegio está en esta villa.

english: May I sit next to you?
spanish: ¿Puedo sentarme a tu lado?

english: She gave me a bag made of leather.
spanish: Ella me dio un bolso de cuero.

english: Why didn't you say anything?
spanish: ¿Por qué no dijiste nada?

english: What a fool I was to lend him the money.
spanish: Qué tonto fui por haberle prestado el dinero.

english: Tom looked at what was on the computer screen.
spanish: Tom miraba lo que pasaba en la pantalla del ordenador.

english: My dad took my toy out of my hands.
spanish: Mi padre me quitó mi juguete de las manos.

english: Does Tom live far from where you live?
spanish: ¿Tom vive lejos de donde vives tú?

english: Have you found Tom yet?
spanish: ¿Ya encontraste a Tom?

english: We went shopping in Shibuya yesterday.
spanish: Fuimos a comprar a Shibuya ayer.

english: Brave people feel fear, but that doesn't stop them.
spanish: La gente valiente siente miedo, pero eso no les detiene.

english: Did you see him at the station this morning?
spanish: ¿Lo viste en la estación esta mañana?

english: Is there anything you can't do?
spanish: ¿Hay algo que no puedas hacer?

english: I would like to eat now.
spanish: Me gustaría comer ahora.

english: I don't know who made the cake.
spanish: No sé quién hizo el pastel.

english: Here's a problem for you.
spanish: Aquí hay problema para ti.

english: I think we should do it today.
spanish: Creo que deberíamos hacerlo hoy.

english: His story was published in a magazine.
spanish: Su historia fue publicada en una revista.

english: Tom didn't have the courage to tell Mary the truth.
spanish: Tom no tuvo el coraje para decirle a Mary la verdad.

english: This cake is very delicious.
spanish: Esta tarta está realmente deliciosa.

english: I'm appalled by such ignorance.
spanish: Estoy sobrecogido por semejante ignorancia.

english: I can teach you how to fight.
spanish: Yo te puedo enseñar a pelear.

english: She thought of a good plan.
spanish: Ella pensó en un buen plan.

english: The room is very gloomy.
spanish: La habitación es muy oscura.

english: What forms do we need to file?
spanish: ¿Qué documentos necesitamos nosotros guardar?

english: You must on no condition open the box.
spanish: No debes abrir la caja en ningún caso.

english: We went to the park, and we played there.
spanish: Fuimos al parque, y jugamos allá.

english: I don't mind it at all.
spanish: No me importa en absoluto.

english: I don't want to do this with you.
spanish: No quiero hacer esto contigo.

english: How could you be so irresponsible?
spanish: ¿Cómo podías ser tan irresponsable?

english: Tom kissed Mary on the Ferris wheel.
spanish: Tom besó a Mary en la rueda de la fortuna.

english: You should call your father as soon as possible.
spanish: Deberías llamar a tu padre tan pronto como sea posible.

english: What are you doing this evening?
spanish: ¿Qué vas a hacer esta tarde?

english: You are the only one who can protect them.
spanish: Eres el único que puede protegerlas.

english: Is Tom Jackson your real name?
spanish: ¿Tom Jackson es tu verdadero nombre?

english: He called off the trip.
spanish: Desistió de hacer el viaje.

english: I have no one to confide in.
spanish: No tengo a nadie en quien pueda confiar.

english: Mary wants to sweep the house.
spanish: Mary quiere barrer la casa.

english: I beat you fair and square.
spanish: Te gané sin tapujos.

english: Tom didn't know that Mary had children.
spanish: Tom no sabía que Mary tenía hijos.

english: Tom owns a yellow sports car.
spanish: Tom tiene un auto deportivo amarillo.

english: What's the first thing you do when you wake up?
spanish: ¿Qué es lo primero que haces al despertar?

english: He is mad about you.
spanish: Está loco por ti.

english: Would you like to get married and have children?
spanish: ¿Os gustaría casaros y tener hijos?

english: I know right from wrong.
spanish: Puedo distinguir entre el bien y el mal.

english: Tom found a dead body on the beach.
spanish: Tom encontró un cadáver en la playa.

english: I just can't deal with this now.
spanish: No puedo lidiar con esto ahora.

english: How long do you plan to be here?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo piensas estar aquí?

english: I think they know me.
spanish: Creo que ellos me conocen.

english: Tom had a terrible dream last night.
spanish: Tom tuvo una pesadilla anoche.

english: What time do you arrive at school?
spanish: ¿A qué hora llegas al colegio?

english: She was always very secretive.
spanish: Ella fue siempre muy reservada.

english: Never confuse pity with love.
spanish: Nunca confundas lástima con amor.

english: I think it's going to rain today.
spanish: Creo que va a llover hoy.

english: Tom almost got hit by a car.
spanish: A Tomás casi lo atropella un auto.

english: Get Tom out of here.
spanish: Saca a Tom de aquí.

english: I'd rather walk than take a bus.
spanish: Preferiría caminar a coger el autobús.

english: Why didn't you tell me Tom was here?
spanish: ¿Por qué no me dijiste que Tom estaba acá?

english: Tom was not much older than Mary.
spanish: Tom no era mucho mayor que María.

english: How long do Christmas trees last?
spanish: ¿Cuánto duran los árboles de Navidad?

english: She took her ring off and threw it at him.
spanish: Ella se quitó su anillo y se lo arrojó.

english: Tom knows the way to Mary's house.
spanish: Tom conoce el camino a la casa de Mary.

english: He admitted he had taken bribes.
spanish: Él admitió que había aceptado sobornos.

english: I met an old man near the station.
spanish: Me encontré con un anciano cerca de la estación.

english: Tom doesn't eat meat or eggs.
spanish: Tom no come carne o huevos.

english: I don't want to buy this carpet.
spanish: No quiero comprar esta alfombra.

english: Of course, this is illegal.
spanish: Por supuesto que es ilegal.

english: I'm looking for a sweater.
spanish: Busco un suéter.

english: Tom has what he wants.
spanish: Tom tiene lo que quiere.

english: Tom seems quite happy, doesn't he?
spanish: Tom se ve harto feliz, ¿o no?

english: Many men were badly wounded in the battle.
spanish: Muchos soldados sufrieron terribles heridas en la lucha.

english: I'd like to be in Paris.
spanish: Me gustaría estar en París.

english: I lent Tom some money.
spanish: Le dejé a Tom algo de dinero.

english: Tom has three adult sons.
spanish: Tomás tiene tres hijos grandes.

english: Could you say that again?
spanish: ¿Podrías repetir eso?

english: I don't remember what happened anymore.
spanish: Ya no recuerdo qué ocurrió.

english: I gave a short talk.
spanish: Di un paseo corto.

english: The elephant is liked by little children.
spanish: A los niñitos les gusta el elefante.

english: Have you eaten lunch yet?
spanish: ¿Ya has almorzado?

english: Is that what you have in mind?
spanish: ¿Es eso lo que tienes en mente?

english: The place where he lives is far from town.
spanish: El lugar en donde vive queda lejos de la ciudad.

english: I'm turning thirty next Monday.
spanish: Cumplo treinta el próximo lunes.

english: Was there fresh bread in the box?
spanish: ¿Había pan fresco en la caja?

english: Did you eat something last night?
spanish: ¿Comiste algo anoche?

english: May I ask you a question?
spanish: ¿Te puedo preguntar algo?

english: He's waiting at the bus stop.
spanish: Él está esperando en la parada del autobús.

english: Yiddish is written in Hebrew characters.
spanish: El yidis se escribe con letras hebreas.

english: My wife is a doctor.
spanish: Mi mujer es médica.

english: I think that you are twenty years old.
spanish: Estimo que tienes veinte años.

english: I probably won't watch TV tonight.
spanish: Es posible que esta noche no vea la tele.

english: You have a lot of problems.
spanish: Tenés muchos problemas.

english: I can't give this dictionary to anyone.
spanish: No le puedo dar este diccionario a nadie.

english: The lion is eating meat.
spanish: El león come carne.

english: I need to buy stamps.
spanish: Necesito comprar estampillas.

english: Gold is far heavier than water.
spanish: El oro es mucho más pesado que el agua.

english: The food's not ready yet.
spanish: La comida no está lista aún.

english: Do you know where my recipe book is?
spanish: ¿Usted sabe dónde está mi libro de cocina?

english: What do you think of his new novel?
spanish: ¿Qué piensas de su nueva novela?

english: Do you have anything else?
spanish: ¿Tienes algo más?

english: It rained a lot that winter.
spanish: Llovió mucho aquel invierno.

english: I can't figure out why he didn't tell the truth.
spanish: No entiendo por qué no dijo la verdad.

english: She frequently gets sugar and salt mixed up.
spanish: Ella a menudo confunde el azúcar y la sal.

english: It is about time we bought a new microwave oven.
spanish: Ya es hora de comprar un nuevo microondas.

english: You might want to have someone look into that matter.
spanish: Puede que quieras que alguien investigue ese asunto.

english: I tried to pretend I was something I wasn't.
spanish: Traté de fingir ser algo que no era.

english: If that guitar weren't so expensive, I could buy it.
spanish: Si esa guitarra no fuera tan cara, podría comprarla.

english: Tom is a fat man.
spanish: Tom es un hombre gordo.

english: Tom worked for a construction company in Boston.
spanish: Tom trabajó para una compañía de construcción en Boston.

english: I have only one picture of my grandmother.
spanish: Solo tengo una fotografía de mi abuela.

english: Her book is very interesting.
spanish: Su libro es muy interesante.

english: We eat many kinds of food.
spanish: Comemos toda clase de comidas.

english: Many of the men became sick.
spanish: Muchos de los hombres se pusieron enfermos.

english: I can't bear the thought of her with another man.
spanish: No puedo soportar la idea de que ella esté con otro hombre.

english: I heard a shout and then a crash.
spanish: Oí un grito y luego un choque.

english: He will end up in jail.
spanish: Él acabará en la cárcel.

english: He was born in the 19th century.
spanish: Él nació en el siglo XIX.

english: Tom is the only adult Mary knows who can't drive.
spanish: Tom es el único adulto que Mary conoce que no sabe manejar.

english: Do you know who I am?
spanish: ¿Sabes quién soy?

english: I will drive you home.
spanish: Te llevaré a casa.

english: I got bored with his long talk.
spanish: Me aburrí de su largo discurso.

english: My father hasn't gone abroad even once.
spanish: Mi padre no ha salido al extranjero ni siquiera una vez.

english: We must consider all the options.
spanish: Tenemos que considerar todas las opciones.

english: I can't afford to buy a new car.
spanish: No puedo permitirme comprar un coche nuevo.

english: Even a child can understand it.
spanish: Esto lo entiende hasta un niño.

english: Who told you the story?
spanish: ¿Quién te contó la historia?

english: Tom believes Mary killed herself.
spanish: Tom cree que Mary se suicidó.

english: When will you be back in Italy?
spanish: ¿Cuándo volverás a Italia?

english: She appears to have been rich.
spanish: Aparentemente ella había sido rica.

english: I used to have an MD player.
spanish: Solía tener un reproductor de MiniDisc.

english: I'm afraid I can't help you now.
spanish: Me temo que no puedo ayudarte ahora.

english: Tom poured himself another shot of bourbon.
spanish: Tom se sirvió otro trago de bourbon.

english: Her new novel has become a best seller.
spanish: Su nueva novela se ha convertido en un best seller.

english: They made the right choice.
spanish: Ellos tomaron la decisión correcta.

english: I want Tom to know the truth.
spanish: Quiero que Tom sepa la verdad.

english: Tom doesn't know what I'm going to do.
spanish: Tom no sabe lo que yo voy a hacer.

english: Lincoln set the slaves free.
spanish: Lincoln liberó a los esclavos.

english: How much sleep do you usually get?
spanish: ¿Cuánto consigue usted dormir usualmente?

english: They made us work all night.
spanish: Nos hicieron trabajar toda la noche.

english: What other options do I have?
spanish: ¿Qué otras opciones tengo?

english: I am beginning to remember it.
spanish: Estoy empezando a acordarme.

english: I can't remember doing that.
spanish: No puedo recordar haciendo eso.

english: Both Tom and John married Canadian women.
spanish: Tom y John están, los dos, casados con mujeres canadienses.

english: I'm thinking of going to Europe.
spanish: Estoy pensando en ir a Europa.

english: I have at least ten books.
spanish: Tengo al menos diez libros.

english: Don't you sleep well at night?
spanish: ¿No duermes bien por la noche?

english: I'm tired, but I can't fall asleep.
spanish: Estoy cansada, pero no puedo quedarme dormida.

english: She inherited her mother's blue eyes.
spanish: Ella heredó los ojos azules de su madre.

english: I have to study French.
spanish: Tengo que estudiar francés.

english: Don't be so hard on your son.
spanish: No seas tan duro con tu hijo.

english: You don't need to hurry.
spanish: No necesitas apresurarte.

english: That man didn't give me his name.
spanish: Ese hombre no me dio su nombre.

english: How do you read this kanji?
spanish: ¿Cómo se lee este kanji?

english: Tom and Mary are intelligent people.
spanish: Tom y Mary son personas inteligentes.

english: It is quality, not quantity that counts.
spanish: Es la calidad y no la cantidad lo que importa.

english: Tom found a job that he likes.
spanish: Tom encontró un trabajo que le gusta.

english: Forget it. There's no sense giving him advice.
spanish: Olvídalo. No tiene caso darle consejo.

english: It is supposed to rain today, isn't it?
spanish: Hoy se supone que llueve, ¿o no?

english: I've got to stop eating such sweet ice cream.
spanish: Tengo que dejar de comer helado tan dulce.

english: You know I would do anything to help you.
spanish: Sabes que haría lo que sea para ayudarte.

english: When will this be returned to me?
spanish: ¿Cuándo me podrán devolver esto?

english: I have a slight headache.
spanish: Tengo un ligero dolor de cabeza.

english: I'll ask my brother to give me a ride.
spanish: Le pediré a mi hermano que me lleve.

english: Tom ate breakfast all by himself.
spanish: Tom desayunó totalmente solo.

english: I hope things will turn out well for you.
spanish: Espero que las cosas te vayan bien.

english: I hurried so I wouldn't miss the train.
spanish: Me apuré para no perder el tren.

english: What time do you usually eat lunch?
spanish: ¿A qué hora sueles almorzar?

english: You should've told me you needed money.
spanish: Debiste haberme dicho que necesitabas dinero.

english: What kind of building do you live in?
spanish: ¿En qué tipo de edificio vives?

english: Let's wait until it stops raining.
spanish: Esperemos hasta que la lluvia pare.

english: I'm not here to arrest you.
spanish: No vengo a arrestarte.

english: This hall was full of people.
spanish: Esta sala estaba llena de gente.

english: You can go now, sir.
spanish: Usted se puede retirar ahora, caballero.

english: Tom was seen stealing apples from the neighbor's tree.
spanish: Tom fue visto robando manzanas del árbol del vecino.

english: We want everybody to have a good Christmas.
spanish: Queremos que todo el mundo tenga una feliz Navidad.

english: It isn't raining much this year.
spanish: Este año no está lloviendo mucho.

english: This is a doghouse that I made myself.
spanish: Ésta es una caseta que hice yo mismo.

english: We took a short rest on the way.
spanish: Tomamos un breve descanso en el camino.

english: I have feeling in my legs.
spanish: Tengo sensibilidad en mis piernas.

english: It doesn't matter what he said.
spanish: No importa lo que él dijo.

english: I doubt the truth of his story.
spanish: Dudo de la veracidad de su historia.

english: They don't know that I'm Japanese.
spanish: No saben que soy japonesa.

english: I can't pay you back the money you lent me.
spanish: No te puedo devolver el dinero que me prestaste.

english: The first step is the most difficult.
spanish: El primer paso es el más difícil.

english: She looked at him angrily.
spanish: Ella le miró con enfado.

english: It's not a big room, but it's beautiful.
spanish: No es una habitación grande, pero es hermosa.

english: This school has no heating.
spanish: Esta escuela no tiene calefacción.

english: Tom bought it for me.
spanish: Tom lo compró para mí.

english: Do you have any Japanese magazines?
spanish: ¿Tiene revistas japonesas?

english: Tom was really into it.
spanish: A Tom verdaderamente le apasionaba.

english: This medicine is still not sold in pharmacies.
spanish: Este medicamento todavía no se vende en las farmacias.

english: I told you it was a bad idea.
spanish: Te dije que era una mala idea.

english: An astronaut can float in space.
spanish: Un astronauta puede flotar en el espacio.

english: What part don't you understand?
spanish: ¿Qué parte no entendés?

english: I asked him where I could park my car.
spanish: Le pregunté a él dónde podía aparcar el coche.

english: Do you have a fever?
spanish: ¿Tienes fiebre?

english: One way to lose weight is to eat less.
spanish: Una forma de perder peso es comer menos.

english: Tom is the most handsome actor in the world.
spanish: Tom es el actor más guapo del mundo.

english: I don't want to see your faces.
spanish: No quiero veros las caras.

english: You must show your passport.
spanish: Debe enseñar su pasaporte.

english: If I had wings, I would fly to you.
spanish: Si yo tuviera alas, volaría hasta ti.

english: I know what the answer will be.
spanish: Sé cuál será la respuesta.

english: I'm no longer married to Tom.
spanish: Ya no estoy casada con Tom.

english: Let's get in the car.
spanish: Entremos al auto.

english: I don't even know what's happening to me anymore.
spanish: Ya ni siquiera sé que me está pasando.

english: He was knocked down by a truck.
spanish: Él fue mandado a volar por un camión.

english: The superintendent lives on the ground floor.
spanish: El portero vive en el bajo.

english: My sister washes her shoes every Sunday.
spanish: Mi hermana limpia sus zapatos todos los domingos.

english: It was a dark and stormy night.
spanish: Era una noche oscura y tormentosa.

english: Tom removed the lid from the box.
spanish: Tom quitó la tapa de la caja.

english: Did you see yesterday's episode?
spanish: ¿Viste el capítulo de ayer?

english: That's something I hadn't figured on.
spanish: No había contado con eso.

english: He has been on a diet for two months.
spanish: Él estuvo haciendo dieta por dos meses.

english: He is no longer a child.
spanish: Él ya no es un niño.

english: The police found out where the criminal lived.
spanish: La Policía averiguó dónde vivía el criminal.

english: Why don't we take a short break?
spanish: ¿Por qué no hacemos una breve pausa?

english: There is no money in my bag.
spanish: No hay dinero en mi cartera.

english: Mary and I are engaged.
spanish: Mary y yo estamos comprometidos.

english: Please pass me the pepper.
spanish: Por favor, pásame la pimienta.

english: The sun is sinking in the west.
spanish: El sol se hunde en el oeste.

english: I can barely stand his behavior.
spanish: Apenas soporto su comportamiento.

english: I have a serious skin problem.
spanish: Tengo un serio problema a la piel.

english: Tom stared at Mary with hatred.
spanish: Tom miró fijamente a Mary con odio.

english: I'll give it a whirl.
spanish: Probaré la suerte con ello.

english: When will dinner be ready?
spanish: ¿Cuándo estará lista la cena?

english: How many books did you read?
spanish: ¿Cuántos libros leíste?

english: Do you believe in ghosts?
spanish: ¿Creés en fantasmas?

english: Tom was elected to the Senate in 2008.
spanish: Tom fue elegido para el Senado en 2008.

english: I don't want to watch television this evening.
spanish: No quiero ver la televisión esta noche.

english: The door is open now.
spanish: La puerta está abierta ahora.

english: Please make a milkshake for me.
spanish: Por favor, prepárame un batido.

english: It can be used as a knife.
spanish: Puede ser usado como un cuchillo.

english: I only asked if I could borrow the book.
spanish: Solo pregunté si podía llevarme el libro.

english: I only saw the apple.
spanish: Solo vi la manzana.

english: What time is your plane scheduled to take off?
spanish: ¿A qué hora está programado tu avión para despegar?

english: Tom died while he was in Boston.
spanish: Tom murió mientras estaba en Boston.

english: He wants to see us again.
spanish: Él quiere vernos otra vez.

english: The man you just saw is a great musician.
spanish: El hombre que acabas de ver es un gran músico.

english: I like to go and watch baseball games.
spanish: Me gusta ir a ver partidos de béisbol.

english: I just want to make sure Tom is all right.
spanish: Solo quiero asegurarme de que Tom está bien.

english: There is a card on the desk.
spanish: Hay una carta sobre el escritorio.

english: She's not his sister, but his mother.
spanish: Ella no es su hermana, es su madre.

english: The loud noise woke up the children.
spanish: El estruendo despertó a los niños.

english: I had to lie to Tom.
spanish: Tuve que mentirle a Tom.

english: You have to turn in the reports on Monday.
spanish: Tienes que entregar los reportes el lunes.

english: I've waited two whole hours. I can't wait any longer.
spanish: He esperado dos horas enteras. No puedo esperar más.

english: He taught me how to write.
spanish: Él me enseñó a escribir.

english: Do you know where my key is?
spanish: ¿Sabes dónde está mi llave?

english: What time do you get up every day?
spanish: ¿A qué hora te levantas todos los días?

english: There's a strong probability of a nuclear tragedy.
spanish: Hay una gran posibilidad de una tragedia nuclear.

english: Let's eat pizza for lunch today.
spanish: Almorcemos pizza hoy.

english: Let's go back before it begins to rain.
spanish: Volvamos antes de que empiece a llover.

english: The child fell out of bed.
spanish: El niño se cayó de la cama.

english: He is selfish and greedy.
spanish: Es egoísta y avaricioso.

english: You must respect your elders.
spanish: Tienes que respetar a tus mayores.

english: I am grateful to you for your help.
spanish: Le agradezco mucho por su ayuda.

english: His friend promised never to abandon him.
spanish: El amigo le prometió que nunca lo abandonaría.

english: She bought a new house the other day.
spanish: Ella se compró una casa nueva el otro día.

english: Tom didn't have on his shoes.
spanish: Tom no llevaba sus zapatos puestos.

english: He likes collecting old coins.
spanish: A él le gusta coleccionar monedas viejas.

english: Where else would you like to go?
spanish: ¿A dónde más te gustaría ir?

english: Do you spend much time in Boston?
spanish: ¿Pasas mucho tiempo en Boston?

english: She poured milk into the cup.
spanish: Ella vertió leche en la taza.

english: This computer is excellent, but it cost me a fortune.
spanish: Esta computadora es excelente, pero me costó una fortuna.

english: Can you explain it to me?
spanish: ¿Me lo puede explicar?

english: I'd better get going. My father is really strict.
spanish: Será mejor que me vaya. Mi padre es bastante estricto.

english: This palace was built for the rich king.
spanish: Este palacio fue construido para el opulento rey.

english: They gave us a lot to eat.
spanish: Nos dieron mucho que comer.

english: It must've been a shock to you.
spanish: Tiene que haber sido un golpe para ti.

english: Tom and Mary got married on Christmas Eve.
spanish: Tom y Mary se casaron en Nochebuena.

english: I didn't know about it until I read the paper.
spanish: No lo sabía hasta que leí el periódico.

english: Tom makes up stories all the time.
spanish: Tom inventa historias todo el tiempo.

english: Didn't I ask you not to help?
spanish: ¿No te pedí que no ayudaras?

english: Most people stuck around for a while after the show.
spanish: La mayoría de personas se quedaron un rato después del espectáculo.

english: Tom is sending a fax.
spanish: Tom está mandando un fax.

english: The girl was aware of the danger.
spanish: La chica era consciente del peligro.

english: Don't forget to send the letter.
spanish: No te olvides de mandar la carta.

english: They say that she was born in Germany.
spanish: Dicen que nació en Alemania.

english: The rain stopped at last.
spanish: La lluvia al fin paró.

english: I'm just glad everything worked out.
spanish: Estoy tan contento que todo salió bien.

english: The ruins are worth visiting.
spanish: Vale la pena visitar las ruinas.

english: He wrote this book at the age of twenty.
spanish: Él escribió este libro a los veinte años.

english: He gave his children a good education.
spanish: Él dio una buena educación a sus hijos.

english: He began to work for that company last year.
spanish: Él empezó a trabajar para esa compañía el año pasado.

english: I take back everything I said.
spanish: Retiro todo lo dicho anteriormente.

english: I didn't need to tell him.
spanish: No necesité contarle.

english: They didn't have anything smaller.
spanish: No tenían nada más pequeño.

english: Can we afford a new car?
spanish: ¿Nos podemos permitir un coche nuevo?

english: This is the flag of Japan.
spanish: Ésta es la bandera de Japón.

english: Tom left three days ago.
spanish: Tom partió tres días atrás.

english: The police arrested members from two criminal gangs.
spanish: La Policía detuvo a miembros de dos bandas delictuales.

english: I don't think we should shut the window.
spanish: No creo que debamos cerrar la ventana.

english: Tom arrived in Boston last night.
spanish: Tom llegó a Boston anoche.

english: This is why he got angry with you.
spanish: Es por esto que él se enojó contigo.

english: She was not a very good pianist.
spanish: Ella no era una muy buena pianista.

english: Tom is choking on something.
spanish: Tom se está ahogando con algo.

english: Don't you want to stay here with us?
spanish: ¿No quieres quedarte aquí con nosotros?

english: Children don't like to go out in the dark.
spanish: A los niños no les gusta salir cuando está oscuro.

english: We will leave as soon as he comes.
spanish: Iremos apenas él llegue.

english: Tom doesn't know how to swim.
spanish: Tom no sabe nadar.

english: He was ready to face his fate.
spanish: Él estaba preparado para enfrentarse a su destino.

english: His words touched her heart.
spanish: Sus palabras le llegaron al alma.

english: What time do you usually eat breakfast?
spanish: ¿A qué hora desayunas normalmente?

english: I don't want you to go home.
spanish: No quiero que te vayas a tu casa.

english: Tom can't tell time yet.
spanish: Tomás no sabe decir la hora todavía.

english: Tom needs to take charge.
spanish: Tom tiene que ponerse al mando.

english: I went to many shops to look for the book.
spanish: Fui a muchas tiendas buscando el libro.

english: Tom treated Mary like a slave.
spanish: Tom trataba a Mary como a una esclava.

english: My father has been dead for three years.
spanish: Mi padre murió hace tres años.

english: For goodness' sake, please be nice to him.
spanish: Por Dios, por favor sé majo con él.

english: He has very little interest in his children.
spanish: Él tiene muy poco interés en sus niños.

english: There's not a single safe place anymore in Japan.
spanish: Ya no hay ni un solo lugar seguro en Japón.

english: She will get well soon.
spanish: Ella se aliviará pronto.

english: What do you want to tell us?
spanish: ¿Qué quieres decirnos?

english: Japan surpasses China in economic power.
spanish: Japón sobrepasa a China en poder económico.

english: I haven't talked to Tom in almost a year.
spanish: No he hablado con Tom en casi un año.

english: I have to know the truth.
spanish: Tengo que saber la verdad.

english: My tastes differ greatly from yours.
spanish: Mis gustos son muy distintos a los suyos.

english: Would you rather be blind or be deaf?
spanish: ¿Preferirías estar ciego o estar sordo?

english: We took him to the hospital right away.
spanish: Nosotros lo llevamos en seguida a un hospital.

english: There are some eggs in the box.
spanish: Hay algunos huevos en la caja.

english: Can we talk after class?
spanish: ¿Podemos hablar después de clases?

english: Go straight along this street.
spanish: Sigue recto esta calle.

english: Although her house is nearby, I seldom see her.
spanish: Aunque su casa queda cerca, yo rara vez la veo.

english: He was sharpening a knife.
spanish: Él estaba afilando un cuchillo.

english: I'm going with you to Hanover.
spanish: Voy contigo a Hanóver.

english: I asked Tom to help me with my homework.
spanish: Le pedía a Tom que me ayudase con mis tareas domésticas.

english: I'll catch up with you soon.
spanish: Te alcanzaré pronto.

english: I don't know how you did it.
spanish: No sé cómo lo hiciste.

english: The project was a great success.
spanish: El proyecto fue un gran éxito.

english: I went to the hospital to visit him.
spanish: Fui al hospital a visitarlo.

english: Japan is rich in beautiful scenery.
spanish: Japón es muy rico en bellos paisajes.

english: Tom bumped into Mary the other day at the supermarket.
spanish: Tom se topó con Mary en el supermercado el otro día.

english: I had to give it a shot.
spanish: Tuve que darle una oportunidad.

english: It won't cost you a dime.
spanish: No te costará un céntimo.

english: I met nobody on my way home.
spanish: No me encontré con nadie camino a casa.

english: Tom is on bad terms with Mary.
spanish: Tom y Mary no se llevan bien.

english: I bought myself a small car.
spanish: Me compré un auto pequeño.

english: I informed her of my arrival.
spanish: Yo le informé de mi llegada.

english: The driver advised us to fasten our seat belts.
spanish: El conductor nos dijo que nos abrochemos el cinturón de seguridad.

english: Why did you decide to name your son Tom?
spanish: ¿Por qué decidiste llamar Tom a tu hijo?

english: His lecture had a large audience.
spanish: Su clase tuvo una gran audiencia.

english: I don't know what I've been so afraid of.
spanish: No sé de qué he estado tan asustado.

english: You've got a lot of willpower.
spanish: Tienes mucha fuerza de voluntad.

english: My friend frowned as she read the letter.
spanish: Mi amigo frunció el ceño al leer la carta.

english: Tom stayed up all night studying.
spanish: Tom se quedó toda la noche estudiando.

english: Tom promised Mary that he'd meet her after school.
spanish: Tom le prometió a Mary que se encontraría con ella después de la escuela.

english: I will just hang around here for a while.
spanish: Voy a estar por aquí un rato.

english: Tom insisted on paying the bill.
spanish: Tom insistió en pagar la cuenta.

english: I don't think what we did made any difference.
spanish: No creo que lo que hicimos supusiera ninguna diferencia.

english: Excuse me for opening your letter by mistake.
spanish: Perdóneme por haber abierto su carta por error.

english: I read about it in the newspaper.
spanish: Lo he leído en el periódico.

english: Do you feel like dancing?
spanish: ¿Tenés ganas de bailar?

english: He never puts off anything he has to do.
spanish: Él nunca pospone nada de lo que debe hacer.

english: He didn't go to school.
spanish: No fue a clase.

english: Tom spoke French to me.
spanish: Tom me habló en francés.

english: Do you know where it is?
spanish: ¿Sabes dónde está?

english: I'm a little bit hungry.
spanish: Tengo un poquito de hambre.

english: You swim well, don't you?
spanish: Nadas bien, ¿Verdad?

english: We'll get in trouble if we get caught.
spanish: Nos meteremos en problemas si nos pillan.

english: I won't be here tomorrow.
spanish: Mañana no estaré aquí.

english: You two are very cute together.
spanish: Ustedes dos son muy lindos juntos.

english: He is in good physical condition.
spanish: Él está en buena condición física.

english: Leave me alone or I'm going to call security.
spanish: Déjame tranquila o llamaré a seguridad.

english: Tom told me that he wasn't afraid of Mary.
spanish: Tom me dijo que no le tenía miedo a Mary.

english: Don't lean on your friends for help.
spanish: No te apoyes en la ayuda de tus amigos.

english: I appeared on television once.
spanish: Una vez salí en televisión.

english: She told me his name after he had left.
spanish: Ella me dijo el nombre de él después de que se hubiera ido.

english: Dancing is not a crime.
spanish: Bailar no es un crimen.

english: Portugal has decriminalized the possession of drugs for personal use.
spanish: Portugal ha despenalizado la posesión de drogas para propio consumo.

english: Tom arrived at the camp safely.
spanish: Tom llegó al campamento a salvo.

english: You're looking at me in a way that scares me.
spanish: Me estás mirando de una forma que me asusta.

english: Mary hired Tom to paint her house.
spanish: Mary contrató a Tom para pintar su casa.

english: She'll have to wait for him.
spanish: Ella tendrá que esperarlo.

english: She did not promise to come here again.
spanish: Ella no prometió venir aquí de nuevo.

english: This mine will close down next month.
spanish: Esta mina cerrará el mes que viene.

english: A big tree fell in the storm.
spanish: Un gran árbol cayó en la tormenta.

english: We must make a new start.
spanish: Debemos recomenzar.

english: I don't enjoy studying because I don't make any progress.
spanish: No disfruto estudiando porque no hago ningún progreso.

english: I don't think they're teachers.
spanish: No creo que ellos sean profesores.

english: Everything is covered with dust.
spanish: ¡Todo está lleno de polvo!

english: Not knowing what to say, he remained silent.
spanish: Como no sabía qué decir, permaneció callado.

english: The sun shines during the day.
spanish: El sol brilla durante el día.

english: I was used to eating like a pig.
spanish: Estaba acostumbrado a comer como un cerdo.

english: There was an attempt on the president's life.
spanish: Se cometió un atentado contra la vida del presidente.

english: What does your family eat for Christmas dinner?
spanish: ¿Qué come tu familia en la cena de Navidad?

english: Do you go to school on Saturday?
spanish: ¿Hay escuela el sábado?

english: Here is the fish my mother baked.
spanish: Éste es el pescado que asó mi madre.

english: His house is there on the right.
spanish: Su casa está allí a la derecha.

english: We've known each other for years.
spanish: Nos conocemos desde hace años.

english: Tom didn't want Mary to know he was rich.
spanish: Tom no quería que Mary supiera que era rico.

english: I have nothing to lose.
spanish: No tengo nada que perder.

english: Where did this custom start?
spanish: ¿Dónde se inició esta costumbre?

english: I need you to take a look at this.
spanish: Necesito que le eches un vistazo a esto.

english: It's been there a while.
spanish: Ello ha estado ahí por un rato.

english: Tom hasn't been in school.
spanish: Tom no ha estado en la escuela.

english: Our train reached Rome after dark.
spanish: Nuestro tren llegó a Roma después de que se oscureció.

english: Good to see you, Tom.
spanish: Qué bueno verte, Tom.

english: These clothes are finally dry.
spanish: Esta ropa por fin está seca.

english: It'll cost at least a hundred pesos.
spanish: Por lo menos costará cien pesos.

english: There was a food fight in the cafeteria.
spanish: Hubo una pelea de comida en la cafetería.

english: I'd hoped to speak with Tom.
spanish: Quería hablar con Tom.

english: He did not appear until late at night.
spanish: Él no apareció hasta tarde en la noche.

english: Tom denied knowing anything about it.
spanish: Tom negó haber sabido nada al respecto.

english: Did it rain here yesterday?
spanish: ¿Ayer llovió aquí?

english: I have just what you need.
spanish: Tengo justo lo que ustedes necesitan.

english: Many of the people died.
spanish: Muchas personas murieron.

english: I'm having some problems compiling this software.
spanish: Tengo problemas para compilar este programa.

english: That bridge is made of stone.
spanish: Aquel puente está hecho de piedra.

english: He moved into my neighborhood.
spanish: Él se mudó al barrio.

english: Tom doesn't speak to Mary.
spanish: Tom no está hablando con Mary.

english: I'm not good with kids.
spanish: No soy bueno con los niños.

english: You did tell Tom about that, right?
spanish: Sí le contaste a Tom, ¿cierto?

english: The older he grew, the more modest he became.
spanish: Cuanto más viejo se hacía, más modesto se volvía.

english: Tom's dream is to go to a university in England.
spanish: El sueño de Tom es ir a una universidad inglesa.

english: It is on this point that our opinions differ.
spanish: A partir de aquí nuestras opiniones difieren.

english: I don't know how to say that in French.
spanish: No sé cómo se dice en francés.

english: I need Tom to see this.
spanish: Necesito que Tom vea esto.

english: I remember my mother teaching me the alphabet.
spanish: Recuerdo a mi madre enseñándome el abecedario.

english: Beetles, butterflies and cockroaches are insects.
spanish: Los escarabajos, las mariposas y las cucarachas son insectos.

english: I couldn't go because of the heavy rain.
spanish: No pude ir por culpa de la lluvia torrencial.

english: Why aren't you eating anything?
spanish: ¿Por qué no estás comiendo algo?

english: He will go as well.
spanish: Él también se irá.

english: I think Tom shares too much personal information online.
spanish: Creo que Tom comparte demasiada información personal en línea.

english: I was on the phone.
spanish: Estaba al teléfono.

english: I would very much like to go.
spanish: Me gustaría mucho ir.

english: Tom's an extremely honest person.
spanish: Tom es una persona extremadamente honesta.

english: We must do more than yesterday.
spanish: Hagamos más que ayer.

english: Do I need to be here tomorrow?
spanish: ¿Es necesario que esté aquí mañana?

english: Thank you for inviting me to dinner.
spanish: Gracias por haberme invitado a cenar.

english: Mary let Tom kiss her.
spanish: María dejó que Tom la besara.

english: Tom doesn't like classical music.
spanish: A Tom no le gusta la música clásica.

english: I don't know exactly where I was born.
spanish: No conozco con certeza dónde nací.

english: Our eyes take time to adjust to the darkness.
spanish: Nuestros ojos requieren tiempo para adaptarse a la oscuridad.

english: Tom is the only person Mary knows who enjoys opera.
spanish: Tom es la única persona que Mary conoce que disfruta de la ópera.

english: Don't you have anything better to do with your time?
spanish: ¿No tienes nada mejor que hacer con tu tiempo?

english: Anteaters and aardvarks are similar.
spanish: Los osos hormigueros y los cerdos hormigueros se parecen.

english: Tom had nothing to do, so he went home.
spanish: Tom no tenía nada que hacer, así que se fue a casa.

english: She tried on a new dress.
spanish: Ella se probó un vestido nuevo.

english: This is a good start.
spanish: Este es un buen comienzo.

english: He proposed that we should play baseball.
spanish: Propuso que jugásemos al béisbol.

english: His condition changed for the worse.
spanish: Su situación empeoró.

english: Tom asked Mary out to dinner, but she said no.
spanish: Tom invitó a Mary a salir a cenar, pero ella dijo que no.

english: Where did you go on your summer vacation?
spanish: ¿A dónde fuiste de vacaciones de verano?

english: You must prepare yourself for the worst.
spanish: Tienes que prepararte para lo peor.

english: It's going to rain this evening.
spanish: Esta noche va a llover.

english: We got lost in the fog.
spanish: Nos perdimos en la niebla.

english: I don't want any popcorn.
spanish: No quiero pochoclo.

english: We talked about the question over a cup of coffee.
spanish: Nosotros discutimos acerca de la pregunta sobre una taza de café.

english: Tom is driving too slow.
spanish: Tom está conduciendo demasiado lento.

english: He predicted she would win.
spanish: Él predijo que ella ganaría.

english: Tom runs a company in Boston.
spanish: Tom dirige una compañía en Boston.

english: My father told me where to go.
spanish: Mi papá me dijo a dónde ir.

english: He said that he would come back here tomorrow.
spanish: Él dijo que volvería aquí mañana.

english: What do I have to do?
spanish: ¿Qué tengo que hacer?

english: He is very concerned about his elderly parent's health.
spanish: Él está muy preocupado por la salud de su anciano padre.

english: Do you want to try another one?
spanish: ¿Quieres probar otro?

english: He has been studying for two hours.
spanish: Ha estado estudiando dos horas.

english: I'm more afraid of Tom than I am of Mary.
spanish: Le tengo más miedo a Tom que a Mary.

english: Look out of the window.
spanish: Mira por la ventana.

english: I think Tom is stupid.
spanish: Creo que Tomás es estúpido.

english: My colleagues welcomed me very warmly.
spanish: Mis colegas me recibieron muy cálidamente.

english: When did you buy your car?
spanish: ¿Cuándo te compraste tu auto?

english: We didn't need to call the doctor.
spanish: No tuvimos que llamar al doctor.

english: Men don't drive as well as women.
spanish: Los hombres no conducen tan bien como las mujeres.

english: I wish I had something to contribute.
spanish: Desearía tener algo con que aportar.

english: I don't want to talk to Tom.
spanish: No quiero hablar con Tom.

english: Can I reserve a flight to Chicago?
spanish: ¿Puedo reservar un vuelo a Chicago?

english: Tom doesn't know the answer yet.
spanish: Tom no sabe la respuesta todavía.

english: She asked me for help.
spanish: Ella me pidió ayuda.

english: The movie is showing in movie theaters next month.
spanish: Darán la película en el cine el próximo mes.

english: I can take care of myself.
spanish: Sé cuidar de mí mismo.

english: I like your profile picture.
spanish: Me gusta tu foto de perfil.

english: The party was really great.
spanish: La fiesta fue realmente genial.

english: She did nothing but cry all day.
spanish: Ella no hizo nada más que llorar todo el día.

english: We can build a wall with bricks and mortar.
spanish: Podemos construir una pared con ladrillos y cemento.

english: Tom left the window open.
spanish: Tom dejó la ventana abierta.

english: She advised him to use a bicycle.
spanish: Ella le aconsejó que usara una bicicleta.

english: I have a surprise for you.
spanish: Tengo una sorpresa para ustedes.

english: I don't have a son named Tom.
spanish: Yo no tengo un hijo llamado Tom.

english: Can I please have something hot to drink?
spanish: ¿Pueden darme algo caliente de beber, por favor?

english: You need to calm down.
spanish: Tienes que tranquilizarte.

english: Our football team has a good defense.
spanish: Nuestro equipo de football tiene una buena defensa.

english: He lives in Tokyo now.
spanish: Ahora está viviendo en Tokio.

english: Do you drink tea or coffee?
spanish: ¿Bebe usted té o café?

english: It is a very sad tale.
spanish: Es un cuento muy triste.

english: What do you want to give Tom?
spanish: ¿Qué le quieres regalar a Tom?

english: Tom pretended not to be afraid.
spanish: Tom fingió no tener miedo.

english: Does Tom want a car?
spanish: ¿Tomás quiere un auto?

english: I thought you two played tennis together every weekend.
spanish: Pensé que ustedes dos jugaban al tenis todos los fines de semana.

english: They heard it on the radio.
spanish: Escucharon esto por radio.

english: How did it go last night?
spanish: ¿Os fue bien anoche?

english: You are an idiot to go out in this weather.
spanish: Eres muy idiota para salir con este tiempo.

english: I entered a singing contest.
spanish: Entré a un concurso de canto.

english: When was the last time you crossed a river?
spanish: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que cruzaste un río?

english: Why don't we form a study group?
spanish: ¿Por qué no hacemos un grupo de estudio?

english: You have not seen it.
spanish: No lo has visto.

english: Tom had to take care of Mary by himself.
spanish: Tom tuvo que cuidar a Mary él mismo.

english: I'm not as rich as I once was.
spanish: No soy tan rico como era.

english: You must pay attention to him.
spanish: Tienes que prestarle atención.

english: Who do you think will win the tournament?
spanish: ¿Quién crees que ganará el torneo?

english: I only have one brother.
spanish: Tengo un solo hermano.

english: Tom walked over to Mary.
spanish: Tom caminó hacia Mary.

english: The house I'm living in isn't very large.
spanish: La casa en que vivo no es muy grande.

english: I'm leaving town for a few days.
spanish: Me voy de la ciudad por un par de días.

english: What's your favorite web browser?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu navegador favorito?

english: He won the race again.
spanish: Él ganó la carrera otra vez.

english: Have you ever dealt with a problem like this?
spanish: ¿Has tratado alguna vez con un problema como este?

english: I'm looking at my reflection in the lake.
spanish: Miro mi reflejo en el lago.

english: The train is bound for Niigata.
spanish: El tren va hacia Niigata.

english: He has a large desk in his small room.
spanish: Tiene un gran escritorio en su pequeña habitación.

english: We are forty kilometers away from the capital city.
spanish: Estamos a cuarenta kilómetros de la capital.

english: I can't believe you remembered.
spanish: No puedo creer que te acordaste.

english: I was late to school.
spanish: Llegué tarde a la escuela.

english: Tom didn't know that Mary liked to cook.
spanish: Tom no sabía que a Mary le gustaba cocinar.

english: Can you go with us?
spanish: ¿Puedes ir con nosotros?

english: I found the comic book very interesting.
spanish: Encuentro el comic muy interesante.

english: There isn't anyone in the room.
spanish: No hay nadie en la habitación.

english: How did you and Tom meet?
spanish: ¿Cómo se conocieron con Tomás?

english: A man suddenly appeared in the doorway.
spanish: De repente apareció un hombre en la puerta.

english: Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level.
spanish: El agua hierve a los 100 grados Celsius a nivel del mar.

english: My dog is smaller than yours is.
spanish: Mi perro es más chico que el tuyo.

english: Who's in charge of this matter?
spanish: ¿Quién atiende este asunto?

english: Apart from a few minor mistakes, your composition was excellent.
spanish: Quitando unos poco errores leves, tu redacción fue excelente.

english: Tom built this with his dad.
spanish: Tom construyó esto con su padre.

english: The police officer drew his revolver.
spanish: El policía sacó el revolver.

english: Can you solve the puzzle?
spanish: ¿Puedes resolver el misterio?

english: Do what you believe is right.
spanish: Haz lo que creas correcto.

english: He died of natural causes.
spanish: Murió de causas naturales.

english: Shakespeare created many famous characters.
spanish: Shakespeare creó muchos personajes famosos.

english: Tom claimed that he came from a rich family.
spanish: Tom sostenía que él proviene de una familia rica.

english: When you're mad, count to ten before speaking.
spanish: Cuando estés furioso, cuenta hasta diez antes de hablar.

english: I know he is watching me.
spanish: Yo sé que él me está observando.

english: I like your way of smiling.
spanish: Me gusta la manera en que sonríes.

english: She took her bike to the store.
spanish: Se fue a la tienda en bicicleta.

english: The couple separated, never to see each other again.
spanish: La pareja se separó, para no volver a verse nunca más.

english: Many of the workers had missing fingers.
spanish: A muchos de los trabajadores les faltan algunos dedos.

english: Since my mother was sick, I couldn't go there.
spanish: Como mi madre estaba enferma, no pude ir allí.

english: I could never go back there again.
spanish: No podría volver nunca allí.

english: I didn't get along with her.
spanish: No me llevaba bien con ella.

english: We left him some cake.
spanish: Le dejamos un poco de tarta.

english: Tom was accused of collaborating with the enemy.
spanish: Tom fue acusado de colaborar con el enemigo.

english: What have you done with your car?
spanish: ¿Qué hiciste con tu auto?

english: I believe he'll be with us today.
spanish: Creo que hoy estará con nosotros.

english: He made her feel like he wanted her to leave.
spanish: Le hizo sentir que quería que se fuera.

english: I don't want you to get hurt.
spanish: No quiero que te lastimes.

english: She is angry with me.
spanish: Ella está enfadada conmigo.

english: I want her to do the difficult work.
spanish: Quiero que ella haga el trabajo difícil.

english: How did you end up here?
spanish: ¿Cómo terminaste aquí?

english: Tom wants to buy a house in Boston.
spanish: Tom quiere comprar una casa en Boston.

english: It was very cold this morning.
spanish: Esta mañana hacía mucho frío.

english: Don't believe anything Tom says.
spanish: No creas nada de lo que dice Tom.

english: My father has been dead for ten years.
spanish: Mi padre lleva muerto diez años.

english: Answer the telephone, will you?
spanish: ¿Puedes contestar el teléfono?

english: I thought you said Tom would never hurt Mary.
spanish: Pensaba que tú dijiste que Tom nunca haría daño a Mary.

english: I believe you know what this is all about.
spanish: Creo que tú sabes de que se trata todo esto.

english: I've got a feeling that Tom won't graduate this year.
spanish: Tengo la sensación de que Tom no se va a graduar este año.

english: She had to use her dictionary many times.
spanish: Ella tuvo que usar el diccionario muchas veces.

english: I held up my hand to stop a taxi.
spanish: Levanté la mano para detener un taxi.

english: The sleeves of this coat have to be lengthened.
spanish: Hay que alargar las mangas de este abrigo.

english: We won't start the meeting until Tom comes.
spanish: No comenzaremos la reunión hasta que llegue Tomás.

english: I bought a set of table linen.
spanish: Compré un juego de manteles.

english: That is my own affair.
spanish: Eso es asunto mío.

english: We ought to help each other.
spanish: Deberíamos ayudarnos los unos a los otros.

english: Please come back at 2:30.
spanish: Por favor, vuelve a las dos y media.

english: Aim the video camera at that group.
spanish: Dirige la cámara a aquel grupo.

english: Tom never talks about his childhood.
spanish: Tom no habla nunca de su infancia.

english: Painters such as Picasso are rare.

spanish: María y Tom experimentan tiempos felices juntos.

english: I'm not as talkative as you.
spanish: No soy tan charlatana como tú.

english: A year has twelve months.

spanish: Tom espera poder visitar Boston antes de morir.

spanish: Es tan simple como eso.

spanish: Tom no tiene que disculparse con Mary.

spanish: Aquel barco naufragó en las costas de Chile.

english: Do you have any objection to this plan?

english: I wish I could speak English.
spanish: Desearía poder hablar inglés.

english: He knows how to argue with the manager.
spanish: Él sabe cómo discutir con el gerente.

english: You have nothing to lose.

spanish: Me puse bajo el paraguas de mi amigo.

spanish: Creo que Tom está mintiendo.

english: It wasn't cheaper than any of the other stores.
spanish: No era más barato que en ninguna de las otras tiendas.

spanish: Tom vio donde vive Mary.

english: How many do you need?
spanish: ¿Cuántas necesitas?

spanish: Mi padre maneja un restaurante.

english: Someone is playing the piano.
spanish: Alguien está tocando el piano.

english: Today is a good day to die.
spanish: Hoy es un buen día para morir.

english: This is where I was born.
spanish: Aquí es donde nací.

english: I wonder how many horses died during the Civil War.
spanish: Me pregunto cuántos caballos murieron en la Guerra Civil.

english: How many people did you see in the park?
spanish: ¿Cuánta gente viste en el parque?

english: Thank you for buying me this magazine.
spanish: Gracias por comprarme esta revista.

english: I've taken the first step.
spanish: He dado el primer paso.

english: She's at the hotel now.
spanish: Ella está en el hotel ahora.

english: I hate cold winter days.
spanish: Odio los días fríos de invierno.

english: Tom wants to know when Mary will go shopping.
spanish: Tom quiere saber cuándo Mary irá de compras.

english: Even a child can answer it.
spanish: Incluso un niño puede responderlo.

english: The photographs are the only proof we have.
spanish: Las fotografías son las únicas pruebas que tenemos.

english: He will be a good husband to my sister.
spanish: Él se convertirá en un buen esposo para mi hermana.

english: Tom went to Boston to meet Mary.
spanish: Tom fue a ver a Mary a Boston.

english: There are many galaxies in the universe.
spanish: Hay muchas galaxias en el universo.

english: Can I use my laptop in the bath?
spanish: ¿Puedo usar mi portátil en la bañera?

english: Have you ever been to Europe?
spanish: ¿Alguna vez has estado en Europa?

english: The police detained several suspects for questioning.
spanish: La Policía detuvo a varios sospechosos para ser interrogados.

english: I explained the process to him.
spanish: Le expliqué el proceso.

english: Tom is staying in Boston.
spanish: Tom se está quedando en Boston.

english: He'll make a good lawyer sooner or later.
spanish: Tarde o temprano, el será un buen abogado.

english: Tom was murdered last night.
spanish: Tomás fue asesinado anoche.

english: Tom just got back from his lunch break.
spanish: Tom justo regresó de su hora de comer.

english: I came here to see Tom.
spanish: He venido aquí para ver a Tom.

english: I don't know much about computers.
spanish: No sé mucho de computadoras.

english: We live in a complicated world.
spanish: Vivimos en un mundo complicado.

english: The river is fifty yards across.
spanish: El río tiene 50 yardas de ancho.

english: I thought you'd gone and left me.
spanish: Pensé que que te habías ido y me habías dejado.

english: I want to know everything.

english: You'll forget about me someday.
spanish: Me olvidarás algún día.

english: Tom works at a bank.
spanish: Tom trabaja en un banco.

english: Without your help, we wouldn't have finished in time.
spanish: Sin tu ayuda no habría podido terminar a tiempo.

english: I know what he did.

english: Tom has returned from Boston.
spanish: Tom ha vuelto de Boston.

english: Now, what do you think?
spanish: ¿Y ahora qué piensas?

spanish: ¿Por qué todos ustedes se ven tan felices?

english: Did you enjoy the party yesterday?
spanish: ¿Se divirtió ayer en la fiesta?

english: He was welcomed wherever he went.
spanish: Él era bienvenido a dondequiera que iba.

english: Several of my friends have been to Japan this year.
spanish: Muchos de mis amigos estuvieron en Japón este año.

english: Tom did this to me.
spanish: Tom me hizo esto.

english: There is almost no water in this bottle.
spanish: Casi no hay agua en esta botella.

english: It's a room large enough for a library.
spanish: Es una habitación bastante capaz para biblioteca.

english: Don't be ashamed of yourself.
spanish: No te avergüences de ti mismo.

english: Fatal errors arise from carelessness.
spanish: Errores fatales surgen de la falta de atención.

english: Tell Tom to get ready.
spanish: Dile a Tom que se aliste.

english: He is afraid of dogs.
spanish: Él le teme a los perros.

english: I'm not convinced at all.
