english: What are some foods commonly eaten in America?
spanish: ¿Cuáles son algunos alimentos comúnmente ingeridos en Estados Unidos?

english: Tom's family is in Boston.
spanish: La familia de Tom está en Boston.

english: You'll definitely fail if you don't study more.
spanish: Está claro que te van a suspender si no estudias más.

english: Are you happy in your house?
spanish: ¿Estás feliz en tu casa?

english: I should have taken the doctor's advice.
spanish: Debería haber hecho lo que me dijo la médica.

english: Tom asked if he was invited.
spanish: Tom preguntó si estaba invitado.

english: Tom is facing financial problems.
spanish: Tom está pasando por problemas financieros.

english: It may possibly be fine tomorrow.
spanish: Posiblemente haga buen día mañana.

english: I know what has happened.
spanish: Yo sé lo que ha pasado.

english: I thought Tom had a dog.
spanish: Pensé que Tom tenía un perro.

english: Tom likes to go swimming in the summer.
spanish: A Tom le gusta ir a nadar en el verano.

english: I must seize this opportunity.
spanish: Debo atrapar esta oportunidad.

english: He didn't get in until 2 o'clock in the morning.
spanish: Él no regresó hasta las dos de la mañana.

english: Tom told Mary he wouldn't let her go by herself.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary que no la dejaría ir sola.

english: He wore a mask so no one would recognize him.
spanish: Él llevaba una máscara, de forma que nadie pudiera reconocerle.

english: I don't know if Tom is dead or alive.
spanish: No sé si Tom está vivo o muerto.

english: It's not easy to be honest all the time.
spanish: No es fácil ser siempre honesto.

english: Are you just going to stand there all day?
spanish: ¿Te vas a quedar ahí parado todo el día?

english: It took me several hours to cook it.
spanish: Cocinarlo me tomó varias horas.

english: No, I'm not a teacher. I'm only a student.
spanish: No, no soy maestro. Soy solo un estudiante.

english: The slippery snake slithered right out of his hand.
spanish: La escurridiza serpiente se deslizó fuera de su mano.

english: Tom owes us a favor.
spanish: Tomás nos debe un favor.

english: Tom had a problem with his car.
spanish: Tom tuvo un problema con su coche.

english: I can't figure out how to operate this machine.
spanish: No puedo descubrir como operar esta máquina.

english: Can I have one of these?
spanish: ¿Puedo tener una de éstas?

spanish: Él me ordenó hacerlo.

english: Why do you think it happened?
spanish: ¿Por qué piensas que eso sucedió?

english: Excuse me, but where is the library?
spanish: Perdone, pero ¿dónde está la biblioteca?

english: She is accustomed to sitting.
spanish: Ella está acostumbrada a sentarse.

english: Tom didn't tell anyone else.
spanish: Tom no se lo dijo a nadie más.

english: He was a wonderful man.
spanish: Él fue un hombre maravilloso.

english: He wiped his nose on his sleeve.
spanish: Él se refregó la nariz en su manga.

english: They're going to have a baby.
spanish: Ellos van a tener un bebé.

english: I got lost trying to find the library.
spanish: Me perdí tratando de llegar a la biblioteca.

english: Tom doesn't know what happened.
spanish: Tom no sabe lo que ocurrió.

english: Tom will be returning soon.

spanish: Mi padre me ha comprado una cámara de fotos por mi cumpleaños.

spanish: Tom cumplirá treinta el año que viene.

english: I need to charge my cell phone.
spanish: Necesito cargar mi celular.

spanish: Tom es el hombre de mis sueños.

english: Tom wasn't polite to Mary.
spanish: Tom no fue educado con Mary.

english: I think you're on the right track.
spanish: Creo que estás en el buen camino.

spanish: ¿Puedes entender lo que está intentando decir?

spanish: No tengo dinero, pero tengo sueños.

spanish: Llegué tarde a casa.

spanish: ¿Y si alguien matara a Tom? ¿Qué harías?

spanish: ¿Qué comida encuentras que sabe mejor?

spanish: ¿A qué hora sueles irte a la cama?

spanish: Algunas tiendas le descuentan el precio.

spanish: Tom es mucho más joven que Mary.

spanish: ¿Qué ciudad es la más peligrosa?

spanish: ¿Cómo te gustan preparados los huevos?

spanish: Decidí ir a la universidad para especializarme en Inglés.

english: I arrived in Boston at 2:30.
spanish: Llegué a Boston a las dos y media.

spanish: Un avión está volando sobre la ciudad.

english: Tom did it three times.
spanish: Tomás lo hizo tres veces.

english: All of us climbed aboard quickly.
spanish: Todos subimos rápidamente a bordo.

english: I felt sympathy for him.
spanish: Sentí simpatía por él.

english: I'm looking for an apartment to rent.
spanish: Estoy buscando un departamento para arrendar.

english: I doubt Tom knows Mary.
spanish: Dudo de que Tomás conozca a María.

english: I will lend you whatever book you need.
spanish: Te prestaré cualquier libro que necesites.

english: I hope you had a nice trip.
spanish: Espero que hayas tenido un buen viaje.

english: Everywhere you look you can see children playing.
spanish: Dondequiera que mires podrás ver niños jugando.

english: Let me know the result as soon as you can.
spanish: Hágame saber el resultado tan pronto como pueda.

spanish: A Tom le falta confianza en sí mismo.

english: She translated the book from Japanese into English.
spanish: Ella tradujo el libro del japonés al inglés.

english: She was kind enough to show me around the town.
spanish: Ella fue tan amable de mostrarme la ciudad.

spanish: Él le dejó una fortuna a su hijo.

english: We had a heavy rain last night.

english: I have a slight fever today.

english: It's more complicated than that.
spanish: Es más complicado que eso.

spanish: En Nueva York un dólar equivalía a ocho chelines.

english: The fitting room is occupied.
spanish: El probador está ocupado.

english: Do you know who took the call?
spanish: ¿Sabes quién contestó la llamada?

spanish: No hagas preguntas, solo sigue órdenes.

english: They decided to put an end to the discussion.
spanish: Ellos decidieron terminar la discusión.

spanish: Tom se paró y fue hacia la ventana.

english: He disguised himself as a woman.
spanish: Él se disfrazó de mujer.

english: Will you go on a picnic with me?

english: Can you give me a discount?
spanish: ¿Me puede hacer un descuento?

english: As soon as we got there, it began to rain.
spanish: Tan pronto como llegamos allí, empezó a llover.

english: He left the house without saying goodbye.
spanish: Se fue de la casa sin decir adiós.

english: Is it hot over there?

english: I don't want to die here.
spanish: No quiero morir acá.

spanish: Quiero lucir distinto.

spanish: Ella parece joven, pero de hecho es mayor que tú.

spanish: El sindicato consiguió un aumento salarial del 5%.

spanish: Tom supo que Mary había besado a John.

spanish: Me quedaré tres días más.

english: Do you remember the day when we saw the accident?
spanish: ¿Te acuerdas del día en que vimos ese accidente?

english: The beauty of the scenery was beyond description.
spanish: La belleza de aquel paisaje era indescriptible.

english: Tom doesn't know what Mary wants to eat for dinner.
spanish: Tom no sabe qué quiere Mary para cenar.

english: Who's the richest person in Australia?
spanish: ¿Quién es la persona más rica de Australia?

spanish: A decir verdad, no me gusta.

spanish: Ella abandonó a los hijos.

spanish: Él corrió un gran riesgo en la jungla.

spanish: Tom se lo explicó muy meticulosamente a Mary.

spanish: Sí, le besé, ¿y qué?

spanish: ¿Van a participar en el concurso?

english: I'm only interested in the truth.
spanish: Solo estoy interesado en la verdad.

spanish: Tom quería hablar con el padre de María.

english: I don't like both of them.

spanish: ¿El inglés es más difícil que el japonés?

english: The climate in Japan is milder than in England.
spanish: El clima en Japón es más templado que en Inglaterra.

english: The knight swore an oath of allegiance to the king.
spanish: El caballero hizo un juramento de lealtad al rey.

english: The garden is in front of the house.
spanish: El jardín está al frente de la casa.

english: Today is a special day.
spanish: Hoy es un día especial.

english: The war ended in 1954.
spanish: La guerra se terminó en 1954.

english: How much will all the treatments cost?
spanish: ¿Cuánto van a costar todos los tratamientos?

english: We want to go to Boston and Chicago.
spanish: Queremos ir de Boston a Chicago.

english: I'd like to talk to one of your guests.
spanish: Me gustaría hablar con uno de tus invitados.

english: My work is my passion.
spanish: Mi trabajo es mi pasión.

english: You can go to the station by bus.
spanish: Puedes ir a la estación en autobús.

english: You have to push that door to open it.
spanish: Tienes que empujar esa puerta para abrirla.

english: You'd better not go out today.
spanish: Mejor no hubieras salido hoy.

english: Tom and Mary have just bought a new car.
spanish: Tom y Mary acaban de comprar un coche nuevo.

english: Thank you for returning my call.
spanish: Gracias por llamarme de vuelta.

english: Let go of my arm.
spanish: Suelta mi brazo.

english: Tom cut his hand when he fell.
spanish: Tom se cortó la mano cuando se cayó.

english: Do you feel like eating?
spanish: ¿Tienes ganas de comer?

english: This store isn't very big.
spanish: Esta tienda no es muy grande.

english: Big men are not necessarily strong men.
spanish: Los hombres grandes no necesariamente son fuertes.

english: He gets up at seven.
spanish: Se levanta a las siete.

english: I think this is enough.
spanish: Creo que ya está bien.

english: That tower you see over there is the Eiffel Tower.
spanish: La torre que ves allá es la torre Eiffel.

english: Please turn out the lights when you leave.
spanish: Por favor, apaga las luces al salir.

english: I can't find my shoes.
spanish: No encuentro mis zapatos.

english: I want to go to bed early tonight.
spanish: Esta noche quiero acostarme temprano.

english: Tom was on the floor.
spanish: Tom estaba en el piso.

english: I've decided to tell the truth.
spanish: He decidido decir la verdad.

english: Please explain the rule to me.
spanish: Acláreme la regla, por favor.

english: I was happy to see Tom.
spanish: Estaba feliz de ver a Tom.

english: Tom confessed that he had stolen the money.
spanish: Tom confesó que él había robado el dinero.

english: It's on the tip of my tongue.
spanish: Lo tengo en la punta de la lengua.

english: This room is too dark.
spanish: Esta habitación está demasiado oscura.

english: What is the reason for that lie?
spanish: ¿Cuál es el motivo para aquella mentira?

english: Tom knows this is important to Mary.
spanish: Tom sabe que esto es importante para Mary.

english: Tom concealed his anger from Mary.
spanish: Tom le ocultó su ira a Mary.

english: Tom passed out because of the heat.
spanish: Tom se desmayó a causa del calor.

english: He came back at about nine last night.
spanish: Él volvió anoche sobre las nueve.

english: Tom isn't as old as he looks.
spanish: Tom no es tan viejo como parece.

english: Please send me a catalogue.
spanish: Envíame un catálogo por favor.

english: "Where is my classroom?" "It's on the third floor."
spanish: "¿Dónde queda mi sala?" "En el tercer piso."

english: Do you want to go again?
spanish: ¿Quieres ir de nuevo?

english: Sugar replaced honey as a sweetener.
spanish: El azúcar sustituyó a la miel como endulzante.

english: I'm glad you asked me to join you.
spanish: Me alegro de que me pidieras unirme a ti.

english: He thought that I was very tired.
spanish: Él pensó que yo estaba exhausto.

english: He's mad at his daughter.
spanish: Él está enfadado con su hija.

english: I think we have more work to do.
spanish: Creo que tenemos más trabajo por hacer.

english: It's a question of taste.
spanish: Es cuestión de gustos.

english: Tom confessed to stealing the money.
spanish: Tom confesó haber robado el dinero.

english: I doubt this will work.
spanish: Dudo de que vaya a funcionar.

english: Give me a piece of chalk.
spanish: Dadme un trozo de tiza.

english: The capital of the United Kingdom is London.
spanish: La capital de Reino Unido es Londres.

english: The archer killed the deer.
spanish: El arquero mató al ciervo.

english: May I see your license?
spanish: ¿Puedo ver tu permiso?

english: He did not like to travel.
spanish: A él no le gustaba viajar.

english: Choose a food from each part of the menu.
spanish: Elige una comida de cada parte del menú.

english: We took pictures of the dolphins.
spanish: Hicimos fotos a los delfines.

english: How long do we have to stay here?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo tenemos que quedarnos aquí?

english: We will have a music contest soon.
spanish: Pronto tendremos un concurso de música.

english: Can she ride a bicycle?
spanish: ¿Ella sabe andar en bicicleta?

english: Don't be late to school again.
spanish: No vuelvas a llegar tarde al colegio.

english: The Texans began to organize their own army.
spanish: Los texanos empezaron a organizar su propio ejército.

english: Have you seen my recipe book?
spanish: ¿Viste mi libro de recetas?

english: I like my job very much.
spanish: Me gusta mucho mi trabajo.

english: You look like a baboon.
spanish: Parecés un papión.

english: I'll keep it in mind.
spanish: Lo tendré en cuenta.

english: You won't get a second chance.
spanish: No tendrás una segunda oportunidad.

english: I've met him on several occasions.
spanish: Lo encontré en varias ocasiones.

english: We felt the coolness when we arrived at the river.
spanish: Sentimos la frescura al llegar al río.

english: Would you please not leave the door open?
spanish: ¿Podría por favor no dejar la puerta abierta?

english: That was her chance to show what she could do.
spanish: Esa fue su oportunidad de demostrar lo que podía hacer.

english: I haven't seen Tom since yesterday.
spanish: No veo a Tomás desde ayer.

english: I thought you said you liked to try new things.
spanish: Pensé que habías dicho que te gustaba probar cosas nuevas.

english: I thought we had a deal.
spanish: Pensé que teníamos un trato.

english: A white-haired man was playing an accordion outside the shop.
spanish: Un hombre de pelo blanco tocaba el acordeón afuera de la tienda.

english: I have a good sense of smell.
spanish: Tengo un buen sentido del olfato.

english: I think it's time I moved to a smaller apartment.
spanish: Creo que es hora de que me mude a un piso más pequeño.

english: He was satisfied with the work he had done.
spanish: Estaba satisfecho con el trabajo que había realizado.

english: I have so many things I don't need.
spanish: Tengo tantas cosas que no necesito.

english: He asked her advice about the problem.
spanish: Él le pidió a ella su consejo acerca del problema.

english: The boss gave us all a day off.
spanish: El jefe nos dio a todos un día libre.

english: This train gets to Chicago at 9 o'clock tonight.
spanish: Este tren llega a Chicago a las 9 de la noche.

english: I can't pretend to like him.
spanish: No puedo fingir que me gusta.

english: He was calm in the presence of danger.
spanish: Él estaba calmado ante el peligro.

english: She's made up her mind to quit the company.
spanish: Ella ha decidido dejar la compañía.

english: What have you bought your girlfriend for Christmas?
spanish: ¿Qué le has comprado a tu novia por Navidad?

english: He readily agreed to my proposal.
spanish: Él aceptó sin reparos mi propuesta.

english: Did Tom buy that for Mary?
spanish: ¿Tom ha comprado eso para Mary?

english: Russia signed its own peace treaty with Germany.
spanish: Rusia firmó su propio tratado de paz con Alemania.

english: Tom had an asthma attack.
spanish: Tom tuvo un ataque de asma.

english: You weren't supposed to come today.
spanish: No se suponía que vinierais hoy.

english: The medicine had an immediate effect.
spanish: El remedio tuvo un efecto inmediato.

english: I shave almost every day.
spanish: Me afeito casi todos los días.

english: Don't be afraid to try new things.
spanish: No tenga miedo de experimentar cosas nuevas.

english: To make money one must want money.
spanish: Para hacer dinero, uno debe primero desear el dinero.

english: He cut off a slice of meat.
spanish: Cortó una loncha de carne.

english: I have to choose between the two.
spanish: Tengo que elegir entre esos dos.

english: No one cares what Tom thinks.
spanish: A nadie le importa lo que piense Tom.

english: I'll support you as long as I live.
spanish: Yo te sostendré mientras viva.

english: Those colors go well together.
spanish: Esos colores contrastan muy bien.

english: Why are you driving Tom's car?
spanish: ¿Por qué conduces el coche de Tom?

english: We must be there at seven, so hurry up.
spanish: Tenemos que estar a las siete, así que date prisa.

english: He took something out of his pocket.
spanish: Él se sacó algo del bolsillo.

english: Don't look a gift horse in the mouth.
spanish: A caballo regalado no le mires el diente.

english: The surviving refugees longed for freedom.
spanish: Los refugiados supervivientes aspiraban a la libertad.

english: The drought did severe damage to the harvest.
spanish: La sequía perjudicó gravemente a la cosecha.

english: Did you see a brown wallet around here?
spanish: ¿Has visto una billetera marrón por aquí?

english: Staying at home is boring.
spanish: Es aburrido quedarse en casa.

english: It's difficult to live in this city.
spanish: Es difícil vivir en esta ciudad.

english: I'm not sure what my children want for Christmas.
spanish: No estoy seguro de qué quieren mis niños para Navidad.

english: I just want to be sure.
spanish: Sólo quiero estar seguro.

english: Tom doesn't believe anything Mary says.
spanish: Tom no cree nada de lo que Mary dice.

english: Tom asked me to be more attentive.
spanish: Tom me pidió que fuera más atento.

english: Excuse me, could I get past?
spanish: Perdóneme, ¿puedo pasar?

english: Don't take me seriously. I'm only joking.
spanish: No me tomes en serio. Sólo estoy bromeando.

english: I haven't slept well recently.
spanish: No duermo bien últimamente.

english: We'll need an extra ten dollars.
spanish: Necesitaremos diez dólares extra.

english: Skiing is my favorite sport.
spanish: El esquí es mi deporte favorito.

english: I want to eat out tonight.
spanish: Esta noche quiero salir a comer.

english: I don't understand what you are trying to say.
spanish: No entiendo lo que quiere decir.

english: I helped him walk across the street.
spanish: Lo ayudé a cruzar la calle.

english: He listened to the music with his eyes closed.
spanish: Él cerró los ojos y escuchó la música.

english: They're all the same size.
spanish: Todas tienen el mismo tamaño.

english: Electrical appliances have made housework easier.
spanish: Los electrodomésticos han hecho más fáciles las tareas del hogar.

english: This is an illegal procedure.
spanish: Este es un procedimiento ilegal.

english: Tom talked with Mary all night.
spanish: Tom habló con Mary toda la noche.

english: She wouldn't speak to him.
spanish: Ella no hablaría con él.

english: Mail this letter tomorrow morning.
spanish: Manda esta carta mañana en la mañana.

english: What time do we leave?
spanish: ¿A qué hora nos vamos?

english: She is the type men call "stunning."
spanish: Ella es el tipo que los hombres llaman "imponente".

english: If it were true, what would you do?
spanish: Si fuera cierto, ¿qué harías?

english: I didn't expect that Mary would come so soon.
spanish: No esperaba que Mary viniera tan pronto.

english: He can speak only a little English.
spanish: Él sólo sabe hablar un poco de inglés.

english: In Australia, they speak English.
spanish: En Australia hablan inglés.

english: He was bound hand and foot.
spanish: Estaba atado de pies y manos.

english: There is no way to confirm that he is alive.
spanish: No hay modo de confirmar que él esté vivo.

english: Tom doesn't have to listen to what Mary says.
spanish: Tom no tiene que escuchar lo que Mary diga.

english: Tom was killed in a train accident.
spanish: Tom murió en un accidente de tren.

english: I don't even know how to dance.
spanish: Yo ni sé bailar.

english: She was ready to give him back all his money.
spanish: Ella estaba dispuesta a devolverle a él todo su dinero.

english: He won the first prize at the chess tournament.
spanish: Él ganó el primer premio en el torneo de ajedrez.

english: Don't throw away this magazine.
spanish: No tire esta revista.

english: I didn't know anyone at the party.
spanish: Nadie en la fiesta me resultaba conocido.

english: He is still very much alive.
spanish: Todavía está muy vivo.

english: I want you in my office in one hour.
spanish: Te quiero en mi oficina en una hora.

english: My sister is a very beautiful girl.
spanish: Mi hermana es una niña bellísima.

english: How many times a day should you feed a dog?
spanish: ¿Cuántas veces al día debe uno alimentar a un perro?

english: This is my first time, so I'm a little nervous.
spanish: Esta es mi primera vez, así que estoy un poco nervioso.

english: No one I know wears a tie anymore.
spanish: Ya nadie que conozca usa corbata.

english: Where did you buy this guitar?
spanish: ¿Dónde compraste esta guitarra?

english: I feel that I should help you.
spanish: Siento que debería ayudarle.

english: Tom doesn't have much energy today.
spanish: Tom no tiene mucha energía hoy.

english: I wrote to her last month.
spanish: Yo le escribí a ella el mes pasado.

english: Tom can't picture himself as a teacher.
spanish: Tom no se puede imaginar como profesor.

english: I am expecting a letter from her.
spanish: Estoy esperando una carta suya.

english: I wish I had more time to talk with you.
spanish: Ojalá tuviera más tiempo para conversar contigo.

english: I have seen that girl before.
spanish: A esa chica la he visto antes.

english: Tom felt a sharp pain in his stomach.
spanish: Tom sintió un dolor agudo en el estómago.

english: You can't be friends with everybody.
spanish: No puedes ser amigo de todos.

english: This was too much for Tom.
spanish: Esto fue demasiado para Tom.

english: There are no dinosaurs or mammoths to be found now.
spanish: Ya no quedan dinosaurios o mamuts por encontrar.

english: None of my friends know.
spanish: Ninguna de mis amigas lo sabe.

english: Why didn't you answer me?
spanish: ¿Por qué no me respondiste?

english: I want to know what happened to your car.
spanish: Quiero saber qué le pasó a tu auto.

english: Tom is having his Bar Mitzvah next month.
spanish: Tom tiene su Bar Mitsvah el próximo mes.

english: Which do you usually drink, wine or beer?
spanish: ¿Qué bebe usted por lo general, vino o cerveza?

english: I don't know what's best for me.
spanish: No sé lo que es mejor para mí.

english: Not every country belongs to the U.N.
spanish: No todo país es miembro de la ONU.

english: Accuracy is important in arithmetic.
spanish: La precisión es importante en aritmética.

english: You don't sound very surprised.
spanish: No suenas muy sorprendido.

english: I'm sure Tom will complain.
spanish: Estoy seguro de que Tom se quejará.

english: This is a daily newspaper.
spanish: Es un diario.

english: He could do nothing but watch.
spanish: No pudo hacer nada excepto mirar.

english: Wear something warm. It's going to be cold this afternoon.
spanish: Abrígate bien. Va a hacer frío esta tarde.

english: If you were in my shoes, what would you think?
spanish: ¿Qué pensarías si estuvieras en mi lugar?

english: We are playing tennis this weekend.
spanish: Vamos a jugar tenis esta semana.

english: Tom doesn't know anything about Mary's family.
spanish: Tom no sabe nada acerca de la familia de Mary.

english: I have it at home.
spanish: Lo tengo en casa.

english: I have almost no information about the problem.
spanish: No tengo casi información sobre el problema.

english: I can understand you to some extent.
spanish: Te puedo entender en cierta medida.

english: We'll furnish you with everything you need.
spanish: Le proporcionaremos todo lo que necesite.

english: He seems to have missed the point.
spanish: Él parece no haber entendido de qué se trata.

english: I'm going to see Mary this afternoon.
spanish: Voy a ver a Mary esta tarde.

english: He made a joke about it.
spanish: Él bromeó al respecto.

english: I met him by chance on the train this morning.
spanish: Me encontré con él por casualidad en el tren esta mañana.

english: I just want a clear answer.
spanish: Solo quiero una respuesta clara.

english: Tom isn't afraid of death.
spanish: Tom no le teme a la muerte.

english: We must consider all the options.
spanish: Hemos de considerar todas las opciones.

english: I want you to meet someone very special.
spanish: Quiero que conozcas a alguien muy especial.

english: You can't kill someone that's already dead.
spanish: No puedes matar a alguien que ya está muerto.

english: He likes French more than German.
spanish: A él le gusta más el francés que el alemán.

english: I did everything for you.
spanish: Te lo di todo.

english: Is that car too small?
spanish: ¿Es ese auto demasiado chico?

english: Do you have shoes and socks?
spanish: ¿Tienes calcetines y zapatos?

english: It hardly ever rains in the area.
spanish: Casi nunca llueve en esta región.

english: Tom, Mary and John sat around the kitchen table.
spanish: Tom, Mary y John se sentaron alrededor de la mesa de la cocina.

english: I'm trying to be happy.
spanish: Estoy tratando de ser feliz.

english: I'd prefer that black one over there.
spanish: Preferiría aquella negra de allí.

english: I have a gift for you.
spanish: Tengo un regalo para ustedes.

english: He had his head in the clouds in class.
spanish: Él tenía la cabeza en las nubes en clase.

english: Gargling with salt water helps stop coughing.
spanish: Hacer gárgaras con agua con sal ayuda para la tos.

english: How much will it cost?
spanish: ¿Cuánto costará esto?

english: They consider him a hero.
spanish: Le consideran un héroe.

english: You're not telling the truth.
spanish: No estás diciendo la verdad.

english: Some Canadian territories have almost no people.
spanish: En algunos territorios canadienses casi no hay personas.

english: You really don't want to know.
spanish: De verdad, no quieres saberlo.

english: Did Tom see what happened?
spanish: ¿Tom vio lo que pasó?

english: You are a very good artist.
spanish: Eres un muy buen artista.

english: Don't handle my books with dirty hands.
spanish: No toques mis libros con las manos sucias.

english: I still think Tom is hiding something.
spanish: Todavía pienso que Tom está ocultando algo.

english: It was obvious that they had told a lie.
spanish: Era obvio que ellos habían mentido.

english: I like to play soccer.
spanish: Me gusta jugar futbol.

english: Tom admitted that he had committed the murder.
spanish: Tom admitió que había cometido el homicidio.

english: Tom invited Mary and her friends to dinner.
spanish: Tom invitó a Mary y sus amigos a cenar.

english: Not knowing what to do, I asked him for advice.
spanish: Al no saber qué debía hacer, le pedí consejo.

english: I've never woken up this early.
spanish: Nunca me he despertado tan temprano.

english: You're lucky you didn't get shot.
spanish: Eres afortunado de que no te hayan disparado.

english: My cell phone was off.
spanish: Mi celular estaba apagado.

english: Won't you come and see me this weekend?
spanish: ¿Quieres venir a verme este fin de semana?

english: Wind is a cheap and clean source of energy.
spanish: El viento es una fuente de energía limpia y barata.

english: Tomorrow I have to go shopping.
spanish: Mañana tengo que ir de compras.

english: Don't you have a meeting?
spanish: ¿No tenés una reunión?

english: He is poor, but happy.
spanish: Es pobre, pero feliz.

english: He addressed the audience in a soft voice.
spanish: Se dirigió a su auditorio con una voz dulce.

english: I didn't do my homework.
spanish: No hice mis deberes.

english: Tom is away on a business trip.
spanish: Tom está fuera en un viaje de negocios.

english: We didn't get much rain last spring.
spanish: No tuvimos mucha lluvia la primavera pasada.

english: He will not say yes.
spanish: Él no dirá que sí.

english: Tom sat next to Mary on the bus.
spanish: Tom se sentó junto a Mary en el autobús.

english: It's just that I don't want to die today.
spanish: Es solo que no quiero morir hoy.

english: I'm convinced that this job is perfect for you.
spanish: Estoy convencido de que este trabajo es perfecto para ti.

english: He sat on the bank.
spanish: Se sentó en el banco.

english: Tom never said a word.
spanish: Tom nunca dijo una palabra.

english: Let me introduce you to my family.
spanish: Permítame presentarle a mi familia.

english: I heard him go down the stairs.
spanish: Lo oí bajar por las escaleras.

english: Could you go get some wood for the fire?
spanish: ¿Puedes ir a buscar leña?

english: Tom found Mary a job.
spanish: Tom encontró un empleo para Mary.

english: My uncle comes back from America next Monday.
spanish: Mi tío vuelve de Estados Unidos el lunes que viene.

english: You seem to hate women.
spanish: Parece que odiás a las mujeres.

english: Is there any place you recommend?
spanish: ¿Hay algún lugar que recomiendes?

english: I'm saving money for a car.
spanish: Estoy ahorrando para comprarme un coche.

english: It was a bad idea.
spanish: Era una mala idea.

english: I hope he isn't ill.
spanish: Espero que no esté enfermo.

english: He got a broken jaw and lost some teeth.
spanish: Se rompió la mandíbula y perdió algunos dientes.

english: I know he is watching me.
spanish: Yo sé que él me está vigilando.

english: There's something I should tell you.
spanish: Tengo algo que decirte.

english: It's understood that we'll start tomorrow.
spanish: Está entendido que empezaremos mañana.

english: The bird was covered with white feathers.
spanish: El pájaro estaba cubierto de plumas blancas.

english: It's a pity that Tom can't come.
spanish: Es una lástima que Tomás no pueda venir.

english: Nobody is going to stop me.
spanish: Nadie va a detenerme.

english: Tom is always complaining about one thing or another.
spanish: Tom siempre se está quejando de una cosa u otra.

english: Mary doesn't have a husband.
spanish: Mary no tiene marido.

english: Would you like to watch the game together?
spanish: ¿Quieres que veamos el partido juntos?

english: I had a good reason to do that.
spanish: Tuve un buen motivo para hacer aquello.

english: I assume your mission was a success.
spanish: Asumo que tu misión fue un éxito.

english: He is the last man to do such a thing.
spanish: Él es el último hombre en hacer semejante cosa.

english: The constitution of the country is very democratic.
spanish: La constitución del país es muy democrática.

english: The medicine didn't do me any good.
spanish: Está medicina no me hace ningún bien.

english: Please keep the windows open.
spanish: Por favor, dejá las ventanas abiertas.

english: The men will be happy if they get anything back.
spanish: Los hombres estarán felices si recuperan algo.

english: Iron is much more useful than gold.
spanish: El hierro es mucho más útil que el oro.

english: Let's be best friends forever.
spanish: Seamos las mejores amigas para siempre.

english: Draw a line on the paper.
spanish: Dibuja una línea en el folio.

english: I could order you to stay.
spanish: Podría ordenarte que te quedes.

english: I'd like a vodka and tonic.
spanish: Quisiera un vodka con tónica.

english: Japan is not what it was 15 years ago.
spanish: Japón no es lo que era hace 15 años.

english: A great many people attended his funeral.
spanish: Un montón de gente asistió a su funeral.

english: Would you like to leave a message?
spanish: ¿Querrías dejar un mensaje?

english: He is a gentleman among gentlemen.
spanish: Es un caballero entre caballeros.

english: Today is too hot for sunbathing.
spanish: Hoy hace demasiado calor para tomar el sol.

english: He has no wife, no children and no friends.
spanish: No tiene mujer, hijos ni amigos.

english: I think you went too far.
spanish: Creo que fuiste demasiado lejos.

english: You can't separate language from culture.
spanish: No se puede separar la lengua y la cultura.

english: You get more beautiful every year.
spanish: Cada año estás más guapa.

english: Aren't you glad you're retired?
spanish: ¿No te alegra haberte retirado?

english: I met Tom on my way to school.
spanish: Me encontré con Tom de camino a la escuela.

english: All of my friends can speak French.
spanish: Todos mis amigos hablan francés.

english: Can you estimate how late the train will be?
spanish: ¿Puede estimar cuánto se va a retrasar el tren?

english: He likes to read books.
spanish: A él le gusta leer libros.

english: I have to take the entrance examination today.
spanish: Debo tomar el examen de ingreso hoy.

english: I didn't know the truth until yesterday.
spanish: Hasta ayer no sabía la verdad.

english: Take the money and run.
spanish: Tomen el dinero y corran.

english: Tom doesn't like to make mistakes.
spanish: A Tom no le gusta cometer errores.

english: Don't cast pearls before swine.
spanish: No arrojes perlas a los cerdos.

english: The ship went up in flames.
spanish: La nave estalló en llamas.

english: I was in the area.
spanish: Yo estaba en el área.

english: When did you start learning French?
spanish: ¿Cuándo empezaste a aprender francés?

english: I haven't eaten lunch yet.
spanish: Aún no he almorzado.

english: I'm never eating here again.
spanish: Nunca comeré acá otra vez.

english: Why don't you come to the movies with me?
spanish: ¿Por qué no vienes conmigo al cine?

english: I have a great deal of work to do.
spanish: Tengo un montón de trabajo por hacer.

english: This is why I dislike cats.
spanish: Por eso no me gustan los gatos.

english: Tom denied having stolen the money.
spanish: Tom negó haber robado el dinero.

english: Will it bother you if I turn on the radio?
spanish: ¿Le molesta si enciendo la radio?

english: You've got plenty of time.
spanish: Tienes tiempo de sobra.

english: He jumped into the water with a splash.
spanish: Él salto dentro del agua con un chapoteo.

english: Flies and mosquitoes interfered with his meditation.
spanish: Las moscas y mosquitos interferían con su meditación.

english: Are you seriously thinking about driving all night?
spanish: ¿Estás pensando seriamente en conducir la noche entera?

english: Is there anyone who wants some more pie?
spanish: ¿Hay alguien que quiera algo más de tarta?

english: He drinks coffee before work.
spanish: Él bebe café antes del trabajo.

english: Nothing can excuse him for such rude behavior.
spanish: Nada puede justificarlo por su comportamiento tan grosero.

english: We learn to read and write.
spanish: Aprendemos a leer y a escribir.

english: His voice is pleasant to listen to.
spanish: Su voz es agradable de oír.

english: How long will you have to wait?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tendrás que esperar?

english: It hardly ever rains there.
spanish: Apenas llueve allí.

english: Tom hasn't seen Mary for more than a year.
spanish: Tom no ha visto a Mary hace más de un año.

english: She doesn't love me anymore.
spanish: Ya no me ama.

english: Did you take these pictures in Germany?
spanish: ¿Sacaste estas fotos en Alemania?

english: She was cooking dinner at that time.
spanish: Ella estaba cocinando la cena en ese momento.

english: Tom wants to try a new shampoo.
spanish: Tom quiere probar un nuevo shampoo.

english: I don't approve of his conduct.
spanish: No apruebo su conducta.

english: Is that a request or an order?
spanish: ¿Es un pedido o una orden?

english: The world is changing fast.
spanish: El mundo está cambiando rápidamente.

english: I don't feel like having Chinese food today.
spanish: No tengo ganas de comer comida china hoy.

english: I wonder where he is now.
spanish: Me pregunto dónde estará ahora.

english: Tom has to fill out these forms.
spanish: Tom tiene que llenar estas formas.

english: I got the ticket free of charge.
spanish: Conseguí la entrada gratis.

english: I love her and she loves me.
spanish: Yo la quiero y ella me quiere.

english: There is no need for you to stay here.
spanish: No hace falta que te quedes.

english: We have to be at work by nine.
spanish: Tenemos que estar en el trabajo a las nueve.

english: I can get you out of prison.
spanish: Puedo sacarte de la cárcel.

english: Tom worked on the job alone.
spanish: Tom trabajaba solo.

english: Do you want to see Tom again?
spanish: ¿Quieres ver a Tom de nuevo?

english: They are deliberating what to do next.
spanish: Están pensando qué hacer a continuación.

english: We learn French at school.
spanish: Aprendemos francés en la escuela.

english: Are you saying that Tom can't understand French at all?
spanish: ¿Estás diciendo que Tomás no entiende francés en absoluto?

english: Tom is babbling, isn't he?
spanish: Tom está murmurando. ¿No lo está?

english: He could no longer stand the pain.
spanish: Ya no podía aguantar el dolor.

english: I can't go on Saturday.
spanish: No puedo ir el sábado.

english: I will give you this bicycle as a birthday present.
spanish: Te daré esta bicicleta como regalo de cumpleaños.

english: My grandfather died when I was boy.
spanish: Mi abuelo murió cuando yo era un niño.

english: It was quite dark when I got home.
spanish: Estaba bastante oscuro cuando llegué a casa.

english: I built this doghouse by myself.
spanish: Construí esta cucha yo solo.

english: She asked him to marry her.
spanish: Ella le pidió que se casara con ella.

english: I want to keep it there.
spanish: Quiero guardarlo allí.

english: You need to keep trying until you get it right.
spanish: Debes seguir intentando hasta que lo consigas.

english: Tom is a Canadian citizen.
spanish: Tom es un ciudadano canadiense.

english: I won't fail this time.
spanish: Esta vez no fallaré.

english: I'm at the hospital. I got struck by lightning.
spanish: Estoy en el hospital. Me ha caído un rayo.

english: I don't want to know his name.
spanish: No quiero saber su nombre.

english: I wanted to see you.
spanish: Quería verte.

english: I burned myself with boiling water.
spanish: Me quemé con agua hirviendo.

english: I thought you wanted the truth.
spanish: Pensé que querías la verdad.

english: Tom's parents told him not to get involved with Mary.
spanish: Los padres de Tom le dijeron que no se involucre con Mary.

english: Whose turn is it next?
spanish: ¿Quién sigue?

english: He was sick, so he couldn't come.
spanish: Él estaba enfermo, así que no pudo venir.

english: "Will it rain?" "I hope not."
spanish: "¿Va a llover?" "Espero que no".

english: The sisters are both blondes.
spanish: Ambas hermanas son rubias.

english: Tell me about your son.
spanish: Cuéntame acerca de tu hijo.

english: Do you think Tom is lying?
spanish: ¿Pensás que Tom está mintiendo?

english: I suggest that you begin doing that right away.
spanish: Sugiero que te pongas a hacerlo inmediatamente.

english: I'm just saying we can't leave yet.
spanish: Sólo digo que no podemos irnos todavía.

english: Can you iron these clothes for me?
spanish: ¿Me pueden aplanchar esta prenda?

english: This is the last time.
spanish: Ésta es la última vez.

english: Tom acknowledges that he was defeated.
spanish: Tom reconoce que fue derrotado.

english: He is hard to please.
spanish: Es difícil satisfacerlo.

english: I thought Tom would give Mary John's phone number.
spanish: Pensé que Tomás le daría el número de teléfono de Juan a María.

english: When can I see you next time?
spanish: ¿Cuándo te puedo ver de nuevo?

english: We found it in the house.
spanish: Lo encontramos en la casa.

english: I'm sorry that you can't join us.
spanish: Lamento que usted no pueda acompañarnos.

english: I lost my favorite pen.
spanish: Perdí mi bolígrafo favorito.

english: You're going the wrong way.
spanish: Vas en la dirección equivocada.

english: You are now on the way to recovery.
spanish: Ahora estás en vías de recuperación.

english: They give presents to one another.
spanish: Ellos se regalan obsequios el uno al otro.

english: "Is there a book in the desk?" "No, there isn't."
spanish: "¿Hay un libro en el escritorio?" "No, no hay."

english: There is no excuse for his behaviour.
spanish: No hay excusa para su comportamiento.

english: I will not tolerate this.
spanish: No voy a tolerarlo.

english: This hospital is run by the city.
spanish: Este hospital es administrado por el municipio.

english: Do you remember what I told you?
spanish: ¿Recuerdas lo que te dije?

english: I'd like to see your sister.
spanish: Me gustaría ver a tu hermana.

english: Pardon me for interrupting you.
spanish: Dispense usted que le interrumpa.

english: School begins on the eighth of April.
spanish: El colegio empieza el ocho de abril.

english: There's a hole in this sock.
spanish: Este calcetín tiene un agujero.

english: We are glad to help you.
spanish: Estamos encantados de ayudaros.

english: What time do you usually go to bed?
spanish: ¿A qué hora sueles acostarte?

english: The old man was loved by everyone.
spanish: El anciano era querido por todos.

english: I hope you'll come again some day.
spanish: Espero que usted vuelva algún día.

english: Fat people generally sweat a lot.
spanish: La gente gorda en general suda mucho.

english: Smell is one of the five senses.
spanish: El olfato es uno de los cinco sentidos.

english: Why don't you tell me?
spanish: ¿Por qué no me dices?

english: I've just been to my uncle's house.
spanish: Acabo de estar en la casa de mi tío.

english: Let's hurry back to our hotel.
spanish: Démonos prisa de vuelta a nuestro hotel.

english: Where can I catch the bus to the Tokyo station?
spanish: ¿Dónde puedo coger el autobús para la estación de Tokio?

english: I think we're ready to go there.
spanish: Creo que estamos listos para ir allí.

english: He was injured badly in the accident.
spanish: Él quedó gravemente herido en el accidente.

english: I met with an old woman.
spanish: Conocí a una anciana.

english: It is impossible for us to cross that river.
spanish: Es imposible para nosotros cruzar ese río.

english: He didn't hesitate to tell his wife the truth.
spanish: Él no dudó en decir a su mujer la verdad.

english: There's something we have to do.
spanish: Hay algo que tenemos que hacer.

english: Could you tell me which way I should go?
spanish: ¿Podría decirme qué camino debo seguir?

english: I wish you weren't always so busy.
spanish: Ojalá no estuvieras siempre tan ocupado.

english: I am proud to work with you.
spanish: Estoy orgulloso de trabajar con usted.

english: I don't want to eat this.
spanish: No quiero comerme esto.

english: Shall we take a taxi?
spanish: ¿Tomamos un taxi?

english: Tom couldn't have done it without Mary.
spanish: Tom no lo pudo haber hecho sin Mary.

english: I wanted to show it to you.
spanish: Quería enseñártelo.

english: Tom got first prize, didn't he?
spanish: Tom obtuvo el primer premio, ¿no es así?

english: Tom is a kindergarten teacher.
spanish: Tom es un profesor de guardería.

english: What about having fish for dinner?
spanish: ¿Qué tal pescado para cenar?

english: What are you waiting for?
spanish: ¿Qué estás esperando?

english: I met her at the church.
spanish: Me la encontré en la iglesia.

english: I didn't want you to hate me.
spanish: No quería que me odiaras.

english: They have taken her away.
spanish: Ellos se la han llevado.

english: Tom was a judge in an art contest.
spanish: Tom fue juez en un concurso de arte.

english: Tom asked me to open the door.
spanish: Tom me pidió que abra la puerta.

english: I would like to hear your voice, too.
spanish: A mí también me gustaría escuchar tu voz.

english: The jug was very heavy.
spanish: La jarra estaba muy pesada.

english: Who does the gun belong to?
spanish: ¿A quién le pertenece el arma?

english: You should be happy for Tom.
spanish: Deberías estar feliz por Tom.

english: My father used to say that time is money.
spanish: Mi padre solía decir que el tiempo es oro.

english: Where in Turkey do you live?
spanish: ¿En dónde vives en Turquía?

english: I wonder if this is love.
spanish: No sé si es amor.

english: We're very proud of Tom.
spanish: Estamos muy orgullosos de Tomás.

english: He has a terrible hangover.
spanish: Tiene una goma horrible.

english: Unfortunately I hit the morning rush hour.
spanish: Desgraciadamente me topé con el horario punta de la mañana.

english: There is nothing to be scared of.
spanish: No hay nada de qué asustarse.

english: The radio will not work.
spanish: La radio no funciona.

english: A group of children were playing.
spanish: Un grupo de niños estaban jugando.

english: The girl went to school in spite of her illness.
spanish: La niña fue a la escuela a pesar de estar enferma.

english: There is no wind today.
spanish: Hoy no hace nada de viento.

english: How many people did you invite to your wedding?
spanish: ¿A cuánta gente invitaste a tu boda?

english: Tom sometimes appears on TV.
spanish: Tom aparece a veces en la televisión.

english: Tom has lost the will to live.
spanish: Tom perdió la voluntad de vivir.

english: He has gone out for lunch already.
spanish: Ya ha salido a almorzar.

english: I have to buy flowers for my girlfriend.
spanish: Tengo que comprarle flores a mi novia.

english: This is by far the best.
spanish: Esta es por lejos la mejor.

english: Tom might be able to convince Mary to do that.
spanish: Tom podría ser capaz de convencer a Mary para que hiciera eso.

english: It won't take much time.
spanish: No tomará mucho tiempo.

english: Tom wants to know why you didn't call him back.
spanish: Tom quiere saber por qué no le regresaste la llamada.

english: Forgiveness is the greatest gift of all.
spanish: El perdón es el regalo más grande.

english: It was very cold last night.
spanish: Anoche hizo mucho frío.

english: I think it will be sunny.
spanish: Creo que hará sol.

english: It's not good to read in a dark room.
spanish: No es bueno leer en una pieza oscura.

english: Do you really want to know what happened?
spanish: ¿De verdad quieres saber qué ocurrió?

english: Can I use this dictionary of yours?
spanish: ¿Puedo usar este diccionario tuyo?

english: The clock is still ticking.
spanish: El reloj está todavía haciendo tictac.

english: Cats don't like to get wet.
spanish: A los gatos no les gusta estar mojados.

english: Please remind me to phone him tomorrow.
spanish: Por favor, recordadme que le llame mañana.

english: I am ashamed of my son's conduct.
spanish: Estoy avergonzada del comportamiento de mi hijo.

english: I got you a little something.
spanish: Te traje una cosita.

english: Today is one of my friends' birthday.
spanish: Hoy es el cumpleaños de uno de mis amigos.

english: The thief admitted his crime.
spanish: El ladrón admitió su crimen.

english: Tom wants to be near you.
spanish: Tom quiere estar cerca de ti.

english: What do we know about Tom?
spanish: ¿Qué sabemos acerca de Tom?

english: This is a car imported from Germany.
spanish: Éste es un coche importado de Alemania.

english: Don't throw in the towel.
spanish: No tires la toalla.

english: Could you call me later?
spanish: ¿Podrías llamarme más tarde?

english: She became a teacher when she was twenty.
spanish: Se hizo profesora cuando tenía veinte años.

english: I'm hungry, so I'm going to get something to eat.
spanish: Tengo hambre, así que voy a buscar algo para comer.

english: I have visited the place time after time.
spanish: He visitado el lugar una y otra vez.

english: Are there any religions that don't permit organ donation?
spanish: ¿Hay alguna religión que no permita la donación de órganos?

english: I'll stake my life on it.
spanish: Pondré mi vida en riesgo con ello.

english: I really thought we were going to win.
spanish: Sinceramente creí que íbamos a ganar.

english: The weather is cold now.
spanish: El clima está helado ahora.

english: He has an eye for antiques.
spanish: Él tiene ojo para las antigüedades.

english: He was happy at the news of her success.
spanish: Ella estaba feliz al oír la noticia de su éxito.

english: This work is not necessarily easy.
spanish: Este trabajo no es necesariamente fácil.

english: Who are you talking with?
spanish: ¿Con quién estás hablando?

english: Keeping a diary is a good habit.
spanish: Llevar un diario de vida es un buen hábito.

english: I share a bedroom with my sister.
spanish: Comparto el dormitorio con mi hermana.

english: It is very important to keep your word.
spanish: Es muy importante que cumplas tu palabra.

english: Would you like to dance with me?
spanish: ¿Bailas conmigo?

english: That child can count to twenty.
spanish: Ese niño sabe contar hasta veinte.

english: The little boy is used to talking with grown-ups.
spanish: El niñito está acostumbrado a hablar con adultos.

english: Be on your guard against pickpockets.
spanish: Debes estar atento de los carteristas.

english: Mary has already left on her trip.
spanish: Mary se marchó ya a su excursión.

english: I wanna get out of here!
spanish: ¡Quiero salir de aquí!

english: She has a sense of humor.
spanish: Ella tiene sentido del humor.

english: He is adept at telling lies.
spanish: Él es un experto para mentir.

english: Do you think this is stupid?
spanish: ¿Crees que es estúpido?

english: This is never going to end.
spanish: Esto no va a acabar nunca.

english: What do you want to do now?
spanish: ¿Qué quieres hacer ahora?

english: Let's talk about the problem.
spanish: Vamos a hablar del problema.

english: When was the last time you saw Tom?
spanish: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que viste a Tom?

english: She cared for her father until his death.
spanish: Ella cuidó a su padre hasta su muerte.

english: Tom has the opposite problem.
spanish: Tom tiene el problema opuesto.

english: He can see nothing without his glasses.
spanish: No ve nada sin gafas.

english: Last year, I decided to come to Japan.
spanish: El año pasado decidí venirme a Japón.

english: They're hoping the wheat harvest will be good this year.
spanish: Ellos esperan que la cosecha de trigo sea buena este año.

english: School begins at nine and is over at six.
spanish: El cole empieza a las nueve y acaba a las seis.

english: You can't swim, can you?
spanish: No sabes nadar, ¿verdad?

english: Tom is the tallest in his family.
spanish: Tom es el más alto de su familia.

english: The worst is already over.
spanish: Lo peor ya ha pasado.

english: They carried him to a nearby house.
spanish: Ellos lo llevaron a una casa cercana.

english: You can spend the night with us.
spanish: Podés pasar la noche con nosotros.

english: Tom gave Mary a hug and a kiss.
spanish: Tom le dio a María un abrazo y un beso.

english: My son is ashamed of his behavior.
spanish: Mi hijo se avergüenza de su comportamiento.

english: My remarks were not aimed at you.
spanish: Mis comentarios no iban dirigidos a ti.

english: The Greeks, too, eat a lot of fish.
spanish: Los griegos también comen pescado a menudo.

english: I can't give up my dream.
spanish: No puedo abandonar mi sueño.

english: I'm not as talkative as you.
spanish: No soy tan habladora como tú.

english: Do you mind if I leave for a few minutes?
spanish: ¿Le importa si me voy por unos minutos?

english: Her clarinet squeaked, and the entire audience laughed.
spanish: Su clarinete chirrió, y toda la audiencia se rió.

english: You should rewrite this sentence. It doesn't make sense.
spanish: Deberías reescribir esta frase; no tiene sentido.

english: I met her on my way to school.
spanish: Me la encontré de camino al colegio.

english: When she heard that, she felt like crying.
spanish: Cuando lo oyó, le entraron ganas de llorar.

english: We've finished cleaning the classroom.
spanish: Hemos terminado de hacer la limpieza de la clase.

english: This catterpillar will turn into a beautiful butterfly.
spanish: Esta oruga se convertirá en una hermosa mariposa.

english: Our team won the game.
spanish: Nuestro equipo ganó el partido.

english: Tell me what you have in mind.
spanish: Dime qué tienes en mente.

english: She'll be having dinner with him at this time tomorrow.
spanish: Ella cenará con él a esta hora mañana.

english: I don't like it, either.
spanish: A mí tampoco me gusta.

english: I had a problem to take care of.
spanish: Tuve que ocuparme de un problema.

english: Have the police been called?
spanish: ¿Se ha llamado a la policía?

english: I feel much better today.
spanish: Hoy me siento mucho mejor.

english: We're all citizens of the world.
spanish: Todos somos ciudadanos del mundo.

english: A stewardess was rescued from the wreck.
spanish: Una camarera fue rescatada del naufragio.

english: How long did Tom work here?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo trabajó aquí Tom?

english: How long did you stay abroad?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo pasaste en el extranjero?

english: Tom is my younger brother.
spanish: Tom es mi hermano pequeño.

english: He did the work in two days.
spanish: Él hizo el trabajo en dos días.

english: He is not as tall as his father.
spanish: No es tan alto como su padre.

english: Somebody has broken this dish.
spanish: Alguien rompió este plato.

english: I plan to finish it in two or three minutes.
spanish: Planeo terminarlo en dos o tres minutos.

english: She began doing her homework immediately after dinner.
spanish: Ella empezó a hacer su tarea inmediatamente después de la cena.

english: Tom looks like he's a bit tired.
spanish: Tom se ve que está un poco cansado.

english: A curfew was imposed on the city.
spanish: Se impuso un toque de queda en la ciudad.

english: I don't want to be cruel.
spanish: No quiero ser cruel.

english: Tom doesn't pay much attention to how he dresses.
spanish: Tom no presta mucha atención a su vestimenta.

english: Tom told me to wait here.
spanish: Tom me dijo que esperara aquí.

english: I keep on not understanding.
spanish: Sigo sin entender.

english: I was shocked by yesterday's news.
spanish: Estaba impactado por las noticias de ayer.

english: May I turn on the radio?
spanish: ¿Te importa que encienda la radio?

english: I have just come back from school.
spanish: Acabo de llegar del colegio.

english: I will ask him about it tomorrow, then.
spanish: Entonces mañana le pregunto.

english: He owns a lot of land.
spanish: Él posee muchas tierras.

english: Tell me I did the right thing.
spanish: Dime que he hecho lo correcto.

english: She was a child, but she wasn't afraid.
spanish: Era una niña, pero no estaba asustada.

english: I need to ask you a favor.
spanish: Tengo que pedirte un favor.

english: I'll ask when the train will get in.
spanish: Voy a preguntar cuándo va a venir el tren.

english: Never have I seen such a thing.
spanish: Nunca había visto una cosa así.

english: You mustn't stay out that late.
spanish: No deben quedarse fuera tan tarde.

english: I thought Tom had stopped smoking.
spanish: Pensé que Tom había dejado de fumar.

english: I spilled my coffee on the carpet.
spanish: Derramé mi café sobre la alfombra.

english: Why is that baby crying?
spanish: ¿Por qué llora ese bebé?

english: Was I really that busy?
spanish: ¿Estaba realmente tan ocupado?

english: Please say hello to your parents.
spanish: Por favor, saluda a tus padres.

english: Not every child likes apples.
spanish: No a todos los niños les gustan las manzanas.

english: I am not wearing any underwear.
spanish: No llevo ropa interior.

english: Please wash your hands before you eat.
spanish: Por favor, lávate las manos antes de comer.

english: The judge gave the woman a three year sentence.
spanish: El juez le dio a la mujer una sentencia de tres años.

english: Do you want me to shuffle the cards?
spanish: ¿Quieres que yo baraje las cartas?

english: I promise you I'll keep you safe.
spanish: Prometo que te mantendré segura.

english: I'll go when I'm ready.
spanish: Iré cuando esté lista.

english: The snowman had melted completely by the next morning.
spanish: A la mañana siguiente el muñeco de nieve estaba completamente derretido.

english: I'd like to have a test for breast cancer.
spanish: Me gustaría tomarme un test para cáncer de mamas.

english: The man finally confessed what he had done.
spanish: El hombre confesó finalmente lo que había hecho.

english: People talk without having anything to say.
spanish: La gente habla sin tener nada que decir.

english: He may have read the letter.
spanish: Puede que él haya leído la carta.

english: You will miss the train.
spanish: Vas a perder el tren.

english: We have been to Tokyo many times.
spanish: Visitamos Tokio varias veces.

english: There was no one there besides me.
spanish: No había nadie allí aparte de mí.

english: Do you know when they will arrive?
spanish: ¿Sabes cuándo llegarán?

english: I knew I had to come.
spanish: Sabía que tenía que venir.

english: Leave the matter to me. I'll see to it.
spanish: Déjame el asunto a mí. Yo me encargo.

english: I do not believe in the existence of God.
spanish: No creo en la existencia de Dios.

english: She is always free in the afternoon.
spanish: Ella siempre está desocupada en la tarde.

english: Poyang Lake is the largest freshwater lake in China.
spanish: El lago Poyang es el lago más grande de agua dulce en China.

english: That's what you said last year.
spanish: Eso es lo que dijiste el año pasado.

english: The flood prevented me from crossing the river.
spanish: La inundación me impidió cruzar el río.

english: Tom was arrested Monday night.
spanish: Tomás fue arrestado el lunes por la noche.

english: Anything is infinitely better than nothing.
spanish: Algo es infinitamente mejor que nada.

english: I don't want you to see this.
spanish: No quiero que vean esto.

english: I often go swimming at the beach in the summer.
spanish: A menudo voy a la playa a nadar en el verano.

english: We haven't been called to the meeting yet.
spanish: Todavía no nos han citado para la reunión.

english: I think that's what Tom was trying to tell me.
spanish: Pienso que eso es lo que Tom estaba intentando decirme.

english: She stood close to her husband.
spanish: Ella se mantuvo cerca de su marido.

english: Tom was eating lunch with Mary at that time.
spanish: Aquella vez, Tom estaba almorzando con Mary.

english: Tom doesn't know how worried Mary is.
spanish: Tom no sabe lo preocupada que está Mary.

english: No matter where you go, I'll follow you.
spanish: No importa a dónde vayas, yo te seguiré.

english: All the desk drawers were empty.
spanish: Todos los cajones del escritorio estaban vacíos.

english: We're still on our honeymoon.
spanish: Todavía estamos en nuestra luna de miel.

english: Tom doesn't like to eat where people are smoking.
spanish: A Tom no le gusta comer donde hay gente fumando.

english: A vast desert lay before us.
spanish: Un vasto desierto se extiende ante nosotros.

english: Tom was waiting for you.
spanish: Tom te estaba esperando.

english: Do you guys like white wine?
spanish: ¿Os gusta el vino blanco?

english: My friend's condition is very serious.
spanish: El estado de mi amigo es muy grave.

english: How did you know that I was Canadian?
spanish: ¿Cómo supiste que yo era canadiense?

english: I want a single room if possible.
spanish: Quiero una pieza individual si es posible.

english: Don't be late for school.
spanish: No llegues tarde a la escuela.

english: I have no interest whatsoever in eating English food.
spanish: No tengo ningún interés en comer comida inglesa.

english: He tied the dog to a tree.
spanish: El ató al perro a un árbol.

english: My friend is studying Korean.
spanish: Mi amiga estudia coreano.

english: What in the world does he mean?
spanish: ¿Qué diantres pretenderá él?

english: Just leave it to me.
spanish: Déjamelo a mí.

english: The air conditioner is out of order.
spanish: El aire acondicionado está estropeado.

english: They will not eat meat.
spanish: Ellos no comerán carne.

english: As is often the case with teenagers, she's conceited.
spanish: Como es a menudo el caso con los adolescentes, ella es orgullosa.

english: Tom changed into his school uniform.
spanish: Tom se puso su uniforme del colegio.

english: Tom wants to learn to speak fluent French.
spanish: Tom quiere aprender a hablar francés fluído.

english: Please give me a little more time.
spanish: Dame un poco más de tiempo, por favor.

english: You need to stop playing.
spanish: Debes dejar de jugar.

english: Tom wanted to have dinner in bed.
spanish: Tom quería cenar en cama.

english: How old is this church?
spanish: ¿Cuántos años tiene esta iglesia?

english: Does Tom know what you're doing?
spanish: ¿Sabe Tom lo que estáis haciendo?

english: We'll start when he gets here.
spanish: Cuando él venga, empezamos.

english: I hope we have good weather tomorrow.
spanish: Espero que nos haga buen tiempo mañana.

english: I keep fit by jogging every morning.
spanish: Me mantengo en forma haciendo footing todas las mañanas.

english: Tom didn't watch much television when he was younger.
spanish: Cuando era más joven, Tom no veía mucho la televisión.

english: I wonder who this is from.
spanish: Me pregunto de quién es esto.

english: None of us want that.
spanish: Nadie de nosotros quiere eso.

english: My brother is very good at playing the guitar.
spanish: Mi hermano es muy bueno tocando la guitarra.

english: I want to go with you, Tom.
spanish: Tom, quiero ir con vos.

english: Oh, no! We're running out of gas.
spanish: ¡Oh, no! Ya no tenemos gasolina.

english: Tom and Mary were told to stay in their room.
spanish: A Tom y María les dijeron que se quedaran en sus dormitorios.

english: It looks as if it is going to rain.
spanish: Parece que va a llover.

english: Competition is not bad in itself.
spanish: La competencia en sí misma no es mala.

english: He was fined for illegal parking.
spanish: Le multaron por estacionamiento indebido.

english: We could hear wolves howling in the distance.
spanish: Podíamos oír el aullar de lobos en la distancia.

english: Please make yourself at home.
spanish: Por favor, siéntase como en su casa.

english: There are various kinds of coffee.
spanish: Hay varios tipos de café.

english: You're too young to understand.
spanish: Eres demasiado joven para entender.

english: His car has no wheels.
spanish: Su auto no tiene ruedas.

english: Could you move the chair a bit?
spanish: ¿Podrías mover un poco la silla?

english: Tom reminds me of John.
spanish: Tom me recuerda a John.

english: He found the door closed.
spanish: Encontró la puerta cerrada.

english: She felt her heart beat quickly.
spanish: Ella sintió a su corazón latir rápidamente.

english: The dictator came to power fifteen years ago.
spanish: El dictador llegó al poder hace quince años.

english: That should make you happy.
spanish: Eso te debería hacer feliz.

english: Do you want me to help you with your homework?
spanish: ¿Quieres que te ayude con tus tareas?

english: It's about time for bed.
spanish: Va siendo hora de irse a la cama.

english: My mother boiled ten eggs.
spanish: Mamá hirvió diez huevos.

english: When will the concert be held?
spanish: ¿Cuándo será el concierto?

english: Would you tell me when to get off?
spanish: ¿Me dirás cuando tengo que marcharme?

english: I like both watching and playing sports.
spanish: Me gusta tanto ver como practicar deportes.

english: Why do zebras have stripes?
spanish: ¿Por qué las cebras tienen rayas?

english: I am looking forward to seeing you.
