spanish: Estoy tan feliz de que estés aquí.

english: Tom prefers to stay home.
spanish: Tomás prefiere quedarse en su casa.

english: Is roast chicken on the menu tonight?
spanish: ¿Está el pollo asado en el menú esta noche?

english: Mary hopes to rest a lot during her vacation.
spanish: Mary espera descansar mucho durante sus vacaciones.

english: The population of Japan is larger than that of Britain.
spanish: La población de Japón es mayor que la de Inglaterra.

english: I offered to lend money to her.
spanish: Le ofrecí prestarle dinero.

english: After you kill the sheep, you'll have to skin it.
spanish: Después de matar el carnero tendrá usted que desollarlo.

english: Do you prefer tea or coffee?
spanish: ¿Vos preferís un té o un café?

english: Do you really want to sell your guitar?
spanish: ¿Realmente quieres vender tu guitarra?

english: It is too difficult a problem for me to solve.
spanish: Este problema es muy difícil para que lo resuelva.

english: Tom never got an award.
spanish: Tom nunca obtuvo un premio.

english: Tom asked Mary a rather difficult question.
spanish: Tom le hizo una pregunta bastante complicada a Mary.

english: I cut the article out of the magazine.
spanish: Recorté el artículo de la revista.

english: Tom said he saw nothing.
spanish: Tomás dijo que no había visto nada.

english: Thank you for inviting me to your birthday party.
spanish: Gracias por invitarme a tu fiesta de cumpleaños.

english: I want you to analyze this.
spanish: Quiero que analices esto.

english: Tom and Mary grew up together.
spanish: Tom y María crecieron juntos.

english: I didn't want to scare Tom.
spanish: No quise asustar a Tom.

english: The price depends on the size.
spanish: El precio depende de la talla.

english: I decided to be a lawyer.
spanish: Decidí ser abogado.

english: What are you going to do in college?
spanish: ¿Qué vas a hacer en la universidad?

english: He explained his plans in detail.
spanish: Él explicó sus planes en detalle.

english: It's as smooth as a baby's bottom.
spanish: Está suave como el culito de un bebé.

english: That is not possible anymore.
spanish: Eso ya no es posible.

english: I broke both my legs riding a bicycle.
spanish: Me rompí las dos piernas andando en una bicicleta.

english: This is all he has to do.
spanish: Esto es todo lo que él tiene que hacer.

english: Would you like some more beef?
spanish: ¿Quisiera usted un poco más de vacuno?

english: He is now in a very difficult situation.
spanish: Él está ahora en una situación muy difícil.

english: I don't know for certain.
spanish: No sé a ciencia cierta.

english: Please bring me a glass of water.
spanish: Traedme un vaso de agua, por favor.

english: I have no more ideas.
spanish: No tengo más ideas.

english: I'd like to think so.
spanish: Me gustaría pensar que sí.

english: You don't even try to help me.
spanish: Ni siquiera intentas ayudarme.

english: He had a blue jacket on.
spanish: Él llevaba un abrigo azul.

english: Tom refused to give up.
spanish: Tom se rehusó a rendirse.

english: I just got back from school.
spanish: Acabo de volver del colegio.

english: I'm only trying to protect you.
spanish: Sólo estoy tratando de protegerte.

english: I suddenly became very sad.
spanish: De pronto me puse muy triste.

english: I hurried in order to catch the first train.
spanish: Me apuré para alcanzar el primer tren.

english: Let me introduce you to my mother.
spanish: Déjame presentarte a mi madre.

english: Tom knew Mary had threatened John.
spanish: Tom sabía que Mary había amenazado a John.

english: This word isn't used like that.
spanish: Esta palabra no se utiliza así.

english: Tom hasn't yet done what we've asked him to do.
spanish: Tom aún no ha hecho lo que le pedimos que hiciera.

english: It'll be dark by the time we get home.
spanish: Cuando lleguemos a casa, habrá oscurecido.

english: Don't you get bored when you're alone?
spanish: ¿No se aburren cuando están solas?

english: Some people hate to argue.
spanish: Algunas personas odian discutir.

english: Do you know an ethnic dance?
spanish: ¿Conoces algún baile étnico?

english: I did this for you.
spanish: Hice esto por ti.

english: I have to comb my hair.
spanish: Tengo que peinarme el cabello.

english: He took out one egg.
spanish: Él sacó un huevo.

english: This camera is Tom's, isn't it?
spanish: Esta cámara es de Tom, ¿o no?

english: I'm going back to America.
spanish: Yo me voy de regreso a América.

english: I need to talk to one of you.
spanish: Necesito hablar con uno de ustedes.

english: I haven't yet read all of these books.
spanish: Todavía no he leído todos estos libros.

english: He told us he had gone through many hardships.
spanish: Él nos dijo que había atravesado muchas dificultades.

english: Tom didn't have to do that.
spanish: Tom no tenía que hacer eso.

english: I believe in the immortality of the soul.
spanish: Yo creo en la inmortalidad del alma.

english: How many pies did you bake?
spanish: ¿Cuántos pasteles horneaste?

english: Tom heard Mary and John arguing.
spanish: Tom escuchó a Mary y John discutiendo.

english: When does the performance begin?
spanish: ¿A qué hora empieza la función?

english: I will ask him where he went last Sunday.
spanish: Le preguntaré a dónde fue el domingo pasado.

english: I just learned six new facts about wombats.
spanish: Acabo de aprender seis nuevos datos sobre los vombátidos.

english: She left the window open.
spanish: Ella dejó la ventana abierta.

english: There is a big supermarket in my neighborhood.
spanish: En mi barrio hay un gran supermercado.

english: He has no house to live in.
spanish: No tiene una casa donde vivir.

english: We cannot tell which is better.
spanish: No podemos decir cuál es mejor.

english: What do you think of this red hat?
spanish: ¿Qué piensas de este sombrero rojo?

english: I want Tom to say that he was wrong.
spanish: Quiero que Tom diga que estaba equivocado.

english: I knew where to search.
spanish: Supe dónde buscar.

english: If I had time, I would go to the movies.
spanish: Si tuviera tiempo iría al cine.

english: I am very glad school is over.
spanish: Me alegro mucho de que se haya acabado la escuela.

english: I think they know you.
spanish: Yo creo que ellos te conocen.

english: The cat is sleeping on the sofa.
spanish: El gato está durmiendo en el sofá.

english: Smoking is not permitted here.
spanish: Aquí no se permite fumar.

english: She's really smart, isn't she?
spanish: Es realmente inteligente, ¿verdad?

english: His story is partially true.
spanish: Su historia es verdad en parte.

english: In any case, I'll call you tomorrow.
spanish: De cualquier manera, te llamo mañana.

english: Japan is located in the Northern Hemisphere.
spanish: Japón se sitúa en el hemisferio norte.

english: I need to rest a moment.
spanish: Necesito descansar un momento.

english: There are many problems to solve.
spanish: Hay muchos problemas para resolver.

english: Father does not eat much fruit.
spanish: Papá no come mucha fruta.

english: Tom didn't make it clear.
spanish: Tom no lo dejó claro.

english: Can you pass me the milk?
spanish: ¿Me alcanza la leche?

english: Would you like to hear more?
spanish: ¿Te gustaría oír más?

english: The bill amounted to 500 dollars.
spanish: La factura ascendía a 500 dólares.

english: We made a good buy.
spanish: Hicimos una buena compra.

english: He always tells the truth.
spanish: Él siempre dice la verdad.

english: We have a huge amount of food.
spanish: Tenemos una inmensa cantidad de comida.

english: Let's keep this a secret, OK?
spanish: Mantengámoslo en secreto, ¿de acuerdo?

english: Why are you so clumsy?
spanish: ¿Por qué eres tan torpe?

english: My mother is making a cake.
spanish: Mi madre está haciendo una tarta.

english: He is resting on his laurels.
spanish: Él está reposando sobre sus laureles.

english: I rang the bell six times.
spanish: Llamé al timbre seis veces.

english: I blamed him for the accident.
spanish: Lo culpo por el accidente.

english: I sleep in my room.
spanish: Duermo en mi habitación.

english: I went on vacation, and my plants are still alive.
spanish: Me fui de vacaciones, y mis plantas siguen vivas.

english: Tom rose with great care.
spanish: Tom se levantó con gran cuidado.

english: I'm sure it was an accident.
spanish: Estoy segura de que fue un accidente.

english: We are going to visit our aunt next Sunday.
spanish: El próximo domingo iremos a visitar a nuestra tía.

english: I did not miss my purse until I returned home.
spanish: No eché en falta mi monedero hasta que llegué a casa.

english: Shampoo and toothpaste are the same price.
spanish: El champú y el dentífrico cuestan lo mismo.

english: I am not a bird, but I'd like to be.
spanish: No soy un pájaro, pero me gustaría serlo.

english: Have I done something wrong?
spanish: ¿Acaso hice algo mal?

english: I'm looking for my brother.
spanish: Busco a mi hermano.

english: I met her at the station by accident.
spanish: Me encontré con ella en la estación de casualidad.

english: Photography is now considered a new form of art.
spanish: La fotografía ahora es considerada una nueva forma de arte.

english: Everyone needs someone to turn to when they're in trouble.
spanish: Todos necesitan a alguien a quién acudir cuando están en problemas.

english: Won't you eat lunch with us?
spanish: ¿Quieres almorzar con nosotros?

english: The man set himself on fire.
spanish: El hombre se prendió fuego.

english: I can't guarantee that that's going to happen.
spanish: No puedo asegurar que vaya a ocurrir.

english: It is probable that she will come.
spanish: Ella probablemente vendrá.

english: Were you invited to her birthday party?
spanish: ¿Te invitaron a su fiesta de cumpleaños?

english: I'm aware of all that.
spanish: Soy consciente de todo eso.

english: Let us know by next Monday.
spanish: Háznoslo saber para el lunes que viene.

english: The period is missing at the end of the sentence.
spanish: Falta el punto al final de la oración.

english: You may swim as long as you want.
spanish: Puedes nadar todo el tiempo que quieras.

english: Are you on a diet?
spanish: ¿Estás a dieta?

english: I'll call them tomorrow when I come back.
spanish: Los llamaré cuando regrese mañana.

english: What do you regret not doing?
spanish: ¿Qué lamentas no hacer?

english: He traveled all over the world.
spanish: Viajó por todo el mundo.

english: I need to know what you know.
spanish: Necesito saber qué sabes.

english: I bought a jacket without a collar.
spanish: Me compré una chaqueta sin cuello.

english: I hate you from the bottom of my heart.
spanish: Te odio desde el fondo de mi corazón.

english: I sometimes hear my father singing in the bath.
spanish: A veces oigo a mi padre cantar en el baño.

english: It is impossible for you to do so.
spanish: Es imposible para ti hacer eso.

english: I'd like to call my parents.
spanish: Me gustaría llamar a mis padres.

english: His car ran into a tree.
spanish: Su coche se chocó con un árbol.

english: The Chinese are a friendly people.
spanish: Los chinos son amistosos.

english: The words 'small' and 'little' are synonyms.
spanish: Las palabras 'pequeño' y 'chico' son sinónimos.

english: How many people live in Australia?
spanish: ¿Cuánta gente vive en Australia?

english: Tom told Mary to go home.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary que se vaya a casa.

english: No one lives here anymore.
spanish: Ya nadie vive aquí.

english: The earth is a beautiful planet.
spanish: La Tierra es un bello planeta.

english: I can't run as fast as Tom.
spanish: No puedo correr tan rápido como Tom.

english: There's been a lot of rain this summer.
spanish: Ha llovido mucho este verano.

english: Like it or not, you must do it.
spanish: Le guste o no, lo tiene que hacer.

english: Tom got a small portion of pie.
spanish: Tom recibió un trozo pequeño de pastel.

english: I didn't know anyone at the party.
spanish: Ninguno en la fiesta me era conocido.

english: Did you see anyone on the beach?
spanish: ¿Viste a alguien en la playa?

english: I've never made a lot of money.
spanish: Nunca he hecho mucho dinero.

english: He's my best friend. It's like we are brothers.
spanish: Él es mi mejor amigo. Es como si fuéramos hermanos.

english: My brother has never climbed Mt. Fuji.
spanish: Mi hermano nunca ha escalado el monte Fuji.

english: He eats around the clock.
spanish: Él come a toda hora.

english: I kind of like you.
spanish: Creo que me gustas.

english: The witness stated his name.
spanish: El testigo indicó su nombre.

english: Let's do this first of all.
spanish: Hagamos eso primero que todo.

english: What do you think of war?
spanish: ¿Tú qué piensas de la guerra?

english: I'm sure you'll find something in the refrigerator.
spanish: Estoy segura que vas a encontrar algo en la heladera.

english: Do you have your laptop with you?
spanish: ¿Llevas tu portátil?

english: This milk has a peculiar smell.
spanish: Esta leche tiene un olor peculiar.

english: I rested in the shade of a tree.
spanish: Descansé bajo la sombra de un árbol.

english: Let's give Tom some room.
spanish: Démosle un campito a Tom.

english: May I eat a little of it?
spanish: ¿Puedo comer un poco?

english: They fought for freedom of religion.
spanish: Ellos lucharon por la libertad de religión.

english: They're on good terms with their neighbors.
spanish: Se llevan bien con sus vecinos.

english: Tom won't have that problem.
spanish: Tom no tendrá ese problema.

english: Tom woke up when the telephone rang.
spanish: Tom se despertó cuando sonó el teléfono.

english: Leave me some ice cream.
spanish: Déjame un poco de helado.

english: Which house do they live in?
spanish: ¿En cuál casa viven ellos?

english: He might not be happy.
spanish: Él puede que no sea feliz.

english: Say it in plain terms.
spanish: Dígalo en lenguaje llano.

english: Is it OK if I turn the TV down?
spanish: ¿Le importa si bajo el volumen del televisor?

english: I am just going for a walk.
spanish: Sólo voy a dar un paseo.

english: The trial lasted five days.
spanish: El juicio duró cinco días.

english: Tomorrow, I have plans to go to Tokyo.
spanish: Tengo planes de ir a Tokio mañana.

english: Many people would agree with you.
spanish: Mucha gente estaría de acuerdo con usted.

english: I think that it's possible.
spanish: Creo que eso es posible.

english: Our dorm's heating system isn't working properly.
spanish: La calefacción de nuestro dormitorio no está funcionando bien.

english: She gave him a slap in the face.
spanish: Le dio una bofetada.

english: I plan on living in the city.
spanish: Planeo vivir en la ciudad.

english: The vase fell to the floor and shattered.
spanish: La vasija se cayó al piso y se hizo trizas.

english: She invited me to the ballet.
spanish: Ella me invitó al ballet.

english: I don't want to do it anymore.
spanish: Ya no lo quiero hacer.

english: I'd like to go to France.
spanish: Me gustaría ir a Francia.

english: He was born in Africa.
spanish: Él nació en África.

english: Do you like to travel?
spanish: ¿Te gusta viajar?

english: That meeting was a waste of time.
spanish: Esa reunión fue una pérdida de tiempo.

english: If that is not true, she is a liar.
spanish: Si eso es falso, ella es una mentirosa.

english: We are likely to get there before dark.
spanish: Es probable que lleguemos allá antes de que oscurezca.

english: Tom's hope was to win first prize.
spanish: Tom esperaba ganar el primer premio.

english: I used to drink beer.
spanish: Solía beber cerveza.

english: Tom waited to hear from Mary.
spanish: Tom esperaba oír de Mary.

english: I had intended to visit you yesterday.
spanish: Tenía la intención de haberte visitado ayer.

english: Take aim at the target.
spanish: Apunta al blanco.

english: Don't go anywhere without Tom.
spanish: No vayas a ningún lado sin Tom.

english: You can count on me to be there by 10:00.
spanish: Estaré allí sobre las 10:00.

english: I managed to make myself understood in English.
spanish: De algún modo conseguí hacerme entender en inglés.

english: This coffee is too strong for me.
spanish: Este café está muy fuerte para mí.

english: She was ready to face her fate.
spanish: Ella estaba lista para enfrentar su destino.

english: They live on the 12th floor of this condo.
spanish: Viven en la planta doce de este bloque.

english: I like my coffee without sugar.
spanish: Me gusta el café sin azúcar.

english: Give me a little money.
spanish: Dame un poco de dinero.

english: Why aren't you listening to me?
spanish: ¿Por qué no me escuchas?

english: He caught a boy stealing his watch.
spanish: Él atrapó a un joven tratando de robar su reloj.

english: She learned to ride a bicycle last year.
spanish: Ella aprendió a montar en bicicleta el año pasado.

english: Our country is running short of energy resources.
spanish: A nuestro país se le están agotando los recursos energéticos.

english: This room is large enough.
spanish: Este cuarto es lo suficientemente grande.

english: They don't want to do it by themselves.
spanish: No quieren hacerlo ellos mismos.

english: Tom handed Mary a cup of hot coffee.
spanish: Tom le pasó a Mary una taza de café caliente.

english: I would rather die than do it.
spanish: Yo preferiría morir que hacerlo.

english: Mary is defending human rights.
spanish: Mary está defendiendo los derechos humanos.

english: Maybe we can help you.
spanish: Tal vez podamos ayudarte.

english: Who else came to the party?
spanish: ¿Quién más vino a la fiesta?

english: Please take note of that.
spanish: Por favor, toma nota de esto.

english: I wish there were more people like you.
spanish: Ojalá hubiera más gente como tú.

english: Study as hard as you can.
spanish: Estudia tanto como puedas.

english: Crime has often been related to poverty.
spanish: El crimen ha estado frecuentemente relacionado con la pobreza.

english: I'm not going to tell you where Tom is.
spanish: No te voy a decir donde está Tom.

english: I haven't eaten there in a long time.
spanish: No he comido ahí en mucho tiempo.

english: At that altitude the weather can change rapidly without warning.
spanish: A esa altura el clima puede cambiar rápidamente sin aviso.

english: Tom used up all his bullets.
spanish: Tom usó todas sus balas.

english: I don't know who painted this picture.
spanish: No sé quién pintó este cuadro.

english: Thank you for coming all the way to see me.
spanish: Gracias por venir hasta aquí para verme.

english: Can I go in there now?
spanish: ¿Puedo entrar ahí ahora?

english: She called him every other day.
spanish: Ella lo llamaba día por medio.

english: Thank you very much for your gift.
spanish: Muchísimas gracias por el regalo.

english: Alexander was a great conqueror.
spanish: Alejandro fue un gran conquistador.

english: I'm thinking of the plan.
spanish: Estoy pensando en el plan.

english: Tom hasn't yet done what we've asked him to do.
spanish: Tom no ha hecho todavía lo que le pedimos que hiciera.

english: Tom and Mary seldom eat together.
spanish: Tom y Mary rara vez comen juntos.

english: Her genius makes up for her lack of experience.
spanish: Su ingenio compensa su falta de experiencia.

english: Tom told me he needed some time to himself.
spanish: Tom me dijo que necesitaba tomarse algo de tiempo.

english: There's no one but me here.
spanish: Aquí estoy yo solo.

english: Tom claims to be a Canadian.
spanish: Tom asegura ser canadiense.

english: He likes listening to the radio.
spanish: A él le gusta escuchar la radio.

english: Tom was the only man in the room.
spanish: Tom era el único hombre en la habitación.

english: By the time you came back, I'd already left.
spanish: Para cuando volviste, yo ya me había ido.

english: Who's taller, Tom or Mary?
spanish: ¿Quién es más alto, Tom o Mary?

english: She refused to speak English.
spanish: Se negó a hablar inglés.

english: I'm not selling you my car.
spanish: No te vendo mi coche.

english: Many boys and girls were present.
spanish: Muchos chicos y chicas estaban presentes.

english: Are you going to buy a dictionary?
spanish: ¿Vas a comprarte un diccionario?

english: He acted like a madman.
spanish: Él actuó como un demente.

english: Tom showed up just in time.
spanish: Tom apareció justo a tiempo.

english: Why do you want to leave today?
spanish: ¿Por qué quieres irte hoy?

english: That motor doesn't have enough power.
spanish: Ese motor no tiene fuerza suficiente.

english: My father is an expert surgeon.
spanish: Mi padre es un cirujano experto.

english: Yesterday I hit on a good idea.
spanish: Ayer se me ocurrió una buena idea.

english: Is there something you want to tell me?
spanish: ¿Hay algo que me quieras decir?

english: We must vacate the house before next month.
spanish: Tenemos que desocupar la casa antes del mes próximo.

english: Tom got very angry at Mary.
spanish: Tom se enfadó mucho con Mary.

english: The meeting took place yesterday.
spanish: La reunión tuvo lugar ayer.

english: I met him on the street the other day.
spanish: Me lo encontré en la calle el otro día.

english: Tom and Mary are friends with John.
spanish: Tom y Mary son amigos de John.

english: His grades have improved significantly.
spanish: Sus notas mejoraron significativamente.

english: It must've been very difficult for you.
spanish: Debe de haberos sido muy difícil.

english: I don't think that he will come.
spanish: Creo que no vendrá.

english: I know what you want.
spanish: Sé lo que quieres.

english: The situation gets worse and worse.
spanish: La situación no hace más que empeorar.

english: It's important for today's young people to study English.
spanish: Es importante para los jóvenes de hoy el estudiar inglés.

english: He insulted me without reason.
spanish: Me insultó sin motivo.

english: I'd like to say a few words.
spanish: Querría decir unas palabras.

english: It'll be sunny tomorrow afternoon.
spanish: Mañana por la tarde hará sol.

english: Mary was definitely the prettiest girl at the party.
spanish: Mary era definitivamente la chica más linda en la fiesta.

english: I'm not sure I'm ready.
spanish: No estoy segura de estar preparada.

english: It's a piece of cake.
spanish: Es facilísimo.

english: The Japanese population is shrinking.
spanish: La población japonesa está decreciendo.

english: You can't sleep more than 24 hours a day.
spanish: No podés dormir más de 24 horas al día.

english: I'm excited to see what Tom does.
spanish: Estoy entusiasmado por ver qué hace Tom.

english: Fresh fruit is good for your health.
spanish: La fruta fresca es buena para la salud.

english: This fact must not be forgotten.
spanish: Este hecho no debe ser olvidado.

english: Can you recommend a hotel?
spanish: ¿Me puede recomendar un hotel?

english: I'm really not much of a performer.
spanish: No soy bueno como intérprete.

english: I want Tom on my team.
spanish: Lo quiero a Tom en mi equipo.

english: I'm sure Tom doesn't want to study French.
spanish: Estoy seguro que Tom no quiere estudiar francés.

english: What if something gets broken?
spanish: ¿Y si algo se rompe?

english: It's all for the best.
spanish: Es por tu bien.

english: She is not rich enough to waste money.
spanish: Ella no es tan rica como para poder derrochar su dinero.

english: He led a life of luxury.
spanish: Él llevó una vida de lujos.

english: Tom wants to tell Mary the truth.
spanish: Tom quiere decirle la verdad a María.

english: The airplane was just going to take off.
spanish: El avión estaba a punto de despegar.

english: Tom spends way too much time thinking about Mary.
spanish: Tom pasa demasiado tiempo pensando en Mary.

english: He was very affectionate with his parents.
spanish: Era muy cariñoso con sus padres.

english: We have to take steps to prevent air pollution.
spanish: Tenemos que tomar medidas para prevenir la contaminación atmosférica.

english: I don't want to interrupt Tom while he's speaking.
spanish: No quiero interrumpir a Tom mientras está hablando.

english: I might not do that.
spanish: Creo que no lo haré.

english: Are you still playing the bassoon?
spanish: ¿Sigues tocando el fagot?

english: Tom doesn't know when Mary will come back.
spanish: Tom no sabe cuándo volverá Mary.

english: The police persuaded her not to jump off the bridge.
spanish: La policía la convenció para que no saltara del puente.

english: He has a black shirt.
spanish: Él tiene una camisa negra.

english: I think that they're a lot of fun.
spanish: Yo pienso que ellos son muy divertidos.

english: He did what I told him to do.
spanish: Hizo lo que le dije que hiciese.

english: I will never tell a lie from now on.
spanish: Ya nunca diré una mentira de ahora en adelante.

english: Can I use my credit card?
spanish: ¿Puedo usar mi tarjeta de crédito?

english: I think this is exactly what Tom wants.
spanish: Creo que esto es exactamente lo que quiere Tom.

english: Our country produces a lot of sugar.
spanish: Nuestro país produce mucha azúcar.

english: I taught myself how to play the guitar.
spanish: Aprendí de manera autodidacta a tocar la guitarra.

english: I was having a bath when the telephone rang.
spanish: Me estaba bañando cuando sonó el teléfono.

english: Tom will try to convince Mary to accept your offer.
spanish: Tom tratará de convencer a Mary de que acepte tu oferta.

english: Nothing is worse than war.
spanish: Nada es peor que la guerra.

english: If I were you, I'd ask him.
spanish: Si fuera tú, le preguntaría.

english: Don't interrupt me! Can't you see I am talking?
spanish: ¡No me interrumpas! ¿No ves que estoy hablando?

english: Tom plans to stay here until it stops raining.
spanish: Tom planea estar aquí hasta que pare de llover.

english: Talking is one thing, doing is another.
spanish: Del dicho al hecho hay mucho trecho.

english: I remember hearing the story once.
spanish: Recuerdo ya haber oído esa historia una vez.

english: Take off your socks, please.
spanish: Por favor, quítate los calcetines.

english: Would you be willing to help me clean the garage?
spanish: ¿Estarías dispuesto a ayudarme a limpiar la cochera?

english: You want me to show you how to do it?
spanish: ¿Quieres que te enseñe cómo hacerlo?

english: They say she and her husband can't agree on anything.
spanish: Dicen que ella y su marido no están de acuerdo en nada.

english: Tom and Mary have very eventful lives.
spanish: Tom y Mary tienen unas vidas azarosas.

english: Investigators are running a probe into what caused the crash.
spanish: Los científicos están realizando una investigación para saber lo que causó el accidente.

english: She doesn't like going to school.
spanish: A ella no le gusta ir a la escuela.

english: My mother did nothing but weep.
spanish: Mi madre no hizo nada sino llorar.

english: I have to mow the lawn once a week.
spanish: Debo cortar la hierba una vez por semana.

english: I can't remember where I hid my money.
spanish: No puedo recordar dónde escondí mi dinero.

english: We talked about various subjects.
spanish: Conversamos sobre varios temas.

english: You will never be too old to learn.
spanish: Nunca se es demasiado viejo para aprender.

english: Why should I believe that?
spanish: ¿Por qué debería creer eso?

english: Why aren't you with your parents?
spanish: ¿Por qué no estás con tus padres?

english: My girlfriend is a good dancer.
spanish: Mi novia baila bien.

english: She caressed her baby lovingly.
spanish: Ella acarició a su bebé dulcemente.

english: They were given a hearty welcome.
spanish: Fueron recibidos con una calurosa bienvenida.

english: I'm glad you were there.
spanish: Me alegra que estuvieras allí.

english: Tom continued banging on the door.
spanish: Tom continuó golpeando la puerta.

english: Could you take a picture of me?
spanish: ¿Me puede sacar una foto?

english: There is a fork missing.
spanish: Falta un tenedor.

english: Tom can't get rid of his cough.
spanish: Tom no se puede deshacer de su tos.

english: Look, your shoelaces have come undone.
spanish: Mira, se te desataron los cordones.

english: Don't you have a pen?
spanish: ¿No tienes un bolígrafo?

english: Let's see what the outcome is.
spanish: Veamos cual es el resultado.

english: I don't want Tom to talk to Mary.
spanish: No quiero que Tom hable con María.

english: This desk is designed for children.
spanish: Este pupitre está diseñado para niños.

english: Tom didn't think you would like the idea.
spanish: Tom no pensó que te gustaría la idea.

english: I drank from the tap.
spanish: Bebí de la canilla.

english: Even my mom knows it.
spanish: Hasta mi mamá lo sabe.

english: My family is always there for me.
spanish: Mi familia está siempre ahí para mí.

english: They showed me a lot of nice pictures.
spanish: Ellos me mostraron muchas fotos hermosas.

english: Fishing is not allowed here.
spanish: Aquí no está permitido pescar.

english: Nice to see you, Tom.
spanish: Qué bueno verte, Tom.

english: I'm sitting in the railway station.
spanish: Estoy sentado en la estación de tren.

english: I'll do what I can.
spanish: Haré lo que pueda.

english: He put all his money in the box.
spanish: Él puso todo su dinero en la caja.

english: He planned the attack carefully.
spanish: Planeó el ataque con cuidado.

english: Mary is helping her mother.
spanish: Mary está ayudando a su madre.

english: What did you do this week?
spanish: ¿Qué hiciste esta semana?

english: I saw Tom hit Mary.
spanish: Vi a Tom pegarle a Mary.

english: Do you have any experience doing that?
spanish: ¿Tiene usted experiencia haciendo eso?

english: We heard the door shut.
spanish: Oímos la puerta cerrándose.

english: The accident damaged her car's front wheels.
spanish: El accidente dañó las ruedas delanteras de su coche.

english: I'm very grateful to you.
spanish: Te estoy muy agradecido.

english: I don't recognize any of the people in the picture.
spanish: No reconozco a ninguno de los que aparecen en la foto.

english: I went there out of curiosity.
spanish: Fui allí por curiosidad.

english: We hear with our ears.
spanish: Oímos con nuestras orejas.

english: This is my first time.
spanish: Esta es mi primera vez.

english: We used to take a walk before breakfast.
spanish: Nosotros solíamos dar una caminata antes del desayuno.

english: Why don't you sit here?
spanish: ¿Por qué no te sientas aquí?

english: I can't understand what happened.
spanish: No puedo explicarme lo ocurrido.

english: She listens to him even though no one else does.
spanish: Ella le escucha, aunque nadie más lo haga.

english: He was the first person to arrive.
spanish: Él fue la primera persona en llegar.

english: Tom is alone in the kitchen.
spanish: Tom está solo en la cocina.

english: I don't mind hot weather.
spanish: No me afecta el clima cálido.

english: The chair is not by the window.
spanish: La silla no está al lado de la ventana.

english: I guess I'll have to leave now.
spanish: Supongo que ahora me tengo que ir.

english: I'm sorry, but I can't go with you.
spanish: Lo siento, pero no puedo ir contigo.

english: I'm taking a walk in a park.
spanish: Estoy paseando por un parque.

english: I have a feeling that she'll come today.
spanish: Tengo la impresión de que ella vendrá hoy.

english: He is working hard to catch up with the others.
spanish: Él está trabajando mucho para ponerse al nivel de los demás.

english: The capital of France is Paris.
spanish: La capital de Francia es París.

english: The boy cannot keep quiet for ten minutes.
spanish: Ese niño es incapaz de estarse quieto durante diez minutos.

english: It is 50 kilometers to Paris.
spanish: Está a 50 kilómetros de París.

english: I asked Tom a question.
spanish: Le hice una pregunta a Tom.

english: Tom had nothing more to say.
spanish: Tom no tenía nada más que decir.

english: He was having lunch when I entered the room.
spanish: Él estaba almorzando cuando entré a la habitación.

english: There is a dragonfly on the ceiling.
spanish: Hay una libélula en el techo.

english: Meat and eggs have a lot of protein.
spanish: La carne y huevos tienen mucha proteína.

english: Can I ask a question?
spanish: ¿Puedo hacer una pregunta?

english: I owe what I am today to education.
spanish: Lo que yo soy hoy se lo debo a la educación.

english: What do you want now?
spanish: ¿Qué quieres ahora?

english: I can't get rid of it.
spanish: No me puedo deshacer de él.

english: He only paid ten dollars for that shirt.
spanish: Él sólo pagó diez dólares por esa camisa.

english: A cold wind was blowing.
spanish: Soplaba un viento frío.

english: Thanks for picking me up.
spanish: Gracias por recogerme.

english: I wish I had a house of my own.
spanish: Desearía tener una casa propia.

english: What did you say to me?
spanish: ¿Qué me dijiste?

english: Please take off your shoes.
spanish: Por favor, quítate los zapatos.

english: Do you really think it's no good?
spanish: ¿De verdad crees que no es bueno?

english: How far is it from the airport to the hotel?
spanish: ¿Cuánta es la distancia desde el aeropuerto hasta el hotel?

english: I don't like wasting people's time.
spanish: No me gusta hacerle perder el tiempo a la gente.

english: Nobody knows where Tom went.
spanish: Nadie sabe hacia dónde fue Tom.

english: I thought I'd never see you again.
spanish: Pensé que jamás te volvería a ver.

english: I think Tom was hiding something.
spanish: Creo que Tom estaba ocultando algo.

english: When was the last time you tidied your room?
spanish: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que ordenaste tu pieza?

english: Will you be finished by 2:30?
spanish: ¿Habrás terminado para las dos y media?

english: Mary waxes her legs every month.
spanish: María se depila las piernas todos los meses.

english: You said almost all of your friends were Canadians.
spanish: Dijiste que casi todos tus amigos eran canadienses.

english: I study math harder than you do.
spanish: Yo estudio mates mucho más que tú.

english: He speaks as if he were an expert.
spanish: Él habla como si fuera un experto.

english: What language do they speak in your country?
spanish: ¿Qué lengua se habla en tu país?

english: I'm not able to fix the computer.
spanish: No puedo reparar el ordenador.

english: May I ask how old you are?
spanish: ¿Puedo preguntaros cuántos años tenéis?

english: Would you take part in the project?
spanish: ¿Participarías en el proyecto?

english: Who has eaten all the cookies?
spanish: ¿Quién se comió todas las galletas?

english: What happened to the book I put here yesterday?
spanish: ¿Qué le pasó al libro que dejé aquí ayer?

english: He pushed his nose against the window.
spanish: Él apoyó la nariz contra la ventana.

english: He built an exact replica of Notre Dame Cathedral.
spanish: Él construyó una réplica exacta de la catedral de Notre Dame.

english: I know Tom wouldn't leave me stranded.
spanish: Sé que Tom no me dejaría colgada.

english: I don't want to get married too early.
spanish: No quiero casarme tan pronto.

english: After that, he went home.
spanish: Después de eso, él se fue a casa.

english: You know what I want you to say.
spanish: Sabes lo que quiero que digas.

english: Many things have changed in the last five years.
spanish: Han cambiado muchas cosas en el último lustro.

english: He stalled the engine three times.
spanish: Él caló el motor en tres ocasiones.

english: Harvard University was founded in 1636.
spanish: La universidad de Harvard fue fundada en 1636.

english: I was not aware of a mosquito biting my arm.
spanish: No me di cuenta de que un mosquito me estaba picando en el brazo.

english: The judge banged his gavel.
spanish: El juez golpeó con su martillo.

english: She is certainly over forty.
spanish: Ella seguro que pasa de los cuarenta.

english: The two poems express human suffering.
spanish: Los dos poemas expresan la miseria humana.

english: I do not understand you.
spanish: No te entiendo.

english: I forgot to shutter the windows before the storm hit.
spanish: Olvidé cerrar las contraventanas antes de que la tormenta golpeara.

english: My dream is to become a firefighter.
spanish: Mi sueño es ser bombera.

english: I don't know whether he will come or not.
spanish: No sé si va a venir o no.

english: Start your morning off with coffee.
spanish: Empieza tu mañana con café.

english: Learn these names by heart.
spanish: Aprendé estos nombres de memoria.

english: Who doesn't like the beach?
spanish: ¿A quién no le gusta la playa?

english: This book is a good guide for beginners.
spanish: Este libro es una buena guía para principiantes.

english: Tom is as old as Mary.
spanish: Tomás tiene la misma edad que María.

english: Is anyone else excited about this?
spanish: ¿Alguien más está emocionado por esto?

english: That could be true, but I don't really think so.
spanish: Eso podría ser verdad, pero realmente no lo creo.

english: She could not keep her daughter from going out.
spanish: Ella no pudo impedir que su hija saliera.

english: Do you have a crush on my brother?
spanish: ¿Estás enamorada de mi hermano?

english: Tom was afraid of Mary.
spanish: Tom tenía miedo de Mary.

english: I could not convince him of his mistake.
spanish: No pude sacarle de su error.

english: Tom didn't mean to offend Mary.
spanish: Tom no quería ofender a Mary.

english: He goes to school on foot.
spanish: Va al colegio a pie.

english: We have five classes every day except Saturday.
spanish: Tenemos cinco clases todos los días excepto el sábado.

english: Today she turns ten years old.
spanish: Hoy ella cumple diez primaveras.

english: The supermarket opens at ten o'clock.
spanish: El supermercado abre a las diez.

english: I participated in the discussion.
spanish: Participé de la discusión.

english: Tell me where to put these books.
spanish: Dime dónde pongo estos libros.

english: He stopped reading the newspaper.
spanish: Él paró de leer el periódico.

english: The building on the hill is our school.
spanish: El edificio en la colina es nuestra escuela.

english: What's your favorite Broadway musical?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu musical de Broadway favorito?

english: Don't be afraid of making mistakes when you speak English.
spanish: No tengas miedo de cometer errores cuando hables en inglés.

english: We talked without the aid of an interpreter.
spanish: Conversamos sin la ayuda de un intérprete.

english: Turn right at the next intersection.
spanish: Gire a la derecha en el siguiente cruce.

english: I think we need a doctor.
spanish: Creo que necesitamos un médico.

english: We enjoyed the excursion very much.
spanish: Disfrutamos mucho de la excursión.

english: I feel like sleeping all day.
spanish: Tengo ganas de dormir todo el día.

english: That's a very witty phrase.
spanish: Esa frase tiene mucho ingenio.

english: I thought I had enough money.
spanish: Pensaba que tenía bastante dinero.

english: I don't know who my mother is.
spanish: No sé quién es mi madre.

english: What do you want to study at college?
spanish: ¿Qué quieres estudiar en la universidad?

english: She took care of his wound.
spanish: Ella prestó cuidados a su herida.

english: I ate a whole lot of cookies.
spanish: Me comí un montón de galletas.

english: I asked Tom where he had gone.
spanish: Le pregunté a Tom a dónde había ido.

english: Your remarks were out of place.
spanish: Sus comentarios estuvieron fuera de lugar.

english: A lot of people in our neighborhood own guns.
spanish: Mucha gente en nuestro vecindario posee armas.

english: I'm not a bit tired.
spanish: No estoy nada cansado.

english: Skating is one of my hobbies.
spanish: Esquiar es uno de mis pasatiempos.

english: Tom has decided to study abroad.
spanish: Tom ha decidido estudiar fuera.

english: I let Tom in the house.
spanish: Dejé a Tom en la casa.

english: We might not need to sign a contract.
spanish: Puede que no tengamos que firmar un contrato.

english: Tom is living with his uncle now.
spanish: Ahora Tom vive con su tío.

english: We had a very good time last night.
spanish: Anoche nos divertimos mucho.

english: Even the strongest man can't stop a typhoon.
spanish: Ni siquiera el hombre más fuerte puede parar un tifón.

english: Tom slumped back in his chair.
spanish: Tom se cayó hacia atrás sobre su silla.

english: Delegates from many countries participated in the conference.
spanish: Delegados de muchos países participaron en la conferencia.

english: She argued with him and then hit him.
spanish: Ella discutió con él y luego lo golpeó.

english: When will your book be published?
spanish: ¿Cuándo se publicará tu libro?

english: The concert will take place next summer.
spanish: El concierto se realizará el siguiente verano.

english: Tom hasn't complained of any discomfort.
spanish: Tom no se ha quejado de alguna incomodidad.

english: His life is in danger.
spanish: Su vida está en peligro.

english: He thought someone had put poison in his soup.
spanish: Pensaba que alguien había echado veneno en la sopa.

english: Tom seems very angry, doesn't he?
spanish: Tom parece estar muy enfadado, ¿verdad?

english: I had to give Tom a little help.
spanish: Tuve que proporcionar a Tom un poco de ayuda.

english: Father bought me a camera.
spanish: Mi padre me ha comprado una cámara.

english: I want Tom left alone.
spanish: Quiero que se deje en paz a Tom.

english: It's a dream come true.
spanish: Es un sueño hecho realidad.

english: Is there a student discount?
spanish: ¿Hay descuento por ser estudiante?

english: Tom says he doesn't remember a thing.
spanish: Tom dice que no recuerda nada.

english: I care for you a great deal.
spanish: Cuido de ti mucho.

english: He received cheers and applause.
spanish: Él recibió ovaciones y aplausos.

english: Do you have a twin brother?
spanish: ¿Tienes un hermano gemelo?

english: She seems to be possessed by an evil spirit.
spanish: Ella parece poseída por un espíritu maligno.

english: I saw Tom a while back.
spanish: Yo vi a Tom un rato atrás.

english: What are the dimensions of the room?
spanish: ¿Cuáles son las dimensiones del cuarto?

english: I need a word with Tom.
spanish: Necesito hablar dos palabras con Tom.

english: Stop beating around the bush.
spanish: Déjate de andar con indirectas.

english: Let me sing a song for you.
spanish: Deja que te cante una canción.

english: He stopped to talk to them.
spanish: Él se paró a hablar con ellos.

english: Tom seems to have disappeared.
spanish: Parece que Tom ha desaparecido.

english: The frogman jumped into the canal.
spanish: El buzo se tiró al canal.

english: We went to Boston, where we stayed a week.
spanish: Fuimos a Boston, donde estuvimos una semana.

english: Her face was bright with happiness.
spanish: Su cara brillaba de felicidad.

english: It's the same every time.
spanish: Es siempre lo mismo.

english: Tom was soaked to the skin.
spanish: Tom se empapó hasta los huesos.

english: What are you waiting for?
spanish: ¿Qué esperas?

english: Mom says you should get out of bed.
spanish: Mamá dice que debería salir de la cama.

english: We need someone with guts to do it.
spanish: Necesitamos a alguien con dos cojones para hacerlo.

english: What happened to my bag?
spanish: ¿Qué pasó con mi bolso?

english: Can you drive me to the airport tomorrow morning?
spanish: ¿Puedes llevarme mañana por la mañana al aeropuerto?

english: The man hit me on the head.
spanish: El hombre me golpeó en la cabeza.

english: What the newspapers say is true.
spanish: Lo que dice el periódico es verdad.

english: Tom told Mary not to wait for John.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary que no esperara a John.

english: I'm really starting to hate this town.
spanish: Estoy empezando a odiar este pueblo.

english: Tom is not in prison at the moment.
spanish: Tom no está en prisión por ahora.

english: I'm not strong enough to do this.
spanish: No soy lo suficientemente fuerte para hacer esto.

english: I am sure of his accepting our invitation.
spanish: Estoy seguro de que aceptará nuestra invitación.

english: He's a teacher and so am I.
spanish: Él es profesor, y yo también.

english: Tom went in my place.
spanish: Tom entró en mi casa.

english: Nanako is really cute, isn't she?
spanish: Nanako es muy mona, ¿verdad?

english: I would do anything for love.
spanish: Haría lo que fuera por amor.

english: Tom didn't know that he had a secret admirer.
spanish: Tom no sabía que tenía una admiradora secreta.

english: You aren't as short as I am.
spanish: No eres tan bajo como yo.

english: Do you want to tell me what this is?
spanish: ¿Me quieres decir qué es esto?

english: The neighbor didn't see anything.
spanish: El vecino no vio nada.

english: She is anxious about his safety.
spanish: Ella está preocupada por su seguridad.

english: I want a knife to sharpen my pencil with.
spanish: Quiero un navaja para afilar mi lápiz.

english: Tom calls Mary up every night.
spanish: Tom llama todas las noches a Mary.

english: Aren't you a little young to be doing this?
spanish: ¿No eres un poco joven para estar haciendo esto?

english: It's been snowing all night.
spanish: Ha estado nevando toda la noche.

english: Two sheets were on the bed.
spanish: Había dos sábanas sobre la cama.

english: She beat him to death with a golf club.
spanish: Lo apaleó hasta la muerte con un palo de golf.

english: Where did Tom go wrong?
spanish: ¿Dónde se equivocó Tom?

english: Can you solve this problem?
spanish: ¿Puede resolver este problema?

english: I'll meet you at the usual place.
spanish: Te veré en el sitio habitual.

english: I just graduated from high school.
spanish: Acabo de terminar el instituto.

english: The lamb was killed by the wolf.
spanish: El lobo mató al borrego.

english: Let me say what I think.
spanish: Déjame decir lo que pienso.

english: He passed away quite suddenly.
spanish: Él falleció repentinamente.

english: How long does it take from here to the station?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo se tarda en ir desde aquí hasta la estación?

english: That was all Greek to me.
spanish: Eso fue como hablarme en chino.

english: He has a good chance of being chosen.
spanish: Él tiene una buena chance de ser elegido.

english: I wonder if Tom can tell us anything else.
spanish: Me pregunto si Tom nos puede decir algo más.

english: None of us is perfect.
spanish: Ninguno de nosotros es perfecto.

english: It was this book that I borrowed from him.
spanish: Este era el libro que le tomé prestado.

english: Tom doesn't have to hide his feelings from Mary.
spanish: Tom no tiene que ocultar sus sentimientos por Mary.

english: Tom asked Mary why she was crying.
spanish: Tom le preguntó a Mary por qué lloraba.

english: Tom says that's not fair.
spanish: Tomás dice que no es justo.

english: I think it's time for me to close the window.
spanish: Creo que es hora de que cierre la ventana.

english: Tom intended to visit Boston last month.
spanish: Tom pretendía visitar Boston el mes pasado.

english: Will this much food do for a week's camping?
spanish: ¿Llegará esta cantidad de comida para una semana de acampada?

english: I tried to save Tom.
spanish: Traté de salvar a Tom.

english: I don't know how to thank you.
spanish: No sé cómo agradecértelo.

english: She spends every Saturday afternoon playing tennis.
spanish: Ella pasa las tardes de los sábados jugando al tenis.

english: I like to eat sweets.
spanish: Me gusta comer dulces.

english: The police arrested the pickpocket in the act.
spanish: La policía detuvo al carterista en flagrante delito.

english: The old man breathed his last.
spanish: El anciano expiró.

english: What do you think of the new teacher?
spanish: ¿Qué opinas del nuevo profesor?

english: The deer was running by itself.
spanish: El ciervo iba corriendo por sí sólo.

english: Look after the children this afternoon.
spanish: Cuida a los niños esta tarde.

english: I'm exactly where I want to be.
spanish: Estoy exactamente donde quiero estar.

english: To the Hilton Hotel, please.
spanish: Al hotel Hilton, por favor.

english: My ex-husband no longer lives in this city.
spanish: Mi ex-esposo ya no vive más en esta ciudad.

english: Tom wasn't at home yesterday.
spanish: Tom no estaba en casa ayer.

english: Don't use this until tomorrow.
spanish: No uses esto hasta mañana.

spanish: ¿Hay una playa pública por aquí cerca?

spanish: Deberías llevarte un paraguas hoy.
