english: Tom usually doesn't have to work on Monday afternoons.
spanish: Los lunes por la tarde Tom no suele tener que trabajar.

english: The pen I lost yesterday was new.
spanish: La birome que perdí ayer era nueva.

english: I think I'm going mad.
spanish: Creo que me estoy volviendo loca.

english: The police chased the stolen car.
spanish: La policía persiguió al coche robado.

english: It was cold and we got a fire going.
spanish: Hacía frío y encendimos un fuego.

english: I heard him humming in the shower.
spanish: Lo escuché tatarear en la ducha.

english: Innocence is a beautiful thing.
spanish: La inocencia es una cosa hermosa.

english: I have to be at the station at three o'clock.
spanish: Tengo que estar en la estación a las tres en punto.

english: I did what was important to me.
spanish: Hice lo que era importante para mi.

english: Tom's not in the hospital.
spanish: Tom no está en el hospital.

english: Serve the fish on that platter.
spanish: Sirva usted el pescado en esa fuente.

english: Tom came back to Boston last year.
spanish: Tom volvió a Boston el año pasado.

english: Have you taken a bath?
spanish: ¿Has tomado un baño?

english: My gums bleed whenever I floss my teeth.
spanish: Las encías me sangran cada vez que me paso hilo dental.

english: Tom told Mary what John had told him.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary lo que John le había contado.

english: The buds began to open.
spanish: Los capullos empezaron a abrirse.

english: This is not my car.
spanish: Este no es mi coche.

english: How much is the ticket?
spanish: ¿Cuánto cuesta el billete?

english: I will ask him tomorrow.
spanish: Le preguntaré mañana.

english: I only slept two hours.
spanish: Solo dormí dos horas.

english: The baby is able to walk.
spanish: La bebé puede caminar.

english: We tried to trap the fox.
spanish: Tratamos de atrapar al zorro.

english: Why did you abandon me?
spanish: ¿Por qué me abandonaste?

english: My father complained about the traffic noise.
spanish: Mi padre se quejaba del ruido del tráfico.

english: How do you assess your students?
spanish: ¿Cómo evalúas a tus estudiantes?

english: She has a bad reputation.
spanish: Ella tiene una mala reputación.

english: I need to leave a message.
spanish: Necesito dejar un mensaje.

english: Is it true that Tom went to Boston?
spanish: ¿Es verdad que Tom fue a Boston?

english: She saw a lot of animals on the road.
spanish: Ella vio muchos animales en la carretera.

english: He doesn't have the necessary skills for that job.
spanish: Él no tiene las habilidades para llevar bien ese trabajo.

english: She knows who he is.
spanish: Sabe quién es.

english: I've known Tom for a long time.
spanish: Hace mucho tiempo que conozco a Tom.

english: The boy caressed the girl's chin and kissed her cheek.
spanish: El niño acarició a la niña en el mentón y la besó en la mejilla.

english: How long have you been in Japan?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo estuviste en Japón?

english: I assumed Tom and Mary were husband and wife.
spanish: Asumí que Tom y María eran marido y mujer.

english: Do you like classical music?
spanish: ¿Os gusta la música clásica?

english: Since I was sick, I didn't go.
spanish: No fui porque estaba enfermo.

english: I lost my best friend in a traffic accident.
spanish: Perdí a mi mejor amiga en un accidente de tránsito.

english: Japan maintains friendly relations with the United States.
spanish: Japón mantiene relaciones amistosas con Estados Unidos.

english: Tom wondered what had happened.
spanish: Tom se preguntó qué había pasado.

english: His ranch covers twenty square miles.
spanish: Su rancho abarca 20 millas cuadradas.

english: I have to hurry. My flight leaves in an hour.
spanish: Me tengo que apurar, mi vuelo sale en una hora.

english: Do you like these earrings?
spanish: ¿Te gustan esos pendientes?

english: I just came from there.
spanish: Acabo de volver de allí.

english: Let's get you fixed up with a drink.
spanish: Vayamos a conseguirte una bebida.

english: What brand of dog food do you feed your dog?
spanish: ¿Qué marca de comida de perro le das a tu perro de comer?

english: She heard someone calling for help.
spanish: Ella oyó a alguien pidiendo ayuda.

english: Where did you take your gloves off?
spanish: ¿Dónde te quitaste los guantes?

english: What did you do at school today?
spanish: ¿Qué has hecho hoy en la escuela?

english: I usually read labels carefully.
spanish: Normalmente leo las etiquetas con cuidado.

english: France is to the south of England.
spanish: Francia está al sur de Inglaterra.

english: He has a good knowledge of French.
spanish: Él tiene un buen dominio del francés.

english: We are sorry we can't help you.
spanish: Lo sentimos mucho por no poder ayudarlos.

english: I have to get out of this mess.
spanish: Tengo que salir cagando.

english: Tropical rainforests produce oxygen and consume carbon dioxide.
spanish: Las selvas tropicales producen oxígeno y consumen dióxido de carbono.

english: She told him that she was leaving.
spanish: Ella le dijo que se iba.

english: I brought something for you.
spanish: Traje algo para vos.

english: I live with my parents.
spanish: Vivo con mis padres.

english: Tom tried to figure out the answer by himself.
spanish: Tom trató de averiguar la respuesta por sí solo.

english: Tom takes a bath every evening after dinner.
spanish: Tom se baña todas las noches después de la cena.

english: The old man told the children an amusing story.
spanish: El anciano les contó una divertida historia a los niños.

english: Mother sent us grapes packed in a box.
spanish: Mamá nos mandó uvas empacadas en una caja.

english: This singer is very popular with young people.
spanish: Este cantante es muy popular entre los jóvenes.

english: Tom parked in his usual spot.
spanish: Tom se paró donde siempre se para.

english: I wish you had come to see me yesterday.
spanish: Ojalá hubieras venido a verme ayer.

english: She was more beautiful than all the others.
spanish: Ella era más linda que todas las demás.

english: Do you want to help?
spanish: ¿Querés ayudar?

english: The boxer had to lose weight for the title match.
spanish: El boxeador tenía que perder peso para la pelea por el título.

english: How can I start the engine?
spanish: ¿Cómo puedo encender el motor?

english: You've got to stop doing that.
spanish: Tienes que parar de hacer eso.

english: He bought a plane ticket.
spanish: Compró un billete de avión.

english: They built the first electric car.
spanish: Construyeron el primer coche eléctrico.

english: Tom sometimes falls asleep in class.
spanish: Tom a veces se queda dormido en clases.

english: The furniture was bought at an auction.
spanish: Compraron los muebles en un remate.

english: He could not forsake his friend in trouble.
spanish: Él no pudo abandonar a su amigo en dificultades.

english: I've already finished reading this book.
spanish: Ya he terminado de leer este libro.

english: Are you going to the meeting?
spanish: ¿Vas a ir a la reunión?

english: I think it won't rain tomorrow.
spanish: Creo que no lloverá mañana.

english: When did you immigrate to our country?
spanish: ¿Cuándo emigró a nuestro país?

english: He has not come home yet, has he?
spanish: Todavía no ha vuelto a casa, ¿verdad?

english: He is eager to become famous.
spanish: Él está deseando hacerse famoso.

english: How often do you eat fish?
spanish: ¿Qué tan seguido comes pescado?

english: He was given the benefit of the doubt.
spanish: Se le concedió el beneficio de la duda.

english: Tom got drunk last night.
spanish: Tom se emborrachó anoche.

english: I thought Tom would want to try some Japanese food.
spanish: Pensé que a Tom le gustaría probar un poco de comida japonesa.

english: Tom knows that Mary went to Boston.
spanish: Tom sabe que Mary fue a Boston.

english: He seized me by the wrist.
spanish: Él me agarró por la muñeca.

english: He helped me do my homework.
spanish: Él me ayudó a hacer mis tareas.

english: See if the gas is turned off.
spanish: Fíjate si el gas está cerrado.

english: Tom and three of his friends went on a picnic.
spanish: Tom y tres de sus amigos se fueron de picnic.

english: Can't we work this out?
spanish: ¿No podemos solucionar esto?

english: You never let me do anything.
spanish: Nunca me dejas hacer nada.

english: I thought something horrible had happened.
spanish: Pensé que algo horrible había sucedido.

english: The family is watching a movie together.
spanish: Juntos, la familia mira una película.

english: I think that the train will be here soon.
spanish: Creo que el tren llegará aquí pronto.

english: She will make a business trip to London next week.
spanish: Ella hará un viaje de negocios a Londres la semana próxima.

english: While listening to the radio, I fell asleep.
spanish: Me dormí escuchando la radio.

english: I give you my word.
spanish: Le doy mi palabra.

english: I thought about the meaning of his painting.
spanish: Pensé acerca del significado de su pintura.

english: Most people know that sea water is undrinkable.
spanish: La mayoría de las personas saben que el agua de mar es imbebible.

english: You're not expected to do anything we wouldn't do ourselves.
spanish: No hace falta que hagas lo que nosotros no haríamos.

english: It is our duty to help them.
spanish: Es nuestro deber ayudarles.

english: Tom could hear his name being called.
spanish: Tom pudo oír que llamaban su nombre.

english: You must be careful when talking to a European.
spanish: Debes ser cuidadoso cuando hablas con un europeo.

english: You've got a lot to learn.
spanish: Tenéis mucho que aprender.

english: Tom was totally snockered before the party even began.
spanish: Tom estaba totalmente borracho antes incluso de que la fiesta empezara.

english: To me, it is important.
spanish: Es importante para mí.

english: I congratulate you on a job well done.
spanish: Los felicito por un trabajo bien hecho.

english: I was in New York for a few days.
spanish: Estuve en Nueva York un par de días.

english: Who are your closest friends?
spanish: ¿Quiénes son tus amigos más cercanos?

english: There was an awkward silence when he appeared.
spanish: Hubo un silencio incómodo cuando él apareció.

english: I told him that I would do my best.
spanish: Le dije que haría lo que pudiera.

english: He kept me waiting for an hour.
spanish: Me tuvo una hora esperando.

english: Why didn't you say goodbye?
spanish: ¿Por qué no dijiste adiós?

english: Do you want to eat now or later?
spanish: ¿Quieres comer ahora o más tarde?

english: Do you know where I can find it?
spanish: ¿Sabes dónde lo puedo encontrar?

english: Tom wants Mary to say that she needs him.
spanish: Tom quiere que María diga que lo necesita.

english: Tom pretended that what Mary said didn't hurt.
spanish: Tom fingió que no le había dolido lo que había dicho Mary.

english: You should get your car fixed.
spanish: Deberías mandar a reparar tu auto.

english: How much did you pay for that?
spanish: ¿Cuánto pagaste por eso?

english: Please don't compare me with my brother.
spanish: Por favor no me compares con mi hermano.

english: Speak clearly so that everyone may hear you.
spanish: Habla claramente para que todos puedan oírte.

english: Tom was trying to escape.
spanish: Tom estaba intentando escapar.

english: Tom speaks French better than Mary.
spanish: Tom habla francés mejor que Mary.

english: This is what I bought in Spain.
spanish: Esto es lo que compré en España.

english: What brand of cigarettes do you smoke?
spanish: ¿Qué marca de cigarrillos fuma usted?

english: He'll finish the job by tomorrow.
spanish: El terminará el trabajo para mañana.

english: The tickets sold out within a week.
spanish: Los boletos se agotaron en menos de una semana.

english: I'm taking an exam in January.
spanish: Voy a ir a un examen en enero.

english: Why is Tom learning French?
spanish: ¿Por qué aprende francés Tom?

english: I know Tom's hiding something, but I don't know what.
spanish: Yo sé que Tom está ocultando algo, pero no sé qué.

english: She danced with a grace that surprised us all.
spanish: Ella bailó con una gracia que nos sorprendió a todos.

english: The post office is not too far from here.
spanish: El correo no está muy lejos de acá.

english: We need you to be strong.
spanish: Necesitamos que seas fuerte.

english: You're carrying this too far.
spanish: Estás llevando esto demasiado lejos.

english: Generally speaking, Japanese cars are popular overseas.
spanish: En general los coches japoneses son populares en el extranjero.

english: I don't want that kind of life for our children.
spanish: No quiero esa clase de vida para nuestros hijos.

english: How tall is that tower?
spanish: ¿Qué tan alta es aquella torre?

english: I told you I don't know how to do that.
spanish: Te he dicho que no sé cómo hacer eso.

english: A thief broke into the house while we were away.
spanish: Se metió un ladrón a la casa mientras andábamos afuera.

english: There is a little milk left in the bottle.
spanish: Queda un poco de leche en la botella.

english: Tom knew that Mary was unhappy.
spanish: Tom supo que Mary fue infeliz.

english: I never forget a name.
spanish: Nunca olvido un nombre.

english: I don't know what Mary is looking for.
spanish: No sé qué está buscando Mary.

english: I have an errand I need to run.
spanish: Tengo que hacer un mandado así que necesito correr.

english: I'm pretty sure Tom doesn't know how to swim.
spanish: Estoy bastante seguro de que Tom no sabe nadar.

english: Don't judge me too harshly.
spanish: No me juzguéis con demasiada severidad.

english: I'll be in trouble if the story gets out.
spanish: Estaré en problemas si la historia se filtra.

english: Tom meant exactly what he said.
spanish: Tom quiso decir exactamente lo que él dijo.

english: There used to be a small shrine around here.
spanish: Solía haber un pequeño santuario por aquí.

english: Tom hesitated for a moment before answering Mary.
spanish: Tom vaciló por un momento antes de contestarle a Mary.

english: They swam across the river.
spanish: Ellos cruzaron el río nadando.

english: He did not have enough money.
spanish: No tenía dinero suficiente.

english: I have just what you need.
spanish: Tengo justo lo que necesitáis.

english: You've got to learn to hold your tongue.
spanish: Tú tienes que aprender a mantener la boca cerrada.

english: Tom had a bad dream.
spanish: Tom tuvo un mal sueño.

english: I don't need a wheelchair.
spanish: No necesito ninguna silla de ruedas.

english: He kept on smoking all the time.
spanish: Seguía fumando todo el tiempo.

english: Her father dedicated his life to science.
spanish: Su padre dedicó su vida a la ciencia.

english: We have to memorize this poem by the next class.
spanish: Tenemos que memorizar este poema para la próxima clase.

english: Is it money you want?
spanish: ¿Es dinero lo que querés?

english: The Mayor addressed a large audience.
spanish: El alcalde se dirigió a una gran audiencia.

english: Did I miss the party?
spanish: ¿Me he perdido la fiesta?

english: Who taught you how to dance?
spanish: ¿Quién le enseñó a bailar?

english: We just gave up too soon.
spanish: Nos rendimos antes de la cuenta.

english: When was the last time you played soccer?
spanish: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que jugasteis al fútbol?

english: He has a good command of English.
spanish: Él domina muy bien el inglés.

english: It doesn't have any meaning.
spanish: No significa nada.

english: Tom was elected in 2010.
spanish: Tom salió elegido el 2010.

english: It really doesn't concern you.
spanish: Sí que no te concierne.

english: Did you hear about the big earthquake in Japan?
spanish: ¿Oíste acerca del gran terremoto en Japón?

english: He collected a lot of stamps.
spanish: Él recolectó un montón de estampillas.

english: We can all do this.
spanish: Todos nosotros podemos hacer esto.

english: I plan to hire someone who can speak English.
spanish: Planeo contratar a alguien que pueda hablar inglés.

english: Not everybody is the same.
spanish: No todos son iguales.

english: I think maybe that's all you have to do.
spanish: Creo que tal vez eso sea todo lo que tengas que hacer.

english: I don't want anyone to play my guitar.
spanish: No quiero que nadie toque mi guitarra.

english: Tom is a little jealous, isn't he?
spanish: Tom es un poco celoso, ¿no?

english: As soon as I got home, it began to rain.
spanish: Tan pronto como llegué a casa, empezó a llover.

english: How did you find my house?
spanish: ¿Qué te pareció mi casa?

english: I spent hours reading books.
spanish: Pasé muchas horas leyendo libros.

english: Say hello to your friends.
spanish: Di hola a tus amigos.

english: There are many craters on the moon.
spanish: En la Luna hay muchos cráteres.

english: You should ask Mary out on a date.
spanish: Deberías pedirle una cita a Mary.

english: Do you think Tom has put on weight?
spanish: ¿Crees que Tom ha subido de peso?

english: He can sing better than any of us.
spanish: Él puede cantar mejor que cualquiera de nosotros.

english: That's worth three hundred dollars.
spanish: Eso vale trecientos dólares.

english: Tom told me to slow down.
spanish: Tom me ha dicho que disminuya la velocidad.

english: If you're busy, I'll ask someone else to help me.
spanish: Si estás ocupado, le pediré a otra persona que me ayude.

english: I forbid you to smoke.
spanish: Te prohíbo fumar.

english: How did you get in my house?
spanish: ¿Cómo te metiste en mi casa?

english: When will we repaint her room?
spanish: ¿Cuándo volveremos a pintar su habitación?

english: I want to tell you something important.
spanish: Quiero decirte algo importante.

english: We have no choice but to go.
spanish: No tenemos más remedio que ir.

english: I want to go to Africa someday.
spanish: Quiero ir a África algún día.

english: I'm afraid I'm coming down with a cold.
spanish: Temo que estoy resfriándome.

english: Won't you come over to my place?
spanish: ¿No quieres venir a mi casa?

english: Once you have made a promise, you should keep it.
spanish: Una vez que hayas hecho una promesa, debes mantenerla.

english: Did you do it by yourself?
spanish: ¿Lo hiciste tú solo?

english: She is never on time.
spanish: Ella nunca es puntual.

english: He seldom goes to church.
spanish: Raramente va él a la iglesia.

english: After his father died, he had to study by himself.
spanish: Después de que su padre murió, tuvo que estudiar por sí mismo.

english: To love life is to love God.
spanish: Amar la vida es amar a Dios.

english: Tom has never played guitar with Mary.
spanish: Tom nunca ha tocado guitarra con Mary.

english: I expect you to pay off all your debts.
spanish: Espero que pagues todas tus deudas.

english: I wish I'd known that Tom could speak French.
spanish: Ojalá hubiera sabido que Tom sabía hablar francés.

english: Tom heard someone humming his favorite tune.
spanish: Tom escuchó a alguien tararear su melodía favorita.

english: She was reading a gardening manual.
spanish: Ella estaba leyendo un manual de jardinería.

english: Do you mean you don't know what happened?
spanish: ¿Quieres decir que no sabes lo que pasó?

english: They want to go home.
spanish: Ellos quieren irse a casa.

english: I'm kind of excited about this.
spanish: Estoy un poco emocionado por esto.

english: May I go with him?
spanish: ¿Puedo ir con él?

english: I gave Tom detailed instructions.
spanish: Le dí a Tom instrucciones detalladas.

english: Please let me know what you want.
spanish: Por favor, dime lo que quieres.

english: Tom wouldn't lie to me.
spanish: Tom no me mentiría.

english: Well, what are we waiting for?
spanish: Bueno, ¿qué estamos esperando?

english: When was the last time you chewed tobacco?
spanish: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que masticaste tabaco?

english: He had three sons who became doctors.
spanish: Él tuvo tres hijos que se hicieron doctores.

english: He didn't go home yesterday.
spanish: Él no regresó a casa ayer.

english: Tom confessed to murdering Mary.
spanish: Tom confesó haber asesinado a Mary.

english: Why do you love me?
spanish: ¿Por qué me ama usted?

english: Long skirts were in fashion in those days.
spanish: Las faldas largas estaban de moda en esos días.

english: I don't know if we want to do that.
spanish: No sé si queremos hacerlo.

english: I'd appreciate it if you would turn off the lights.
spanish: Agradecería que apagaran la luz.

english: I've learned to think like Tom thinks.
spanish: He aprendido a pensar como Tom.

english: You go there without me.
spanish: Tú ve allá sin mí.

english: I've been practicing a long time for this.
spanish: He practicado por mucho tiempo para esto.

english: That was just a dream.
spanish: Eso fue solo un sueño.

english: He always sings in the shower.
spanish: Él siempre canta en la ducha.

english: Tom doesn't want me to stay.
spanish: Tom no quiere que me quede.

english: Let me get you something to drink.
spanish: Déjame que te consiga algo para beber.

english: I don't feed my dog in the morning.
spanish: No alimento a mi perro en la mañana.

english: I was nearly hit by a car.
spanish: Casi me atropella un auto.

english: The whole country was covered with snow.
spanish: El país entero estaba cubierto con nieve.

english: She got a job as a typist.
spanish: Ella encontró un trabajo como mecanógrafo.

english: The job is half done.
spanish: El trabajo está a medias.

english: She hasn't been to the dentist's for years.
spanish: Ella no ha ido al dentista por años.

english: I want to be a better person.
spanish: Quiero ser una mejor persona.

english: There's no doubt that Tom used to live in Boston.
spanish: No hay duda de que Tom solía vivir en Boston.

english: There's something I need you to do.
spanish: Hay algo que necesito que hagas.

english: These boots belong to her.
spanish: Estas botas le pertenecen a ella.

english: I didn't want my mom to know.
spanish: No quería que lo supiera mi mamá.

english: The dog was sleeping on the mat.
spanish: El perro estaba durmiendo en la estera.

english: You can do it, can't you?
spanish: Puedes hacerlo, ¿verdad?

english: This will give you a rough idea.
spanish: Esto le dará una idea aproximada.

english: Tom is encouraging his students.
spanish: Tom está alentando a sus estudiantes.

english: My mother is not always at home.
spanish: Mi madre no está siempre en casa.

english: She was similar to me in many ways.
spanish: Ella era parecida a mí en muchas formas.

english: Tom thought the food Mary had prepared tasted pretty good.
spanish: Tom pensó que la comida que Mary había preparado sabía muy bien.

english: I pray for Tom almost every day.
spanish: Rezo por Tom casi todos los días.

english: There is a great demand for gasoline.
spanish: Hay mucha demanda de gasolina.

english: Tom knows a lot about American history.
spanish: Tom sabe mucho sobre la historia de América.

english: The Himalayas are higher than the Alps.
spanish: Los Himalayas son más altos que los Alpes.

english: Tom fumbled in his pocket for the keys.
spanish: Tom rebuscó en su bolsillo las llaves.

english: He helped me carry the chair.
spanish: Me ayudó a llevar la silla.

english: I had my brother correct the errors in my composition.
spanish: Mi hermano me corrigió los errores de la redacción.

english: A big wave turned over his canoe.
spanish: Una gran ola volcó su canoa.

english: I just want to hug you.
spanish: Solo quiero abrazarte.

english: What did you do yesterday?
spanish: ¿Qué hicieron ustedes ayer?

english: What do you usually have for breakfast?
spanish: ¿Qué tomas para desayunar?

english: Tom is a very good-looking guy.
spanish: Tom es un chico muy apuesto.

english: I went to the movies with my brother.
spanish: Fui al cine con mi hermano.

english: I could kiss you right now.
spanish: Podría besarte justo ahora.

english: She started dancing when she was eight.
spanish: Ella empezó a bailar cuando tenía ocho años.

english: Everybody will be home for Christmas.
spanish: Todo el mundo estará en casa por Navidad.

english: I need a new one.
spanish: Necesito uno nuevo.

english: Are you wearing that dress for the first time?
spanish: ¿Está usted estrenando ese traje?

english: Do you have anything particular in mind?
spanish: ¿Tienes en mente algo en particular?

english: Tom had a heart tattooed on his arm.
spanish: Tom tenía un corazón tatuado en el brazo.

english: The cavalry charged the enemy.
spanish: La caballería cargó sobre el enemigo.

english: The road is too narrow for cars.
spanish: El camino es muy estrecho para los autos.

english: Tom looked around the room for his keys.
spanish: Tom buscó sus llaves por el cuarto.

english: He made an important discovery.
spanish: Él hizo un descubrimiento importante.

english: Tell me what movies you guys have seen.
spanish: Decidme qué películas habéis visto.

english: We usually talked in French.
spanish: Habitualmente hablábamos en francés.

english: Who was the last to reach the goal?
spanish: ¿Quién fue el último en alcanzar la meta?

english: I don't know a lot of jokes.
spanish: No me sé muchos chistes.

english: Three-fourths of the earth's surface is covered with water.
spanish: Tres cuartos de la superficie de la Tierra están cubiertos de agua.

english: I know it's been really hard for you.
spanish: Sé que ha sido realmente duro para ti.

english: Mary had to go to school.
spanish: Mary tenía que ir a la escuela.

english: The statistics are in our favor.
spanish: Las estadísticas están a nuestro favor.

english: He was silent for a long time.
spanish: Él estuvo callado por mucho tiempo.

english: I found this restaurant by chance.
spanish: Encontré este restaurante por casualidad.

english: Life is full of surprises.
spanish: La vida está llena de sorpresas.

english: We used to compete furiously in college.
spanish: Solíamos competir frenéticamente cuando estábamos en la universidad.

english: The official start is on Saturday.
spanish: El comienzo oficial es el sábado.

english: Are you sure you've never met him?
spanish: ¿Están seguros de no haberlo encontrado nunca?

english: That took longer than I expected.
spanish: Eso llevó más tiempo de lo que esperaba.

english: I'm ashamed of what I did.
spanish: Me avergüenzo de lo que hice.

english: This may not be a real diamond.
spanish: Puede que no sea un diamante auténtico.

english: I will arrive in four hours.
spanish: Llegaré en cuatro horas.

english: I like going for a walk in the park.
spanish: Me gusta ir a caminar al parque.

english: They did not notice the small differences.
spanish: Ellos no notaron las pequeñas diferencias.

english: She knows who I am.
spanish: Ella sabe quién soy.

english: She taught him the tricks of the trade.
spanish: Ella le enseñó los trucos del negocio.

english: I never do anything crazy.
spanish: Nunca hago nada loco.

english: He asked the president to do something.
spanish: Le pidió al presidente que hiciera algo.

english: Although she is rich, she dresses quite simply.
spanish: Aunque ella es rica, viste con bastante sencillez.

english: I'd like you to come early.
spanish: Quisiera que vinieras temprano.

english: She read one poem to him.
spanish: Ella le leyó un poema a él.

english: He gave me an apple.
spanish: Él me dio una manzana.

english: Forgive me for breaking my promise.
spanish: Perdóname por haber roto mi promesa.

english: I didn't have enough time.
spanish: No tuve suficiente tiempo.

english: They set very low standards.
spanish: Ponen el listón muy bajo.

english: Tom should call a lawyer.
spanish: Tom debería llamar a un abogado.

english: The dog was run over by a car.
spanish: El perro fue atropellado por un auto.

english: I never imagined that you would say that.
spanish: Nunca imaginé que dirías esto.

english: It will soon be breakfast time.
spanish: Pronto será la hora de desayunar.

english: The news that she got divorced was a big surprise.
spanish: Las noticias sobre su divorcio fueron una gran sorpresa.

english: We have 24 hours to evacuate the city.
spanish: Tenemos 24 horas para evacuar la ciudad.

english: I need to make sure your leg isn't broken.
spanish: Necesito asegurarme de que tu pierna no esté rota.

english: No decision has been made.
spanish: Todavía no nos hemos decidido.

english: She said that she was happy.
spanish: Ella dijo que era feliz.

english: He had the boldness to ignore my advice.
spanish: Él tiene el atrevimiento de ignorar mi consejo.

english: When was the last time you rented a house?
spanish: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que arrendaste una casa?

english: He gave her a diamond bracelet.
spanish: Le regaló una pulsera de brillantes.

english: Tom decided to wait for another hour.
spanish: Tom decidió esperar una hora más.

english: This river becomes shallow at that point.
spanish: Él río se vuelve poco profundo en ese punto.

english: I know you can make it.
spanish: Sé que lo puedes lograr.

english: The milk is in the fridge.
spanish: La leche está en el refrigerador.

english: I want to show you something else.
spanish: Quiero mostrarte algo más.

english: That's none of your business.
spanish: No es asunto tuyo.

english: Some boys play tennis and others play soccer.
spanish: Algunos chicos juegan tenis, y otros juegan fútbol.

english: The ending is much more interesting.
spanish: El final es mucho más interesante.

english: I really like your sweater.
spanish: Me gusta mucho tu sweater.

english: I have a Canadian neighbor.
spanish: Tengo un vecino canadiense.

english: He often gets worked up over little things.
spanish: Él suele ponerse nervioso con pequeñas cosas.

english: The nurse is dressed in white.
spanish: La enfermera va vestida de blanco.

english: Tom played with the baby.
spanish: Tom jugó con el bebé.

english: Tom says he eats more when he's sad.
spanish: Tom dice que come más cuando está triste.

english: Tell Tom to leave me alone.
spanish: Dile a Tom que me deje a solas.

english: My mother is writing a letter now.
spanish: Mi madre está escribiendo una carta ahora.

english: Keep your hands out of your pockets.
spanish: Mantén tus manos lejos de tus bolsillos.

english: Tom is depressed and upset.
spanish: Tom está deprimido y acongojado.

english: The man was given a life sentence.
spanish: Al hombre le dieron cadena perpetua.

english: He wrote a book while in China.
spanish: Él escribió un libro cuando estaba en China.

english: Today is a sunny day.
spanish: Hoy es un día soleado.

english: He preferred working to doing nothing.
spanish: Él prefería trabajar a no hacer nada.

english: I can't bear to see him cry like that.
spanish: No soporto verlo llorar de esa manera.

english: We have a good heating system.
spanish: Tenemos un buen sistema de calefacción.

english: I ran to my mother.
spanish: Corrí adonde mi madre.

english: Tom is the one who convinced Mary to help.
spanish: Tom es quien convenció a María de que ayudara.

english: He invented an excuse for being late.
spanish: Él inventó una excusa sobre su retraso.

english: I'm glad Mary isn't my wife.
spanish: Yo estoy contento, Mary no es mi esposa.

english: Can you go with us?
spanish: ¿Puedes ir con nosotras?

english: You shouldn't write in library books.
spanish: No deberías escribir en los libros de la biblioteca.

english: Tom walks about fifteen miles a day.
spanish: Tom camina unas quince millas al día.

english: This tree is the tallest and oldest in this forest.
spanish: Este árbol es el más alto y más viejo en este bosque.

english: Blackboards are not always black.
spanish: Las pizarras no son siempre negras.

english: The old farmer did not pay him much money.
spanish: El viejo granjero no le pagaba mucho.

english: How many times a minute does the average person blink?
spanish: ¿Cuántas veces por minuto parpadea de media una persona?

english: I kept it with me.
spanish: Lo mantuve conmigo.

english: Your work has greatly improved.
spanish: Tu trabajo ha mejorado mucho.

english: I'll see if Tom can help us.
spanish: Voy a ver si Tomás nos puede ayudar.

english: I wonder if what I wrote was correct.
spanish: Me pregunto si lo que he escrito era correcto.

english: I'm expecting my baby in the middle of January.
spanish: Voy a tener a mi bebé a mediados de enero.

english: We need to chat soon.
spanish: Necesitamos charlar pronto.

english: She wanted him to sing her a song.
spanish: Ella quería que él le cantara una canción.

english: Are you thinking of helping them?
spanish: ¿Estás pensando ayudarles?

english: You should arrive at school before nine.
spanish: Tienes que llegar a la escuela antes de las nueve.

english: They made us work all day.
spanish: Nos hicieron trabajar todo el día.

english: Would you like me to help?
spanish: ¿Quieres que yo ayude?

english: I've got to make lunch.
spanish: Tengo que hacer almuerzo.

english: I don't even know who she is.
spanish: Ni siquiera sé quién es ella.

english: Are you sure you don't want something a little smaller?
spanish: ¿Estás seguro de que no quieres algo un poco más pequeño?

english: I decided that I wouldn't do that.
spanish: Decidí que no haría eso.

english: Tom makes his own wine.
spanish: Tom hace su propio vino.

english: We don't have much time.
spanish: No tenemos mucho tiempo.

english: You told me not to tell anybody.
spanish: Me dijiste que no se lo diga a nadie.

english: You write better than I do.
spanish: Tú escribes mejor que yo.

english: It was shorter than she expected.
spanish: Fue más corto de lo que ella esperaba.

english: Tom gave Mary his telephone number.
spanish: Tom le dio su número de teléfono a Mary.

english: He got lost while walking in the woods.
spanish: Él se perdió mientras andaba en el bosque.

english: We had to abandon our plan.
spanish: Tuvimos que abandonar nuestro plan.

english: I'm pleased with my new jacket.
spanish: Estoy contento con mi nueva chaqueta.

english: Tom had a long talk with Mary.
spanish: Tom tuvo una larga charla con Mary.

english: I want to make some changes.
spanish: Quiero hacer algunos cambios.

english: If I were you, I would not do it.
spanish: De ser tú, yo no lo haría.

english: I want to become an engineer.
spanish: Quiero ser ingeniero.

english: If I weren't sick, I'd join you.
spanish: Si no estuviera enfermo, me uniría a vosotros.

english: She had her handbag stolen.
spanish: A ella le robaron el bolso.

english: The meaning is unknown to me.
spanish: Desconozco el significado.

english: No one knows what to say.
spanish: Nadie sabe qué decir.

english: I spend a few hours a day maintaining my website.
spanish: Paso unas pocas horas al día manteniendo mi sitio web.

english: You must be a fool.
spanish: Debes ser un tonto.

english: A solution had to be found.
spanish: Había que encontrar una fórmula.

english: I speak English every day.
spanish: Hablo inglés todos los días.

english: You really do look beautiful.
spanish: Realmente te ves hermosa.

english: Our streets flood when we have rain.
spanish: Nuestras calles se inundan cuando llueve.

english: I don't think Tom will be back.
spanish: No creo que Tom regrese.

english: How do I know you?
spanish: ¿Cómo te conozco?

english: It isn't suitable for minors.
spanish: No es apto para menores.

english: Do you remember the day when we first met?
spanish: ¿Te acuerdas del día en que nos conocimos?

english: News stations use helicopters to report on traffic.
spanish: Las estaciones de noticias utilizan helicópteros para reportar el tráfico.

english: How much is the most expensive car?
spanish: ¿Cuánto cuesta el coche más caro?

english: My uncle lived in Washington, D. C. for two years.
spanish: Mi tío vivió en Washington durante dos años.

english: I don't have a lot of money.
spanish: No tengo mucho dinero.

english: Where do they do that?
spanish: ¿Dónde hacen eso?

english: She looked at me and smiled.
spanish: Me miró y sonrió.

english: Is there somebody else here?
spanish: ¿Hay alguien más aquí?

english: Tom has been sick a lot recently.
spanish: Tom ha estado enfermo hartas veces recientemente.

english: I got something for Tom.
spanish: Tengo algo para Tom.

english: I just heard about it thirty minutes ago.
spanish: Acabo de oír al respecto hace treinta minutos.

english: The almond trees are in bloom.
spanish: Los almendros están floridos.

english: Tom doesn't have a webpage.
spanish: Tom no tiene una página web.

english: Tom becomes nervous whenever he has to speak in public.
spanish: Tom se pone nervioso cada vez que tiene que hablar en público.

english: Mary wants to buy a dress.
spanish: Mary quiere comprar un vestido.

english: There are many wild animals around here.
spanish: Hay muchos animales salvajes en esta área.

english: She was hurt in the accident.
spanish: Ella resultó herida en el accidente.

english: He will be back in a second.
spanish: Vuelve enseguida.

english: We spent the whole evening talking to them.
spanish: Pasamos toda la tarde charlando con ellos.

english: Her latest book deals with pollution.
spanish: En su último libro ella habla de la polución.

english: Stir the soup until it boils.
spanish: Mueva usted la sopa hasta que hierva.

english: Never be this late again.
spanish: Nunca vuelvas a retrasarte tanto.

english: Did you mention my book?
spanish: ¿Mencionaste mi libro?

english: Tom came just before dinner.
spanish: Tom vino justo antes de la cena.

english: It was a real pleasure to work with Tom.
spanish: Fue un verdadero placer trabajar con Tom.

english: He always walks with a rifle.
spanish: Siempre anda con un rifle.

english: The office is full of competent people.
spanish: La oficina está llena de gente competente.

english: Excuse me for a moment.
spanish: Disculpa un segundo.

english: Just staying alive in these times is hard enough.
spanish: En estos tiempos, tan sólo sobrevivir es lo suficientemente difícil.

english: I hope you know what this is.
spanish: Espero que sepas qué es esto.

english: The dog has a very keen sense of smell.
spanish: El perro tiene un agudo sentido del olfato.

english: I've lived in China for six months.
spanish: He vivido en China durante seis meses.

english: They left before we arrived.
spanish: Salieron antes que nosotros llegásemos.

english: Tom is a delinquent who comes from a rich home.
spanish: Tom es un delincuente que viene de una familia rica.

english: How can I prevent this from happening?
spanish: ¿Cómo puedo evitar que pase esto?

english: Do you have anything to read?
spanish: ¿Tenés algo para leer?

english: The wall protected me from the rain.
spanish: La pared me cubría de la lluvia.

english: Tom didn't expect to hear Mary's voice.
spanish: Tom no esperaba oír la voz de Mary.

english: Is the bank open today?
spanish: ¿Está abierto el banco hoy?

english: Both of my parents were brought up in the country.
spanish: Mis dos padres crecieron en el campo.

english: Why did he quit smoking?
spanish: ¿Por qué ha dejado de fumar?

english: I will never tell it to anybody.
spanish: No se lo diré nunca a nadie.

english: It's been a while, hasn't it?
spanish: Ha pasado mucho tiempo.

english: Your mother is very young, isn't she?
spanish: Tu madre es muy joven, ¿verdad?

english: I think it's better to do it this way.
spanish: Creo que es mejor hacerlo de este modo.

english: Whatever happens, you must keep calm.
spanish: Pase lo que pase, tienes que mantener la calma.

english: You must have me confused with someone else.
spanish: Debes haberme confundido con alguien más.

english: She promised to meet him last night.
spanish: Ella prometió encontrarse con él ayer por la noche.

english: I suppose you love him.
spanish: Yo supongo que lo amas.

english: Tom hardly ever listens to the radio.
spanish: Tom casi nunca escucha radio.

english: The boy seems to be coming in this direction.
spanish: Parece que el niño viene en esta dirección.

english: I'll wait a day or two.
spanish: Esperaré un día o dos.

english: He's not at all afraid of snakes.
spanish: A él no le dan ningún miedo las serpientes.

english: I don't want Tom to see me naked.
spanish: No quiero que Tom me vea desnuda.

english: I was expecting a letter from her.
spanish: Estaba esperando una carta de ella.

english: You don't need to do that.
spanish: No hace falta que hagas eso.

english: Tom can't stop thinking about Mary.
spanish: Tom no puede dejar de pensar en Mary.

english: Words failed me at the last minute.
spanish: Me faltaron las palabras en el último minuto.

english: I remember what you said.
spanish: Recuerdo lo que dijiste.

english: You have a good memory.
spanish: Tenés buena memoria.

english: There is a television in the room.
spanish: Hay un televisor en el cuarto.

english: I don't have any questions.
spanish: No tengo ninguna pregunta.

english: I chose the wrong answer.
spanish: Escogí la respuesta incorrecta.

english: I knew it from the start.
spanish: Lo sabía desde el comienzo.

english: Father is well as usual.
spanish: Papá está bien como siempre.

english: Do you feel better now?
spanish: ¿Te sentís mejor ahora?

english: I was leaving home when Tom telephoned me.
spanish: Estaba saliendo de casa cuando Tom me llamó por teléfono.

english: Do you think I'm doing the right thing?
spanish: ¿Pensás que estoy haciendo lo correcto?

english: The champion was welcomed by large crowds.
spanish: El campeón fue recibido por una enorme multitud.

english: The sunset is really beautiful here.
spanish: El atardecer es realmente hermoso acá.

english: My head doesn't ache anymore.
spanish: Ya no me duele la cabeza.

english: I'm going to sell my car.
spanish: Voy a vender mi carro.

english: Tom invited Mary to his house.
spanish: Tom invitó a Mary a su casa.

english: I read a lot of modern authors.
spanish: Leí muchos autores modernos.

english: Tom might have stolen Mary's camera.
spanish: Puede que Tom haya robado la cámara de Mary.

english: I know how you feel, but it's over.
spanish: Sé cómo te sientes, pero se acabó.

english: How did you come by the money?
spanish: ¿Cómo conseguiste ese dinero?

english: This work does not meet our requirements.
spanish: Este trabajo no cumple con nuestros requisitos.

english: Help me and I'll help you.
spanish: Ayúdame y yo te ayudaré.

english: Please pick up your ticket at the counter.
spanish: Recoja su boleto en el mostrador, por favor.

english: Tom got on his motorcycle and started it up.
spanish: Tom se montó en la motocicleta y la arrancó.

english: As far as I know, she has not yet married.
spanish: Que yo sepa, ella todavía no está casada.

english: It was a wild goose chase.
spanish: Fue un objetivo inalcanzable.

english: Is there space for one more person?
spanish: ¿Cabe ahí uno más?

english: I'm sorry to have bothered you.
spanish: Perdón por haberte molestado.

english: I turned on the radio.
spanish: Encendí la radio.

english: What do you think she is going to do?
spanish: ¿Qué piensas que hará ella?

english: He learned the news while reading the newspaper.
spanish: Él se enteró de la noticia leyendo el periódico.

english: She is very free with her money.
spanish: Ella es muy manirrota.

english: Swimming in the sea is great fun.
spanish: Es muy divertido nadar en el mar.

english: I drank a glass of milk this morning.
spanish: Esta mañana me tomé un vaso de leche.

english: I know exactly who Tom plans to marry.
spanish: Sé exactamente con quién planea casarse Tom.

english: He put his head out of the window.
spanish: Asomó la cabeza por la ventana.

english: I do not play the piano.
spanish: Yo no toco el piano.

english: I have nothing better to do.
spanish: No tengo nada mejor que hacer.

english: The climate here is mild.
spanish: El clima está templado.

english: There is no reason why I should go there.
spanish: No hay razón por la que debería ir allá.

english: I stayed up late last night.
spanish: Me quedé hasta tarde anoche.

english: You probably want to be alone.
spanish: Probablemente quieras estar sola.

english: Please move the chair. It's in the way.
spanish: Por favor mueva la silla. Está en el camino.

english: I'm expecting a customer today.
spanish: Hoy espero a un cliente.

english: Check your answer with his.
spanish: Comprueba su respuesta con la de él.

english: Everyone needs to quit whining.
spanish: Todo el mundo necesita dejar de quejarse.

english: What are you doing up this early?
spanish: ¿Qué haces despierta tan temprano?

english: I'm afraid of the dark.
spanish: Yo le temo a la oscuridad.

english: Tom and Mary are John's children.
spanish: Tom y Mary son los hijos de John.

english: The horse is a domestic animal.
spanish: El caballo es un animal doméstico.

english: It took me two hours to reach Yokohama.
spanish: Me tomó dos horas llegar a Yokohama.

english: Will you sell me your house?
spanish: ¿Me vende su casa?

english: Tom hasn't been busy for three days.
spanish: Tom no ha estado ocupado durante tres días.

english: Do you have Japanese newspapers?
spanish: ¿Tiene periódicos japoneses?

english: All the leaves on the tree turned yellow.
spanish: Todas las hojas del árbol se pusieron amarillas.

english: She's attractive, but she talks too much.
spanish: Ella es atractiva, pero habla demasiado.

english: Which CD do you want to listen to?
spanish: ¿Qué CD quieres escuchar?

english: She is not a good person.
spanish: No es una buena persona.

english: The second button of your shirt is coming off.
spanish: El segundo botón de tu camisa se está desabrochando.

english: What did you do to Tom?
spanish: ¿Qué le hiciste a Tom?

english: We've been waiting for you for an hour.
spanish: Te hemos estado esperando una hora.

english: I can't bear living alone.
spanish: No soporto vivir solo.

english: Smoke could be seen pouring out of the window.
spanish: Por la ventana se veía salir el humo.

english: I have to shine my shoes.
spanish: Tengo que sacarle brillo a mis zapatos.

english: Asians eat a lot of rice.
spanish: Los asiáticos comen mucho arroz.

english: The plane landed at Narita.
spanish: El avión aterrizó en Narita.

english: We don't want to scare the children away.
spanish: No queremos asustar a los niños.

english: Tom is good at tennis, no question about it.
spanish: Tom es bueno para el tenis, sin duda.

english: This should be pretty simple to understand.
spanish: Esto debería ser bastante simple de entender.

english: Tom rushed into the office.
spanish: Tom corrió a la oficina.

english: When the bell rang, the teacher ended the class.
spanish: El profesor terminó la clase cuando sonó la campana.

english: I'm listening to Björk's latest song.
spanish: Estoy escuchando la última canción de Björk.

english: We have plenty of time.
spanish: Tenemos un montón de tiempo.

english: Tom never eats junk food.
spanish: Tom nunca come comida chatarra.

english: I need to know how this happened.
spanish: Necesito saber cómo sucedió esto.

english: This movie is for adults only.
spanish: Esta película es solo para adultos.

english: You can choose one of them.
spanish: Podéis elegir uno.

english: What's your favorite cold weather drink?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu trago favorito para un día frío?

english: This is the longest novel that I have ever read.
spanish: Ésta es la novela más larga que he leído hasta ahora.

english: I need to talk to you a minute.
spanish: Necesito hablar un minuto contigo.

english: When does the exam start?
spanish: ¿A qué hora empieza el examen?

english: The sun has dried up the ground.
spanish: El sol ha secado el suelo.

english: Nobody has seen the bird fly.
spanish: Nadie ha visto volar al pájaro.

english: Tom wanted to send a message.
spanish: Tom quería mandar un mensaje.

english: Tom isn't as smart as you.
spanish: Tomás no es tan inteligente como vos.

english: The only thing I want to do is go fishing.
spanish: Lo único que quiero hacer es ir a pescar.

english: I walked about a mile.
spanish: Caminé alrededor de una milla.

english: I wonder why Tom didn't show up last night.
spanish: Me pregunto por qué Tom no apareció anoche.

english: I shared a room with him.
spanish: Compartí una pieza con él.

english: Why don't you just believe me?
spanish: ¿Qué te cuesta creerme?

english: The use of this type of radio has become widespread.
spanish: Se ha divulgado mucho el uso de ese tipo de radio.

english: The sky is covered with clouds.
spanish: El cielo está cubierto de nubes.

english: I assumed that you were in charge.
spanish: Asumí que tú estabas a cargo.

english: I must pass this exam, no matter what.
spanish: Tengo que aprobar este examen pase lo que pase.

english: Tom didn't tell Mary anything at all about his plan.
spanish: Tom no le contó a Mary nada en absoluto sobre su plan.

english: Driving a car is really very simple.
spanish: Conducir un auto es realmente muy simple.

english: I swim almost every day in the summer.
spanish: En verano nado casi todos los días.

english: My driver's license expires at the end of this month.
spanish: Mi licencia de conducir expira a final de este mes.

english: Few people know what the word "hipster" means.
spanish: Poca gente sabe lo que quiere decir la palabra "hipster".

english: I'm very anxious about my son's safety.
spanish: Estoy muy preocupado por la seguridad de mi hijo.

english: We did it according to your instructions.
spanish: Lo hicimos con arreglo a sus instrucciones.

english: I have a lot of money in my savings account.
spanish: Tengo mucho dinero en mi cuenta de ahorro.

english: I found the question very easy.
spanish: La pregunta me pareció muy fácil.

english: You'll have no more problems.
spanish: No tendrás ningún problema más.

english: Look how that ball bounces.
spanish: Mire cuánto bota esa pelota.

english: He likes to go out fishing alone.
spanish: A él le gusta salir a pescar solo.

english: Prices seem to be going down.
spanish: Los precios parecen estar bajando.

english: The girl entered the room.
spanish: La chica entró en la habitación.

english: This isn't possible without Tom's help.
spanish: Esto no es posible sin la ayuda de Tom.

english: If I didn't have money I wouldn't have a house.
spanish: Si no tuviera dinero no tendría casa.

english: The children are playing marbles.
spanish: Los niños están jugando canicas.

english: Five or ten minutes would not have made any difference.
spanish: Cinco o diez minutos no habrían hecho ninguna diferencia.

english: Don't forget to call me.
spanish: No olvides llamarme.

english: He was framed for murder.
spanish: Le achacaron el muertito.

english: I think it's time for me to leave.
spanish: Creo que es hora de que me vaya.

english: Can she come in time?
spanish: ¿Ella puede ser puntual?

english: Tom stopped looking for the treasure and went back home.
spanish: Tom dejó de buscar el tesoro y volvió a casa.

english: Why do you want that anyway?
spanish: Y bien, ¿por qué quieres eso?

english: He made his parents happy.
spanish: Él hizo felices a sus padres.

english: They can communicate using hand signs.
spanish: Pueden comunicarse haciendo señas con las manos.

english: Cut the cheese into thin slices or into little cubes.
spanish: Cortá el queso en rodajas finas o en cubos.

english: The policeman asked people to back off.
spanish: El policía les pidió a las personas que retrocedieran.

english: I meet new people every day.
spanish: Todos los días conozco gente nueva.

english: I bought a red sports car.
spanish: Yo compré un auto deportivo rojo.

english: I was compelled to go there.
spanish: Yo fui forzado a ir allí.

english: There is an urgent need for new ideas.
spanish: Hay una necesidad urgente de nuevas ideas.

english: Methadone is commonly prescribed as a pain killer.
spanish: Con frecuencia, la metadona se prescribe como analgésico.

english: You really did a good job.
spanish: Tú realmente hiciste un buen trabajo.

english: The hungry birds were eating from the bird feeder.
spanish: Los pájaros hambrientos estaban comiendo del alimentador para pájaros.

english: Press this button to start the machine.
spanish: Presione este botón para encender la máquina.

english: Did you really love me?
spanish: ¿De verdad me amabas?

english: I introduced Mary to my parents.
spanish: Le presenté a María a mis padre.

english: I entered this school two years ago.
spanish: Me matriculé en esta escuela hace dos años.

english: How much is this camera?
spanish: ¿Cuánto vale esta cámara?

english: I need to charge my cell phone.
spanish: Necesito cargar mi móvil.

english: I got my bicycle repaired.
spanish: Mandé mi bicicleta a arreglar.

english: He went to the hospital yesterday.
spanish: Ayer fue al hospital.

english: I feel spring in the air.
spanish: Siento la primavera en el aire.

english: He didn't used to drink.
spanish: Él no solía beber.

english: You know we love you.
spanish: Sabes que te queremos.

english: My cousin invited me to her wedding.
spanish: Mi primo me invitó a su boda.

english: I cannot disclose any information about the informant.
spanish: No puedo revelar nada de información acerca del informante.

english: The sun will shine again soon.
spanish: El sol brillará nuevamente pronto.

english: Picasso painted this picture in 1950.
spanish: Picasso pintó este cuadro en 1950.

english: He died at the age of seventy.
spanish: Él murió a la edad de setenta años.

english: There's a message for you.
spanish: Hay un mensaje para ti.

english: Don't involve me in that matter.
spanish: No me implique usted en ese asunto.

english: He's the most popular boy in the class.
spanish: Es el chico más popular de la clase.

english: He may have said so.
spanish: Él puede haber dicho eso.

english: You said I was a liar.
spanish: Tú dijiste que yo soy una mentirosa.

english: I'll never forget visiting Paris last summer.
spanish: Nunca olvidaré mi viaje a París del verano pasado.

english: The survey revealed that most pregnant women prefer girls.
spanish: La encuesta reveló que la mayoría de las mujeres embarazadas prefieren niñas.

english: Today is a fabulous day.
spanish: Hoy es un día fabuloso.

english: If not now, then when?
spanish: Si no es ahora, bueno, ¿cuándo?

english: The weatherman says we'll have rain in the afternoon.
spanish: El hombre del tiempo dice que tendremos lluvia por la tarde.

english: Tom doesn't know how to tie his shoelaces.
spanish: Tom no se sabe atar los zapatos.

english: Tom sang his son to sleep.
spanish: Tom le cantó a su hijo para que se durmiera.

english: He's very fond of walking.
spanish: Es muy aficionado a caminar.

english: I told you it was stupid.
spanish: Te dije que era idiota.

english: We're counting on you to help.
spanish: Contamos con su ayuda.

english: What was the best present you got last Christmas?
spanish: ¿Cuál fue el mejor regalo que recibiste la pasada Navidad?

english: Our teacher is a real idiot.
spanish: Nuestra profesora es una perfecta idiota.

english: I fell down and hurt my wrist.
spanish: Me caí y me hice daño en la muñeca.

english: Tom said Mary would come.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary que vendría.

english: Even though I spoke French, they didn't understand.
spanish: Aunque hablé en francés, ellos no entendieron.

english: Do you play the guitar?
spanish: ¿Tocas la guitarra?

english: I don't know why Tom is fat.
spanish: Yo no sé por qué Tom es gordo.

english: Let's hope everything gets better tomorrow.
spanish: Ojalá todo mejore para mañana.

english: I read this article yesterday.
spanish: Ayer leí este artículo.

english: Be careful. It's a fierce bull.
spanish: Cuidado, es un toro bravo.

english: The hill used to be covered in snow.
spanish: La colina estaba cubierta de nieve.

english: I live on the outskirts of Tokyo.
spanish: Vivo en las afueras de Tokio.

english: They are accustomed to hard work.
spanish: Ellos están acostumbrados al trabajo duro.

english: Do you see any policeman over there?
spanish: ¿Ves la figura de algún policía ahí enfrente?

english: I want to clean the house before my parents come.
spanish: Quiero limpiar la casa antes de que vengan mis padres.

english: President Johnson rejected the agreement.
spanish: El Presidente Johnson rechazó el acuerdo.

english: Children are afraid of me.
spanish: Los niños me temen.

english: We must defend our freedom at all cost.
spanish: Debemos defender nuestra libertad cueste lo que cueste.

english: Would you see to it that they get properly fed?
spanish: ¿Te encargarías de que estén adecuadamente alimentados?

english: Does anyone know where Tom is?
spanish: ¿Alguno sabe dónde está Tom?

english: I think she is charming and attractive.
spanish: Creo que ella es atractiva y encantadora.

english: Don't put books on the table.
spanish: No pongas libros sobre la mesa.

english: Tom asked Mary if she was free on Valentine's Day.
spanish: Tom le preguntó a Mary si acaso estaba desocupada el Día de los Enamorados.

english: What do you want to be in the future?
spanish: ¿Qué quieres ser en el futuro?

english: His shadow on the wall looked sad.
spanish: Su sombra en la pared parecía triste.

english: They mistook my politeness for friendship.
spanish: Ellos confundieron mi cortesía por amistad.

english: Don't say bad things about others.
spanish: No digas cosas malas de otros.

english: You are a bit fat.
spanish: Eres un poco gordo.

english: Something has happened to the engine.
spanish: Algo le ha ocurrido al motor.

english: Why don't we meet at 2:30?
spanish: ¿Por qué no quedamos a las dos y media?

english: Now, go have a good time.
spanish: Ahora vete a pasarlo bien.

english: I've just been to the post office.
spanish: Acabo de estar en la oficina de correos.

english: I saw it from the window.
spanish: Lo vi desde la ventana.

english: I want you to remember this moment.
spanish: Quiero que tú recuerdes este momento.

english: I don't want to go to work today.
spanish: No quiero ir a trabajar hoy.

english: How much is the car you are planning to buy?
spanish: ¿Qué tanto cuesta el carro que planeas comprar?

english: I would like to get a camera like this.
spanish: Me gustaría comprar una cámara como esta.

english: Tom is looking at us.
spanish: Tomás nos está mirando.

english: It is our duty to help one another.
spanish: Es nuestro deber ayudarnos el uno al otro.

english: I've discovered a serious error.
spanish: He descubierto un grave error.

english: I gained a clear picture of how it works.
spanish: Me quedó claro cómo funciona.

english: She advised him against doing it.
spanish: Ella le aconsejó que no lo hiciera.

english: I promised not to tell.
spanish: Prometí no decir.

english: Mary works in a supermarket.
spanish: Mary trabaja en un supermercado.

english: Don't you have something to do?
spanish: ¿No tenés algo que hacer?

english: She sang a Japanese song for us.
spanish: Ella cantó una canción japonesa para nosotros.

english: His son is serving his sentence.
spanish: Su hijo está cumpliendo su condena.

english: Tom is arguing with Mary.
spanish: Tom está discutiendo con Mary.

english: Do you have anything to eat?
spanish: ¿Tienes algo de comer?

english: Tom and Mary are dependent on each other.
spanish: Tom y María dependen el uno del otro.

english: I don't want to take a walk now.
spanish: Ahora no quiero dar un paseo.

english: I have to ask you a question.
spanish: Tengo que hacerte una pregunta.

english: You don't have to talk so loud.
spanish: No tienes que hablar tan alto.

english: I have an older brother and two younger sisters.
spanish: Yo tengo un hermano mayor y dos hermanas menores.

english: Tom's train hasn't arrived yet.
spanish: El tren de Tom aún no ha llegado.

english: I need to get out of here.
spanish: Necesito salir de aquí.

english: He is able to speak ten languages.
spanish: Él es capaz de hablar diez lenguas.

english: What's that little blinking light?
spanish: ¿Qué es esa lucecita intermitente?

english: The immigrants dream of having a new, better life.
spanish: Los inmigrantes sueñan con tener una nueva y mejor vida.

english: She must be very happy.
spanish: Ella debe ser feliz.

english: When he comes, I'll pay the money that I promised.
spanish: En cuanto venga pagaré el dinero que he prometido.

english: They have no more wine.
spanish: Ellos no tienen más vino.

english: My name isn't on the list.
spanish: Mi nombre no está en la lista.

english: How about February 28th around 3:00 pm?
spanish: ¿Qué tal el 28 de febrero alrededor de las 3 de la tarde?

english: You had better tell me the whole story.
spanish: Me tenías que haber contado la historia completa.

english: Tom didn't do anything to help Mary.
spanish: Tom no hizo nada para ayudar a Mary.

english: Tom and Mary both just stare at John.
spanish: Ambos, Tom y Mary, tan sólo miran a John.

english: Tom walked right into Mary's trap.
spanish: Tom caminó directo hacia la trampa de Mary.

english: We enjoyed every minute of the party.
spanish: Disfrutamos cada minuto de la fiesta.

english: Tom burned himself on the stove.
spanish: Tom se quemó en la estufa.

english: Mary felt like Tom was undressing her with his eyes.
spanish: María se sentía como si Tom la desvistiera con la mirada.

english: We have to leave a bit earlier.
spanish: Tenemos que salir temprano.

english: We'll continue to be vigilant.
spanish: Permaneceremos vigilantes.

english: Tom is too tired to do anything.
spanish: Tom está demasiado cansado para hacer algo.

english: I said you could go.
spanish: Dije que podía ir.

english: You made the same mistake.
spanish: Cometiste el mismo error.

english: Zoology and botany deal with the study of life.
spanish: La zoología y la botánica tratan sobre el estudio de la vida.

english: Will you teach me French?
spanish: ¿Me enseñarás francés?

english: Can you come on Sunday evening?
spanish: ¿Podés venir el domingo por la noche?

english: His first name was Tom.
spanish: Su primer nombre era Tom.

english: You went to the park yesterday, didn't you?
spanish: Ayer fuiste al parque, ¿verdad?

english: These two brothers resemble each other.
spanish: Estos dos hermanos se parecen el uno al otro.

english: I don't have any money.
spanish: No tengo dinero.

english: I fell asleep while reading.
spanish: Me quedé dormido mientras leía.

english: I didn't go into details.
spanish: No entré en detalles.

english: I wonder where Tom studied French.
spanish: Me pregunto dónde habrá aprendido francés Tom.

english: Contact my assistant if you have any questions.
spanish: Contacte a mi asistente si tiene cualquier pregunta.

english: My sister lives near Yokohama.
spanish: Mi hermana vive cerca de Yokohama.

english: Tom doesn't want to break up with Mary.
spanish: Tom no quiere romper con Mary.

english: She's the most popular girl in the class.
spanish: Ella es la chica más popular de la clase.

english: Don't do anything you'll regret.
spanish: No hagas nada de lo que te arrepentirías.

english: I flew from London to New York.
spanish: Volé desde Londres hasta Nueva York.

english: You are very fortunate that you have such friends.
spanish: Es usted muy afortunado de tener tales amigos.

english: The king once lived in that palace.
spanish: Alguna vez el rey vivió en ese palacio.

english: I will be free in ten minutes.
spanish: Estaré libre en 10 minutos.

english: Tom puts too much sugar in his tea.
spanish: Tom se echa demasiado azúcar en el té.

english: Do you plan to work until 10:00?
spanish: ¿Pretendes trabajar hasta las diez?

english: I can't understand your language.
spanish: No puedo entender tu idioma.

english: He was face to face with his enemy at last.
spanish: Finalmente estaba frente a su enemigo.

english: I'll return at half past six.
spanish: Vuelvo a las seis y media.

english: May I see your passport, please?
spanish: ¿Puedo ver su pasaporte, por favor?

english: Tom doesn't believe the rumors about Mary.
spanish: Tom no cree en los rumores acerca de Mary.

english: He sent me a present.
spanish: Me mandó un regalo.

english: Did I have a choice?
spanish: ¿Tenía otra opción?

english: He came to see you yesterday.
spanish: Ayer vino a verte.

english: Don't listen to him. He's just kidding.
spanish: No le prestes atención, él sólo está bromeando.

english: Every man has his price.
spanish: Todo el mundo tiene un precio.

english: The picture is hung crooked.
spanish: El cuadro está colgado torcido.

english: I know about the job.
spanish: Ya sabía del trabajo.

english: I'm absolutely certain you're wrong about that.
spanish: Estoy absolutamente seguro de que te equivocas en eso.

english: Why didn't you tell me?
spanish: ¿Por qué no me lo dijiste?

english: This is never going to end.
spanish: Esto no terminará jamás.

english: To lose face means to be humiliated.
spanish: Perder la cara significa ser humillado.

english: I know a shorter route.
spanish: Conozco una ruta más corta.

english: He gave her a box.
spanish: Le dio una caja.

english: Her family moved to Brazil.
spanish: Su familia se mudó a Brasil.

english: Mary lied about her age.
spanish: María mintió acerca de su edad.

english: Do you like white chocolate?
spanish: ¿A usted le gusta el chocolate blanco?

english: Her hair didn't look dyed.
spanish: Su pelo no se veía teñido.

english: Tom knows how to keep a secret.
spanish: Tom sabe mantener un secreto.

english: To our surprise, Tom came to our party with Mary.
spanish: Para nuestra sorpresa, Tom vino con Mary a nuestra fiesta.

english: Attach a recent photograph to your application form.
spanish: Adjunte una fotografía reciente a su formulario de solicitud.

english: That must've taken place while I was away.
spanish: Eso habrá ocurrido cuando yo no estaba.

english: I'm going to take a look.
spanish: Voy a echar un vistazo.

english: I was laughed at by everyone.
spanish: Todos se rieron de mí.

english: Thousands of people visited the city.
spanish: Miles de personas visitaron la ciudad.

english: Democrats and Republicans worked together.
spanish: Demócratas y republicanos trabajaron juntos.

english: The village is on the side of the hill.
spanish: El pueblo está en la falda de la colina.

english: Are you free after school?
spanish: ¿Estás libre después de clases?

english: The boy takes after his father.
spanish: El niño se parece a su padre.

english: Did you see their faces?
spanish: ¿Viste sus caras?

english: A cat is lying in the sun.
spanish: Un gato está tumbado al sol.

english: I have known Tom since I was a little boy.
spanish: Conozco a Tom desde la infancia.

english: Tom would never hit Mary.
spanish: Tom nunca golpearía a Mary.

english: He has reached the end of his patience.
spanish: Llegó al límite de su paciencia.

english: Tom doesn't have to go anywhere.
spanish: Tom no debe ir a ningún lado.

english: What he told me yesterday is a white lie.
spanish: Lo que él me dijo ayer es una mentira blanca.

english: Everyone in my family gets up early.
spanish: Todos en mi familia se levantan temprano.

english: Tom had to make a difficult decision.
spanish: Tom tuvo que tomar una difícil decisión.

english: Wake me up when Tom gets home.
spanish: Despiertame cuando Tom llegue a casa.

english: No one loves you as much as I do.
spanish: Nadie te quiere tanto como yo.

english: I didn't hear how many times the clock struck.
spanish: No he oído cuántas campanadas eran.

english: We have just a tiny bit of garden.
spanish: Tenemos un jardín minúsculo.

english: Tom fixed the leaky faucet.
spanish: Tom reparó la cañería que goteaba.

english: I need to make sure Tom gets paid.
spanish: Necesito asegurarme que le paguen a Tom.

english: I was impatient for the game to start.
spanish: Yo estaba impaciente por que el juego comenzara.

english: I don't have the number.
spanish: No tengo el número.

english: Tom goes to the same school as Mary does.
spanish: Tom va a la misma escuela que Mary.

english: It was an awful week.
spanish: Fue una semana terrible.

english: Tom went back to his room.
spanish: Tom volvió a su cuarto.

english: The moon is exceptionally pretty tonight.
spanish: Esta noche, la luna está excepcionalmente bella.

english: Tom didn't mean to be so late.
spanish: Tom no pretendía llegar tan tarde.

english: Man is the only animal that uses fire.
spanish: El hombre es el único animal que usa el fuego.

english: I thought Tom would say hi.
spanish: Pensé que Tom diría hola.

english: He has an interest in collecting insects.
spanish: Él tiene interés en coleccionar insectos.

english: Tom was my friend, too.
spanish: Tom también era mi amigo.

english: Tom fell flat on his face.
spanish: Tom cayó de narices.

english: You have to judge the case without bias.
spanish: Tienes que juzgar el caso siendo imparcial.

english: How can I get to the train station?
spanish: ¿Cómo llego a la estación de tren?

english: I don't remember you at all.
spanish: No me acuerdo de ti en absoluto.

english: Tom is clearly the winner.
spanish: Tomás es claramente el ganador.

english: More than 75% of farms raised pigs and milk cows.
spanish: Más del 75% de las granjas criaron puercos y vacas lecheras.

english: Why don't you get some sleep?
spanish: ¿Por qué no duermes un poco?

english: Who do you want to talk to?
spanish: ¿Con quién desea hablar?

english: She has flowers in her hand.
spanish: Ella tiene flores en la mano.

english: What do you think you'd like to do next time?
spanish: ¿Qué crees que te gustaría hacer la próxima vez?

english: The journalist was kidnapped by terrorists.
spanish: Terroristas secuestraron al periodista.

english: I thought Tom was with Mary.
spanish: Pensé que Tom estaba con María.

english: Please have someone else do it.
spanish: Por favor, que alguien más lo haga.

english: Are you seriously thinking about not going?
spanish: ¿Estás pensando seriamente en no ir?

english: Tom told Mary not to go there alone.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary que no fuera allí sola.

english: Two tickets to San Diego, please.
spanish: Dos pasajes a San Diego, por favor.

english: There is a picture on the wall.
spanish: Hay una pintura en la pared.

english: I like living with Tom.
spanish: Me gusta vivir con Tom.

english: I just need three hundred dollars.
spanish: Solo necesito trecientos dólares.

english: He didn't give up the plan.
spanish: Él no renunció al proyecto.

english: In a democracy, all citizens have equal rights.
spanish: En una democracia, todos los ciudadanos tienen los mismos derechos.

english: It's always been this way.
spanish: Siempre ha sido de esta manera.

english: Could I look at that book?
spanish: ¿Podría mirar ese libro?

english: I thought you were going to visit Tom.
spanish: Pensé que ibas a visitar a Tom.

english: She taught him everything she knew.
spanish: Ella le enseñó todo lo que sabía.

english: Come to watch us play.
spanish: Venid a vernos jugar.

english: That's not what I'm saying.
spanish: Eso no es lo que estoy diciendo.

english: I need to know who helped Tom.
spanish: Necesito saber quién ayudó a Tom.

english: Tom said he had a stomachache and left the room.
spanish: Tom dijo que le dolía la tripa y se fue de la habitación.

english: My best friend is in Rome now.
spanish: Mi mejor amiga está ahora en Roma.

english: Tom was seated between Mary and John.
spanish: Tom estaba sentado entre Mary y John.

english: Have you heard from him?
spanish: ¿Has sabido algo de él?

english: We stayed at our uncle's.
spanish: Nos quedamos donde nuestro tío.

english: This building is near completion.
spanish: Este edificio está casi terminado.

english: At that time, she was bathing in the sun.
spanish: En ese momento, ella se estaba nadando al sol.

english: Peace has returned after three years of war.
spanish: Ha vuelto la paz después de tres años de guerra.

english: You wouldn't accept candy from a stranger.
spanish: No deberías aceptar dulces de un desconocido.

english: Tom told me he knew where Mary lived.
spanish: Tom me dijo que él sabía dónde vive María.

english: I thought Tom had quit smoking.
spanish: Pensé que Tom había dejado de fumar.

english: She has never gone on a date with him.
spanish: Ella nunca ha salido con él.

english: Did you buy a round trip ticket?
spanish: ¿Compraste un billete de ida y vuelta?

english: Please come as soon as possible.
spanish: Por favor, ven lo más pronto posible.

english: Tom arrived home at 2:30.
spanish: Tom llegó a casa a las dos y media.

english: What about the other one?
spanish: ¿Qué tal el otro?

english: I usually get up at six.
spanish: Yo normalmente me levanto a las seis.

english: Japan is the best country under the sun.
spanish: Japón es el mejor país bajo el sol.

english: Tom has a sore knee.
spanish: A Tom le duele una rodilla.

english: Why did I do that?
spanish: ¿Por qué lo he hecho?

english: They need food and water.
spanish: Necesitan comida y agua.

english: Let's go have a chat with Tom.
spanish: Tengamos una charla con Tom.

english: Many lives were lost in the accident.
spanish: Se perdieron muchas vidas en el accidente.

english: I saw Shin'ichi in Kakogawa yesterday.
spanish: Ayer vi a Shin'ichi en Kakogawa.

english: We regret that you have to leave.
spanish: Sentimos que tengas que irte.

english: He will be back in an hour.
spanish: Él volverá en una hora.

english: She wants to hug him.
spanish: Ella quiere abrazarle.

english: I've heard a lot about you.
spanish: He oído mucho acerca de usted.

english: He's three years older than she is.
spanish: Él es tres años mayor que ella.

english: Do you want to get married?
spanish: ¿Quieres casarte?

english: Tom showed up Monday night.
spanish: Tom apareció el lunes por la noche.

english: Those are our teachers' cars.
spanish: Esos son los autos de nuestros profesores.

english: I sprained my finger while playing volleyball.
spanish: Me torcí el dedo mientras jugaba voleibol.

english: We want to take your blood pressure.
spanish: Queremos medir tu presión sanguínea.

english: I'm surprised at your behavior.
spanish: Estoy sorprendido de tu comportamiento.

english: I've got a newspaper article I want to show you.
spanish: Tengo un artículo de un periódico que quiero que veas.

english: He seemed worried about his health.
spanish: Él parecía preocupado por su salud.

english: Tom told everybody what was on his mind.
spanish: Tom les dijo a todos lo que tenía en mente.

english: You should drink a lot of liquid.
spanish: Deberías beber mucho líquido.

english: She writes me every week.
spanish: Ella me escribe cada semana.

english: He explained why the experiment failed.
spanish: Él explicó por qué el experimento fracasó.

english: If I had enough money, I could buy it.
spanish: Si tuviese dinero suficiente, lo podría comprar.

english: Are you coming with us?
spanish: ¿Vienes con nosotras?

english: I thought you wouldn't notice that Tom wasn't here.
spanish: Pensé que no te darías cuenta de que Tom no estaba aquí.

english: I think this is a waste of time.
spanish: Creo que esto es una pérdida de tiempo.

english: I can't thank you enough.
spanish: No puedo agradecerte lo suficiente.

english: She didn't send me any letter.
spanish: Ella no me mandó ninguna carta.

english: Did you have a good time yesterday?
spanish: ¿Os lo pasasteis bien ayer?

english: I live ten miles from the city.
spanish: Vivo a diez millas de la ciudad.

english: Sorry, but your brother is an idiot.
spanish: Lo siento, pero tu hermano es un idiota.

english: I need to borrow this broom.
spanish: Necesito pedir prestado esta escoba.

english: I want to go to school.
spanish: Quiero ir a la escuela.

english: She was absorbed in reading the magazine.
spanish: Ella estaba absorta leyendo la revista.

english: Tom is due to arrive here soon.
spanish: Tom debería llegar aquí pronto.

english: My film has run out.
spanish: Se me acabó el rollo.

english: You'd make a lovely couple.
spanish: Haríais una pareja encantadora.

english: Please tell me about it.
spanish: Por favor cuéntame sobre ello.

english: You needn't do it at once.
spanish: No hace falta que lo hagas de una vez.

english: I know what I did wasn't right.
spanish: Sé que lo que hice era incorrecto.

english: We should let sleeping dogs lie.
spanish: Deberíamos dejar descansar a los perros dormidos.

english: The handkerchiefs are in the drawer.
spanish: Los pañuelos están en el cajón.

english: The children ran down the hill.
spanish: Los niños bajaron corriendo la colina.

english: Tom and I ate together in the school cafeteria.
spanish: Tom y yo comimos juntos en la cafetería.

english: He died a few hours later.
spanish: Murió algunas horas más tarde.

english: I'd like to live in Australia.
spanish: Me gustaría vivir en Australia.

english: It takes time to get over a divorce.
spanish: Toma tiempo superar un divorcio.

english: It's been my dream since I was a little girl.
spanish: Ése ha sido mi sueño desde que era una niña pequeña.

english: Tom sat on a stool in the corner.
spanish: Tom se sentó en un taburete en la esquina.

english: Please give me a glass of water.
spanish: Dame un vaso de agua, por favor.

english: My French is a little rusty.
spanish: Mi francés está un poco oxidado.

english: He's going to love this.
spanish: Le va a encantar esto.

english: This house has three bathrooms.
spanish: Esta casa tiene tres baños.

english: A selfish man thinks of nothing but his own feelings.
spanish: Un hombre egoísta sólo piensa en sus propios sentimientos.

english: You must continue to train.
spanish: Debes seguir entrenando.

english: I'm not good at classifying things.
spanish: No soy bueno clasificando cosas.

english: He always says one word too many.
spanish: Él siempre dice una palabra de más.

english: Do you want to do it?
spanish: ¿Quieres hacerlo?

english: Do you know much about Tom?
spanish: ¿Sabe usted mucho acerca de Tom?

english: I know the man you came with.
spanish: Yo conozco al hombre con quien viniste.

english: Are you certain about this?
spanish: ¿Estáis seguras de esto?

english: Tom is hard to handle.
spanish: Tom es difícil de tratar.

english: I know Tom is tired.
spanish: Sé que Tom está cansado.

english: The weather was very good today.
spanish: Hoy hace muy buen tiempo.

english: Do you take me for a complete beginner?
spanish: ¿Me tomas por un completo principiante?

english: He didn't want to disappoint his mother.
spanish: Él no quería decepcionar a su madre.

english: I received a good job offer.
spanish: He recibido una buena oferta de trabajo.

english: Can you spare me a few minutes?
spanish: ¿Tienes unos minutos?

english: He brought us sad news.
spanish: Él nos trajo noticias tristes.

english: As I see it, that is the best way.
spanish: Como yo lo veo, esa es la mejor forma.

english: Tom can't find his keys.
spanish: Tom no encuentra sus llaves.

english: I won't go down without a fight.
spanish: No caeré sin presentar batalla.

english: I want to be rich.
spanish: Quiero ser rica.

english: They are both working at the pet store.
spanish: Ellos dos trabajan en la tienda de mascotas.

english: The ship changed its course.
spanish: El barco cambió de rumbo.

english: Keep your room as neat as you can.
spanish: Mantén tu recámara tan ordenada como puedas.

english: When was the last time you played violin?
spanish: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que tocaste violín?

english: Such a thing can't happen in Japan.
spanish: Una cosa así no puede pasar en Japón.

english: If you don't understand, ask.
spanish: Si no entendés, preguntá.

english: We watched a baseball game on television.
spanish: Vimos un partido de béisbol en televisión.

english: Are you going to attend the meeting tonight?
spanish: ¿Vas a asistir a la reunión de esta noche?

english: I'm not sure if it's a boy or a girl.
spanish: No estoy segura de si es un niño o una niña.

english: Her composition was free from mistakes.
spanish: Su redacción estaba libre de fallos.

english: I was impressed by his music.
spanish: Estaba impresionado con su música.

english: The puppy wants to sleep.
spanish: El cachorro quiere dormir.

english: The United States is the greatest country in the world.
spanish: Estados Unidos es el mejor país del mundo.

english: The chances are very good that our team will win.
spanish: Las chances de que nuestro equipo gane son muy buenas.

english: Call me up whenever you need my help.
spanish: Llámame cuando sea que necesites mi ayuda.

english: I don't know how to put it in Japanese.
spanish: No sé cómo expresar eso en japonés.

english: I don't want to hear any more of your complaining.
spanish: No quiero escuchar tus quejas nunca más.

english: I can't believe I'm telling you this.
spanish: No puedo creer que te esté contando esto.

english: How much does Tom weigh?
spanish: ¿Cuánto pesa Tom?

english: How much money do you want?
spanish: ¿Cuánto dinero quieres?

english: Please wait outside of the house.
spanish: Por favor espere afuera de la casa.

english: He was deaf to my pleas.
spanish: Hizo oídos sordos a mis ruegos.

english: I wouldn't like to meet him in a dark place.
spanish: No me gustaría encontrármelo en un lugar oscuro.

english: I felt that the plan was unwise.
spanish: Me di cuenta de que el plan no era sensato.

english: Should we change the Australian flag?
spanish: ¿Deberíamos cambiar la bandera de Australia?

english: Don't forget to send the letter.
spanish: No se olvide de enviar la carta.

english: Where there is smoke there is fire.
spanish: Donde hubo fuego cenizas quedan.

english: I studied his face for signs of weariness.
spanish: Estudié su cara buscando signos de agotamiento.

english: What did you do with my luggage?
spanish: ¿Qué hiciste con mi equipaje?

english: She asked him to give her some money.
spanish: Ella le pidió que le diera algo de dinero.

english: If you mix blue and red, the result is purple.
spanish: Si mezclás azul y rojo, el resultado es púrpura.

english: Are you an idiot or what?
spanish: ¿Serás idiota o qué?

english: Ask him to attend the meeting.
spanish: Pídele que asista a la reunión.

english: He answered all the questions in ten minutes.
spanish: Él respondió todas las preguntas en diez minutos.

english: It is said that smoking is bad for your health.
spanish: Es sabido que fumar es malo para tu salud.

english: I'm going to be there.
spanish: Voy a estar allí.

english: Are you going to cut down all the trees here?
spanish: ¿Vas a derribar todos los árboles de aquí?

english: We didn't want to upset Tom.
spanish: No queríamos hacer enfadar a Tom.

english: He has a perfect command of English.
spanish: Tiene un perfecto dominio del inglés.

english: Tom seems like a reliable person.
spanish: Tom parece ser una persona seria.

english: They say that I'm an old woman.
spanish: Dicen que soy una vieja.

english: Reading is one of life's great pleasures.
spanish: Leer es uno de los grandes placeres de la vida.

english: I haven't seen anything of her lately.
spanish: No he sabido nada de ella últimamente.

english: How far is it from here?
spanish: ¿Qué tan lejos está de aquí?

english: Tom heard Mary talking in her sleep.
spanish: Tom escuchó a Mary hablando en el sueño.

english: I don't like this jacket.
spanish: No me gusta esta chaqueta.
